description: This drink got the nickname "Bangin' Margarita" due to the fact that the contributor makes all their drinks rather strong, and this one gave everybody at their last "Disturbing B-Movie & Margarita Night" a banging headache in the morning.  They liked it, though.Rim a hurricane glass lip with salt (moisten with some lime juice). Add the tequila, triple sec and Rose's lime juice, then fill the rest of the glass with ice cubes until the level of liquor reaches the salt rimmed top. Serve.
instructions: Rim a hurricane glass lip with salt (moisten with some lime juice). Add the tequila, triple sec and Rose's lime juice, then fill the rest of the glass with ice cubes until the level of liquor reaches the salt rimmed top. Serve.

name: Bangin' Your Wife's Girlfriend
instructions: Build over ice in glass.

name: Banging On The Hardwood Floor
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice (except the cola). Strain into glass. Then add the cola and stir.

name: Bangkok Bomb
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with ice and blend until frothy. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Banilla Splash
instructions: Add all ingredients to a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, add a cherry and serve.

name: Bankers Doom
instructions: Put the spirits in together then add the soda water. Stir.

name: Bar Bandit
instructions: Add to an ice-filled highball glass, and garnish with a cherry and slice of lime.

name: Bar Slut
instructions: Add vodka to a mason jar filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and Red Bull and splash 7-up on top. Stir and enjoy!

name: Barbados Planter's Punch
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and pour into a chilled collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, a slice of banana, a maraschino cherry and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Barbados Punch
instructions: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime slice and a pineapple wedge.

name: Barbarian
instructions: Pour root beer into mug. Add a shot of Blackberry Brandy.

name: Barcelona
instructions: Add to an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of seville orange speared with a cherry, and paper parasol.

name: Barcelona Fizz
instructions: Shake the sherry, gin, lemon juice and syrup in a shaker. Strain into a frosted highball glass half filled with ice, then add chilled soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry, and serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Bargo
instructions: Pour the brandy and vodka into a mason jar. Add the root beer and a splash of red wine, and serve.

name: Barkeep Special
instructions: Shake and serve in Highball glass over ice. Add slice of orange and cherry skewed together (optional).

name: Barking Spider
instructions: Serve over ice in a collins glass, or blend for a frozen version of this drink.

name: Barn Door
instructions: Pour into a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Float the cranberry juice.

name: Barnaby's Buffalo Blizzard
instructions: Blend ingredients (except cream) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Top with whipped cream. Serve with a cherry.

name: Barney Fizz
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with ice and pour into a collins glass.

name: Barney Obliterator
instructions: Put the shot of of Vodka and 99 Blackberries into a shaker, with ice. Then add the Grapeade/Grapejuice. Shake well. After that, prepare glass with adiquate   ice. First, add the Red Bull to the glass, then the mix from the shaker and stir gently until completely mixed. Add a purple straw for more character affect. Use more or less Grapeade/Grape Juice to suite your taste. Enjoy!

name: Barney on Acid Highball
instructions: Build ingredients on ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Barqs & Brandy
instructions:
Pour a good Brandy into large glass filled with cubed ice. 

Hold glass at slight angle while filling up glass with Barqs. 

Stir lightly. 

Test before squeezing small lemon slice.

Best in Collins or HighBall glasses.  Needs to be Barq's, or another strong root beer (not A&W or Hensen's).  Barq's is also one of few root beer's with caffeine, giving you the perfect kick.

name: Barracks Bash
instructions: Pour 7-up Plus into glass, then drop in shot of JíƒÂ¤germeister and slam it.

name: Barracuda Bite
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Bartender In A Cup
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled highball glass.

name: Bartender's Cream Soda
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass with ice.

name: Bartender's Rootbeer
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker, shake until foamy, pour into mug. Should come out foamy, like rootbeer!

name: Baseball Pleasure
instructions: Begin by making a standard Screwdriver (OJ and vodka). Add the whiskey and the amaretto, mix and serve.

name: Baso
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into a highball glass, garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Bastardo
instructions: Build in a highball glass and fill with club soda.

name: Bat Bite
instructions: Pour the spiced rum over ice cubes in a glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and add a splash of grenadine. Stir, and serve.

name: Bat Chain Puller
instructions: Pour the cherry vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Dr. Pepper and orange juice, stir and serve.

name: Batida Abacaxi
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well, pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Batida Abaci
instructions: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a wine glass.

name: Batida de Banana
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Batida de Brazil
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Batida de Carneval
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Batida de Maracuja
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Batida Mango
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well, pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Batida Morango
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well, pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Batman
instructions: Mix all. Serve cold.

name: Battering Ram
instructions: Mix vodka and tequila in a highball glass, fill up with ice cold Battery and add a dash of lime. Stir and serve.

name: Battery Skydiver
instructions: Mix all ingredients together with an ice cube or two, shaking vigorously and pour into a highball glass over 3 - 5 ice cubes. Serve.

name: BaWanna Tom
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with crushed ice until smooth. Garnish with shaved white and milk chocolate and serve with a large straw or spoon.

name: Bawlers
description: It's a special guaranna in Bawls that is sweet and makes this drink good. You can use flavored vodka if you feel it necessary, but true bawlers go for the straight up kind.Put the Absolut in the bottom of the glass, add ice and then slowly pour the Bawls energy drink into the vodka, no need to stir, just drink up.
instructions: Put the Absolut in the bottom of the glass, add ice and then slowly pour the Bawls energy drink into the vodka, no need to stir, just drink up.

name: Bay Blue
instructions: Pour the vodka, the schnapps and the 7-up in a highball glass. Then add in slowly the cranberry juice. Float the blue curacao on top. If done right you'll have a nice multi-coloured drink.

name: Bay Breeze
instructions: First, add cubed ice, then add the three parts stoli, then add the pineapple juice and last but not least, add the cranberry juice for color.

name: Bay Spritzer
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour in rum, squirt in lime juice, fill glass with 7-up and add a splash of grenadine and stir.

name: Bayard Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Bayou Self
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan spiced rum, butterscotch schnapps and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice. Top with grenadine, and garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of pineapple.

name: Baywatch
instructions: Shake the vodka, the galliano and the juice in a shaker. Then add ice and finally put cream on top. A little bit of chocolate makes it look really great. Should be served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: Bazooka Bull
instructions: Pour them both over ice. Tastes just like Bazooka Joe Bubble Gum!

name: Bazooka Joe #2
instructions: Pour the Bacardi limon into a collins glass. Add a small, 8 oz can or thereabouts of Red Bull. Stir well, and serve.

name: BC Snowball
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a frosty champagne flute, and serve.

name: Be Sweet
instructions: Add a few ice cubes and fill the glass with ginger ale.

name: Beach Bum
instructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir.

name: Beach Bum Bob
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass.

name: Beach Bum Shake
instructions: Pour the tequila, orange juice, vodka and triple sec into a cocktail shaker with crushed ice and shake for about a minute. Strain into hurricane glass. Add a tiny umbrella and slice of lemon (optional), and serve.

name: Beach Bum's Cooler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice. Add a paper umbrella, and serve.

name: Beach Cooler
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Beach Cruiser
instructions: Pour spiced rum, pineapple juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Beach Sunday
instructions: Pour vodka and raspberry liqueur over ice. Add cranberry juice, and the freshly squeezed lime juice. Stir and serve.

name: Beachcomber #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Beady Little Eyes
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except ginger ale. Shake and pour back into glass. Add ginger ale and stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Beakers Blue
instructions: Add ice cubes, stir, and garnish with cherry.

name: Beam 'n Squirt
instructions: Pour both ingredients over 6 ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Beam and 7
instructions: Pour whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add 7-up, and serve.

name: Beam Black Bourbon
instructions: In a drink mixer, place crushed ice & the Black Bourbon followed by the Crown Royal, then follow these by the cola and the soda, mix it up and place it in a Collins glass and add a Cherry, then enjoy!

ingredients.name: Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey

name: Beam Scream
instructions: Mix shots in 3-4 oz glass, stir, then drain it.

name: Beatle Juice
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. In shaker with scoop of ice combine all alcohol and fill with sour mix. Shake. Strain into glass and add grenadine for color and top with 7-up. Garnish with a lime and cherry.

name: Beau's Rum and Coke
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Beautiful Disaster
instructions: Empty the mickey into a half-empty bottle of sprite. Put the cap on, and turn upside down slowly a few times - allowing it to mix. Serve in a collins glass with ice.

name: Beautiful Lady
description: Invented by "The Legacy" in Saint Peter, MN.  Popular with the females who've ever had one.Pour approx. 3 shots (change to taste) of Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass.  Add approx 2 shots each of orange and pineapple juice. Add a splash of half & half for color. Drip a little grenadine into mix for cool effect.  Tastes like heaven, so watch out after a few.
instructions: Pour approx. 3 shots (change to taste) of Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass.  Add approx 2 shots each of orange and pineapple juice. Add a splash of half & half for color. Drip a little grenadine into mix for cool effect.  Tastes like heaven, so watch out after a few.

name: Beautiful Mila
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Beautiful Side Ride
instructions: Pour the cognac, Grand Marnier and triple sec into a highball glass in that order. Add sweet and sour mix and Sprite (or 7-Up) lemon-lime soda, both to taste. Serve.

name: Beauty On The Beach
instructions: Pour white rum, Southern Comfort, Grand Marnier, lemon juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Beaver Shot
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass, and serve.

name: Beck's Butter Beer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Becky's Bomber
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodkas and fill with cranberrry juice.

name: Bee
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir well and garnish with a cherry.

name: Beef Curtains
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a champagne tulip glass, and serve.

name: Beef Salad
instructions: Add to an ice-filled highball glass, and serve with in-season fruit and straws.

name: Beer Rose
instructions: Stir ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Beergarita
instructions: Mix all ingredients except the lager in a blender with ice. Pour into a large pilsner/pint glass, then add the Corona (which should be chilled) over the top. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Beezer Punch
instructions: Stir the vodka, rum and orange juice together over crushed ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Beige Russian
instructions: Pour the vodka, Tia Maria and chocolate milk into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Belgian Blue
instructions: Pour all ingredients into the glass and stir.

name: Belinda's Fuzzy Melon
instructions: Shake and strain into a highball glass.

name: Belize Rum Punch
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice, add first 5 ingredients then top off with pineapple juice. Shake thoroughly. Add a dash or two of grenadine, stir gently and then listen to the sound of the warm Carribean breezes flowing through the palm trees.

name: Bella
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice and pour into a hurricane glass; top with cherry.

name: Belladonna
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass full of ice cubes.

name: Bellatrix Ball
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bellevue
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Bellini
instructions: Pour peach puree into glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a peach slice.

name: Bellini #3
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a blender with ice; blend well. Pour into a Champagne flute, and serve.

name: Bellini Cocktail
instructions:
Mix the peach nectar, lemon juice and schnapps in a chilled glass. Add half a cup (or more) of crushed ice, stir, and add the champagne. (Serves 2).

May be prepared in a blender to produce a frozen drink.

name: Bend Over Shirley
instructions: Fill a 12oz. glass with cubed ice. Add 1.5 oz. of Raspberry Vodka. Add Sprite, and top off with Grenadine. Garnish with two Maraschino Cherries.

name: Benelyn
instructions: Pour the tequila, Southern Comfort and peach schnapps into a tall glass. Add Hoopers Hooch and Red Bull. Top with cranberry juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Benka on the Rocks
instructions: Pour the whiskey and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass. Fill with chilled ginger ale, and serve.

name: Bent Bum
instructions: Fill Collins Glass with a heaping of ice. Pour in Vodka, Gin, 1/2 of remaining glass with O.J., then rest with Grapefruit. Skake, don't stir. Then add a healthy splah of Coca-cola.

name: Bermuda Bouquet
instructions: Pour the gin, apricot brandy, triple sec, grenadine, sugar and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bermuda Highball
instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Bermuda Mai Tai
instructions: Fill a martini shaker about half full with ice cubes. Pour about a shot of tequila, triple sec, peach schnapps, and light rum. Fill with a roughly equal amount of pineapple juice (to taste), and shake well. Pour into a large glass with crushed ice. Top off with dark rum and stir a little. Garnish and serve.

name: Bermuda Triangle
instructions: Add ingredients over ice, stir gently and garnish with a fresh orange slice.

name: Bernardete
instructions: The Bernardete is very sweet, lots of fun and yet very easy to mix. Just put 3-4 ice cubes in a tall glass and cover with the Peach Liqueur. Then fill up the glass to the top with Peach Juice. Both ingredients should have been in the fridge before serving.

name: Berries 'n Cream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with the crushed ice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into a single large glass, two medium-sized glasses or 4/5 cocktail glasses. Garnish with strawberries, blueberries or raspberries.

name: Berry Bananza
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Berry Bomb
instructions: Put 2 shots of vodka in glass, pour in 1 can of chilled Sprite berry clear, stir, drink, and be merry!

name: Berry Cool
instructions: Muddle fruit in glass with ice, add alcohol and shake with more ice. Strain into glass filled with crushed ice, top with cranberry juice. To garnish, slice a strawberry in half and make a slice halfway so it sits on the rim, and spear a sliver of orange peel into the top.

name: Berry Me In The Sand
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a small highball glass, and serve.

name: Berry Rum Rickey
instructions: Shake the first 5 ingredients and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top glass with a small dash of soda. garnish with berries and serve.

name: Berryessa Blast
instructions: Pour the gold rum and Southern Comfort into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add guava juice to taste, and serve.

name: Berrynice
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry on the glass, and with another summer berry held on with a toothpick.

name: Berrytini
instructions: Pour the vodka and framboise into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberries, and serve.

name: Berta's Special
instructions: Combine the tequila, honey, orange bitters, egg white and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda water, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Betsie Temple
instructions: Pour the pineapple juice and Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Drizzle a little grenadine on top and throw however many cherries you like on top of that.... tastes like candy.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Betsy Clear
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Stir. Garnish with an orange wedge. Enjoy!

name: Better Than Sex
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, Haagen Dazs cream liqueur, Grand Marnier and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Float the cream on top, and serve.

name: Between The Cheeks
instructions: Pour the Bacardi dark rum, brandy, triple sec and Rose's lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with two maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Bible Belt
instructions: Mix all ingredients, pour over ice, and serve.

name: Biekert
description: Huge drink in Lincoln, NE. Ironically named after arch rival University of Colorado linebacker, Greg Biekert.Pour the Captain Morgan rum over crushed ice in a highball glass. Add the orange juice, stir and serve.
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan rum over crushed ice in a highball glass. Add the orange juice, stir and serve.

name: Big Apple
instructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass over three or four ice cubes and fill with apple juice. Pour creme de menthe, stir, and serve.

name: Big Apple And Sprite
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice, stir and enjoy!

name: Big Bad Voodoo Kooler
instructions: Sling Malibu, RedRum and Midori in a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with Orange, pineapple juices and a splash of soda. Mix it up with your swizzle stick and Go Daddy-O!

name: Big Bear
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Big Bird
instructions: Pour banana schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the way with pineapple and orange juice, and serve.

name: Big Chill #1
instructions: Pour the rum, coconut cream and juices into a cocktail shaker with one cup of ice (8 oz). Shake well, Strain into a pilsner glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Big Chill #2
instructions: Pour the dark rum, Kahlua, coffee, cream and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Top with vanilla ice cream, and serve.

name: Big Daddy
instructions: Pour over ice & stir.

name: Big Daddy Woo Woo
instructions: Mix ingredients in beer mug and enjoy.

name: Big Daddy's Crystal Meth
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Big Dog
instructions: Pour the Kahlua and vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add chilled milk almost to the brim of the glass. Top with a splash of Pepsi cola. Stir, and serve.

name: Big Dumb Russian
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. I like to use a standard beer glass. Add about 2 shots of vodka. Then fill the glass about 3/4th of the way with Sprite. Then add just a splash of pineapple juice. Finally, add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost skyblue) blue color. Stir.

name: Big Dumb Russian #2
description: This was inspiried by the original "Big Dumb Russian". It uses Blue Curacao instead.Fill a 16-oz. pint glass with ice cubes. Add 2 oz of vodka, then fill the glass to slightly more than 3/4 full with Sprite. Add pineapple juice to the glass, then add enough blue curacao to give it a "Caribbean ocean blue" color.
instructions: Fill a 16-oz. pint glass with ice cubes. Add 2 oz of vodka, then fill the glass to slightly more than 3/4 full with Sprite. Add pineapple juice to the glass, then add enough blue curacao to give it a "Caribbean ocean blue" color.

name: Big Easy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Big Johnson
instructions: Pour the vodka, Jack Daniel's Country Cocktails (Downhome Punch flavor), 7-Up, and sweetened lime juice into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Pour grenadine around the side of the glass for effect, and serve.

name: Big Red
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Big Red Hooter
instructions: Pour Tequila and Amaretto over ice into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Big Red Hooter #2
instructions:
Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a pint glass or 500ml tall glass. Fill to the top with ice. Carefully add the vodka which should remain seperate above the Midori. Pour orange and cranberry juice in equal measures until the glass is 3/4 full. Pour a ring of cherry brandy. Add 1/3 of a can of red-bull (or similar energy drink), and finally pour a ring of galliano on top, and serve.

When done correctly the glass will be almost full, there will be a green layer at the bottom from the midori and the rest of the drink will be red.

name: Big Skyy
instructions: Put slices of lemon and lime into glass. Pour in rum, and then vodka. Add a little crushed ice. Next fill the cup up with Sprite. Stir.

name: Big Squeeze
instructions: Pour the vodka and berry punch into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Big Stick
instructions: Build over ice in an 11 oz. glass. Looks and tastes like a big stick popsicle.

name: Big Zacs Morning After
instructions: Combine ingredients in a pint glass with plenty of ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Bigger Better Blue Lagoon
instructions: Pour over ice in glass. Shake or stir, add cherry and if you would like an additional splash of color, add a few drops of cherry grenadine.

name: Bikini Bottom
instructions: Blend all ingredients except for the orange slice with a handful of crushed ice and pour into glass. Place orange slice on the rim.

name: Bill Murray and The Ghostbusters
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a beer mug, stir lightly and serve.

name: Billionaire
instructions: Combine everything but the sour mix into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill up with sour mix.

name: Billy Taylor
instructions: Pour gin and juice of lime into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Binford
description: Binford seems to be a popular newcomer to the cocktail world. The drink, according to the contributor, was invented at Tufts AEPi fraternity and is already becoming a legend. Yum.Shake all ingredients and strain over ice in a 16-oz highball glass.
instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain over ice in a 16-oz highball glass.

name: Bingo
instructions: Build in highball glass with lots of ice. Garnish with slice of orange and cocktail cherry.

name: Birch Beam
instructions: Pour Jim Beam whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with birch beer, stir lightly and serve.

name: Bird Bomb
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass half-way with ice. Add the Absolut vodka and DeKuyper Cheri-Beri Pucker. Fill with lemonade, and serve.

name: Bird of Paradise Cooler
instructions: Pour the gin, lemon juice, grenadine, superfine sugar and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda/sparkling water. Stir well, and serve.

name: Bird of Paradise Fizz
instructions: Shake ingredients (except soda) well and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add the soda, and garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry. Serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Birdman's Delight
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Bishop Cocktail
instructions: Shake juice of lemon, juice of orange, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add two ice cubes, fill with burgundy, and stir well. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

name: Bison Tonic
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Bit of Russian Honey
instructions: Add ingredients (cream as desired), shake and pour over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Bitch Ass
instructions: Add rum and vodka to a hurricane glass full of ice. Fill with desired amount of pineapple and orange juice, topping with a splash of cranberry. Squeeze a lime wedge over it and then drop it in.

name: Bitch Slap
instructions: Mix vodka, 7-up, gin, everclear and rum together over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, and serve.

name: Bitch Slap #3
description:
This Bitch Slap became very popular at local parties in Phoenix. 

The name derives from the reaction of the drinker after finishing the drink; it smacks you upside the head when your not paying attention. Thanks to Vada for contributing this drink recipe. Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Bitches Ain't Shit
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bitchin Orange
instructions: Pour the amaretto into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the sour mix and top with orange soda. Add a splash of grenadine and a cherry for garnish, and serve.

name: Bite Your Mama Bloody Mary
instructions: Combine all ingredients together with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker, and pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pickle spear, olives, and a lime slice.

name: Bitter Bison
instructions: Pour vodka, vermouth and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bitter Christina
instructions: Pour Martini & Rossi Dry Vermouth into a highball glass filled with ice. Add sloe gin and Pisang Ambon. Stir well. Fill with Schweppes bitter lemon, and serve.

name: Bitter Hitter
instructions: Place all the fruits in a blender and puree, add blue curacao and Cointreau then pulse until combined. Add water and ice and pulse until combined. Serve in tall glass with rim dipped in sugar and lemon juice and a slice of orange on side.

name: Bitters Highball
instructions: Sprinkle dashes of angostura bitters over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Bittersweet With A Twist
instructions: Add all liquid ingredients to mason jar and add ice to taste. Stir well and add slice of lemon.

name: Bjorns Moscow Mule
instructions: Pour lemon juice and vodka into a collins glass. Mix together, fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Black Anaconda
instructions: Chill all three ingredients. Mix in shaker and pour into frosted mason jar.

name: Black and Blue Buck
instructions: Pour the jagermeister over several ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Mountain Dew Pitch Black, and serve.

name: Black and White Cherry
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until the ice is crushed and the entire drink is creamy. Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with whipped cream and cherry, and serve.

name: Black Berry Chocolate
instructions: Pour Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Bailey's irish cream into a mug. Add hot chocolate and whipped cream, garnish with shaved dark chocolate, and serve.

name: Black Bison
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Black Bottom
instructions: Pour the brandy, Cointreau, blackberry brandy, gin, lemon juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Black Bull
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Black Butterfly
instructions: Shake brandy and cranberry juice with ice in a mixer; pour into hurricane glass; add 7-up; garnish with cranberries and serve.

name: Black Cat #2
instructions: Pour the Kirschwasser, vodka and grenadine into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice. Stir well. Add cola to taste, and serve.

name: Black Cherry
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Shake, top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Black Cherry Coke
instructions: Pour 2-3 shots of Black Haus into glass and add cola.

name: Black Cherry Fizz Bomb
instructions: Pour the Cherry 7-UP into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Smirnoff watermelon vodka, and top with Red Bull. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Black Dahlia
instructions: Mix the JíƒÂ¤germeister and Red Bull first, then pour in the vodka.

name: Black Flag
instructions: Dissolve honey and molasses in a mixing glass with the boiling water. Stir until they are well dissolved, then add rum and some crushed ice and stir again. Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Black Forest
instructions: Shake ingredients together and pour into glass. Add a little more cream as a floater, then add a cherry.

name: Black Fruit Tree
instructions: Add all ingredients to glass with ice and stir.

name: Black Haus Chimney
instructions: Pour the Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a mug. Top with hot chocolate and fresh whipped cream.

name: Black Hole
instructions: Fill glass 2/3 with ice, add Sambuca and fill with soda.

name: Black Ice
description: Black Ice is a popular beverage on the Michigan Tech campus. It was shared by a Mr Caesar Peterson.Pour the Kahlua and Rumple Minze into a highball glass and pour the Coca-cola over the top. Put the glass to your mouth and enjoy the flavor.
instructions: Pour the Kahlua and Rumple Minze into a highball glass and pour the Coca-cola over the top. Put the glass to your mouth and enjoy the flavor.

name: Black Majic
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Black Mozart Sparkler
instructions: Shake ingredients in a shaker and pour into a champagne tulip. Top with dry red sparkling wine. Garnish with a red cherry on a cocktail stick, and serve.

name: Black Napkin
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and Captain Morgan spiced rum. Top with a healthy dose of Royal Crown cola. Serve unstirred topped with a lime wedge and maraschino cherry.

name: Black Nazi
instructions: Mix the Jagermeister and Mountain Dew Pitch Black over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Black Opal
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a beer glass. Garnish with a cherry and lemon wedge. When done right it should taste like a grape otter pop.

name: Black Russian #2
instructions: Pour Stoli, Kahlua into a highball glass over ice. Top with Coke and serve.

name: Black Sea Urchin
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Black Stripe
instructions: Dissolve the molasses in a mug with some boiling water. Add the cinnamon, a lemon twist and the remaining water. Float rum on top and ignite. Let the flame burn for a few seconds then stir to extinguish it and sprinkle some nutmeg on top to garnish.

name: Black Swedish Virgin
instructions: Mix on the rocks.

name: Black Temple
instructions: In a hurricane glass filled with ice, add Blackhuas and Grenadine then fill with 7-Up and Ginger Ale.

name: Black Tequila
instructions: Shake ingredients and pour into a champagne tulip. Top with dry sparkling wine, and serve.

name: Black Tie
instructions: Pour into a wine glass and garnish with a black grape.

name: Black Tooth
instructions: Pour the Jack Daniel's, Dr. Pepper and Coca-Cola into a beer mug (pint glass). Fill up with ice, and serve.

name: Black Ukrainian
instructions: Pour the vodka, Tia Maria coffee liqueur, Southern Comfort and Coca-cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Black Watch
instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a shaker 2/3 full of ice. Stir well - strain into a highball glass.

name: Blackbeard
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's, and root beer schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Coke or Pepsi and serve.

name: Blackbeard's Ghost
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass over ice and garnish with a cherry.

name: Blackberry 7
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Blackberry Cola
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Blackberry Fizz
instructions: Dissolve sugar, shake and strain ingredients (except lemonade) into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add the lemonade, and garnish with a cherry and orange slice. Serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Blackberry Julep
instructions: Shake blackberry liqueur, lemon juice and simple syrup with ice, and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Stir until the glass begins to frost. Garnish with the berry marinade, and serve.

name: Blackberry Punch
instructions: Pour the rum, blackberry liqueur, sugar and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Blackberry Smoothie
instructions: Combine the vanilla ice cream and blackberry brandy in a blender. Blend until smooth, pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Blackberry Tequila
instructions: Pour tequila, creme de cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour contents into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Blackdriver Haus
instructions: Pre-chill the Black Haus blackberry schnapps. Pour into a highball glass over ice, and add orange juice. Garnish with an orange wheel, and serve.

name: Blackula
instructions: Pour Blavod Vodka in hurricane glass with ice. Pour in Bloody Mary mix. Add jalepeno pickle for spicy taste.

name: Blame It On Rio
instructions: Pour the vodka, rum, amaretto, peach schnapps, banana liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Top with soda water, to taste. Squeeze in the juice from a lime wedge and drop the shell into the glass. Serve.

name: Blanqita
instructions: Pour Anisette, Kahlua, Pineapple Juice, and a handful of crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake hard. Then pour into a Collins glass. Garnish with the slice of pineapple.

name: Blastula
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a champagne flute.

name: Bleeding Apple
instructions: Add currant vodka and raspberry liqueur to a glass with ice. Fill with apple juice and add a dash of grenadine. Add diced pieces of fruit.

name: Bleeding Nazi
instructions: Add the tomato juice, Tabasco, Worcestershire, and Jager into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge if you like, and serve.

name: Bleeding Orgasm #2
description:
Invented by Maxiie Paige, this drink by the name of Bleeding Orgasm is usually enjoyed at private social events where alcohol costs significantly less. 

It's popularity exists minutely in several British cities; Leicester, Leeds, Nottingham, Birmingham. Often enjoyed with a cigarette.Firstly, it is reccomended that you hold a shot (1-oz) of absinthe in your mouth for around 30 seconds, then swallow. After the shot of absinthe, drink the concoction through a straw (serve at room temperature, strictly neither too warm, nor too cold). Follow up with a double shot (2-oz) of sambuca for that sweet aftertaste. Finally, relax + watch the room go funny.
instructions: Firstly, it is reccomended that you hold a shot (1-oz) of absinthe in your mouth for around 30 seconds, then swallow. After the shot of absinthe, drink the concoction through a straw (serve at room temperature, strictly neither too warm, nor too cold). Follow up with a double shot (2-oz) of sambuca for that sweet aftertaste. Finally, relax + watch the room go funny.

name: Bleeding Snatch
instructions: Add ingredients together in highball glass stir with cinnamon stick, and enjoy your very own bleeding snatch.

name: Bleeding Surgeon
instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

name: Bleeding Weasel
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Bleeker
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Blended Comfort
instructions: Skin a peach quarter and add to a blender. Add Southern Comfort, bourbon, vermouth and juices. Blend on low for 10 - 15 seconds. Strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of both peach and orange, and serve.

name: Bleu Balls
instructions: Mix Alize Bleu and Hpnotiq together and shake. Pour the contents into the glass. Fill the rest of the glass with the Red Bull.

name: Blind Bat
instructions: Pour the Coca-cola into a tall glass, followed by the vodka. Add just a splash of Bacardi rum just for taste. Sit back and enjoy.

name: Blind Russian
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all liqueurs. Add milk. shake.

name: Blinder
instructions: Pour the scotch and grapefruit juice into a highball glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

name: Blindside
instructions: Pour strawberry syrup, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a large glass. Add vodka, and serve.

name: Bloated Bag of Monkey Spunk
instructions: Shake and strain into collins glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Blonde Moment
instructions: Mix over Ice and garnish with a cherry.

name: Blonde Ron
instructions: Just fill ice, then pour rum, 7up, and slash of pineapple.

name: Blonde Titty Beer
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass, ice and all.

name: Blonde's Death
instructions: Mix in the glass. Serve cool!

name: Blood
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a Champagne flute filled with crushed or shaven ice. Add more syrup if necessary to obtain a blood red complexion, and serve.

name: Blood Mary Extra Hairy
instructions: Shake all ingredients except celery in a martini shaker with ice. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with stalk of celery. Can optionally add olives, cocktail onions, or lemon/lime wedge. For a little lighter drink, cut this with a fourth to a half a can of light beer.

name: Blood Orange Blast
instructions: Mix all the liquid ingredients into a cocktail shaker and fill to the brim with ice. Shake until cold and then strain into a highball glass. Take the ice from the shaker and put into the glass. Take the blood orange slice and roll it around the edge of the glass and drop it in.

name: Bloodthirsty Pirate
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Bloody Bull
instructions: Pour vodka, tomato juice, and beef bouillon over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime and the wedge of lemon and serve.

name: Bloody Butrum
instructions: Roll all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a pint glass over ice, and serve.

name: Bloody Caesar
instructions: Rim tall glass with celery salt, fill with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick, straw, and lime.

name: Bloody Cherry
instructions: Pour vodka and grenadine into and ice-filled glass. Slowly add beer and 7-up. Serve plain or with cherries on top.

name: Bloody Coochie
instructions:
Fill a glass half full of ice.

Pour in the ingredients in order. Stir or shake. Serve.

name: Bloody Demon From Hell
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large glass. Garnish with a radish or a celery stick, and serve.

name: Bloody Dragon
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or highball glass with cracked ice, and serve.

name: Bloody Fairy
instructions: Pour absinthe over ice, add cranberry to taste, and top off with tonic.

name: Bloody Hell
description:
Bloody Hell, an intense drink which will change flavors as you drink it, killing you with the pain at first and finishing you off with salted ice. Apparently Bloody Hell was developed on from a Bloody Jack, which obviously wasn't fierce enough. All those who like it hot, this is for you, although be aware that the contributor originally listed "courage" as one of the ingredients. Scary.Pour the vodka over plenty o' ice cubes in a tall glass. Add the Worcestershire sauce and habanero sauce, and stir. (If you can't find Hot Sauce From Hell, use 5 dashes of the hottest Habanero sauce you can find, or 8-10 dashes of Tabasco as a last resort.) 

Pour in the V8 juice (tomato juice has no body and does not mix well so don't attempt to substitute it). Give one stir only. Cover the ice generously with salt and then with fresh, coursely ground black pepper (like so it sticks in your teeth and you gotta chew it).
instructions:
Pour the vodka over plenty o' ice cubes in a tall glass. Add the Worcestershire sauce and habanero sauce, and stir. (If you can't find Hot Sauce From Hell, use 5 dashes of the hottest Habanero sauce you can find, or 8-10 dashes of Tabasco as a last resort.) 

Pour in the V8 juice (tomato juice has no body and does not mix well so don't attempt to substitute it). Give one stir only. Cover the ice generously with salt and then with fresh, coursely ground black pepper (like so it sticks in your teeth and you gotta chew it).

ingredients.name: Hot Sauce From Hell® pepper sauce

name: Bloody Hurricane
instructions: Pour tequila into a collins glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Add 7-Up, and splash grenadine. Allow to chill for 10 seconds. Serve.

name: Bloody Leech
instructions: Place the crushed popsicle into the bottom of a tall glass. Add vodka (to taste) and kool-aid. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Bloody Mariana
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, add a stick of celery, and serve.

name: Bloody Mary #2
instructions: Combine vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, pepper, salt, celery salt, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a stick of celery and a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Bloody Mary #3
instructions: Pour pepper vodka and V-8 juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Float a slice of jalapeno pepper on top, and serve.

name: Bloody Mary #4
instructions: Combine lemon vodka, tomato juice and dill (use a dash of dried if no fresh available) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Float a slice of lemon on top, and serve.

name: Bloody Monkey
instructions: Half-fill a highball glass with ice. Pour the grenadine around the inside of the glass and on top of the ice to give that bloody look to it. Next, add the vodka (more if you prefer), then the sour apple pucker. Add the ginger ale, and then fill with 7-up. Garnish as desired, and serve.

name: Bloody Morning
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice, add vodka, worcestershire, tabasco, horseradish, and celery salt. Fill with tomato juice. Shake well and garnish with celery stalk, lemon and lime wedges. Salt & pepper to taste.

name: Bloody Murder
description: A hard-man's drink. Resident to College Station, Texas, where participants would drink Bloody Murder before fist-fighting in bottlecap alley.Mix the cayenne pepper in a small amount of vodka until dissolved. Add the remainder of vodka and mix again. Add tomato juice. Slice a habenero pepper and use to mix drink; place as garnish.
instructions: Mix the cayenne pepper in a small amount of vodka until dissolved. Add the remainder of vodka and mix again. Add tomato juice. Slice a habenero pepper and use to mix drink; place as garnish.

name: Bloody Navel
instructions: Add orange juice, vodka and peach schnapps in a glass with ice. Add splashes of grenadine.

name: Bloody Navel Screw
instructions: Mix Cointreau, rum, vodka, and peach schnapps in a glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with orange juice, leaving enough room to top with grenadine.

name: Bloody Nightmare
instructions: Pour the vodka, lime juice and cranberry juice into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Bloody Passion
instructions: Build in a highball glass.

name: Bloody Passion #2
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq into a tall glass with ice. Add the pineapple juice, then follow with a few splashes of grenadine. Stir and serve.

name: Bloody Pearl Harbor
instructions: Stir well with ice. Adding a few drops of hot sauce for flavor is optional.

name: Bloody Rain
description: This fresh and tangy drink was invented by Rich D of Chicago, Illinois. The name was inspired by popular Japanese anime OAV Rurouni Kenshin when Kenshin meets Tomoe for the first time on a rainy night.Pour 2 oz Vodka into glass, add 4 oz Snapple® Elements: RAIN energy drink, and top it off with a splash of Cranberry juice to give it that bloody water look. Optional: serve in an oriental tea bowl and garnish with a paper parasol for thematic appeal.
instructions: Pour 2 oz Vodka into glass, add 4 oz Snapple® Elements: RAIN energy drink, and top it off with a splash of Cranberry juice to give it that bloody water look. Optional: serve in an oriental tea bowl and garnish with a paper parasol for thematic appeal.

name: Bloody Sharkbite
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Bloody Smurf
instructions: Pour schnapps into glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and stir.

name: Bloody Smurf Jizz
description: Bloody Smurf Jizz was made by Andy Steinmuller and Nishan Chelvachandran, resident in Hudson Highlands NY. The drink is popular in New York State and in all good bars.Chill the grenadine. Pour the blue curacao into a champagne flute. Add the sprite to taste. Slowly pour the grenadine into the glass in order for it to sink. Add the Bailey's irish cream with a teaspoon slowly in the glass to allow it to float, and serve.
instructions: Chill the grenadine. Pour the blue curacao into a champagne flute. Add the sprite to taste. Slowly pour the grenadine into the glass in order for it to sink. Add the Bailey's irish cream with a teaspoon slowly in the glass to allow it to float, and serve.

name: Bloody Urine
instructions: Pour the liquor into a collins glass with 3 ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew and lime juice, and lastly the Tropicana, and serve.

name: Bloody Viking
instructions: Pour 3/4 of a mug of Newcastle and 1 shot of Jagermeister. Drop the shot into the mug and chug the mixture.

name: Blow Blue Bubbles
instructions: Pour blueberry schnapps into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Blow Job #2
instructions: Stir together the Smirnoff Raspberry Twist vodka and Sprite lemon-lime soda in a highball glass. Serve straight up.

name: Blowhole
instructions: Measure a highball glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except carbonated water. Shake and pour back into glass. Add carbonated water and stir.

name: Blowhole
description: This drink which is similar to the grasshopper, originates from Kiama in NSW, Australia. It gets it's name from Kiama's main attraction the blowhole.Measure out in a shot glass one shot of creme de menthe. Do the same with the dark creme de cacao. Pour the mixture into a large cocktail shaker. Add a small portion of ice to cool the drink down. Add 1 1/2 cups of full creme milk to the mixture. Shake in cocktail shaker. You may add more if desired. Filter out the ice whilst pouring into the glass. For decoration, squirt some chocolate syrup around the inside of the glass. Serve.
instructions: Measure out in a shot glass one shot of creme de menthe. Do the same with the dark creme de cacao. Pour the mixture into a large cocktail shaker. Add a small portion of ice to cool the drink down. Add 1 1/2 cups of full creme milk to the mixture. Shake in cocktail shaker. You may add more if desired. Filter out the ice whilst pouring into the glass. For decoration, squirt some chocolate syrup around the inside of the glass. Serve.

name: Blue Bastard
instructions: Place all ingredients in glass over ice, and shake. Serve with straw, and lemon wedge if desired.

name: Blue Bay
instructions: Mix in a highball glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Blue Bayou
instructions: Pour curacao and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade, stir, and serve.

name: Blue Bermuda
instructions: Mix over ice, garnish with a slice of pineapple.

name: Blue Bike
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir before serving.

name: Blue Bohemian
instructions: Shake ingredients, garnish with an orange twist and a cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Bombsicle
instructions: Pour ingredients into a glass over ice, and stir. Garnish with raspberries, and serve.

name: Blue Bong
instructions: Combine Absolut, Bombay Sapphire and Kool Aid into a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into hurricane glass over ice, add Blue Bubblegum Soda on top and squeeze in the lemon. Garnish with a Blueberry in the glass.

name: Blue Brew
description: Blue Brew was invented by Bob Hansen as his signature drink at a restaurant in Cedar Falls, Iowa.  One caution, it's a soothe and potent drink and can quickly become a mind eraser.Fill glass with ice and add liquer.Add sweet and sour to just over half and then finish filling with Sprite.  May also be blended slightly to change it up.  This recipie can be made as puch by using a bottle of each and then fill with sweet n sour to just over half and Sprite.
instructions: Fill glass with ice and add liquer.Add sweet and sour to just over half and then finish filling with Sprite.  May also be blended slightly to change it up.  This recipie can be made as puch by using a bottle of each and then fill with sweet n sour to just over half and Sprite.

name: Blue Champagne
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except champagne) over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Blue Coconut
instructions: Pour the coconut rum and blue curacao into a tall glass half-filled wtih ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with 7-up, stir lightly and serve.

name: Blue Colada
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple or a plastic monkey.

name: Blue Crayons
instructions: Pour blueberry flavored vodka into a highball glass over ice. Add a small can of chilled cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Blue Devil
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Blue Dolphin #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Dong
instructions: Mix Cointreau and blue curacao liqueur together in a highball glass and fill up with Sprite soda.

name: Blue Downy
instructions: Pour the light rum, blue curacao, coconut milk and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Shake or stir well. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Dream
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a pina colada glass over ice. Add the pina colada mix and blue curacao; serve unstirred to see color difference, stir when ready to drink. It's very pretty. Serve with whipped cream on top if you wish.

name: Blue Ed
instructions: Fill 16oz glass with Ice. Add liquor. Fill with sour.

name: Blue Eye
instructions: Fill the glass with ice and build ordinary with vodka, Battery, Sweet & Sour and Blue curacao at the end.

name: Blue Eyed Bitch
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Blue Fire
instructions: Pour the Jone's into a collins glass and mix in the Everclear well, before serving.

name: Blue Fizz
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice cubes into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except carbonated water. Shake and pour back into glass. Add carbonated water and stir.

name: Blue Frog
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Blue Glory
instructions: Pour the peppermint schnapps, blue curacao and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Blue Grapes
instructions: Combine Absolut, Kool-Aid and Sprite in a shaker, and shake well. Pour over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Blue Green
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Blue Hawaii
description: Blue Hawaii is a tasty recipe modified from a recipe on the reverse of a DeKuyper Blue Curacao bottle.Pour all ingredients into a shaker and shake thoroughly. Pour over crushed ice in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and shake thoroughly. Pour over crushed ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian
instructions: Blend light rum, blue curacao, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at high speed. Pour contents into a highball glass. Decorate with the slice of pineapple and a cherry.

name: Blue Hawaiian #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Heaven
instructions: Pour the blue curacao in the glass. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake amaretto, rum, and pineapple juice. Pour it in the glass and stir. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Blue Horizon
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Hotty
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Pina Colada glass (can be decorated by dipping the top of the glass in syrup and then in sugar). Also possible to use spoon to achieve layers. Serve.

name: Blue Ice #2
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Blue Ice Kool-Aid
instructions: Float hypnotiq on vodka, fill with tonic water and add the juice of one slice of lemon.

name: Blue Ice Mountain
instructions: Combine the first three ingredient into a high-ball glass. Stir well. Top with club soda.

name: Blue Incan
instructions: Place some mint leaves in the bottom of a highball glass. Bruise them with a muddle. Add ice and pour in the blue curacao and cranberry juice. Top off with club soda as desired, stir and serve.

name: Blue Insanity
instructions: Place some ice in a highball glass. Add the UV, blue curacao and triple sec. Top with Smirnoff, and serve.

name: Blue Knickers
instructions: Shake the Vodka, Blue Curacao, Galliano and pineapple juice in a shaker. Pour into glass and add a layer of cream to the top. Serve with a straw and an orange wedge. Drink is to be sipped through the straw.

name: Blue Lagoon
instructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Latvian
instructions: Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey into a mixing glass. Add blue raspberry juice until the mixture is more blue than brown. Finish with lemon-lime soda until the mixture is fizzing. Serve in a collins glass.

name: Blue Lesbian
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with blue Fruitopia fruit juice, stir, and add a dash of blue curacao. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve with a swizzler stick.

name: Blue Lightning
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, Southern Comfort and Wild Turkey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with prepared lime mix, and serve.

name: Blue Long Island
instructions: Typical long island with a kick. Pour into a collins glass on ice. Liquors first followed by sour mix and then blue curacao to preferance. Straw and garnish with a lemon.

name: Blue Marlin
instructions: Build ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Blue Memphis
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except curacao) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Add blue curacao and shake again briefly. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Midnight
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass, stir well, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Blue Monkey
instructions: Pour in hurricane glass with crushed ice. Stir or mix gently.

name: Blue Moon
instructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Blue Moon
instructions: Pour the Cointreau orange liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the lime juice, fill with lemonade and serve.

name: Blue Mother
instructions: Mix everything in the collins glass. Fill with 7-up.

name: Blue MotherFucker
description: There's a Purple Motherfucker, Green Motherfucker and Yellow Motherfucker. Now a Blue Motherfucker has been spotted in Athens, Georgia and Orlando, Florida. Here's how it goes.Shake ingredients, strain over ice in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Shake ingredients, strain over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Blue MotherFucker #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Motorcycle
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass. Fill with sour mix and add a splash of 7-Up.

name: Blue Motorcycle #2
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add the ingredients, shake and serve.

name: Blue Mouth
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice cubes into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except blue curacao. Shake well and pour back into glass. Drop blue curacao into the center of the drink and serve without stirring.

name: Blue Ninja
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Blue Nuke
instructions: Pour vodka, Bacardi 151, gin, blue curacao and blueberry liqueur into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour mix, stir well, and serve.

name: Blue Passion
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, blue curacao and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple flag, and serve.

name: Blue Pixie Stick
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Blue Punch
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Blue Richie
instructions: Stir the vanilla vodka, blueberry juice and apple juice together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 2 - 3 fresh blueberries.

name: Blue Ruby
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Blue Russian
instructions: Place 2 - 3 crushed ice cubes in a parfait glass. Pour the blue curacao over the ice, and add the vodka. Top with cream, and serve.

name: Blue Sapphire
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Blue Screw
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour Mandrin and Blue in, then fill it with OJ. Simple.

name: Blue Shizzle
instructions: Add Everclear, vodka, and Tampico orange punch in mixer with ice. Shake well. Pour into highball glass until 3/4 full. Add Sprite to taste and splash with Blue Curacao.

name: Blue Sky
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Sky #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour everything into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add an umbrella, and serve.

name: Blue Solute
instructions: Mix ingredients in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Blue Tahoe
instructions: Put all ingredients in together followed by the champagne last.

name: Blue Tap
instructions: Shake tequila and pineapple juice with ice. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice and pour the curacao into the center of the drink.

name: Blue Velvet
instructions: Combine the black raspberry liqueur, melon liqueur and vanilla ice cream in a blender. Add a cup of crushed ice and blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and top with whipped cream. Add blue curacao on top, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Volcano
instructions: Add the vodka to a highball glass, then fill to the brim with pre-mixed Kool-Aid. Serve. Alternatively, use another variety of Kool-Aid and rename the drink to match.

name: Blue Whale
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and mix in a shaker. Strain into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Blue Whip
instructions: Shake vodka, curacao and orange juice with ice cubes, and top off with sprite or 7-up. Garnish with fanned slices of orange floating on top, and serve with a straw.

name: Blue-Balled Frog
instructions: Combine 7-up, melon liquer, and sour mix over ice. Add splash of vodka. Finish off by slowly pouring the curacao over the drink for a colorful mixing effect.

name: Blue-Woo
instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. blueberry schnapps in a tall glass. Balance with cranberry juice.

name: Blueberry Popsicle
instructions: Blend milk and schnapps in a blender with ice. Add blue curacao as needed to reach desired color. Serve in a collins glass.

name: Blueberry Rumba
instructions: Shake liquors, syrup and juice in a shaker, and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade.

name: Blues Night
instructions: Pour the vodka and blue curacao into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top up with 7-Up or Sprite. Sprinkle salt on top, stir with a stick or straw, remove and serve.

name: Blunt Ash
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a pitcher, adding Kool-Aid powder last. Stir and serve chilled over ice.

name: Blushing Bride
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps and grenadine syrup into the bottom of a Champagne flute. Fill with Champagne, and serve.

name: Bo's Space Roo
description:
Bo's Space Roo was created for an in honor of well though of US Air Force Colonel Bo Reese. It was submitted by Douglas Blair, who tells us it's a popular drink south of the Potomac.Pour the tequila into a collins glass. Add the Fanta orange soda into the glass, tipped, as to not bruise the tequila. Add desired amount of ice.

Rim the collins glass with salt beforehand if desired.
instructions:
Pour the tequila into a collins glass. Add the Fanta orange soda into the glass, tipped, as to not bruise the tequila. Add desired amount of ice.

Rim the collins glass with salt beforehand if desired.

name: Boardwalk Breeze
instructions: Shake and strain ingredients into a hurricane glass.

name: Boat Drink
instructions: Pour captain morgan's spiced rum into a glass, and add a splash of tonic water. Circle the rim of the glass with a lime, and serve.

name: Bob Dylan
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, mix until smooth. Be careful surge is carbonated, it will foam up. Enjoy!

name: Bob'arita
instructions: Shake Cointreau and Tequila in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into salted rim glass over rocks. Squeeze two lime wedges and stir gently.

name: Bobby Sherman
instructions: Pour vodka over ice and allow to sit for one full minute. Add soda. Do not stir!

name: Bobby's Way
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bocci Ball #2
instructions: Pour the amaretto and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Boccie Ball
instructions: Measure a highball glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake. Pour back into glass.

name: Bocktail
description: Bocktail is a very popular drink from Belgium, invented by a Mr. Bock in Ghent.Pour all ingredients into a chilled highball glass filled with ice cubes and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a chilled highball glass filled with ice cubes and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Bogomip
instructions: Pour sake and coconut milk into the glass. Fill with pink lemonade. Fill the glass with ice first if desired.

name: Bohus Jude
instructions: Pour the gin, vodka, rum, tequila and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice, and stir. Garnish as desired, and serve.

name: Boina Roja
instructions: Pour rums, sugar and grenadine over crushed ice in a small highball glass, and stir well. Add lime juice, garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry, and serve.

name: Boku's Blend
instructions: Put all ingredients in the blender and blend until slushy. Serve very cold.

name: Bolduc On The Beach
instructions: Mix in glass. Serve on the rocks (optional).

name: Bolli Stoli
instructions: Pour Bollinger champagne into a champagne flute. Add Stoli vodka, and serve.

name: Bombay Bellini
instructions: Pour mango puree into a champagne flute (recommended) or a glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a mango slice.

name: Bombay Safari
description: The bastard offspring of a gin & tonic and a Tom Collins. Created and frequently enjoyed by Scott Nelson, Instructor, American Bartending School, Westminster, CA USA.Build directly in a collins glass filled with ice cubes; do not shake. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.
instructions: Build directly in a collins glass filled with ice cubes; do not shake. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Bombay Sling
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Bomber
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bonaparte Velvet
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve with straws.

name: Bone
instructions: Pour the Jagermeister and coconut rum into a pint glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with an energy drink, and serve.

name: Bonehead
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add lemonade to taste, stir again, and serve.

name: Bong Water
instructions: Add all ingredients (except 7-up) to a highball glass with ice. Shake, top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Bongo Cola
instructions: Pour gold rum, coffee liqueur, kirsch, pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cola, and stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Boobies In Manhattan
instructions: Combine ingredients in a pint glass.

name: Booda's Black Brew
instructions: Hurricane Glass Fill with Ice 1oz. Malibu Rum or Parrots Bay Coocnut Rum 3/4oz. Blue Curacao 3/4oz. Chambord 1/2oz. Grenadine Fill with Cranberry Top and Shake

name: Booga Booga
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with two ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Booger's Booze
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Bookmaker's Luck
instructions: Pour the vodka, rum, lime juice (to taste) and orange juice (to taste) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass 1/3 filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, add creme de bananes on top, stir once and serve.

name: Booster Blaster
instructions: Add Jack Daniel's, Southern Comfort and Yukon Jack to your glass with ice. Fill with cola and enjoy.

name: Boot Blaster
instructions: Half fill a 20oz glass (preferrably in the shape of a Cowboy Boot) with ice, regular or crushed. Pour the spirits over the ice. Add lemon-lime mix leaving room at the top for the 1/2 oz of coca-cola to dirty the drink.

name: Bootlegger Tea
instructions: Pour vodka, rum and triple sec over ice in a pint glass. Fill with equal parts of sweet and sour mix and 7-up, add grenadine, and serve.

name: Booty Call 101
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Booty Clap
instructions: Pour ingredients into any glass of your choice. Drink with or without ice - it is suggested that the best experience is without ice.

name: Booty Drink
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until well mixed. Pour into a tall glass.

name: Bootzilla
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors. Fill with Pineapple juice. Shake. Garnish with Orange slice. Serve.

name: Boozy Juice
instructions: Place all contents into mixing glass with ice and shake.

name: Boozy Maria
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Bora Bora
instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

name: Border Crosser
description: You can have a Border Crosser with both ordinary coke and cherry coke.Fill a collins glass part way with ice. Add tequila, sweet and sour mix and fill the remaining space with coca-cola. Mix and serve with a straw.
instructions: Fill a collins glass part way with ice. Add tequila, sweet and sour mix and fill the remaining space with coca-cola. Mix and serve with a straw.

name: Border Crossing
instructions: Pour the tequila, lime juice, lemon juice, and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Bordij
instructions: Stir and strain into an ice-filled wine glass.

name: Borly
description:
Made by MMJ (Norway). So far, just a few know it. There might be similar ones out there, but atleast I gave it a name.
Borly is short for "Boris orly?", and is inspired by Boris Yeltsin, a former Russian president, who was known for his drinking and anger. The drink is red, just like his face (and it reminds you of the old Sovjet regime).Fill the glass halfway up with ice. Then you pour around 3 oz of vodka, preferrably Boris Jelzin Vodka. Fill up the rest with the raspberry soda, and hopefully enjoy. 

You need to make your own mix to like it. It does not hide the alcohol taste very well, and most of the vodka will probably sink downwards in the cocktail. If you find it too strong, use less vodka. Mint leaves could be a success, and lime too. 

You could make it as a mojito, if you just replace the flavourless soda with the raspberry one, and adding some additional vodka along with the rum. Though, haven't tried that yet, leaving that to someone else.
instructions:
Fill the glass halfway up with ice. Then you pour around 3 oz of vodka, preferrably Boris Jelzin Vodka. Fill up the rest with the raspberry soda, and hopefully enjoy. 

You need to make your own mix to like it. It does not hide the alcohol taste very well, and most of the vodka will probably sink downwards in the cocktail. If you find it too strong, use less vodka. Mint leaves could be a success, and lime too. 

You could make it as a mojito, if you just replace the flavourless soda with the raspberry one, and adding some additional vodka along with the rum. Though, haven't tried that yet, leaving that to someone else.

name: Born on the 4th of July
instructions: Pour blue curacao into an ice-filled collins glass. Carefully layer both the sloe gin and cream on top of the ice. (The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.)

name: Born To Be Wild
instructions: Fill the glass 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add the Tequila, Vodka, Pisang Ambon, Sprite and lime. Stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cocktail cerry.

name: Bosco 42DD
instructions: Put 1 scoop chocolate ice cream into glass. Add Kahlua, then gin, then creme de cacoa, then brandy, and finally put a 2nd scoop of choclate ice cream on top.

name: Bossa Nova
instructions: Pour dark rum, apricot brandy, galliano and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple fruit flag, and serve.

name: Boston Cooler
instructions: Stir lemon juice, sugar and 2 oz of club soda together in a collins glass. Fill the glass with cracked ice. Add rum. Top with club soda, and stir. Garnish with a spiral of orange or lemon peel, and serve.

name: Boston Freeze
instructions: Pour dark rum, cranberry juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker with one cup of crushed ice. Shake well, until smooth. Pour all contents of the shaker into a wine glass. Garnish with 3 cranberries on a toothpick or a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Boston Gold
instructions: Pour the vodka and banana liqueur into a highball glass with/without ice. Stir well. Add orange juice, to taste, and stir again. Serve.

name: Boston Ice Tea
instructions: Build over ice. Stir. Garnish with lemon slice and a straw.

name: Boston Iced Coffee
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Boston Tea Hardy
instructions: Pour the rum, orange juice and iced tea into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Boston Tea Party
description: An old-school TGI Friday's drink. Named after the 18th century event in Boston Harbor perpetrated by some typically smart-ass American malcontents.Combine all ingredients (except coca-cola) in a shaker, shake and strain over ice, or combine ingredients in a collins glass with ice and shake. Top with coke, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except coca-cola) in a shaker, shake and strain over ice, or combine ingredients in a collins glass with ice and shake. Top with coke, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Bot Cocktail
instructions:
The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. 

However, the really slick way is much more impressive: 

Add cranberry juice, lime juice, triple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then, mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. 

Fill a turkey baister with the vodka/OJ mix, and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. 

This produces a sort of reverse-layering effect, and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

name: Bottom Bouncer
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bottom Line
