instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Decorate with a twist of lime peel.

name: Bottom of the Barrel
instructions: Put the whip cream in first, then the rum, then the root beer. Stir.

name: Bourbon a la Creme
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey and brown creme de cacao over the vanilla bean in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a glass without ice, and chill in the refrigerator for at least one hour. Pour into a white wine glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Bourbon and Branch
instructions: Pour the bourbon and water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Bourbon and Sprite
instructions: Pour the bourbon into a highball glass with some ice cubes. Fill glass with sprite or 7-up, and serve.

name: Bourbon Cobbler #2
instructions: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Garnish with strawberry, lime and pineapple wedges.

name: Bourbon Collins
instructions: Pour ingredients into a frosted collins glass, two-thirds filled with ice. Serve with straws and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Bourbon Cooler
instructions: Pour the bourbon and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Bourbon Fix
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Bourbon Float
instructions: Chill a beer mug. Add two scoops of vanilla ice cream, then bourbon. Fill with coke.

name: Bourbon Highball
instructions: Pour bourbon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Bourbon Milk Punch
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, half-and-half, sugar, and vanilla extract. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
instructions: In a highball glass, dissolve the sugar in the bourbon by stirring with a teaspoon. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with the cinnamon.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, creme de cacao, and milk. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bourbon Sangaree
instructions: Pour bourbon whiskey and water into a highball glass. Add sugar, allow to dissolve. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice and club soda. Float the tawny port on top. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, sprinkle with nutmeg and cinnamon, and serve.

name: Bourbon Sling
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Bourbon Sloe Gin Fizz
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, sloe gin and lemon juice over cracked ice in a chilled collins glass. Stir gently. Add 3 ice cubes, and fill with soda/sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Bourbon Swizzle
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, bourbon, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Bourbon Toddy
instructions: Soak one teaspoon or a cube of sugar with bitters in the bottom of a highball glass. Add a few ice cubes, and pour in the whiskey and water. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Bourbonime
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the juice of the lime and fill with coke. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Bowl Hugger
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins or tall glass. Stir well, add a straw, and serve.

name: Boye Sparkle
description: One for the occasion. Boye Sparkle was created by Ronald Penaflor and Gloria Gahum of the philippines.Pour champagne into a champagne flute. Add strawberry liqueur and mango juice, garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry, and serve.
instructions: Pour champagne into a champagne flute. Add strawberry liqueur and mango juice, garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry, and serve.

name: Bradford
instructions: Mix ingredients together in glass.

name: Brady Brew
instructions: Combine ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Brahma Bull
instructions: Mix the Red Bull with the Bombay Sapphire gin. Serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Brain Blender
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and serve in a wine goblet with fruit and straws.

name: Brain Candy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass. Add a few ice cubes, stir well and serve.

name: Brain Candy
instructions: Shake alcohols and juices. Add to glass with ice. Pour grenadine and ginger ale on top. Garnish with cherry and orange wheel.

name: Brain Cocktail
instructions: Pour peach schnapps into a highball glass. Add irish cream to the center. Top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Brain Eraser #3
instructions: Pour first two ingredients over ice, fill glass with club soda. Drink through straw.

name: Brain Freeze #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until creamy or thick, as desired. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Bramble
instructions: Shake the gin, lime juice and syrup well with ice, and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Dribble the creme de mure down through the ice, and garnish with a lime wheel and raspberries.

name: Brandied Peaches 'n' Cream
instructions: Mix well in a blender until smooth. Serve in a specialty glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or fresh peach wedge.

name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

name: Brandy and Soda
instructions: Pour the brandy and club soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Brandy Buck
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, adding the spent shell of the lemon quarter.

name: Brandy Collins
instructions: Shake juice of lemon, brandy, and powdered sugar with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Brandy Cooler
instructions: Pour the brandy and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Brandy Crusta
instructions: Slice a lemon in half. Rub the rim of a collins glass with the lemon and dip into sugar to coat the edge. Pare the circumference of each lemon half's peel and add to the glass. Shake brandy, lemon juice, orange curacao and bitters in a shaker with crushed ice and strain into the collins glass. Add an orange slice.

name: Brandy Eggnog
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brandy Fix
instructions: Combine juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Stir, fill with shaved ice, and add brandy. Stir again, add the lemon slice, and serve with a straw.

name: Brandy Fizz
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

name: Brandy Highball
instructions: Pour brandy into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, add the twist of lemon peel, stir gently, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Brandy Julep
instructions: Place sugar, mint leaves, and brandy in a collins glass and fill with finely shaved ice. Stir until mint rises to top, being careful not to bruise leaves. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, orange, or lemon and a cherry.

name: Brandy Mexi
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a cocktail shaker. Shake it for 10 seconds and pour it out into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, then serve.

name: Brandy Milk Punch
instructions: Shake brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Brandy Old Fashion (Pressed)
description:
Cheaper brandy ruins this drink. You can adjust the amount of brandy and old fashion mix to taste. Very popular in Wisconsin.  Anytime of the year.Place 2 or 3 green olives on a toothpick and put it at the bottom of a highball glass.  Then fill the glass 1/3rd of the way with ice. Add 2 oz. brandy. Add Old Fashion Mix. Fill nearly to the top with 7-Up. 
Stir several times. Enjoy a bit of Wisconsin.
instructions:
Place 2 or 3 green olives on a toothpick and put it at the bottom of a highball glass.  Then fill the glass 1/3rd of the way with ice. Add 2 oz. brandy. Add Old Fashion Mix. Fill nearly to the top with 7-Up. 
Stir several times. Enjoy a bit of Wisconsin.

name: Brandy Plush
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled wine glass. Dust with freshly grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brandy Puff
instructions: Shake the brandy and milk in a shaker, strain into a wine goblet, and add the soda.

name: Brandy Punch Cocktail
instructions: Add to a goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and some fruit.

name: Brandy Rickey
instructions: Pour brandy and lime juice into a highball glass. Fill with soda water, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Brandy Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water. Add brandy and pour into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brandy Soda
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Brandy Squirt
instructions: Shake brandy, powdered sugar and grenadine in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass and fill with carbonated water. Stir and garnish with a pineapple stick and strawberries.

name: Brandy Squirt
instructions: Pour brandy, sugar and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a stick of pineapple and strawberries, and serve.

name: Brandy Swizzle
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, brandy, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Brandy Water Press
instructions: Pour the brandy over ice cubes in a collins glass and fill almost to the top with water. Top off with the tonic water, and serve.

name: Brass Fiddle
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps, whiskey, pineapple juice and orange juice into a blender. Add one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Swirl the grenadine around the edge of a parfait glass. Add mixture from blender. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Brass Monkey
instructions: Toss the rum and vodka together and stir gently. Pour in the orange juice, and shake well. Pour over ice in a highball or tall glass.

name: Brazilian Bitch
instructions: Build ingredients in order listed in a highball glass, Coca-cola on top, and serve.

name: Brazilian Breeze
instructions: Pour the vanilla vodka and DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker into a highball glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Brazilian Mango
instructions: Add small slices of mango to a hurricane glass. Pour the cachaca, banana liqueur and mango juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into the glass. Add the Kahlua coffee liqueur. Garnish with a sliced banana and a cherry, and serve.

name: Brazilian Monk
instructions: Pour into a collins glass and blend briefly. Garnish with a mint leaf and cherry, and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Brazy's Pink Lemonade
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass filled with ice.

name: Breakfast Rum
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients, shake, and pour back into glass.

name: Breakfast Screwdriver
instructions: 3 shots of gin to 3 shots of Cranberry Juice, mix and serve over ice.

name: Breda Blackout
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Brevann
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and drink with a straw.

name: Brevann Springwater
instructions: Everything goes in a highball glass with ice. Pour Seven Up or Sprite on the top Garnish with lemon and some other fresh fruit. Drink with a straw.

name: Briagra
instructions: Fill shaker with crushed ice, add blue curacao, malibu and white rum, shake, pour all contents into hiball tumbler, serve and enjoy.

name: Brian Auel
description: Brian Auel is a dynamic individual whose life on earth was cut short in a car accident at the age of 22.  People in Lakeland, FL have now been drinking this concoction in his memory.Add the Southern Comfort, pineapple juice and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with grenadine syrup, and serve.
instructions: Add the Southern Comfort, pineapple juice and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with grenadine syrup, and serve.

name: Bridesmaid Cooler
instructions: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice and a lemon spiral.

name: Brief Encounter
instructions: Combine the sherbet, peach schnapps and coconut liqueur in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and drizzle with grenadine. Garnish with lemon slices, and serve.

name: Brighton Punch
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Brilliance
description: "This drink is kind of like a tequila greyhound except the grapefruit juice is the grapefruit soda 'squirt'. We call it brilliance because the taste is so clear it tastes like nothing. Say hello to my friend gravity while you are down there." Invented in west marin county, CA USA by sean ocean.Fill collins glass half full of ice, add 2-4 oz of patron silver tequila or your favorite tequila (sauza hornitos works as well) to the glass top off with 'squirt'. Stir and garnish with maraschino cherry or grapefruit slice.
instructions: Fill collins glass half full of ice, add 2-4 oz of patron silver tequila or your favorite tequila (sauza hornitos works as well) to the glass top off with 'squirt'. Stir and garnish with maraschino cherry or grapefruit slice.

name: Brimstone
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a collins glass.

name: Brimstone
instructions: Shake with cracked ice.

name: Bring the Pain
instructions: Pour over ice into glass and feel the tasty pain.

name: Brisky Jim
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a large collins glass, fill with Lipton Brisk iced tea, stir and serve.

name: British Bulldog
instructions: Pour DeKuyper Buttershots, Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in half-and-half until the glass is full. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, add a straw, and serve.

name: Brittle Fracture
instructions: Mix in no particular order. Serve over ice.

name: Broken Heart Zombie Mai Tai
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a hurricane glass half-filled with ice. Stir well, and garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry and a piece of cantaloupe melon.

name: Broken Leg
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a tall glass. Stir, garnish with a cinnamon stick, and serve.

name: Broken Nose
instructions: Pour the tequila and grenadine into a highball glass. Add advocaat, but don't mix properly. Dilute to desired strength with lemonade, and serve.

name: Bronx Cheer
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and add the soda. Stir gently and garnish with some fresh raspberries and an orange peel.

name: Brown Cow From Hell
instructions: Mix all ingredients until no chocolate residue is left on bottom of glass. Serve chilled.

name: Brown Elephant #2
instructions: Add 3 ice cubes to a 10 ounce glass. Add Amarula and Kahlua liqueurs. Top up with milk, stir and serve.

name: Brown-eye
instructions: Use any appropriate glass filled with ice cubes, and mix 3 parts of your vodka of choice (preferably not cheap vodka, use Finlandia, Absolut or Grey Goose), with 1 part Coke, or follow the amounts above in a highball or old-fashioned glass.

name: Bruce Doucet
description: The inventor of this drink liked to experiment with several other cocktails. Its origins are in northern Quebec, where a good fruity drink is always a treat. This drink is a personal favorite of several people.Combine schnapps and rum in a highball glass over ice and stir. Add Five-Alive, then rim glass with sugar. NOTE: You DO rim the glass after mixing the drink. It is important to place a good amount of sugar in a small scotch glass or similar recipient. Mix the drink over ice, and dump into the sugar. Next, use a spoon to eat the mixture. Your glass, of course, has been rimmed. After you've finished the "drink", lick the sugar off the glass.
instructions: Combine schnapps and rum in a highball glass over ice and stir. Add Five-Alive, then rim glass with sugar. NOTE: You DO rim the glass after mixing the drink. It is important to place a good amount of sugar in a small scotch glass or similar recipient. Mix the drink over ice, and dump into the sugar. Next, use a spoon to eat the mixture. Your glass, of course, has been rimmed. After you've finished the "drink", lick the sugar off the glass.

name: Bruja Cubana
instructions: First mix/blend the sugar and mint together, add lime juice to molsify. Add liquor. Add 7-up or Sprite to fill. Mix well and pour.

name: Bruja Mexicana
instructions: Mix strega and tequila in a blender the crushed ice. Moist the rim of the glass with lemon and decorate with sugar. Add a little sugar syrup. Pour in and fill with soda.

name: Bruno's Cinnamon Blast
instructions: Pour onto ice, stir and enjoy.

name: Brute
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve with straws.

name: Bubba Collins
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except cola. Shake well and pour back into glass. Add cola and garnish with a cherry.

name: Bubble Comfort
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass; add the orange soda and the root beer. Stir lightly. Add more Southern Comfort for strength if desired, and serve.

name: Bubblegum Delight
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bubblegum Sundae
instructions: Pour creme de bananes, peach schnapps and orange juice into a cocktail shaker with 6 oz of crushed ice. Shake vigorously until slushy. Pour all contents into a highball glass. Add the grenadine so that it sinks down the side of the glass, and serve.

name: Bubbly Boccie Ball
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir before serving.

name: Buck Jones
instructions: Pour rum, sherry, and juice of lime in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Buck's Fizz
instructions: Add to a frosted wine glass.

name: Buck's Peter
instructions: Pour the cranberry juice, Malibu coconut rum, Canada Dry cranberry soda and Crown Royal Canadian Whisky into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Buckhead Root Beer
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Bud Herrmann Brandy
instructions: Build in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Buddy
instructions: Pour Mad Dog and Mountain Dew into a glass (plastic beer glasses work the best). Stir. Add a couple ice cubes.

name: Buddy Rich
instructions: Build the Stoli raspberry vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur, Chambord raspberry liqueur and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with half-and-half, and serve.

name: Buddy's Bloody Mary
instructions: Add several ice cubes to a highball glass, grind some pepper on top and add some celery salt to make seasoned ice cubes. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain the mixture over the ice cubes in the highball glass. Squeeze a lime slice over the drink and drop it in the glass. Serve.

name: Buddy's Favorite
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve without ice.

name: Buenos Noches
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass full of ice cubes.

name: Buffalo Tea
instructions: Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peach juice and iced tea. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Decorate with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Bulge in my Pants
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Bull Driver
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bull Rider
instructions: Mix all ingredients well and enjoy!

name: Bull Rush
instructions: Fill glass 2/3 with ice, and add absinthe, vodka and red bull on top. Then simply squeeze lime wedges according to taste.

name: Bull Stuff
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Sprinkle cinnamon and nutmeg on top.

name: Bull's Eye
instructions: Pour brandy and hard cider into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Bull's Milk
instructions: Shake rum, brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg and the pinch of cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Bull's Special
description: One can drink the Bull's Special all day long without dehydration in hot weather and no hangover.Combine all ingredients with ice, shake and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.
instructions: Combine all ingredients with ice, shake and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Bulldog Cooler
instructions: Pour the gin, cointreau, orange juice and water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with water, and serve.

name: Bulldog Highball
instructions: Pour gin and juice of orange into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Bulldog's Viagra
instructions: Add Bacardi Gold and Bacardi O to a glass with ice. Add triple sec and fill with Sprite. Add a splash of grenadine on top and garnish with a cherry.

name: Bullet to the Head
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice, pour in the ingredients as listed, then pour the glass' contents into a blender, and use the blender to make it smooth. Pour back into the glass, and serve.

name: Bullfrog
instructions: Shake well in a closed container, pour into an open container and stir well.

name: Bullshot
instructions: Combine vodka and beef boullion with four ice cubes in a mixing glass. Add salt and pepper to taste, stir, and strain into a chilled wine glass.

name: Bullvodka
instructions: Pour 2 shots of Vodka in glass. Fill with cold Red Bull. Add 2 ice cubes (optional).

name: Bumble Bee #3
instructions: The crushed ice should be added first, followed by the honey. Stir the mixture as you pour the gin on top, which should be relatively chilled. Add the squirts of lemon to your liking, and place a wedge over the rim, if desired.

name: Bumpy Grapefruit
instructions: Stir both ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Bunky Punch
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Bunueloni
instructions: Stir ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Twist both lemon and orange peels over the glass and drop in. Serve.

name: Burberry Bulldog
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Pour in the vodka, Chambord raspberry liqueur, Kahlua coffee liqueur and Irish cream. Stir, then fill up the glass with equal portions of milk and Dr. Pepper soda. Stir again and serve.

name: Burgundy Bishop
instructions: Shake rum, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with red wine and stir. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

name: Burgundy Bubbler
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice in a large wine glass. Garnish with slices of lemon, lime and orange, and serve.

name: Buried Treasure
instructions: Pour the amaretto, kahlua coffee liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Garnish with a swirl of whipped cream, and serve.

name: Burning Demon Piss
instructions: Pour the Jose Cuervo tequila, Southern Comfort peach liqueur, Captain Morgan spiced rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a beer mug. Add hot sauce and an extremely hot cup of coffee, then top with Bacardi and serve.

name: Burning Pine Needles
description: There's a lot of brand names in this recipe for Burning Pine Needles, but mostly on standard liquors where any brand will do. (Although obviously the higher quality the better.) This drink is a party in your mouth; then later, a party in your pants.Combine all ingredients in a pitcher or punch bowl, mix well, and serve to guests.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher or punch bowl, mix well, and serve to guests.

name: Burning Sun
instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass, stir. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

name: Burnso Tropical
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir well before serving.

name: Burnso Tropical
instructions: Fill high ball glass with ice cubes. Add one ounce each of vodka and peach schnapps. Then add 3 oz of pineapple juice and 1 oz of cranberry juice. Shake and serve.

name: Burnt Sienna
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass full of ice and garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Burt Reynolds
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Bury Me Deep
instructions: Shake all but lemonade in a shaker and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade.

name: Bushwacker #2
instructions:
Fill blender 3/4 with ice (small cubes best).

Add a small splash of vodka, a small splash of Grand Marnier. Add a healthy serving of kahlua and a little less healthy splash of amaretto. Fill the blender with Bailey's until liquid is 1/2 inch from top of ice cubes. Mix until smooth. 

Pour in hurricane glass and sprinkle some nutmeg on top!

name: Bushwacker #3
instructions: Put all contents in a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Ice-cream can be substituted for the half-and-half.

name: Bust Your Black Nut
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Buster Cherry
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Butch Beer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a beer mug and stir.

name: Butch's Blue Lagoon #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a tall glass filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Butcherblock
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a large glass. Shake vigorously. Garnish with grated chocolate.

name: Buttafuoco
instructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients except club soda and cherry with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice cubes and fill with club soda. Stir, then add cherry.

name: Butter Baby
instructions: Combine ingredients in a beer mug. Stir and serve.

name: Butter Cookie
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Butter Milk
instructions: Add ingredients to a mug with a couple of ice cubes.

name: Butter Ripple Fantasy
instructions: Pour Phillip's Butter Ripple schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the glass with root beer, and serve.

name: Butterbeer
instructions: Stir the butterscotch schnapps and cream soda together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Butterbeer #2
instructions: Take a pint glass or mug and fill with ice cubes. Half-fill the glass with Mickey Finn's Butterscotch and Vanilla liqueur (available at grocery stores) and fill the rest of the glass with root beer before serving.

ingredients.name: Mickey Finn's butterscotch and vanilla liqueur

name: Buttercream Tea
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Buttered Pancakes
instructions: Pour peach schnapps, Captain Morgan spiced rum and Pepsi cola into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Butterfinger
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Butterscotch Schnapps and Bailey's into the glass. Fill with Milk. Shake. Serve with sip straw.

name: Buttermilk
instructions: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into a highball glass. Add milk, to taste. Stir well, and serve.

name: Buttermint Delight
instructions: Combine the DeKuyper Buttershots and mint chocolate-chip ice cream in a blender. Add crushed ice if desired. Blend until smooth. Strain over ice cubes in a collins glass, add a straw, and serve.

name: Butterscotch Collins
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass. Add the carbonated water last.

name: Butterscotch Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a pina colada glass. Garnish with whipped cream and caramel.

name: Butterscotch Ice Cream
description: A creamy recipe which tastes very similar to butterscotch-flavored ice cream.Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass, using ice cold milk and/or several ice cubes.
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass, using ice cold milk and/or several ice cubes.

name: Butterscotch Kiss
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Butterscotch Milk Punch
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Butterscotch Mudslide Shake
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 2 cups of ice cubes. Blend until thick like a shake, and pour into a collins glass. Add or subtract ice to liking for thickness. This is also good unblended on the rocks. Makes two drinks.

name: Buttery So-Co
instructions: Pour the butterscotch schnapps and Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a highball glass with a little ice. Top with Coca-cola to taste, and serve.

name: Buttock Clencher
instructions: Shake all but the lemonade and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade and garnish with a cherry and pineapple chunk on stick.

name: Buzz Bomb
instructions: Pour the vodka, cognac, benedictine, Cointreau and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with champagne, either completely or to personal taste. Serve.

name: Buzz Inducer
instructions: Put the two shots into frosty beer mug. Add IBC Root Beer into glass. Ice cubes are optional.

name: Buzz Lightyear
instructions: Pour over cracked ice filled in glass and stir briefly.

name: Buzzby
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with ice, and stir. Add a slice of lime if desired, and serve.

name: Buzzsaw
instructions: Pour the vodka, citrus juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: By The Pool
instructions: Shake briskley for 10 seconds and serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Bye Bye Bahamas
instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum and punch. Stir. Float banana liqueur. Garnish with pineapple, orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Byrrh Cassis
instructions: Pour Byrrh and creme de cassis into a wine glass. Add ice cubes, fill with pre-chilled soda water to taste, and serve.

name: C & M
instructions:
Pour 2 oz. of malibu rum into a glass filled half way with ice

Proceed to pour in 2 oz. of Stoli Vanilla into the glass.

Fill the remainder of the glass with Coca Cola to the brim and enjoy!

name: C.R. Sun Tan Lotion
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice, add ingredients, and stir. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: C3PO
instructions: Shake ingredients in mixer. Garnish with 2 orange slices to give impression of C3PO's eyes.

name: C60
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Cabana Club
instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

name: Cabernet Cobbler
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the lemon juice and the water in a large wine glass. Add cracked ice and pour the Cabernet Sauvignon wine. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Cablegram
instructions: Stir blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Cabo Beach Party
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Cactus Bat
instructions: Pour the batida de coco into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cactus fruit juice, stir and serve.

name: Cactus Cola
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cactus Jack
instructions: Add all ingredients to a beer mug, stir and serve.

name: Caesar Cocktail
instructions: Line the rim of a glass with salt and pepper. Over ice, add vodka, fill with clamato juice, then add the remaining ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick. Add more tabasco sauce if desired.

name: Cafe Au Kirsch
instructions: Combine the kirsch, sugar and egg white in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a wine glass. Fill with coffee, stir, and serve.

name: Cafe Cabana
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Cafe Mazatlan
instructions: Put the sugar in glass, add rum and Kahlua, warm gently. Add coffee and stir well. Put a dash of whipped cream on top. Enjoy!

name: Caffeine Attack
instructions: Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable, pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Caitian Tongue Tickler
instructions: Add the pineapple chunks to a highball glass. Pour in grenadine, fill with wine, and serve.

name: Cajun Bloody Mary
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a celery stick, or a hot pepper!

name: Cajun Tomato
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass. Add a dash of garlic powder on top.

name: Cajun Water
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec, grenadine and bitters into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with champagne, stir and serve.

name: Cake Mix
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vanilla vodka with ginger ale.

name: California Barbie
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the glass with yellow lemonade. Stir and serve with a straw.

name: California Driver
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: California Gold Rush
instructions:
Pour 7-up into a clear glass without ice. Add vodka and goldschlager, and stir to mix gold flakes evenly through the drink. 

Effect: The bubbles of carbon dioxide in the 7-up continuously move the gold flakes around.

name: California Iced Tea
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon twist or an orange slice.

name: California Iced Tea
instructions: Shake or roll. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: California Lemonade
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the cherry and serve with a straw.

name: California Rattle Snake
instructions: Mix equal parts of Southern Comfort, Malibu Rum, an Amaretto in a mixing tin over ice. Add a splash or sour mix, grenadine, and 7-up. Shake well. Can be served over ice or as a shot.

name: California Screwdriver
instructions: Put Vodka and Grand Marnier in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into collins glass. Add ice and fill with equal parts of OJ and Soda. Stir and granish with orange slice.

name: Californian Hurricane
instructions: Mix all ingredients (alcohol first) together in a punch bowl or pitcher, and add only enough grenadine to turn it red. Add ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Calimocho Torreon Special
instructions: Fill the highball glass with ice, then half fill it with red wine, and half fill it with coca-cola. Enjoy.

name: Call a Cab
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a hurricane glass with ice, or combine in a blender. Add juices and sprite to fill glass, and serve.

name: Calm Monkey
instructions: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Bailey's Irish cream, fill the glass with milk, stir and serve.

name: Calm Voyage
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Calpol
description: Invented at Kent University in 2005. Named Calpol because thats what the contributor thought it tasted like. Very easy to drink, but with about 4 units it's strong stuff.Pour Smirnoff Ice into a pint glass. Add the vodka. Fill up with Red Bull, and serve.
instructions: Pour Smirnoff Ice into a pint glass. Add the vodka. Fill up with Red Bull, and serve.

name: Calypso Baby
instructions: Combine 1 dash grenadine, 6 oz. pineapple juice, and 3 oz. white rum (or light golden rum) over ice and shake. Serve in glass of choice.

name: Calypso Cooler
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, peach schnapps, dark rum, orange juice, grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orange flag, and serve.

name: Calypso Daiquiri
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice until smooth. Serve in a coupette glass.

name: Camel Piss
instructions: Pour the beer, tequila, dark rum and ouzo into a highball glass. Top with mountain dew, to taste, and serve.

name: Camen Miranda
instructions:
Squeeze lime wedge over ice. Pour in rum, fruit juice, and coca-cola. Stir lightly. Add club soda or tonic to taste.

*Fruit Juice should be pineapple, orange or banana.

name: Camp Grenada
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the 7-up, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Camp Lawless
instructions: Pour rum and juice into a highball glass filled with broken ice. Sprinkle the campari and galliano on top. Serve unstirred, with straws, and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Campari and Ale
description: Campari and Ale invokes a gradient effect produced as the carbonated ginger ale sits on top of the Campari. This cocktail has been affectionately referred to as the "Crimson Gradient." Many enjoy its simplicity yet alluring tang and undescribable sweetness.Place several ice cubes into a 12 oz highball glass or equivalent. Gently pour in the Campari bitters until one-quarter full. Add the ginger ale until three-quarters full, pouring across the side of the glass so as to not affect the Campari on the bottom.
instructions: Place several ice cubes into a 12 oz highball glass or equivalent. Gently pour in the Campari bitters until one-quarter full. Add the ginger ale until three-quarters full, pouring across the side of the glass so as to not affect the Campari on the bottom.

name: Campari and Bitter Lemon
instructions: Pour the Campari over ice in a highball glass. Add bitter lemon, garnish with a lemon peel, and serve.

name: Campari and Soda
description: The Campari and Soda cocktail is popular on planes where the fruity, tangy flavor of the Campari refreshes your mouth, a treat when you are on long haul flights where you literally dry out due to the lack of humidity in the airline cabin.Pour Campari bitters into a highball glass until half-full. Completely fill the rest of the glass with soda water, and serve.
instructions: Pour Campari bitters into a highball glass until half-full. Completely fill the rest of the glass with soda water, and serve.

name: Campari Champagne
instructions: Pour campari into a champagne flute, and fill with champagne. Twist the lemon peel over the drink, and serve.

name: Campari Milkshake
instructions:
Pour cold milk in a pot. Slowly add orange juice. Finally add campari. Stir really well. Put ice cubes in glass and pour in the milk-shake. Garnish with a slice of orange. Serve with a straw.

After making this drink, try alternating the amount of Campari to taste.

name: Campari Orange
instructions: Mix over ice in highball glass.

name: Campari Soda
instructions: Pour the Campari over ice cubes in a highball glass, then fill with sparkling/soda water. Squeeze a lime wedge over the glass, drop it in, and serve.

name: Campbell F. Craig
instructions: Pour the tequila, orange juice, and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the Chambord into the center of the drink.

name: Campola
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Can Can
instructions: Pour peach schnapps into flute, then fill with champagne.

name: Canada Drink
instructions: Pour the Kirschwasser, Canadian whisky and lemon juice into a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Canadian Car Bomb
instructions: Pour beer into a glass, drop the shot of whiskey into the glass and chug.

name: Canadian Ceasar
instructions: Salt the rim of a collins glass. Add some ice cubes, then vodka, clam juice and tomato juice. Garnish with a celery stick.

name: Canadian Daisy
instructions: Pour the whisky, lemon juice and raspberry syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with sparkling water. Float the brandy on top. Garnish with a few raspberries, and serve.

name: Canadian Diamond
instructions: Make sure both the glass and champagne are well-chilled; fill the glass with champagne and drizzle in grenadine slowly so it settles on the bottom. Add a frozen strawberry.

name: Canadian Killer Kool-Aid
instructions: Pour amaretto, melon liqueur and vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add cranberry juice to taste, and stir again. Top with Sprite, to taste, and serve.

name: Canadian Skittle
instructions: Pour over a couple of ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Canadian Splash
instructions: Add both parts together. Use ice if wanted.

name: Canadian Zombie
instructions: Fill collins glass halfway up with ice. Add white and dark rum. Fill up with half orange- half lemon juice. Pour grenadine and curacao along rim of glass. Top with 151 proof rum.

name: Canado Saludo
instructions: Pour the white rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, grenadine and bitters into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple slice, orange slice and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Canal Street Daisy
instructions: Pour the whisky, orange juice and lemon juice into a collins glass, and stir. Add club soda, to taste. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Cancer
description: Dan Steele and Jeff Prebeg, both from Pittsburgh, a black cancerous town filled to the rafters with the shaded souls of the damned, created this drink out of their cursed souls.Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the DeKuyper Razzmatazz liqueur, then the Everclear. Top off with both Kool-aid mixes; do not stir. Wait until Kool-Aid mixes to a black color. Serve.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the DeKuyper Razzmatazz liqueur, then the Everclear. Top off with both Kool-aid mixes; do not stir. Wait until Kool-Aid mixes to a black color. Serve.

name: Cancun Cocktail
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: Cancun Rum Runner
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake for a few seconds. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry, and serve.

name: Candied Sever St. Special
instructions: Fill Collins glass most of the way with ice. Add Yukon Jack and Midori. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

name: Candy Apple
instructions: Pour one glass of sparkling cider. Add butterscotch schnapps, to taste, and serve.

name: Candy Apple Sour
instructions: Pour vodka, orange juice, and lemonade into a glass over ice. Fill the rest of the glass with sour apple mix. Stir, and serve.

name: Candy Bar
instructions: Blend kahlua, creme de cacao, and frangelico. Add cream. Serve with ice cubes in highball glass.

name: Candy Cane
instructions: In highball glass filled with ice, combine peppermint schnapps, white creme de cacao & grenadine. Fill glass with half-and-half. Top with 7-up. Garnish with a small candycane or filbert nuts. Great for the Holidays!

name: Candy Cane Cola
description: Candy Cane Cola is the result of an experiment involving some peppermint schnapps and a Coke Slurpee.Pour peppermint schnapps into a highball glass, top with coca-cola, and serve.
instructions: Pour peppermint schnapps into a highball glass, top with coca-cola, and serve.

name: Candy Cocktail
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour the 151 proof rum, dr. pepper and amaretto, stir, and serve.

name: Candy Rider
instructions: Pour both ingredients over into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Candy Store
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth, and pour into a highball glass.

name: Cane Toad
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, and stir. Add a swizzle stick, and serve.

name: Canecutter
instructions: Ice first, then add Bundaberg Rum, Kahlua and fill with Coca Cola.

name: Cantaloupe Dizzy
instructions: Add carbonated water to a parfait glass with ice. Shake remaining ingredients in a cocktail shaker and strain into the glass. Stir and garnish with a cherry.

name: Canteloupe Dizzy
instructions: Pour club soda into a parfait glass with ice cubes. Pour vodka, melon liquer, and peach schnapps into a shaker and shake well. Strain into the club soda and stir. Garnish with cherry/orange/pineapple.

name: CanyCaine
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Cape Breeze
instructions: Pour the coconut rum, juices and sugar into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cape Breton Lemonade
instructions: Mix in the lemonade with the Bacardi Limon. If it is a good lemonade you're using you can mix as much as half & half and not be able to taste the rum.

name: Cape Cod
instructions: Combine in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Cape Cod #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cape Cod Cooler
instructions: Pour the gins, cranberry juice, lime juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cape Cod Crush
instructions: Blend the Southern Comfort, cranberry juice, and ice in a blender. Pour and serve.

name: Cape Cod Islander
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and Sprite soda. Top with the Malibu coconut rum and pineapple juice in the center of the drink. Stir slightly and serve.

name: Cape Cod Sour Squishy
instructions: Pour the rum, Puckers, sour mix and cranberry juice into glass over ice, toss, then fill the rest of the way with 7-up.

name: Cape Codder
instructions: Pour Vodka and Cranberry Juice into a highball glass over ice. Stir well, add the wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Cape Coral
instructions: Pour vodka over a handful of ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Add cranberry-raspberry juice, and shake for 5 secs. Pour mixture into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cape Driver
instructions: Mix evenly, enjoy. Make a punch bowl or just a glass. Optional: blend with ice.

name: Cape Grape
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Cape May
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add brandy, gin and orange juice to the shaker and shake well. Pour back into glass and add ginger ale. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Cape Sunrise
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum over ice cubes in a highball glass and fill with guava juice. Stir, drizzle grenadine on top, and serve.

name: Cappy's Grog
instructions: Wash some ice.  Put into glass.  Dump the booze in o'er the ice.  Get your water in there right after that.  Squeeze that bit o lime into it, stir, toss the rind afterward.  Don't try to be fancy.  Just hand it to your miss or your mate and say "AARrr there ya be!  Enjoy"!

name: Capri Sun
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Parrot Bay Pineapple Rum and Island Blue Pucker. Add equal parts of 7-up & pineapple juice in that order, top off with a splash of cranberry juice. Cherry to garnish.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay pineapple rum

name: Captain and Coke
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Original Spiced Rum and Coca-Cola into a highball glass on the rocks. Mix until the coke fizzes at the top, and serve.

name: Captain and Taneal
instructions: Pour rum over ice, and add the iced tea. A slice of lemon makes a nice touch.

name: Captain and Tonic
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

name: Captain Bucci
instructions: Pour the rum over 4 ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with the Canada Dry ginger ale, and serve.

name: Captain Butter Cream
description: Captain Butter Cream, as with many other Captain cocktails and the like, is hugely popular among Captain Morgan fans. Captain Butter Cream is tested with both IBC or A&W cream soda, and works great with both.Pour Captain Morgan into a pint glass with ice, and add buttershots. Top off with the cream soda of your choice. Shake, do not stir, and serve.
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan into a pint glass with ice, and add buttershots. Top off with the cream soda of your choice. Shake, do not stir, and serve.

ingredients.name: 3 oz Captain Morgan® Original spiced rum

name: Captain Climer
instructions: Stir well.

name: Captain Cola
instructions: Funnel the rum, armagnac and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml), roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard, stein or british pint), and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle, and serve.

name: Captain Courageous
instructions: Pour the Parrot Bay coconut rum into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice, and stir. Float Myer's rum on top, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Captain Creamsicle
instructions:
Add captain morgan's to a blender. Add equal parts vanilla ice-cream and orange sherbert to taste, and blend well. Pour over ice in a medium glass, and serve.

NOTE: Orange juice can be substitued for sherbert.

name: Captain Defender
instructions: Fill a highball glass almost completely with ice cubes or cracked ice. Add the Captain Morgan spiced rum, Coca-cola and Sprite. Stir and serve.

name: Captain Dick
description: Celebration of one-armed Captain Dick, an earlier settler of the Lake Tahoe region who used to row his boat from Emerald Bay to Tahoe City in summer, fall, winter or spring with one arm to pick up supplies, mail and have a pint of ale at the local tavern.  He lost his arm in a boat accident during one of his early trips but continued making the trip until the day he died.  Is reportedly buried on the island in Emerald Bay, Lake Tahoe.Mix bourbon, coconut rum and cola in highball glass over ice.  Add wedge of lime.  Mix.
instructions: Mix bourbon, coconut rum and cola in highball glass over ice.  Add wedge of lime.  Mix.

name: Captain Do
instructions: Pour rum into a large glass, and add soda/mountain dew.

name: Captain Guy
instructions: Served with ice. Poor the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Add the raspberry iced tea (from concentrate for best results) and serve.

name: Captain Heron
description: Captain Heron is a combination of a fine coconut rum and Michigan's largest selling wine, Blue Heron.Pour Captain Morgan Parrot Bay into a highball glass until half-full. Fill the other half with Blue Heron Wine (Michigan). Add a squirt of lime, and serve.
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan Parrot Bay into a highball glass until half-full. Fill the other half with Blue Heron Wine (Michigan). Add a squirt of lime, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Captain Jack Sparrow #2
instructions: Drop the cherries and some ice into a highball glass. Pour the Cabo Wabo anejo tequila, Captain Morgan Private Stock dark rum, Minute Maid limeade and 99 Oranges orange schnapps into the glass. Add a splash of maraschino cherry juice on top, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Private Stock dark rum

name: Captain Jake's
instructions: Combine ingredients in glass over ice.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Captain Mike's Lemonade
description: Captain Mike's Lemonade is a popular drink invented by Ed Williams in 2003 in Colorado Springs, CO.Pour rum over 2-3 ice cubes. Add lemonade, stir gently, and serve.
instructions: Pour rum over 2-3 ice cubes. Add lemonade, stir gently, and serve.

name: Captain Nemo
instructions: Combine vodka, clamato juice, horseradish, lime juice, celery salt, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with cracked black pepper, garnish with a squid and serve.

name: Captain OJ
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Captain Pat's Rapier
instructions: Fully ice hurricane glass. In shaker with ice, combine Captain Morgan Spiced Rum, Creme de Almond, Triple Sec, orange juice, and cranberry juice. Shake and pour over ice in hurricane glass. Float Bacardi 151 on top. Garnish on one side of rim with orange and lime slice, and on other side of rim with a flag or a small umbrella.

name: Captain Pepper
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Captain Pepsi
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Captain Plah
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, ice if preferred, and serve.

name: Captain Ron
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Add the juicy juice orange-tangerine juice, stir and serve.

ingredients.name: 3 oz Captain Morgan® Original spiced rum

name: Captain Slim
instructions: Stir together in a beer mug over ice, and serve.

name: Captain's and Cream
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Captain's and Creme
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's over ice, and add cream soda.

name: Captain's Code
instructions: Place one shot of Captain Morgan's spiced rum in a glass. Add one can of Mountain Dew Code Red.

name: Captain's Cream Soda
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Top with the seven-up, stir and enjoy!

name: Captain's Elixir
instructions: Mix together the tea (plain hot), Coca-cola and Captain Morgan spiced rum in a pint mason jar, and serve.

name: Captain's First Mate
instructions: Add rum and Southen Comfort to a collins glass half full of ice. Fill with Pepsi Vanilla. Stir and float creme de cacao on top.

name: Captain's Hook
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Captain's Orange
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay over ice in a highball glass, and add in the pineapple orange juice. Stir, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Captain's Punch
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a small (8 oz) highball or old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Captain's Saddle
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Captain's Shadow
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Captain's Son
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with 3-4 ice cubes, and serve.

name: Captain's Spiced Cider
instructions: Pour (over ice is best, but not necessary) spiced rum into glass, fill with apple cider, stir.

name: Captain's Table
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Campari, grenadine, and orange juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Captains Saddle
instructions: Mix rootbeer schnaps with spiced rum and chill with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass and enjoy.

name: Captang Poontag
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Add the Tang, and serve. It should taste akin to an orange dreamsicle.

name: Car Bomb
instructions: Combine Irish cream and whiskey in a shot glass. Drop shot into a glass of Guinness and drink quickly.

name: Car Crash
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort and amaretto almond liqueur into a collins glass over 1 or2 ice cubes. Fill the glass with 1/2 sweet and sour mix and 1/2 orange juice. Top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Car Wreck
instructions: Build over ice in a hurricane glass, filling with equal parts pineapple and orange juice. Float 151 rum on top.

name: Carabinieri
instructions: Shake well with ice, serve in high glass half filled with ice.

name: Caramel Apple
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker and Buttershots into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Caramel Nut
instructions: Combine creme de cacao, caramel liqueur, and vanilla ice-cream in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with whipped cream and chopped nuts, and serve.

name: Caramel Nut Ice Cream
instructions: Blend caramel liqueur, creme de cacao, vodka and ice cream in a bar blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and top with whipped cream and chopped nuts.

name: Caribbean
instructions: Fill a glass with crushed ice, add rum and triple sec. Add juice and stir.

name: Caribbean Barefooted
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a parfait glass filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Caribbean Bliss
instructions: Use chilled orange juice, but no ice.

name: Caribbean Breeze
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve!

name: Caribbean Breeze #2
instructions: Stir ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Caribbean Bulldog
instructions: Build the kahlua, caribbean cream and milk (or half-and-half) over ice in a tall highball glass. Add coca-cola and stir gently. Add straws, and serve.

name: Caribbean Champagne
instructions: Pour the white rum and creme de bananes into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and stir lightly. Garnish with a slice of banana, and serve.

name: Caribbean Chat
instructions: Pour the rum, creme de cacao and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add club soda, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Caribbean Cruise
instructions: Combine all ingredients, shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry (and an umbrella if handy).

name: Caribbean Delight
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum, vanilla schnapps and vodka into a highball glass. Add Sprite, and serve.

name: Caribbean Dream
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass. Stir, add ice and serve.

name: Caribbean Fly
instructions:
Mix ingredients together in a blender (except the Angostura), pour into a highball glass and stir with a cinnamon stick. Leave refrigerated for an hour or longer. Pour into another glass topped with ice and add a dash of Angostura bitters. Garnish if desired. 

A jug makes 4-5 servings dependent on the shape of the jug... so multiply accordingly on the amount of thirsty guests you have. (1.5 fl oz = 30 ml or 1 standard pour).

name: Caribbean Ice Tea
instructions: Mix all of the ingredients together and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange.

name: Caribbean Milk
instructions: Shake the milk with the Vanilla, add to the shaker the other ingredients and shake well.

name: Caribbean Mist
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, Midori melon liqueur, blue curacao and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Top with 7-up, and stir briefly. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a pineapple flag, and serve.

name: Caribbean Murder
instructions: Pour the Redrum, Malibu rum and Bacardi Limon rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the fruit juice, and top with grenadine. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Caribbean Queen
instructions: Fill glass with handful of ice and add ingredients. Then mix.

name: Caribbean Romance
instructions: Pour the rum, amaretto, orange juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and float grenadine on top. Garnish with slices of orange, lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Caribbean Screwdriver
instructions: Obviously this is not a drink for a small glass. Mix and shake ingredients in a shaker glass with ice. Strain the mixture into a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry if you feel so inclined.

name: Caribbean Smuggler
instructions: Pour the dark rum, triple sec, orange juice, margarita mix and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda, and stir briefly. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange flag, and serve.

name: Caribbean Splash
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with ice. Blend well and pour into two seperate wine glasses, and serve.

name: Caribbean Storm
instructions:
Put ice cubes and Curacao Blue in to Highball glass. Put rum, coconut milk and juices to shaker and shake everything together. Pour the mixture to the glass and garnish with pineaple or other exotic fruits. Add cherry for more colour contrast.

Other variant is just to put everything in to the blender with crushed ice and blend until smooth...your choice!

name: Caribbean Sunset
instructions: Combine melon liqueur and malibu rum together in a hurricane glass. Slowly pour cranberry juice on top until it fills half the remaining space. Float orange juice on top, and serve.

name: Caribbean Sunset #2
instructions: Pour vodka, rum, and both juices into a martini shaker with ice. Shake until chilled. Pour into a collins glass over ice. Finish with a splash of grenadine for the sunset effect.

name: Caribbean Sunset #3
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Caribbean Threesome
instructions: Place ingredients with ice in blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Caribbean Water
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass, garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: Caribou Boogalou
description: A twist on Caribou Lou (invented by rapper Tech N9ne). Instead of Malibu Coconut Rum, Malibu Passionfruit Rum is substituted.Pour ingredients in a highball glass in any order, stir, enjoy.
instructions: Pour ingredients in a highball glass in any order, stir, enjoy.

name: Caribou Lou
description: Referenced in the song "Caribou Lou" by rapper Tech N9ne where he sings about it - "...151 rum, pineapple juice, and malibu, caribou, get them all numb...". The directions are included in the song also but are scaled to a unknown jug quantity. Therefore mix as you please but remember it's the 151 that will hit you. Originated in Kansas City, MO.Shake or serve up with ice in a highball glass.
instructions: Shake or serve up with ice in a highball glass.

name: Carl Johan
instructions: Mix first 3 ingredients. Top with Schweppes. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Carl Josef
instructions: Stir kirschwasser and cherry liqueur together in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Carla
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and pour into a wine glass. Add lemonade, and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Carlitos
instructions: Pour over ice in a tall glass. Stir.

name: Carman's Dance
instructions: Pour vodka and gin simultaneously. Add strawberry and cranberry together. Fill the rest with orange juice.

name: Carmel Apple Spritzer
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

name: Carmen Miranda
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Squeeze a wedge of lime over the glass. Add rum, cola and fruit juice. Stir and add carbonated water if desired.

name: Carmen's Dance
instructions: Pour vodka and gin together over ice, adding strawberry and cranberry together over top of the alcohol. Add orange juice as desired.

name: Carnegie Sunrise
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Carolina
instructions: Pour strega into a chilled wine glass, add champagne, and stir slightly.

name: Carolina Iced Tea
instructions:
Add alcohol and stir lightly. Pour in iced tea. Stir a few more times and serve.

Note: Add a splash of lemon and garnish with a twist for a classy drink or serve in a mason jar for a real down-home feel.

name: Carolina Kamikaze
instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add more or less blue curacao - you're trying to achieve a Carolina Blue color.

name: Carpano Highball
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Add a twist of orange, and serve.

name: Carribean Catholic
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. If possible, shake chocolate powder (Cadbury's) over a match/lighter on top, and serve.

name: Carrie's Midori Sour
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, Midori melon liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with Sprite, and stir lightly. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge, and serve.

name: Carrie's Pink Blossom
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Mix tequila rose, amaretto and milk. Can also add a splash of soda to make fizzy.

name: Carrot Cake
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Place a tsp. (float) of Goldschlager in glass. Fill rest of glass with Irish Cream and Coffee Liqueur. Shake. Pour into shot glasses.

name: Carrot Top Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Stoli orange vodka, DeKuyper peach schnapps, triple sec, sour mix, orange juice and grenadine into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Carry's Caribe
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender at high speed until smooth. Serve in a collins glass.

name: Casablanca
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Add grenadine, garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve unstirred.

name: Casablanca #2
instructions: Shake fairly well with enough ice, and serve.

name: Casco Bay Lemonade
instructions: Pour the citrus vodka, sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda. Float a lemon slice on top, and serve.

name: Cassis Orange
description: We have it on good authority that the Cassis Orange is a popular drink in Japan, and more so with the ladies.Pour the creme de cassis into a parfait glass over ice. Add orange juice and give it a quick stir so that it is blended, but also ensure the top is more orange and the bottom more red.
instructions: Pour the creme de cassis into a parfait glass over ice. Add orange juice and give it a quick stir so that it is blended, but also ensure the top is more orange and the bottom more red.

name: Cassis Screwdriver
instructions: Pour vodka, orange juice, and lemon/lime juice into a shaker half-filled with ice. Shake. Strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Add a splash of creme de cassis and of grenadine. Garnish with a lemon/lime wedge and a straw.

name: Cast Away
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Add juices, add crushed ice until full, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Castillian Hot Chocolate
instructions:
Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water, and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. 

Begin heating the mixture, stirring it with a whisk, and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. 

Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring often, until it is thick, glossy and completely smooth. 

Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

name: Castro Cooler
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Drop in a spiral of lime. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve with a straw.

name: Cat Cocktail
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Mix a high-quality vodka and Triple Sec into glass. Fill with cranberry juice and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Catalina Cocktail
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in vodka and fill with club soda. Add a splash of cranberry juice just to make it pink and garnish with the lime.

name: Category 5
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass.

name: Cattie Suprise
instructions:
Combine the first 3 ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until frothy.

Decorate a tall glass internally with swirls of Hershey's Chocolate Syrup and strain the shaker mixture into glass without ice. 

Top with whipped cream and garnish with maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Cayman Climax
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, Malibu coconut rum and pineapple juice into a collins glass. Top with grenadine, little enough not to be able to taste it distinctly. Stir slightly.

name: Cayman Sunset
instructions: Fill a highball glass half way with crushed ice. Add light rum and piíƒÂ±a colada mix, then fill with pineapple juice. Stir. Add grenadine in the middle of the drink and let it settle on the bottom. Do not stir the grenadine. Garnish with an orange wedge and serve.

name: Cazuela
instructions: In a cazuela that is made of clay, put ice, salt, lime, orange, lemon, and grapefruit. Add grenadine, tequila, and fill with squirt. Use a straws to shake, and serve.

name: Ceasefire
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice, a cherry, and serve with straws.

name: Celestia
instructions: Shake everything with ice and strain into a collins glass half full of ice.

name: Celtic Kick
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cemetary Cider
instructions: Combine the rums and whiskey over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Add the apple cider and stir lightly. Pour into a pint glass, and serve.

name: Cesar Chavez
description:
Maxaemillion Capone created this drink in Los Angeles, California to celebrate Cinco De Mayo. It has gained popularity in Hispanic clubs because of its delicious taste, resemblance to the Mexican flag and unique method of consumption. Pour the grenadine into a collins glass THEN add ice. Swirl the grenadine to chill it, so it stays on the bottom during the build. Pour in the Dekuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps. Carefully add 7-Up (or Sprite or Red Bull) to create a clear layer in the middle. Layer the Midori on top. The drink now looks like the Mexican flag. Place in straw but DO NOT STIR. 

The preferred consumption method is known as "melon picking." The drinker (often female) sucks on the straw and pulls it up from the bottom so all the flavors individually flow quickly through the straw.
instructions:
Pour the grenadine into a collins glass THEN add ice. Swirl the grenadine to chill it, so it stays on the bottom during the build. Pour in the Dekuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps. Carefully add 7-Up (or Sprite or Red Bull) to create a clear layer in the middle. Layer the Midori on top. The drink now looks like the Mexican flag. Place in straw but DO NOT STIR. 

The preferred consumption method is known as "melon picking." The drinker (often female) sucks on the straw and pulls it up from the bottom so all the flavors individually flow quickly through the straw.

name: Chachodaddy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Chaise Lounge
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon, Malibu rum, creme de bananes and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Chambles
instructions: Add ingredients in the order above to a highball glass.  Add ice if desired, and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Chambord and Champagne
instructions: Pour the champagne into a champagne flute. Add a healthy splash of Chambord raspberry liqueur, and serve.

name: Chambord Colada
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir vigorously, and serve.

name: Chambord Kazi
instructions: Mix everythang in cocktail mixer with crushed ice, and pour into cocktail glass.

name: Chamborlada
instructions: Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur, light rum, dark rum, pineapple juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur into a the bottom of a large wine glass. Slowly strain the contents of the cocktail shaker on top of the Chambord, by means of the back of a teaspoon or otherwise, in order to create a second layer. Float a small, further amount of Chambord on top, and serve.

name: Chambrite
instructions: Pour chambord and vodka into a glass. Fill with sprite.

name: Chameleon
instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice.

name: Champagne Ambon
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Champagne Bleu
instructions: Serve in a chilled Champagne flute.

name: Champagne Blitz
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a champagne flute, stir, and serve.

name: Champagne Celebration
instructions: Add Cointreau, Brandy and a sugar cube saturated with Peychaud Bitters to a champagne flute. Fill with your favorite champagne. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Champagne Charlie
instructions: Pour into a wine glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a half-slice of orange.

name: Champagne Cobbler
instructions: Muddle the fruit and maraschino in the bottom of a bar glass. Add ice and champagne, stir gently and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Place one lump of sugar with bitters in a chilled champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Champagne Cooler
instructions: Pour the brandy and triple sec into a large wine glass. Fill with champagne, or simply add to taste. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Champagne Cornucopia
instructions: Pour the cranberry juice into a large red wine glass and set aside. Combine sherbet, vodka, and peach schnapps in a cocktail shaker. Shake until smooth. Pour over cranberry juice to product a swirl effect. Layer champagne on top. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Champagne Cup
instructions: Pour the white curacao and cognac into a white wine glass. Add an ice cube, and fill with champagne. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Champagne de Mars
instructions: Pour into a wine glass.

name: Champagne Fizz
instructions: Pour the gin, lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a champagne flute, add champagne, and serve.

name: Champagne Flip
instructions: Shake brandy, cointreau, cream, sugar syrup and egg yolk over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, and carefully fill with champagne. Sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Champagne Gem
instructions: Put creme de menthe in the flute first, then add champagne and stir slightly. Make sure your champagne is cold.

name: Champagne Hula
instructions: Pour the Whaler's Pineapple Paradise rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Grand Marnier orange liqueur, pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well and strain into a champagne glass. Top with Champagne. Garnish with a strawberry slice on the rim, and serve.

name: Champagne Irish Mist
instructions: Pour into a chilled champagne flute, and serve.

name: Champagne Julep
instructions: Combine 4 mint leaves with the sugar and a few drops of water, and muddle well. Add the bourbon, and stir well. Strain into a collins glass, add ice cubes and the champagne. Garnish with 2 mint leaves, and serve.

name: Champagne Napoleon
instructions: Stir the mandarine napoleon with orange juice and ice, briefly, and strain into a frosted champagne flute. Add the champagne, and serve.

name: Champagne Polonaise
instructions: Serve in a champagne flute.

name: Champange Rita
