instructions: Pour the tequila and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a champagne flute. Add limeade and champagne, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Champbull Vodka
instructions: Pour and mix.

name: Champerno
instructions: Pour into a wine glass.

name: Champibble
instructions: Stir or shake well.

name: Champion's Bubblin' Cherry
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Changuirongo
instructions: Pour the tequila and ginger ale into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Channel Island Iced Tea
description: This drink originated in Ventura, CA, USA close to the Channel Islands off the western California coastline. Channel Island Iced tea is a nice twist on the traditional Long Island Iced Tea on the other side of the country.In highball glass fill with ice 3/4. Add all ingredients DO NOT STIR. Using fork or spoon, push down on ice cubes to distribute contents thoroughly.
instructions: In highball glass fill with ice 3/4. Add all ingredients DO NOT STIR. Using fork or spoon, push down on ice cubes to distribute contents thoroughly.

name: Chantelle
instructions: Mix Galliano, Grenadine and Vanilla Schnapps with ice and then pour into champagne flute. Add chilled Champagne. For effect pour Champagne down the side of the flute.

name: Chaos Calmer
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a goblet. Garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Charles's Caribbean
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass over ice. Garnish with pineapple chunks and a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Charleston Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Mandarine Napoleon and cherry brandy into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with lemonade, to taste, and serve.

name: Charlie's Angel
instructions: Pour ingredients (except soda) into the beaker of a cocktail shaker. Mix gently, and pour into a glass half-filled with ice. Squeeze and drop one fresh lime wedge into the glass. Top with soda, and serve with a stirrer and a straw.

name: Charlie's Angel #2
instructions: Pour the white creme de menthe into a highball glass and fill with the double cream to an inch from the top. Stir well. Next carefully float the spiced rum on the top. Drink from the bottom with a straw.

name: Charm City Classic
instructions: First, mix the Iced tea and the Lemonade in a separate glass. Add the grand marnier to a second collins glass. Then, pour the mixed contents of the Iced Tea-Lemonade into the glass with the Grand Marnier. Stir and drink.

name: Charter Breeze
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all ingredients and shake.

name: Chartreuse and Tonic
instructions: In glass filled with ice, mix Chartreuse and Tonic Water. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Chartreuse Cooler
instructions: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Drop in an orange spiral, and serve.

name: Chase Manhattan
instructions: Pour the gin, orange juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Cheap Crunk Juice
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Cheap Date
instructions: Mix in glass and drink up!

name: Cheap Steve
instructions: Pour in white wine, add orange juice.

name: Cheat's Pimm's
instructions: Mix. Pour into tall glass. Add ice-cold 7-Up or ginger ale. Garnish with one slice each of orange, lemon and cucumber. Serve.

name: Cheaterita
instructions: Combine tequila, limeade and ice in a highball glass. Squeeze lime juice from the slice into mixture and then drop the rind in the glass as well. Stir and serve.

name: Checkerboard
instructions: Blend in a bar blender at low speed. Serve in a champagne flute topped with chocolate shavings.

name: Cheeky Vimto
instructions: Combine both ingredients in a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Chekhov Cooler
instructions: Pour the Stoli raspberry vodka, sloe gin, and cranberry-raspberry juice over several ice cubes in a chilled double old-fashioned glass. Add fresh raspberries, garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Cherokee
instructions: Measure a highball glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake. Pour back into glass and drop a cherry in.

name: Cherries from Heaven
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy, lemon juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with tonic water, and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Cherry Blast
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cherry Blossom #3
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff Black Cherry vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with orange juice, adding a splash of sour mix and touch of grenadine before serving.

name: Cherry Bomb #2
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add the vodka. Fill with unsweetened cherry juice.

name: Cherry Bomb #4
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cup, and serve.

ingredients.name: Blue Ox® black cherry energy drink

name: Cherry Bomb #6
instructions: Pour the Crown Royal Canadian Whisky into a glass filled with a can of Red Bull, and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #8
instructions: Pour the amaretto and Midori into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry juice to fill, stir well. Add a straw and serve.

name: Cherry Bomber
instructions: Mix all parts together and serve cold in a tall glass.

name: Cherry Champagne
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Cherry Chocolate Freeze
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry. Sprinkle with grated chocolate, add straws, and serve.

name: Cherry Chocolate Milk Royal
description: Cherry Chocolate Milk Royal was contributed and created by Aaron Turpin on Christmas Eve several years ago, from a limited ingredient list. It tastes just like regular chocolate milk only better.In a large, milkshake-shape glass (16-oz+), pour the vodka, cherry juice, 3 cherries, chocolate syrup and cold milk. Stir the mixture carefully with a chopstick being careful not to spill until the syrup has dissolved. Add a flexible straw. Top with whipped cream from a can. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles and one of the cherries, and serve immediately.
instructions: In a large, milkshake-shape glass (16-oz+), pour the vodka, cherry juice, 3 cherries, chocolate syrup and cold milk. Stir the mixture carefully with a chopstick being careful not to spill until the syrup has dissolved. Add a flexible straw. Top with whipped cream from a can. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles and one of the cherries, and serve immediately.

name: Cherry Coke From Hell
instructions: Pour everclear and cherry liqueur over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with coke, stir if necessary, and serve.

name: Cherry Daiquiri
instructions: Blend thoroughly, add a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Pour into a goblet, and garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: Cherry Fear
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Cherry Fizz
instructions: Shake juice of lemon and cherry brandy with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Cherry Flash Cola
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy, maraschino liqueur and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cherry Fluster
description: As seen in Arena's Luxury Sex 2004.Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Double strain the mixture into a Champagne glass, then top with Champagne, and garnish with the strawberry. Serve.
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Double strain the mixture into a Champagne glass, then top with Champagne, and garnish with the strawberry. Serve.

name: Cherry Fucker
instructions: Stir the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker and Chambord raspberry liqueur together with the pine-apple juice over ice in a small collins glass. Garnish with 2 cherries, and serve.

name: Cherry Gobbler
instructions: Pour the Wild Turkey bourbon whiskey and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Mello Yellow, and serve.

name: Cherry Heaven
instructions: Put vanilla vodka & red bull on the rocks. Stir till your happy and add cherries. Enjoy. It's rockin'.

name: Cherry Hooker
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cherry Kandi
instructions: First prepare some cherry Kool-Aid with half the water and double the sugar as per the directions on the package. Fill your glass half way with ice. Add cherry vodka, then white rum, then add your cherry flavoured Kool-aid.

name: Cherry Kick Coke
instructions: Measure a highball glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add brandy, Southern Comfort and maraschino liqueur. Shake and pour back into highball glass. Fill with cola and garnish with a cherry.

name: Cherry Long Island
instructions: Shake all ingredients except Sprite in a pint glass with ice, then top with Sprite. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.

name: Cherry Lovers Delight
instructions: Add ingredients into a glass. This can be put over ice, if you desire.

name: Cherry Martinsen
instructions: Pour in the brandy and then the coke. Hold up the glass and say dude. Enjoy dude.

name: Cherry Over The Edge
instructions: Mix southern comfort, vodka and orange juice with crushed ice in a tall glass.

name: Cherry Paradise
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum and Everclear into a cup. Add Cherry Coke, and serve.

name: Cherry Pepsi
instructions: Stir ingredients into a glass with ice and garnish with a cherry.

name: Cherry Popper #4
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cherry Poppin' Scotty
instructions: Pour single-malt scotch in collins glass over ice. Add Milk or cream until nearly filled, then pour Creme de Cacao slowly, layering on the top. Top with 2 maraschino cherries.

name: Cherry Pucker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of both lime and lemon, and serve.

name: Cherry Raspberry Shake
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake vigorously. Pour into a collins glass, add a straw, and serve.

name: Cherry Screwdriver
instructions: Stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Cherry Shake
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cherry Sour
instructions: Pit cherries. Muddle cherries in glass. Add vodka, lemon juice, and ice. Top with club soda and stir. Garnish with lemon, and serve.

name: Cherry Tree
instructions: Mix and serve with crushed ice.

name: Cherry Trouble
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add cherry vodka. Fill the rest with tang. Stir.

name: Cherry Tuesday
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Cherry Vanilla Dr. Pepper
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Cherry Vodka Greyhound
instructions: Pour vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up, stir, and serve.

name: Cheshire Cat
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass over ice.

name: Chi Chi
instructions: Pour the vodka, pineapple juice and coconut cream into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well at high speed, and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Chi-Chi
instructions: Blend vodka, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a red wine glass, decorate with the slice of pineapple and the cherry, and serve.

name: Chicago Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Chicago View
instructions: Shake with ice and serve over ice.

name: Chihuahua
instructions: Pour tequila over ice. Fill with grapefruit juice.

name: Chilli Vodka
instructions: Mix the vodka, green chilli (seedless) and lemon cordial in a cocktail mixer and pour it over ice. Now add fresh lemon juice, a pinch of salt and club soda. Stir it with a twizel stick, and serve.

name: Chilly Chocolate Mint
instructions: Pour the dark rum, peppermint schnapps, coconut cream, chocolate syrup and heavy cream into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour as much of the mixture as you can into a hurricane glass, leaving a little room at the top. Top with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Chilly Irishman
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 4 cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into parfait glasses, garnish with clover leafs, and serve.

name: Chilly Willy
instructions: Pour into shaker. Fill with orange and pineapple juice. Shake well.

name: China Blue
description: This is a extremely popular drink in Japan, China and Hong Kong. Hard to find someone to make this drink in America.Fill a collins glass almost to the top with ice. Pour all three ingredients over ice, stir gently and serve. Can add grapefruit, lemon, or lime wedge. Can also add a cherries to garnish.
instructions: Fill a collins glass almost to the top with ice. Pour all three ingredients over ice, stir gently and serve. Can add grapefruit, lemon, or lime wedge. Can also add a cherries to garnish.

name: China Girl
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into an exotic glass.

name: China Village Mai Tai
instructions:
In a metal shaker add a fair amount of ice cubes. Add dark rum and light rum, then grenadine, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Finally add triple sec and shake vigorously.

Pour in a thick tall ribbed glass. Top with a cherry or a dash of triple sec.

name: Chlamydia
instructions: Add ice to glass, add vodka, preferably vanilla, fill with Dr. Pepper, stir, and serve. Don't be scared away by the name! It's good!

name: Choco Banana Smash
instructions: Combine the irish cream, vanilla extract, light cream, vanilla ice cream and banana in a blender with one small scoop of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles. Garnish with a maraschino cherry. Add a slice of banana on a cocktail pick and place across the top, and serve.

name: Choco Colada
instructions: Shake liquids well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Chocolate Almond Cream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, sprinkle with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Chocolate Almond Kiss
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice. Serve in a coupette glass and garnish with chocolate shavings.

name: Chocolate Banana Martini
instructions: Fill mixing glass with ingredients, stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Add Hershey's Kiss or Godiva Chocolate Liqueur for a garnish.

name: Chocolate Barkchip
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Chocolate Black Russian
instructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: Chocolate Buzz
instructions: Pour chocolate milk into a large glass. Add 2 shots of kahlua and 2 shots of irish cream. Serve cold.

name: Chocolate Chequita
description:
This drink won the Canadian National Cocktail competition in 1987  hosted by the Bartenders' Association of Canada and was entered in the International Competition in Rome, Italy where it places a respectable 15th world wide.

Inventor: Frank Drinkwater, Bar manager and Head Bartender, Deerhurst Resort, Huntsville, Ontario, Canada.Cut a 1/2 inch slice of banana and set aside for garnish. Add crushed ice, banana, Irish cream , chocolate syrup and Kahlua together in a blender. Blend on frappe for 45 seconds or until smooth. The mixture should have the consistency of a fast food shake when ready. Form the slice of banana and cherry into garnish. Add thick straws and enjoy!
instructions: Cut a 1/2 inch slice of banana and set aside for garnish. Add crushed ice, banana, Irish cream , chocolate syrup and Kahlua together in a blender. Blend on frappe for 45 seconds or until smooth. The mixture should have the consistency of a fast food shake when ready. Form the slice of banana and cherry into garnish. Add thick straws and enjoy!

name: Chocolate Chicken
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all ingredients and fill the rest of the glass with cream!

name: Chocolate Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Chocolate Coke
instructions: Pour the Bacardi white rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Chocolate Confusion
instructions: Add into a shaker: one half ounce of each of the liqueurs, milk and chocolate syrup. Shake and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherries
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients, in order, into a brandy snifter; grenadine, kahlua and then bailey's irish cream.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry
instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #2
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Chocolate Covered Martini
instructions:
Chill cocktail glass. 



Mix Vodka, Godiva, and Vanilla Schnapps. Stir, do not shake. Place single cherry with stem in chilled cocktail glass. Strain over cherry.

name: Chocolate Cow
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice (add cream to taste) in cocktail glass.

name: Chocolate Dr. Pepper
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass. Stir.

name: Chocolate Gatail
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Chocolate Heart
instructions: Add a few ice cubes to a highball glass. Pour in Frangelico and Kahlua, then drop in a maraschino cherry (remove the stem). Pour the cream down the sides of the glass and stir lightly before serving.

name: Chocolate Leprechaun
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass and stir well.

name: Chocolate Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice then pour into martini glass.

name: Chocolate Martini #3
instructions: Mix vanilla vodka and chocolate liqueur in shaker filled with ice. Strain into either wine glass or martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Chocolate Milk with a Kick
instructions: Chill all ingredients and pour in glass.

name: Chocolate Monkey
instructions: Blend liqueurs with ice-cream, milk and syrup. Pour into a parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

name: Chocolate Orange
instructions: Stir with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: Chocolate Orange Frappe
instructions: Mix and pour into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

name: Chocolate Paradise
instructions: Simply pour over ice into a tall glass.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Cream
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth. Serve in a champagne flute.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Delight
instructions: Serve on ice or blend for a milk shake effect.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Martini
instructions: Chill vodka and creme de cacao. Pour into chilled glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss and fresh raspberry.

name: Chocolate Rum
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Chocolate Russian
instructions: Pour the Van Gogh chocolate vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream, to taste, and serve.

ingredients.name: Vincent Van Gogh® Dutch chocolate vodka

name: Chocolate Sailor
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled wine glass. Add the cola, and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Chocolate Shake
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Chocolate Slam
instructions: First add the chocolate syrup smoothly on the bottom of the glass. Mix in the vodka, and follow with coca-cola. Serve.

name: Chocolate Snowball
instructions: Place the chocolate syrup around the glass then place the other ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake. Strain into glass.

name: Chocolate Squirrel
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Chocolate Toasted Almond
instructions: Mix all together. Serve in a collins glass over ice.

name: Chocolate XS
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except cream) briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice. Float the cream on top and serve with straws.

name: Chocolate-Mint Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, then pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with chocolate stick and mint sprig.

name: ChoozyMothers Milk
instructions: In a large kettle (lobster pot), mix the Bacardi 151 Dark Rum, Bacardi White Rum, Kahlua, Milk and Vanilla Ice Cream (keep the ice cream in its form from the carton). Stir and mix in the cinnamon powder.

name: Chris Crush
instructions: Mix all ingredients except soda with lots of ice in a shaker. Fill a highball glass with crushed ice and add the mixed ingredients. Fill up with soda.

name: Chris' Flaming Skull
description: Chris' Flaming Skull is a slight take on the Buttery Nipple/Oatmeal Cookie recipe. It came about after using Hot Damn! instead of Goldschlager. The spicey cinnamon adds a very unique flavor, which lends itself well to a hot drink instead of a cold one. A Flaming Skull makes a great hot drink for those cold holidays, and gets it's name because it tastes very similar to a dessert drink made at Trader Vics which comes in a skull mug, on fire. Anybody looking for the original Flaming Skull five years down the line, happen Chris' Flaming Skull is the real thing.Mix equal parts of Bailey's irish cream, butterscotch schnapps, and DeKuyper Hot Damn! in a mug. Stir well with a spoon. Heat in the microwave until warm, and garnish with a cinnamon stick.
instructions: Mix equal parts of Bailey's irish cream, butterscotch schnapps, and DeKuyper Hot Damn! in a mug. Stir well with a spoon. Heat in the microwave until warm, and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Christina Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, vermouth and Pisang Ambon into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with Schweppes bitter lemon, stir again, and serve.

name: Christini Martini
instructions: Build ingredients in a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Christmas
instructions: Heat water in microwave. Mix hot chocolate in water. Add Godiva. Stir. Add marshmallows to taste.

name: Christmas Cheer #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Christmas Elf's Revenge
instructions: Crush the ginger root and add the ginger syrup, apple juice, sambuca and schnapps. Shake well and strain into a pina colada glass, which should be about half full of crushed ice. Add the goldschlager then sprinkle the cinnamon powder over the top. Serve with a slice of apple floating on the top, and a straw.

name: Christmas In Mexico
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with cranberries and slice of lime (salt optional).

name: Christopher Walken
description: This politely named concoction was invented on a cold winter's night in Rockford, MI by Shane and Dave.Stir rum, melon liqueur, and juices together in a collins glass. Fill with 7-Up and stir in sugar to make a nice fizz. Top with a mini-umbrella for festive flair!
instructions: Stir rum, melon liqueur, and juices together in a collins glass. Fill with 7-Up and stir in sugar to make a nice fizz. Top with a mini-umbrella for festive flair!

name: Chronic Ice Tea
instructions: Fill the glass with ice and start with a shot of raspberry vodka. Next add half shots of Malibu, melon, and blue curacao. Add some sweet and sour mix, nearly fill the glass with 7-up, and finally, float a 1/2 oz of spiced rum. Garnish with a flag (or 2 cherries!)

name: Chronic Ice Tea #2
instructions: Pour both types of stoli vodka(vanilla, raspberry) into glass filled with ice. Add the proper amount of sweetened ice tea on top. Stir ingredients. Lemon slice on glass, or squeeze lemon into drink. Then enjoy responsibly.

name: Chuck Diesel
instructions: First, take a chilled 12-16 oz glass, and fill with ice. Add the gin, vodka, and lime juice. Shake. Top off with sprite, and garnish with lemons. Stir slightly, and serve.

name: Chuck Norris
description: "I got this idea after hearing the Chuck Norris joke, 'When Bruce Banner gets angry, he turns into the Incredible Hulk. When the Incredible Hulk gets angry, he turns into Chuck Norris.' So I thought, what better to add to an Incredible Hulk than Walker (Texas Ranger) Red Label (in honor of the beard) Whiskey."Combine the Hpnotiq with the cognac in a highball glass over ice. Top with Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch whisky. Take a deep breath, and prepare for a roundhouse kick to the mouth.
instructions: Combine the Hpnotiq with the cognac in a highball glass over ice. Top with Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch whisky. Take a deep breath, and prepare for a roundhouse kick to the mouth.

ingredients.name: Johnnie Walker® Red Label Scotch whisky

name: Chuck Yeager
description: Chuck Yeager is pretty flexible; try other juice combinations (i.e. pineapple/banana or pineapple/strawberry, etc.). After a couple, you will launch into the atmosphere!Pour the jagermeister into a highball glass roughly half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with the pineapple juice. Stir well with a spoon or shake.
instructions: Pour the jagermeister into a highball glass roughly half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with the pineapple juice. Stir well with a spoon or shake.

name: Chucks Irish Bomb
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a container except for cherry juice. Pour into glasses and splash cherry juice on top.

name: Chucktown Crunk Juice
instructions: Serve in a tall glass without ice.

name: Chunky Monkey
instructions: Shake the chocolate syrup and kahlua, and slowly mix in the desired amount of cottage cheese. Serve cold.

name: Ciao Baby
instructions: Combine all ingredients with two cups of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until slushy, and serve in an elegant glass; hurricane or otherwise.

name: Cibola
instructions: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

name: Ciclonic Hurricane
instructions: Put ice into glass. Pour Ciclon, Gin and Amaretto over ice. Splash grenadine on top of that. Then pour in the juices. Stir thouroughly. Drink very quickly with a straw.

name: Cielo
instructions: Build in an ice-filled collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Cina Polada
instructions: Blend with 2 cups of ice until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge and banana slice.

name: Cinco de Mayo #2
description:
This Cinco de Mayo recipe is the kind of drink you want to make for those who like mingling around the bar so everyone sees it. When the drink is finished it looks like the Mexican Flag.Pour the watermelon schnapps into a collins glass. Fill halfway with ice. Stand up a gold foil covered chocolate coin in ice against the contour of the glass. Fill rest of glass with ice.

Now that the schnapps has chilled, tilt the glass and gently pour in the tequila. Cut up a lemon and squeeze the juice of two wedges into the tequila, and carefully bring the drink to about an ounce and a half from full with 7-Up or Sprite. Float the Midori on the top.

Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.
instructions:
Pour the watermelon schnapps into a collins glass. Fill halfway with ice. Stand up a gold foil covered chocolate coin in ice against the contour of the glass. Fill rest of glass with ice.

Now that the schnapps has chilled, tilt the glass and gently pour in the tequila. Cut up a lemon and squeeze the juice of two wedges into the tequila, and carefully bring the drink to about an ounce and a half from full with 7-Up or Sprite. Float the Midori on the top.

Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Cinco de Rob-o
instructions: Start with a pint glass filled 3/4 with ice. Add the tequila, triple sec, and sweet and sour. The glass should be about 1/2 full. Add the ginger ale, and stir well.

name: Cindy's Cycle
instructions: Mix tequila, melon liqueur, sweet and sour and grenadine in a tall glass. Blend with ice, and serve.

name: Cinnamon Cream
instructions: Stir.

name: Circus Peanut Margarita
instructions: Mix well in a blender with ice and serve in a highball glass that has been rimmed with jimmies. Garnish with a day-glo orange circus peanut.

name: Citizen Cane
instructions:
First take slices of pear and place them on a saucer, pour on raw sugar, douse in the overproof rum, and light. When caramelised this will become the drink garnish.

Pour the rest of the ingredients into a shaker, shake hard and fast and strain over crushed ice into a highball glass. Serve.

name: Citron and Seven
instructions: Pour one part citrus vodka into a tall glass. Add 2 parts (twice the amount) of 7-Up, and add lots of ice. Garnish with pieces of lemon and lime, and serve.

name: Citron and Sprite
instructions: Pour the Absolute Citron into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite, and serve.

name: Citronade
instructions: Mix lemonade and absolut citron into a collins glass, shake or stir, add ice, and drink.

name: Citronella Cooler
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half filled with ice and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Citrus Bull
instructions: Pour the vodka and Red Bull into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Serve.

name: Citrus Coke
instructions: Pour half of a can of coke into a tall glass. Add bacardi limon, and top off with the remaining coke. Stir and serve.

name: Citrus Cooler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large, ice-filled hurricane glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a lime wheel, and serve.

name: Citrus Hurricane
instructions: Mix the Bacardi Ciclon with Minutemaid Limeade. Use lime twist as an optional garnish. Great mixed drink, especially come summer time!

name: Citrus Rum Cooler
instructions: Add the spiced rum, Malibu coconut rum, orange juice, lemon juice, lime juice and sugar to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass with ice. Fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Citrus Smack
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add rum, triple sec, and sour mix. Fill remainder of glass with grapefruit juice. Stir and garnish with orange and lemon wedges.

name: Citrus Surprise
instructions: Mix together in a tall glass, and serve.

name: Citrus Tango
instructions: Pour two shots of citrus or lemon vodka into the glass. Add pineapple juice and then half a can of orange soda. Mix well.

name: Citrus Tequila Fizz
instructions:
1. Juice a lemon and a lime half; cut into wedges and add into a cocktail shaker along with the mint leaves and sugar (use superfine sugar or simple syrup if available). Muddle ingredients to release oils from the mint leaves.

2. Add the tequila, lemon and lime juices and club soda; stir and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: City Rickey
instructions: Pour gin, lime juice and cointreau into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Fill with equal parts of cranberry juice and soda, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and lime, and serve.

name: CJC
instructions: Mix the ingredients in equal parts in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Claret Cobbler
instructions: Pour ingredients into a wine goblet filled with broken or crushed ice. Mix with a barspoon, garnish with fruit, and add straws. Serve.

name: Clarity Cocktail
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Classic Amaretto Sour
instructions: Put a few ice cubes in glass. Pour Amaretto over ice, then pour sour mix on top. Stir and enjoy.

name: Classic Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Soak one sugar cube in a champagne flute with angostura bitters. Add champagne and cognac. Squeeze in a twist of lemon and discard. Garnish with half a slice of orange.

name: Classic Jack
instructions: Pour 1 - 2 shots of Jack into your glass. Add the coke until it is a inch or less to the rim. Then mix with a stirrer. Last but not least get the slice of lime and squeeze just lightly and place into drink and stir once again.

name: Classy Bitch
instructions: Pour the gin, vodka, triple sec and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Classy Razz
instructions: Pour liqueur into the bottom of a champagne flute. Add ginger ale, then raspberries.

name: Clay
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the peach schnapps, and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Clear Blue Sea
instructions: Mix all ingredients with ice. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Clear Cell
instructions: Pour the lemon vodka, lemon rum, tequila and gin into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Clearly Vodkanadian
instructions: Mix one bottle Clearly Canadian flavored sparkling water with vodka in a 16 oz. collins glass.

name: Cloudy Sky
instructions: Pour into a highball glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cloudy Sunshine
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Too strong? Half the spirits and lime but still fill with lemonade.

name: Clousseau
instructions: Mix vodka and kahlua in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Club Haus
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with an orange wedge, and serve.

name: Club Med
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass.

name: Club Tropix
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, add malibu and blue curacao, and a splash of triple sec. Fill remainder of glass with equal parts of pineapple juice and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and an umbrella.

name: Clueless
instructions: Once the vodka and all of the extra ingredient's are added to your glass, stir. Add ice.

name: Coast Colada
description: The Coast Colada recipe was made up by John Aquino at Coast Bar and Grille, Charleston, SC where it became their signature drink, and a popular one at that.Blend all ingredients together in a blender. Pour into a hurricane glass garnished with a slice of starfruit, and serve.
instructions: Blend all ingredients together in a blender. Pour into a hurricane glass garnished with a slice of starfruit, and serve.

name: Coast-Line
instructions: Pour the blue Curacao and the vodka in a highball glass. Top with pineapple juice and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Coastal Breeze
instructions: Pour Crown Royal, cranberry juice, orange juice, and lemon rum into shaker. Fill a highball glass full of ice cubes. Shake well and pour drink into highball glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Cocaine Lady #2
instructions: Shake and strain over ice in a highball glass. Float coke on top, and serve.

name: Cock 'n Balls
instructions: Pour the raspberry lemonade into a highball glass with several ice cubes. Add the vodka's by stirring in as you pour, and serve.

name: Cockney Champagne
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Cocky Carrot
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and stir. Strain over ice into a collins glass. Garnish with an orange wheel, and serve.

name: Coco Blossom
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. You can also add ice or a splash of soda to make fizzy.

name: Coco Butter
instructions: Combine ingredfients in a highball glass with ice.

name: Coco Cabana
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple piece.

name: Coco Loco
instructions: Pour the rums, vodka, creme de bananes, pineapple juice, coconut cream and sugar syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Coco Pucker
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Coco Rush
instructions: Add OJ, Cranberry juice, and Malibu into a mixing glass and pour into the highball glass.

name: Coco Tropico Smoothie
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth and creamy. Use chilled glasses and pour over ice for afteroon drinks in the sun. Serves many!

name: Coco-Cognac
instructions: Pour cognac and creme de cacao into an 8 oz. pina colada glass over ice. Top with milk or cream. Garnish with a cherry and shaved chocolate/cocoa powder.

name: Coco-Mocha Alexander
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Coco-pop
instructions: Simply pour the Livewire into a cup and add the Bacardi Coco. Stir with a fork.

name: Cocoa Colada
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth. Serve in a collins glass and garnish with a cherry and a sprinkle of chocolate shavings.

name: Cocobanana
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with fruit and add straws.

name: Cocoboodo
instructions: Shake with ice chips.

name: Cocomacoque
instructions: Combine rum, juice of lemon, pineapple juice, and orange juice. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with red wine, add the pineapple stick, and serve.

name: Coconut Bra
instructions: Build over ice into a collins glass. Add splash of 7-up last.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Coconut Climber
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with toasted coconut, and serve.

name: Coconut Cola
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Coconut Colada
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with one cup of crushed ice. Shake well for 10-15 seconds. Pour into a pina colada glass, garnish with a pineapple spear, and serve.

name: Coconut Daiquiri
instructions: Rim glass with lime and grated coconut. Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and sprinkle dark rum on top using a barspoon. Serve with short straws.

name: Coconut Dream #2
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a small highball or old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Coconut Frappe
instructions: Shake or blend until frothy, then pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut.

name: Coconut Grove
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with slices of pineapple and lemon.

name: Coconut Guitar
instructions: Pour the blue curacao and coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry juice to taste, and serve.

name: Coconut Orange
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the orange juice, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange on the rim, and serve.

name: Coconut Splash
instructions: Put in coconut, banana and strawberry, then splash in pineapple juice and fill with 7up. Gently dump into shaker then back into hurricane glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: Code Red
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps and Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Code Red to taste, and serve.

name: Codswallop
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Cody Spunk
instructions: Pour Smirnoff vodka, Amaretto, Buttershots and milk into a cup and stir together. Top with cream and enjoy.

name: Coffee Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry. Add straws, and serve.

name: Coffee Cream
instructions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Sprinkle with grated coconut, and serve with short straws.

name: Coffee Egg Nog
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a collins glass, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Coffee Fantasy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Coffey's Hot Irish Bloody Mary
instructions: Add the V8 juice, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, celery salt and pepper to a mason jar, cover and shake well. Add vodka and shake again. Sample and add additional celery salt, pepper or horseradish to taste.

name: Cognac and Soda
instructions: Pour cognac over ice in a highball glass, fill with club soda, and serve.

name: Cognac Highball
instructions: Pour cognac into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Cohutta Twister
instructions: Pour the Malibu, vodka, orange juice and cran-orange juice into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve.

ingredients.name: Tropicana® Twister Orange Cranberry Clash juice

name: Cokaretto
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour Coca-Cola into glass. Add amaretto and stir. Drink with straw.

name: Coke Safari
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Coke Sucker
instructions: Pour the rum into a beer mug half-filled with ice cubes. Add Kahlua coffee liqueur, half-and-half and Coca-Cola. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Cokello
instructions: Pour into tall glass over ice, fill with Coca-Cola and add a wedge of lemon.

name: Cola Kubes
instructions: Mix cherry liqueur and Galliano in a highball glass. Fill with ice and lemonade. Tastes like Cola Kubes (traditional old English sweet) and when mixed correctly, this drink tastes exactly like them!

name: Cola Rita
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Cola-meister
instructions: 2 shots of Jagermeister in the glass, then fill up with cola.

name: Cola-Rolla
instructions: Funnel the curacao, cognac, vodka and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml), roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard, stein or british pint), and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle, and serve.

name: Colada Brazil
instructions: Blend ingredients together with crushed ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Colada Collision
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with ice until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Cold Blood
description:
Cold Blood is a great drink for hot summer nights. The cherry juice/vodka mixture used in the recipe is enough for between 8 - 12 servings.Drain the maraschino cherries and set aside the cherry juice. Place the drained cherries in a small bowl and add 3 ounces of Absolut Lemon-flavored vodka. Cover bowl and refridgerate for 72 hours. 

When marinated, drain the vodka from the cherries and set aside as a reserve. Reserve the cherries also. 

To make one drink:
Fill a hurricane glass one third full of crushed ice. Pour two teaspoons of reserved vodka over the crushed ice. Add 6 ounces of Zima. Fill the glass until 1 inch from the top with blue raspberry Kool-Aid. Add 4 reserved marinated cherries.
instructions:
Drain the maraschino cherries and set aside the cherry juice. Place the drained cherries in a small bowl and add 3 ounces of Absolut Lemon-flavored vodka. Cover bowl and refridgerate for 72 hours. 

When marinated, drain the vodka from the cherries and set aside as a reserve. Reserve the cherries also. 

To make one drink:
Fill a hurricane glass one third full of crushed ice. Pour two teaspoons of reserved vodka over the crushed ice. Add 6 ounces of Zima. Fill the glass until 1 inch from the top with blue raspberry Kool-Aid. Add 4 reserved marinated cherries.

name: Cold Green Slime
instructions: Pour the Surge and vodka into a collins glass. Add a few ice cubes, and stir well. Add the sugar gradually while sitrring carefully, and serve.

name: Cold Hearted Threesome
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Cold Kentucky
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice, then add Amaretto and Southern Comfort. Fill with PJ and add a splash of OJ to top it off.

name: Cold Kiss
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cold Shower
instructions: Use 1 part of creme de menthe with 4 parts club soda; serve in a tall glass, and stir.

name: Cold Smoke
instructions: Pour the SoBe Lizard Blizzard juice into hurricane glass. Add the Jagermeister; serve unstirred.

name: Cole's Special Douche
instructions: Place desired amount of ice in a highball glass. Pour in Smirnoff raspberry twist vodka, followed by raspberry lemonade V8 splash. Add two to three splashes of grenadine, stir and serve.

name: Colibri
instructions: Shake well with ice in a shaker. Strain over crushed ice in a highball glass.

name: College Dropout
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Colonel Dan's Ice Tea
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add lemon juice. Fill 3/4 of the way with sweetened iced tea (prepared). Top with 7-Up. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Colorado Avalanche
instructions: Pour the brandy and the schnapps over the ice cream. Easy and quick.

name: Colorado Coolaid
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with a scoop of ice, and pour into a highball glass.

name: Colorado Motherfucker
instructions: Pour the tequila, coffee liqueur and Coca-cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk, and serve.

name: Colorado Pitbull
instructions: In a shaker mix Spiced Rum, Kahlua, and Cream. Pur into a mason jar filled with ice and add a splash of Coca-Cola. Garnish with a couple of Filberts.

name: Colorado Pucker
instructions: Fill cup with ice. Pour 1 part Apple Pucker, pour 1 part Bacarde Limon, pour 2 1/2 parts Red Bull.  Stir.  Enjoy!

name: Colorado Skies
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Columbia Gold
instructions: Blend well with large scoop of ice.

name: Columbian Necktie
instructions: Fill the Collins Glass with ice.  Add 2 oz. Bacardi 151, 2 oz. Southern Comfort.  Fill with Ginger Ale and add a splash of grenadine.  Give the drink one solid shake, add a cherry to top and enjoy.

name: Columbus Cactus Bowl
instructions: Pour in all ingredients except 151. Shake and then pour into glass. Then put a few splashes of 151 on top.

name: Coma 666
instructions: Mix equal parts of everything together, shake and pour over ice.

name: Combat Cocktail
instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a hurricane glass over ice. Add a splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Come to Me
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Comfort Driver
instructions: Pour orange juice over 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Add southern comfort and stir lightly.

name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw
instructions: Pour the vodka, southern comfort and peach schnapps into a highball glass. Fill mostly with orange juice, and serve.

name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
instructions: Pour the vodka, southern comfort, peach schnapps and galliano into a highball glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Comfortable Melons
instructions: Add ingredients to a glass with ice.

name: Comfortable Screw
instructions: Pour southern comfort and orange juice into a highball glass. Serve chilled.

name: Comfortable Screw Against a Fuzzy Wall
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice.

name: Comfortably Numb
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass with/without a couple of ice cubes, and serve.

name: Comfy Cream Soda
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cream soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Commando Cocktail
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, triple sec, pernod and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Commie Bastard
instructions: Pour the Stolichnaya Red Label vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew Code Red soda, and serve.

ingredients.name: 6 oz Mountain Dew® Code Red soda

name: Commodore Highball
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add Coca-cola, squeeze in the lemon wedges and serve.

name: Complete Mess
instructions:
Place an equal amount of Smirnoff Ice into three seperate half-pint glasses (from a full bottle of Smirnoff Ice). Add both half a shot of cointreau and half a shot of cassique to each. Mix the ingredients.

Fill with coke and add ice. Stir well.

Serves 3.

name: Concoction Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Coney Island Baby
instructions: Pour the peppermint schnapps and brown creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, slowly fill with soda water, and serve.

name: Confederate
instructions:
1. Pour the amaretto almond liqueur, peach schnapps, Southern Comfort, sour mix and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. 

2. In a hurricane glass, add the grenadine then add ice. 

3. Strain the mixture from the cocktail shaker into the hurricane glass, layering the two. Float the blue curacao on top, and serve. Colors, from bottom-to-top, will be as follows; red, clear, and blue.

name: Confederate Kool-aid
instructions: Mix Amaretto, Southern Comfort and Orange Juice. Pour over ice and top with Grenadine.

name: Confusion
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Conn's Fruity Beverage
description: This drink was created by Conn Draka who is also known as Jason Bowles in Little Rock, Arkansas. His Fruity Beverage is popular at SCA events around the south.Combine crushed ice, tequilla, and rum in a blender. Add grenadine, orange juice and lemon juice. Add margarita mix, to taste, for flavor. Blend for a little while, then pour into hurricane glasses.
instructions: Combine crushed ice, tequilla, and rum in a blender. Add grenadine, orange juice and lemon juice. Add margarita mix, to taste, for flavor. Blend for a little while, then pour into hurricane glasses.

name: Connie Cola
instructions: Pour the vodka and DeKuyper Cheri-Beri Pucker schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Add cola, preferably chilled, and serve.

name: Connolly's Irish Connection
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Continental #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Cookies 'n' Cream
instructions: Add the creme de cacao and vanilla schnapps and then fill with milk.

name: Cool Breeze
instructions: Pour the Stolichnaya (Stoli) vodka into a highball glass over 5 ice cubes. Fill with Lemon Perrier, and add the juice extracted from half a lemon. Stir and serve.

name: Cool Breeze Fru-Fru
description: Cool Breeze Fru-Fru is a variation of the Cool Breeze, a great vodka cocktail.Pour the Stolichnaya (Stoli) vodka, Lemon Perrier, tangerine juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass over 5 ice cubes. Add the juice extracted from half a lemon. Stir and serve.
instructions: Pour the Stolichnaya (Stoli) vodka, Lemon Perrier, tangerine juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass over 5 ice cubes. Add the juice extracted from half a lemon. Stir and serve.

name: Cool Carlos
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except curacao) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and float curacao on top. Garnish with pineapple and orange slices and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cool Coco
instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stir. Garnish with cherries.

name: Cool Kid
instructions: Pour ingredients in a hurricane glass, mix it up, and serve.

name: Cool Operator
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender half-filled with ice. Blend until thick. Pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a melon wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cooler by the Lake
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir well before adding club soda last.

name: Copacabana
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass. Fill with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Copperhead
instructions: Combine in an ice cube-filled collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Coppertone Punch
instructions: Combine Creme de Banana, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice & ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.

name: Coral Queensland
instructions: Add vodka to a Champagne flute, add a dash of limoncello (to taste), and a dash of blue curacao (to taste). Fill the glass with lemonade. Add ice if desired, and serve.

name: Cordial Cherry
instructions: Pour amaretto and Coquila liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake until chilled. Pour into a wine glass and add Tequila Rose cream liqueur. Sprinkle dark chocolate shavings on top for garnish/ flavor.

name: Cordial Cooler
instructions: Muddle rockmelon and pineapple chunks with sugar in the bottom of a highball glass. Add Bacardi white rum and a few ice cubes. Top with orange squash (premixed with water as per normal cordial ratio).

name: Corkscrew #2
instructions: Softly stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Corn-Fed Country Pussy
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Cornholio's Revenge
instructions: Pour the malibu rum, banana liqueur, and cherry brandy. Add the ice and sprite. Add lime wedge and serve.

name: Cornwall-Nash
instructions: Pour the rum, gin, triple sec, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Corpse Reviver #2
instructions: Pour pernod into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and sprinkle with a few drops of lemon juice. Serve.

name: Corsican
instructions: Pour into a highball glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime. Serve with a straw.

name: Corvallis Mint Julep
instructions:
Make a simple syrup by boiling the sugar, water, and mint sprigs until sugar is dissolved and it begins to boil. Pour out one cup of bourbon to make room for syrup. Strain Mint sprigs out of syrup and pour into bottle of Bourbon. Mix the contents and put in the deep freeze until it thickens. Serve on the rocks and enjoy.

You can take a couple extra sprigs of mint and put them in the bottle. Also, it's not necessary to use a high quality Bourbon for this to work, Evan Williams works just fine.

name: Corvette
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Cosmopolitan Heston Bar Style (Indiana)
description: This recipe comes from a super club in La Porte, Indiana (about 50 minutes outside of Chicago). Heston Bar is known for its prime rib, handcut steaks and fresh seafood. Winner of the Wine Spectators Wine Award.Pour all ingredients into a stainless steel cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake very well and strain into a chilled martini / cocktail glass. A sheet of ice should form when the cosmo is strained into the glass.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a stainless steel cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake very well and strain into a chilled martini / cocktail glass. A sheet of ice should form when the cosmo is strained into the glass.

name: Cossak
instructions: Add liqueur after filling glass with preferred amount of milk. Vodka can be excluded for a milder drink.

name: Costa del Sol
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, paper parasol and a cherry.

name: Cotton Candy
instructions: Add Butterscotch Schanapps and Mountain Dew to ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and serve.

name: Cotton Candy #3
instructions: Pour the gin, blue hawaiian schnapps and tom collins mix over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Pour into a tall glass or cup top it off with sprite (to taste), and serve.

name: Cotton Mouth
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a glass full of ice.

name: Count Blythe
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Serve with straws.

name: Count Currey
instructions: Pour gin and sugar together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, and strain over ice cubes in a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Counter Strike
instructions: Fill a highball glass half way with ice cubes, then combine all liquids and pour over the ice. The drink turns a nice unearthly green colour. You can add more or less Sobe if desired. Other energy drinks can be substituted; AMP is a good alternative.

name: Country and Western Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Add half a cup of crushed ice, and blend well. Pour into a red wine glass, and serve.

name: Country Club Cooler
instructions: Pour grenadine and carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and dry vermouth. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Country Cream
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine glass. Add straws, and serve.

name: Courage Cocktail
instructions: Pour the amaretto, Southern Comfort, Malibu rum and blue curacao into a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add juices. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Courvoisier Strawberry Lemonade
description: Whether you're planning an afternoon at the beach or spending the entire day under the sun, we want to make sure you'll be enjoying the ultimate fusion of flavors all summer long. For your outdoor entertaining, consider this fine, signature Courvoisier cocktailsServe in a highball glass and top with the club soda.
instructions: Serve in a highball glass and top with the club soda.

name: Cowboy Roy
instructions: Pour vodka, rum and orange juice into a very tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Cowgirl's Prayer
instructions: Pour the tequila and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with lemonade, and stir well. Garnish with slices of lemon and lime, and serve.

name: Cowpoke
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice and garnish with a cherry.

name: Cox in the Morning
instructions: Chill Orange Crystal Light, add Malibu. Perfect for any day this summer!

ingredients.name: Crystal Light® Sunrise Classic Orange mix

name: Cox on the Rox
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Fill with cranberry juice and squeeze a lime out over the top.

name: Crabby Soul Man
description: At the end of a funeral gathering, the guests were clearing out  and so was the alcohol.  An 85 yr old woman and myself decided to concoct a drink out of what was left.  Once we found the Absolut, all it took was a couple of tries and we discovered the crabby soul man.  Refreshing and tasty...  Fill your glass up with ice.  Put in 2 shots of Mandarin Absolut Vodka, top with 2 to 3 shots of Cranberry juice depending how strong you like your drinks and top off with a splash of 7 up.
instructions: Fill your glass up with ice.  Put in 2 shots of Mandarin Absolut Vodka, top with 2 to 3 shots of Cranberry juice depending how strong you like your drinks and top off with a splash of 7 up.

name: Crackhead Slammer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cran Daddy
instructions: Combine all ingredients in hurricane glass over ice.

name: Cran-Apple & Vodka
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Cran-Ram
instructions: Combine rum and cranberry juice first. Add a splash of sunny delight. May drink with crushed ice, if preferred.

name: Cran-Rum Twister
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Cranberry Countdown
instructions: Shake everything together with ice. Strain into a glass with ice.

name: Cranberry Kiss
instructions: Combine ingredients in a small highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cranberry Kiss #2
instructions: Pour the rum, peppermint schnapps, collins mix and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cranberry Sunrise
instructions: Mix vodka, then cranberry juice, then orange juice, then top with grenadine.

name: Cranberry Tart
instructions: Pour ice cold cranberry vodka, add ice (the more the better). Top with orange juice and stir gently.

name: Cranewoman
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Cranhouse Of Love
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add vodka and blackberry, then fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Crank and Vodka
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Cransoma
instructions: Pour DeKuyper wild strawberry liqueur, Finlandia cranberry vodka, Soho liqueur and apple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a hurricane glass. Fill with Schweppes Russian. Garnish with a stick of cucumber, a maraschino cherry, a slice of lemon and pineapple leaves.

name: Crapplenut Punch
instructions: Mix into a highball glass.

name: Crash & Burn
description: As served in Copeland's Restaurant & Bar, New Orleans and other Copeland's establishments. You need a very large glass for this famous drink, the taste is worth the obvious effort, it also serves 2-3 people. One "count" is normally about 1/2 oz. It's described on the menu as "Seven liquors blended with tropical fruit juices and topped with 151 rum". Known brands are listed below, and several of the liqueurs used are DeKuyper brand.Shake and pour into a large glass. Garnish with lime slices, orange slices and cherries.
instructions: Shake and pour into a large glass. Garnish with lime slices, orange slices and cherries.

name: Crawdaddy
instructions: Pour vodka and lemonade into a highball glass. Top with the soda, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Crazy Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Crazy Erika
instructions: Add all ingredients except sprite to a collins glass, and stir well to dissolve sugar. Add sprite, stir lightly, fill glass with ice amd serve.

name: Crazy Finn
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Crazy Jew
instructions: Fill your nice, cold beer mug with ice. Mix all liquors then add juices. Shake it up and serve it to your best customers when they ask for something new, strong, and sweet!

name: Crazy Monkey
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender or Island Oasis machine. Blend and serve in a hurricane glass. Top with whip cream and garnish with a strawberry and orange.

name: Crazy Monkey
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender and pour into a hurricane glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a slice of orange and a fresh strawberry.

name: Crazy Ninja
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam Bourbon whiskey into a highball glass. Add the Sierra Mist and a couple of ice cubes, and serve.

name: Crazy Orgasm
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cream Bomb
instructions: Shake the Malibu coconut rum, white rum, melon liqueur, orange juice and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the syrup last, and serve.

name: Cream Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Cream of Jack
instructions: Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey and amaretto into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add cream soda. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cream Puff
instructions: Pour the rum, light cream and powdered sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain over 2 or 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with club soda, and serve.

name: Cream Seven Simulator
instructions: Pour tequila and Triple Sec over ice. Squeeze lime wedge into drink and fill with cream soda. Stir. Tastes vaguely like a Seven & Seven, only with tequila.

name: Cream Sherry Sangaree
instructions: Add the sugar to a highball glass. Add water and sherry, and stir to dissolve sugar. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice, and add club soda. Float the benedictine on top. Garnish with a lemon twist, a dusting of nutmeg and cinnamon, and serve.

name: Cream Soda
instructions: Pour the Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

name: Cream Soda Shaker
instructions: To make this easy drinking beverage, you must mix together the Cream Soda and Vodka in a blender with ice. Then put the Shake in a Highball glass with the Lime as a garnish.

name: Creamin' Beemin'
instructions: Pour whiskey into tumbler over ice and add cream soda on top.

name: Creamjager
instructions: Pour one shot of JíƒÂ¤germeister and fill the glass with cream soda.

name: Creamsicle
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Creamsicle #2
instructions: Stir with a straw.

name: Creamsicle #6
instructions: Place ice and vodka in a highball glass. Fill to top with orange soda, and serve.

name: Creamsicle #8
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass with an orange and cherry garnish, and serve.

name: Creamsicle Dream
instructions: Put all ingredients in glass and stir. Served as a float drink. Can also be mixed in a blender and served as a shake.

name: Creamsicle Raptor Style
instructions: Combine all mixers but soda water in mixer with ice and shake, pour into high ball glass.  Add the splash of soda water and enjoy.  I recommend experimenting with the quantities of Absolut depending on your taste.

name: Creamsicle Screwdriver
instructions: Combine vanilla vodka, orange juice and some ice cubes in a highball glass and stir.

name: Creamy Grasshopper
instructions: Blend until smooth. Drink should have a thick, shake-like consistency.

name: Creamy Niall
instructions: Fill bottom of glass with ice and pour vodka over it. Follow this by filling the glass full with cream soda.

name: Creamy Pina Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender, except for ice. Serve over ice.

name: Creamy Punani
instructions: Fill a blender about 3/4 full with vanilla ice-cream (not solid). Add the amaretto and kahlua, followed by the bailey's irish cream. Blend until smooth, and pour into tall glasses.

name: Creamy Root Beer Float
instructions: Fill a frosted beer mug with ice. Pour 1 1/2 to 2 ounces of Dr. Vanillacuddy's over ice, fill glass with root beer about 3/4 of an inch from the top. Top off with cream to taste.

name: Creamy Sam
instructions: Mix equal parts sambuca and cream soda with ice. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Creamy Screwdriver
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Creamy Sex on the Beach
instructions: Pour the vodka, Malibu rum, peach schnapps, pineapple juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the whipped cream, and shake vigorously until frothy. Pour into a small highball glass or equivalent, and serve.

name: Creamy Snatch
instructions: Fill half the glass with ice. Pour in the buttershots first, followed slowly by the kahlua until you're halfway up the glass. (You can allow yourself to be a little more generous with the Buttershots than with the Kahlua). Pour in the half-and-half last, and stir until mixed completely. Serve cold.

name: Creamy Soda
instructions: Add ice to highball glass. Add coconut rum and banana liquor. Fill glass with 7-Up, top with grendine. Garnish with cherry.

name: Creamy Vodkanilla
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Creaper
instructions: Combine ingredients in a tall glass with ice. Mix well.

name: Creative Native
instructions: Add all liquid ingredients in blender and set on frappe till the drink is the consistancy of a smoothie. You can serve this in a frosty hurricane glass and top off with whipped cream as desired.

name: Creeping Death
instructions: Shake well.

name: Crime Loyal
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Crime of Passion
instructions: Beat or blend briefly. Pour into a wine glass and add soda. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Crimson Coma
instructions: Pour vodka over ice, then add raspberry and fill with Coca Cola.

name: Crimson Death
instructions: Pour vodka over ice, then add raspberry and fill with Jolt cola.

name: Croc Punch
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors, fill nearly with sprite and top off with lime juice.

name: Crocodile
instructions: Pour midori and bacardi over a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill the rest of the way with the soda, and give a brisk stir.

name: Crocodile Cooler
instructions: Pour over ice and mix well. Garnish with a lime wheel and a straw.

name: Crooked Golf Cart
instructions: Fill glass to top with ice. Pour cranberry juice to about the halfway point. Then, pour in amaretto and continue to fill glass to top with cranberry juice. Throw a splash of rum in at the top and stir lightly. Make sure and drink over the lime, it adds an awesome flavor!

name: Crooked Monkey
instructions: Fill beer mug with ice. Add all ingredients and stir.

name: Crown & Ginger
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Crown Jewel
description: Crown Jewel gets it's name because each liquor used has a crown on the bottle, and the purple jewel tone color of the drink. A popular specialty of Nick Scaglione, made up first in his college years at University of North Texas, Denton, TX.Mix all ingredients in a collins glass in order, top to bottom (floating chambord on top). Garnish with lime, and serve. To make shots instead, place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a collins glass in order, top to bottom (floating chambord on top). Garnish with lime, and serve. To make shots instead, place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well.

name: Crucifix of Love
instructions: Pour Red Bull into glass over ice. Then add Jack, then the shot of Bailey's. Drink quickly.

name: Cruise Control
instructions: Add everything to a glass with ice.

name: Cruiser Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cry Baby Blues
instructions: Serve with shaved ice.

name: Crying Game
instructions: Pour the whiskey, vodka, and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mixing glass, and stir. Heat the Bailey's irish cream, tequila and rum over a medium flame in a saucepan. Pour into a heat-proof cup. Add the contents of the mixing glass. Add tomato juice, and stir well. Top with grenadine. Garnish with a celery stalk and a green onion, and serve.

name: Cryonic Shock
instructions: Mix the Blue Curacao, Whisky, Rum, Brandy, Ouzo, Lemon and Lime juices in a blender. Pulse mixture for 2-3 seconds. Add the 8 ice cubes. Pulse for about 20-30 seconds or until desired consistency of ice is achieved.

name: Cuba Gooding Jr.
description: Cuba Gooding Jr. is a citrusy twist on the popular Cuba Libre; light and refreshing!Combine Bacardi Limon and lime juice in a highball glass over ice. Add Coca-cola, to taste, and stir for 5 seconds. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.
instructions: Combine Bacardi Limon and lime juice in a highball glass over ice. Add Coca-cola, to taste, and stir for 5 seconds. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Cuba Libra
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

name: Cuba Libre
instructions: Pour lime juice into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add rum, fill with cola, stir, and serve.

name: Cuba Libre Espana
instructions: Squeeze lime juice directly into a collins glass and add shell. Fill with ice and pour in the sherry, rums and cola. Serve with straws.

name: Cuban Breeze
instructions: Pour vodka and creme de almond into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cuban Breeze #2
instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cuban Cooler
instructions: Add rum to a glass with ice and fill with ginger ale.

name: Cuban Crime of Passion
instructions: Pour all the ingredients into a mixer glass, shake violently, and then pour the mixture into a 12 oz. glass with ice.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Cuban Immigrant
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cuban Lemur
instructions: Pour Bacardi 151 rum over ice in a highball glass. Add an equal amount of coca-cola. Squeeze in 2 lime slices, and serve.

name: Cuban Screw
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Cuban Sunrise
instructions: Shake rum and OJ with ice. Add grenadine to highball glass and swirl it around the bottom and 1/3 the way up the sides. Add ice and strain rum and OJ into glass. Works best with real Cuban rum if you can get it.

name: Cuban Sunset
instructions: Pour all ingredients except the grenadine into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Layer grenadine on top.

name: Cubins Cracker
instructions: Add Schnapps, Southern Comfort, Juice and Ice to shaker. Shake briefly and pour unstrained into the collins glass. Gently pour Curacao down the side of the glass, to allow it to sink to the bottom. Then add Raspberry Cordial over a spoon, to allow it to float on top. Serve with straws and a slice of Orange.

name: Cubins Cracker
instructions: Shake OJ, SoCo and peach schnapps. Strain into a glass with ice. Float curacao to the bottom and raspberry on top.

name: Cucci
instructions: Add ice to glass, drizzle Southern Comfort over the ice. Add lemonade, orange juice and a dash of Cointreau and mix.

name: Culloden
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a champagne flute, stir, and serve.

name: Cum Guzzler
instructions: In a blender mix ice cream, chocolate syrup, instant coffee, milk and cookies. Blend together. Add gin and blend again. Pour into mug and top with whipped cream.

name: Cum in a Blender
instructions: Pour the milk into a blender with some crushed ice. Add the white chocolate liqueur, Kahlua coffee liqueur, whiskey, Pepsi and banana. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Cum In A Hot Tub
instructions: Pour the vodka and rum carefully but not too carefully into a glass. They have different consistencies and you want them to mix just a little. Now let several drops of Bailey's fall into the liquor.

name: Cunning Stunts
instructions: Shake ingredients with a handful of ice and pour everything (including ice) into highball glass.

name: Cuntrat Supreme
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cupid's Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Curacao Cooler
instructions: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Add a spiral of lime, and serve.

name: Curielle
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a slightly chilled red wine glass. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Curious Comfort
instructions: Add Blue Curacao, Southern Comfort, and half of the pineapple juice over ice and shake. Add remainder of pineapple juice to taste.

name: Curled Satan's Whiskers
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Currant Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cute Gay Bartender
instructions: Pour all ingredients in glass, stir, and enjoy.

name: Cutty Cobbler
instructions: Shake all ingredients well in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a large wine glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, a slice of orange and a sprig of mint.

name: Cutty Collins
