instructions: Combine the Cutty Sark whisky, lemon juice and sugar in a highball glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Fill with club soda, and stir again briefly. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Cutty Rickey
instructions: Pour the whisky and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Fill with club soda, and stir again briefly. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: CV Special
instructions: Pour the port into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the sambuca, followed by the WKD, and serve.

name: Cyprus Brandy Sour
description: "Made by the bar man of the Officers Mess, RAF Akrotiri, Cyprus this mix is the nicest I've tasted.  Cyprus Brandy mixes particularly well as it is mild and not too strong."Brandy in first followed by Lemon squash (undiluted). 2 dashes of Angostura bitters followed by ice. Top up glass with soda water and add slice of lemon.  Stir well.
instructions: Brandy in first followed by Lemon squash (undiluted). 2 dashes of Angostura bitters followed by ice. Top up glass with soda water and add slice of lemon.  Stir well.

name: Czar's Cup
instructions: Chill all ingredients, as well as an 8-oz wine glass, prior to serving. Pour vodka and maraschino liqueur into the glass, and fill with champagne. Garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Czecher Board
instructions: Shake all but the lemonade and strain into an ice filled highball glass. Fill with lemonade.

name: D & D Lay
instructions: Serve shaken, not stirred.

name: D Dootie
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour in vodka, fill remainder of the glass with Red Bull and just a splash of blue curaco. Stir with a straw.

name: D'Artagnan
instructions: Chill the teaspoon amounts of liquor in a mixing glass and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne, add strips of orange peel, and serve.

name: D-Roy
instructions: Put sugar in glass. Squeeze limes into glass. Stir slightly. Add rum. Add lemonade. Stir and serve.

name: D.P.R.
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add 1 ounce of vodka and .5 ounces of triple sec. Fill with cranberry juice leaving about an inch of space for a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass and place one thin straw into the glass.

name: Daffy Duck
instructions: Combine ingredients in a wine glass, and serve.

name: Daisy Dueller
instructions: Shake the tennessee whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup and Cointreau in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill to taste with club soda. Garnish with fruit slices, and serve.

name: Dale's Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Shake all the ingredients, except the cola, with ice and strain into a collins glass filled 3/4 with ice. Top with coke and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Damage
instructions: Pour advocaat, rum and vodka into a shaker with ice. Shake well, pour over ice in a highball glass, and top with lemonade.

name: Dambuster
instructions: In a highball glass with ice, pour three shots of Rum (preferably Bacardi) one shot of Kahlua, a shot of ginger ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk, (Homo or 2%, never SKIM!) Stir. That's It! Enjoy

name: Damiana Golden
description: Damiana Liqueur is a light herbal-based liqueur from Mexico.  It's made with the damiana herb that grows in Baha California, Mexico.  It has great mixability and tastes great as a shooter.  The bottle is uniquely shaped and is modeled after an Incan Goddess.  The Damiana Margarita is very popular in the Los Cabos area of Mexico and Mexican margarita folklore says that the very first margarita ever made was made with Damiana Liqueur (not that silly French liqueur). Shake or stir. Enjoy.
instructions: Shake or stir. Enjoy.

name: Damn Good Lemonade
instructions: Add ice to the hurricane glass. Add the liquor and fill almost to the top with sweet and sour, then add a splash of sprite. Mix by pouring the drink into a mixing glass then back into the hurricane glass. Add a lemon as a garnish.

name: Dana's Nicotine Fit
instructions: Pour ingredients into an iced mixing glass. Serve on rocks.

name: Dances with Wenches
instructions: Pour the Blackbeard's spiced rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice, and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Dancing Captain
instructions: Pour the captain into the glass and fill with root beer.

name: Dancing Leprechaun
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a glass with ice cubes, and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Danger Bomb
description: "Named after me, Danger B Sac... an adamant vodka lover... it's just a drunk idea we got one nite and it didn't taste bad at all when we tried it so we started to rally it all the time.  Most drinkers will add more and more to their glass as the nite goes on just make sure there's enough mixer if you don't like the taste of vodka, but Three Olives is smooth anyway."Just a simple mixed drink, mix both vodkas in shaker with ice, throw in a tom collins glass on the rocks then fill with cherry vanilla Dr. Pepper... not extremely powerful, but enough will set you off with a good nite.
instructions: Just a simple mixed drink, mix both vodkas in shaker with ice, throw in a tom collins glass on the rocks then fill with cherry vanilla Dr. Pepper... not extremely powerful, but enough will set you off with a good nite.

ingredients.name: 4 oz Dr. Pepper® Cherry Vanilla soda

name: Danini
instructions: First two shots of Vodka, then the lime juice. Add ice. Top up the glass with Coke.

name: Danish Gin Fizz
instructions: Pour the gin, cherry heering, kirsch, lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Gently stir in the soda/sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lime.

name: Danish Mary
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Daphrine Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, curacao and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda, to taste, and serve.

name: Daredevil
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Darien Librarian
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Dark and Stormy
instructions:
Pour rum over ice, add ginger ale, and stir.

NOTE: You can substitute any dark or spiced rum.

name: Dark and Stormy #2
instructions: Pour rum into a tall glass over ice. Pour ginger beer over it. Squeeze in lime and drop slice in. Serve.

name: Dark Destroyer
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dark Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a Cherry.

name: Dark Horse
instructions: Pour the rum, Kahlua, vermouth and lemon into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a Champagne flute over crushed ice. Top with Coca-cola. Garnish with a lemon slice, and serve.

name: Dark Indulgence
instructions: Blend all ingredients. Pour into poco grande glass.

name: Dark Lagoon
instructions: Pour the blue curacao and grenadine into a highball glass. Fill with pineapple-flavored wine, to taste, and stir. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

name: Dark Pike
instructions: Pour vodka into the milk. Add chocolate flavoring as desired, and serve.

name: Dark'n Dirty
instructions: Mix like ordinary drink and serve with ice.

name: Darth Maul
instructions: Pour all ingredients, except Jagermeister into a collins glass filled with ice. Then fill rest of glass with Jagermeister, depending on your collins glass this can be more or less than 2 shots. Be sure to add enough grenadine to make it nice and red like the villain we love to hate.

name: Darth Vader
instructions: Pour vodka,Gin,Tequila,Triple sec and rum into a Collins glass filled with ice then top with 1/2 oz.Jaegermeister.

name: Dartmouth Cocktail
instructions: Serve in a highball glass filled with ice with a lemon and lime slice on brim of glass.

name: Datsun Cocktail
instructions: Add the Kahlua coffee liqueur, Tia Maria coffee liqueur, Cointreau and milk to a blender. Blend for 5 seconds, and pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice. Layer whipped cream on top, garnish with a half-strawberry, and serve.

name: Davenport
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add cola, garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry, and serve.

name: Daylon's Bedtime
instructions: Pour vanilla vodka into ice filled glass. Add triple sec. Add soda to taste. Mix with straw.

name: Daytona 501
instructions: Measure a full highball glass of crushed ice into cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake. Pour mixture into highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Daytona Daydream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Daytona Rolling Thunder
description: As the name suggests, this cocktail is an ideal drink for sitting back and watching the Daytona 500.Pour the Southern Comfort, triple sec, bourbon whiskey and peach schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well, and strain into a frosted glass mug with a few ice cubes. Fill with orange and pineapple juice, to taste, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange centered on the rim. Add a straw, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort, triple sec, bourbon whiskey and peach schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well, and strain into a frosted glass mug with a few ice cubes. Fill with orange and pineapple juice, to taste, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange centered on the rim. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Dead Baby Boy
description: Dead Baby Boy is a drink referenced from the film "Man Bites Dog", although the true origin is unknown.Pour the gin and tonic into a highball glass. Attach the olive to the sugar cube with a piece of dental floss, and drop it into the drink. When the sugar cube has dissolved the olive will float to the surface. The olive represents the dead baby boy, and the sugarcube is the ballast.
instructions: Pour the gin and tonic into a highball glass. Attach the olive to the sugar cube with a piece of dental floss, and drop it into the drink. When the sugar cube has dissolved the olive will float to the surface. The olive represents the dead baby boy, and the sugarcube is the ballast.

name: Dead Bastard
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tall glass over ice, stir, and serve.

name: Dead Budgie
instructions: Pour the coconut rum, banana liqueur, orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine around the inside edge of the glass, and serve.

name: Death by Chocolate
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Death in the Afternoon
description: Supposedly one of Hemingway's favorites when in Paris.  It is such a pretty bubbly green thing that one can hardly imagine the wallop it packs.Pour the pernod into the champagne flute and top off with the champagne.
instructions: Pour the pernod into the champagne flute and top off with the champagne.

name: Death Star
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Death Wish
instructions: Pour in cup and stir.

name: Deceased Rabbit
instructions: Pour the vodka and liqueurs in the above order into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir the ingrediens and fill up with soda water and sprite. Squeeze a lime wedge over (optional but make sure to use one as garnish), and serve.

name: Deep Blue Something
instructions: Mix the vodka, peach schnapps and Red Bull together in a collins glass. Add a small amount of curacao until the mixture is a deep green. Add some ice, and pour the remainder of the curacao down the side of the glass to leave a blue layer at the base of the glass.

name: Deep Freeze
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Deep Pleasure
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, then add the Kahlua coffee liqueur, Bailey's Irish cream and butterscotch schnapps. Add half-and-half as desired. For less cream, put in an old fashioned glass.

name: Deep Sea Sex
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the contents into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Deep Valley
instructions: Pour gin and blue curacao into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemon juice, pineapple juice and soda. Stir, and garnish with a long lemon twist, a cherry and mint leaves.

name: Deep-7
instructions: Pour in amaretto and rum on the rocks then add 7-up. Stir and serve.

name: Deep-Sea Diver
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Deer Killer
instructions: Mix all drinks in a blender, You can add 8 cubes of ice to chill the drink and give it more of a body. Add the hot melting butter (or the schnapps) right before you drink. Makes enough for at least 10 people.

name: Deerslayer
instructions: Put a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add the Jí¤germeister and Windsor, stir, then fill the glass with the 7-Up and give it a small stir.

name: Deez Nutz #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake. Pour into a collins glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Delicias de la Habana
instructions: Mix blue curacao with rum and ice. Pour it into a glass and add the rest of the ingredients slowly. Garnish with a piece of peach, a cherry and a piece of celery.

name: Dell Boy
instructions: Mix all ingredients except sprite. Pour into a highball glass over ice cubes and fill with sprite. Garnish with red cherry and lime wheel.

name: Della's After Dark
instructions: Place ice in blender, add remaining items, and mix well into a slushi. Pour into a large glass of 16 oz or more, hurricane glass is recommended. Top drinks with whipped topping and a whole cherry, and drizzle coco syrup over whipped topping. Add a large straw into glass, preferably a large plastic flex straw. Maybe strong tasting due to Kamora, so you can dilute mix with vodka if desired.

name: Demolitious
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add AlizíƒÂ© and coconut rum, then fill with equal amounts of cranberry and pineapple juice, leaving space for the 151 rum to float on top. Shake ingredients before adding the 151 rum. Garnish with sliced pineapples and cherries on a toothpick.

name: Demonade
instructions: Shake lemonade and Everclear in a cocktail shaker with ice. Add grenadine and tabasco sauce. Strain into glass.

name: DeNiro Cocktail
instructions: Pour a shot of vodka over ice. Fill with Ocean Spray White Cranberry juice and stir.

name: Dephaekt
instructions:
Blend the absolut kurant, oregat and frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass, add 2 ice cubes, fill with the cranberry juice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. 

Optional - add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.

name: Depressed Goalie
instructions: Fill a mason jar with ice. Pour over the whiskey (Jim Beam). Then add the Pepsi and Mountain Dew. Mix if desired.

name: Depth Charge
instructions: Pour the Vodka, Pernod, Malibu & Tia Maria into a one pint beer glass, add the lemonade and pineapple juice, and top up with coke.

name: Derby Daiquiri
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup shaved ice in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Derby Fizz
instructions: Combine all ingredients except water with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice cubes in a chilled collins glass. Fill with sparkling water and stir gently.

name: Desert Breeze
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Desert Healer
instructions: Build ingredients (except ginger ale) in a highball glass over ice, and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with orange peel and a cherry, and serve.

name: Desert Shield
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Desert Skies
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Desert Sunrise
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice. Top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Desperation Cocktail
instructions: Using a lime juicer, squeeze the juice of two whole limes into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the dry vermouth and top off with ginger ale. Stir until all ingredients are mixed. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Destefano
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir until well mixed, and serve.

name: Detroit Daisy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a green maraschino cherry and a sprig of mint.

name: Detroit Red Wing
instructions: Mix with ice in a tall glass.

name: Devil In Miss Jones
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass with ice.

name: Devil Juice
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Devil's Delight
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Devil's Tail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a champagne flute or 6-oz glass, and serve.

name: Devotion
instructions: Add ingredients to a glass filled with ice.

name: Dew
instructions: Combine the two ingredients in a tall glass with/without ice.

name: Dew It
instructions: Pour pucker and citrus vodka over ice into glass. Fill with Mountain Dew.

name: Dew the Dancin Captain
instructions: Add rum to glass, then fill with root beer and Mountain Dew.

name: Dew-Driver
instructions: Fill glass w/ice, add vodka and mountain dew to taste, and serve.

name: Dewhaus
instructions: Pour 2 shots of Blackhaus in glass. Add two ice cubes. Fill with Mountain Dew. Drop in a blackberry and add a mint leaf if available for presentation.

name: Dewmeister
instructions: Pour the Mountain Dew in a glass, then mix in the Jagermeister. A lot of the Jager will sink to the bottom, causing a dark, to green effect. Serve over ice.

name: Dewn' Razz
instructions: Fill the glass with ice, add the shot of Razz, top off with Mountain Dew.

name: DewPepper
instructions: Pour schnapps into glass with ice, fill with Mountain Dew.

name: Di Amore Dream
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Di Saronno Driver
instructions: Shake with a glassful of ice and pour unstrained into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Di Saronno Mimosa
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a half-slice of orange, and serve.

name: Di Saronno Punch
instructions: Shake amaretto, curacao, juices and bitters with ice and strain into a collins glass. Top with a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Diabloow
instructions: Frost the rim of a collins glass with salt. Pour the 4 ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake gently. Pour into the collins glass. Fill with 7-up and garnish with wheel of kiwi fruit and lemon twist. Serve.

name: Diamond Fizz
instructions: Shake gin, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir, and serve.

name: Diaper Stripes
instructions: Drink the Yoohoo down to the top of the label, fill with rum and shake. Chocolate will seperate out leaving a diaper stain appearance.

name: Dib Dab
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice add all ingredients. Shake or stir vigorously. Top with lemonade, to taste, and serve.

name: Dick Hard
instructions: Mix all three liquors then fill with sprite. Garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Dick in the Dirt
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass on the rocks.

name: Dickel & Dew
instructions: Take a large glass and fill with ice cubes. Add 1 part george dickel tennessee whiskey to 2 parts of mountain dew.

name: Dickel Tickle
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Dickhead's Delight
instructions: Mix liquor and chocolate milk in a highball glass, then top with whipped cream and cinnamon.

name: Dickie Ward
instructions: Pour the scotch, bitters, and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Diet Cherry Vanilla Yummy
instructions: Add your 2 shots of Skyy vodka into a highball glass followed by Diet Cherry Vanilla Dr.Pepper to the top. Sip or chug to enjoy.

name: Dieta Special
instructions: Pour the Vodka, Midori, and Puucker over ice into a strainer, shake, then strain into glass (with ice in it). Top off with Sweet and Sour and Sprite. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Dignified Iced Tea
instructions: Use absolut citron or other citrus flavored vodka. Mix in highball glass and enjoy.

name: Dingleberry
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Dingo
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain over plenty of ice in a highball glass, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Dionisia
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Diplomatic Answer
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve with straws.

name: Dirk Diggler
instructions: Add Jí¤germeister, and fill rest of glass with Thomas Kemper Root Beer. Mix and enjoy!

name: Dirty Apple
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add more cream if desired. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dirty Banana
instructions: Blend six ice cubes with ice-cream in a blender until smooth. Add liqueurs and continue blending, again until smooth. Add more ice-cream if needed (for milk-shake consistency). Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Dirty Banana #2
instructions: Fill half a tall glass with shaved or crushed ice. Add the Bailey's, banana rum, and cream. Serve.

name: Dirty Bastard
instructions: Pour vodka, brandy and cranberry juice (to taste) into an ice-filled highball glass. Add one squeeze of lime, and serve.

name: Dirty Bomb
instructions: Place red bull in the glass, drop in a shot glass of absinthe and drink.

name: Dirty Bong Water
instructions: Pour all ingredients in a glass with ice. Mix and enjoy.

name: Dirty Butt Whore
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Dirty Deigo
instructions: Beat eggs into the bloody mary mix, and squeeze the juice from half a fresh lemon into it. Add the mixture to a highball glass with two oz. of tequila.

name: Dirty Dick
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dirty Dog
instructions: Put ingredients into a mixing cup or blender, shake, then pour into a mason jar. Enjoy!

name: Dirty Girl Scout
instructions: Mix the vodka, kahlua and bailey's and pour over ice. Pour the creme de menthe down the center of the glass. Looks gross, but tastes delicious!

name: Dirty Gold
instructions: Put 2 shots of Amaretto over ice and finish with Mountain Dew for a sweet, smooth, potent drink.

name: Dirty Grasshopper
instructions: Pour creme de menthe and kahlua in a glass over ice. Add milk to fill. Garnish with whatever you'd like, and serve.

name: Dirty Ice-cap
instructions: Put ice in shaker, pour in 3 parts vodka, one part of each of the rest, shake, and pour into glass.

name: Dirty Knees
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass. Splash grenadine on last.

name: Dirty Lemonade
instructions: Mix vodka and lemonade in a collins glass. Top with sprite.

name: Dirty Melon
instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Take mixing tin, 1 scoop of ice, add 1 1/2 oz. of Midori, fill with pineapple juice, then add 1/2 oz. of grenadine. Shake and strain into collins glass.

name: Dirty Mexican Lemonade
instructions: First add vodka to lemonade, sprite goes in last. Stir and serve.

name: Dirty Moma
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

name: Dirty Momma
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Dirty Mop
instructions: Shake with ice.

name: Dirty Pecker with a Twist
instructions: Put ice in mason jar, add shots and Dr.Pepper. Stir. Cut ends off licorice and use as straw.

name: Dirty Russian
instructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Fill 1/4 with Kahlua and fill to the brim with eggnog. Stir until the drink is one solid color.

name: Dirty Shaft
instructions: Shake root beer and sambuca vigorously in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Splash Irish cream on top.

name: Dirty Shirley
instructions: Pour the vodka over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill the glass the rest of the way with Sprite. Add grenadine, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Dirty Virgin
instructions: Shake both ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Dis'alotta
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Disappointed Lady
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Disco Lemonade
instructions: Pour the vodka and blue curacao into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with lemonade, stir well, and serve.

name: Disco Lemonade
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Country Time pink lemonade, and splash in some Gatorade fruit punch. Add a small glowstick for garnish, and serve with a straw.

name: Discovery Bay
instructions: Add brandy, Cointreau, lemon sherbet and ginger ale to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Dissidente
instructions: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an highball glass. Fill half glass with ice cubes. Pour the rum and angostura into the glass. Stir well. Fill with chinotto, and serve.

name: Dit Kicker
instructions: Pour the fruit punch into a glass. Add the vodka and schnapps. The correct amount of lemon juice all depends on personal preference. A couple of splashes is a good mix to start with.

name: Diva
instructions: Pour and build in a tall glass or collins glass. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cherry and lime.

name: Diversion
instructions:
In a shaker with ice, combine 3-parts Amaretto with 2-parts Southern Comfort. Shake and pour in a tall glass to just under 1/2-way. Fill the rest with Pepsi or Coke.

Optional: Garnish with a small wedge of lime.

name: Divine
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, peach schynapps and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Add the Sierra Mist and Squirt (both chilled), stir lightly and serve.

name: Diwali
instructions: Use a frosty pint glass and make sure the ingredients are ice cold. Drop in the wine and whiskey. With the remaining room, fill half with the pink lemonade and the other half with the club soda.

name: Dixie Julep
instructions: Combine bourbon and powdered sugar in a collins glass. Fill with ice and stir gently until glass is frosted. Add the three sprigs of mint and serve with a straw.

name: Dixie Pearl
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Pour over ice in a tall glass, and serve.

name: Dixie Smooth
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour mixture into collins glass.

name: Dixieland Tea
instructions: Shake or stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Dizzy Blonde
instructions: Pour into a wine glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Do the Pink, the Pink Elephant
instructions: Over ice in hurricane glass, add vodka and gin.  Add soda to taste (less if you want a sweeter drink), then top up with cream soda.  Mix gently with stirrer or the bottom will stomp you. (which is where the elephant comes in.)

name: Doc Holiday
instructions: Pour whiskey into a collins glass. Add surge, and sweeten to taste. Add orange juice to taste, and serve.

name: Doc Hollyblock
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Doc's Lemonade
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass (lemonade to taste) stir and serve.

name: Doctor Dawson
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, sugar, bitters, and egg. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

name: Dog Biscuit
instructions: Pour all ingredients on the rocks. Stir.

name: Dog House Dew
instructions: Pour vodka into any cup or glass. Fill with mountain dew. Add a few splashes of lemon juice. Add a few ice cubes (optional, but recommended). Stir.

name: Dog Nuts
instructions: Mix everything into a glass with ice.

name: Doggystyle
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Doh
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Doh
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice. (NOTE: if you can't purchase Tahiti Treat use pineapple juice.)

name: Dolph Lundgren
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with pineapple chunks, and serve.

name: Dominique
instructions: Fill glass with ice, put in 151 rum, fill with OJ and add grenedine, garnish with a cherry and a half slice of orange.

name: Don Pedro
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Don Roberto
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Don't Worry About It
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Donna's Glowing Sunrise
instructions: Combine schnapps and vodka, add juices, grapefruit and twists of lime, then Fresca. Serve with lots of ice.

name: Donnington Brainstorm
instructions:
Mix well the Thunderbird with the Vodka and pour into an empty litre coke/lemonade bottle. The exact ratio of vodka:thunderbird can be altered to the creator's taste. Fridge for at least 12 hours. 

Donnington Brainstorm is best at temperatures between 2-4 degrees centigrade. If the drink is too cold it will tend to be too bitter; if it is too warm, it will tend to be too sweet. At just the right temperature, it should be light, refreshing, slightly peary and the alcohol taste minimal. 

Drink very carefully.

name: Dorado
instructions: Add Seagrams 7 whisky and grenadine syrup to a highball glass filled with ice. Almost fill the glass with orange juice, leaving just enough room to add the pina colada mix. Stir and serve.

ingredients.name: Mr & Mrs T's® pina colada mix

name: Doralto
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Double Intention
instructions: Blend all the ingredients apart from the Grenadine. Pour that on top of the drink when its in the glass.

name: Double Mudd
instructions: Build over ice. Add lemon bar mix and top with cola. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

name: Double Muff Diver
instructions: Pour ingredients into highball glass, top with ice and serve.

name: Double Omega
instructions: Mix all the alcohol, then lime. Cola on the top.

name: Double Southern and Squirt
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Squirt, and serve.

name: Douchebag
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a glass and serve.

name: Douglas Slammer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Down Home Punch #2
instructions: Combine ingredients. Serve with ice.

name: Down to Earth
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Downshift
instructions: Start with the sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid fruit punch, then float the 151 proof rum. Rocks optional.

name: Dr Jack
instructions: Mix in glass over ice.

name: Dr. Bacardi
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass with a couple of ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Dr. Black
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Dr. Crown
instructions: Add 2 shots of Crown Royal to a highball glass then add Dr. Pepper and ice. Enjoy!

name: Dr. Daniel
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Gently swirl to mix, and serve.

name: Dr. Dente
description: An old recipe, popular in parts of Southern California.Pour the Presidente brandy into a beer mug over ice. Add the Dr. Pepper, stir lightly, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Presidente brandy into a beer mug over ice. Add the Dr. Pepper, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Dr. Feelgood
instructions: Drink or pour out a couple oz of the Dr. Pepper (down to bottom of the buldge of a 20-oz bottle) then top off with Dr. McG's. If your soda isn't cold, the drink can be poured over ice, but it's better cold and straight up.

name: Dr. Fire
instructions: Pour into glass and stir.

name: Dr. Kevorkian
instructions: Stir well and enjoy!

name: Dr. Morgan
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dr. Nut
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour in ingredients and mix.

name: Dr. Pecker
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper #2
instructions: Combine the shots in a collins glass. Fill the glass three-quarters full with coke and add crushed ice.

name: Dr. Pepper #7
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the amaretto, top with the Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Dr. Raspberry
instructions: Pour Dr. Pepper into glass and add Chambord. Stir to mix, and serve chilled.

name: Dr. Red
description: The inventor of Dr. Red is a Mr Frazmanfraz, but props go to the origins of the Long Island Iced Tea as it is the inspiation for this drink. It tastes awesome and is even more deceiving than a Long Island.Completely fill a collins glass with uncrushed ice cubes. Mix the alcoholic ingredients, except grenadine, over the ice in the glass. Top with red bull, stir, and garnish with a slice of lemon. Add grenadine to intensify the color of the drink.
instructions: Completely fill a collins glass with uncrushed ice cubes. Mix the alcoholic ingredients, except grenadine, over the ice in the glass. Top with red bull, stir, and garnish with a slice of lemon. Add grenadine to intensify the color of the drink.

name: Dr. Red Russian
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Dr. Ruth
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Dr. Shocker
instructions: Poor Dr. Pepper into glass, add Aftershock. Stir once.

name: Dr. SoCo
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Dr. Suarez
instructions: Pour 3 oz. Dr. Pepper into a glass, then one shot of tequila, then fill with Dr. Pepper to 3/4 full. Top off with one or two more shots of tequila. Stir and enjoy.

name: Dr. Swerve
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Dr. Zhivago
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Drag Queen
instructions: Put ice in the glass, then add the vodka first, then the 7-up, then the orange juice, and then the cherry juice. Top with a cherry and an orange slice or leave it plain.

name: Dragon's Blood
instructions: In a twelve ounce glass, mix all ingredients and serve.

name: Dragonfly
instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Drainpipe
instructions: Pour Bailey's and Curacao in a glass, stir. Add Coca-Cola slowly. No ice, serve with a straw. Blue Curacao may be used if you are out of green.

name: Drambuie Cider
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, and serve with a cinnamon stick.

name: Drambuie Coffee
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Dramka
instructions: Measuer a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour back into collins glass.

name: Drawbridge
instructions: Fill a white wine glass with ice, and fill most of the way with white wine. Top with carobnated water and a splash of blue curacao. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Dreamcatcher
instructions: Build over ice, pour the shot of vodka in first and then layer the shooter of blue curacao on top of that. Splash the gin over the curaco and add the lime cordial, after this fill the glass up with 7-up and squeeze some lime juice in there. Drop the grenadine in last, to keep it deep purple at the bottom just don't stir it, this makes for a stronger drink.

name: Dreams
instructions: Mix everything in the glass.

name: Dreamsicle #2
instructions: Shake and strain contents into a highball glass filled with ice. Tastes just like the popsicle.

name: Dreamsicle #3
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps, then orange juice and at last milk. Stir vigorously until mixed.

name: Dreamsicle #4
instructions: Pour the schnapps into the orange juice and stir.

name: Dreamsicle Delight
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Dreamy Chameleon
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. This smooth twist of the original Chameleon is reminiscent of that summertime treat, the frozen orange creamsicle.

name: Dreamy Monkey
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream and the remaining 1/2 banana, and serve.

name: Dressed Up Pina Colada
instructions: Make a zig-zag pattern of chocolate syrup on the inside of the glass while turning the glass. Blend rum, coconut milk and pineapple, with 2 cups of crushed ice, on high for a few seconds, until all large chunks of ice are gone. Pour into glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Drift
instructions: Slowly pour Bailey's around the top of the test tube, then add the rum. Float the absinthe on top. Light the absinthe and let it burn for about 5 seconds. Blow it out and enjoy.

name: Drive Away
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Drop Kick
instructions: Mix ingredients together.

name: Drowning Pool
instructions: Pour rum and curacao over ice into a highball glass. Top off with Sprite. Send a maraschino cherry to the bottom of the "Drowning Pool".

name: Drum Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 2 - 3 ice cubes. Blend for about 10 seconds, and pour into a highball glass over 2 - 3 ice cubes. Decorate with an orange slice and two maraschino cherries.

name: Drunk Gummy
instructions: Pour Hpnotiq and raspberry vodka. Top with Red Bull and cherries.

name: Drunk Monkey
instructions: Pour the triple sec, banana liqueur and melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cranberry and pineapple juice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Drunk!
instructions: Take a highball glass, and fill with the double shot of Southern Comfort, followed by the vodka. Then add 1 shot of cordial. Add some ice, as much as you like and then top up the glass with lemonade. Mix for several seconds, until colour is a pale green, then allow to settle for 2 minutes before drinking.

name: Drunken Hawaiian
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Blue Maui, Sour Apple Pucker and coconut rum. Slowly fill remainder of glass with pineapple juice. Looks pretty cool and tastes awesome.

name: Drunken Madness
instructions: Mix vodka, schnapps, orange juice and grenadine together then fill with carbonated water. Top it off with an Orange Slice for decoration! Stir, serve and enjoy.

name: Drunken Parrot
instructions: Fill blender 2/3 full of ice. Add all other ingredients. Blend to smoothie consistency. Pour into a highball glass, and garnish at will. Serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay pineapple rum
Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Drunken Rumsfeld
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Razz rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Rockstar energy drink, stir and serve.

name: Drunken Stupor
instructions: Pour the rye whiskey, Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka into a beer mug. Top with Pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Dry Hole
instructions: Pour the white rum, apricot brandy, Cointreau and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda, stir briefly and serve.

name: Dry Lemonade
instructions: Pour the Absolut Citron into an 8-oz highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up, and add lime juice. Sweeten with sugar. Top with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Dublin Driver
instructions: Pour Irish Mist and Orange Juice over rocks. Enjoy.

name: Dubonnet Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Dubonnet Highball
instructions: Pour dubonnet over ice cubes in a collins glass, and fill with ginger ale. Add a spiral of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Dubonnet Negroni
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a wine glass and add a lemon twist for garnish.

name: Due Campari
instructions: Shake lemon juice and campari well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with prosecco, and serve.

name: Duke Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients except champagne in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a flute, and fill with chilled champagne. Stir before serving.

name: Duke's Dew
instructions: Pour half of a chilled can of Mountain Dew into glass, add schnapps, and top of with remaining Dew.

name: Dumpster Juice
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Duncan MacLeod
instructions: Combine pre-chilled shochu and scotch in a beer mug. Fill with coke, mix gently and serve.

name: Dundee Dream
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a highball glass. Add the ginger ale, garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Dungeon Punch
instructions: Mix fruit punch flavored kool-aid with schnapps, vodka, and orange juice. Once stirred, garnish with cherries.

name: Durban Poison
instructions: Pour both ingredients over crushed ice in a champagne flute or tall, thin glass, and serve.

name: Dusty Dog
instructions: Pour vodka, creme de cassis, lemon juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale, and stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Dutch Turbo
instructions: Mix on the rocks. Pour it all over cubed ice. Put a wedge pineapple on the glass. Serve it the way they want it.

name: Dutchie
instructions:
Pour creme de banane, apricot brandy and cherry brandy into the beer mug. Drop in a few ice cubes, and fill mug 3/4 with milk. Slowly pour the ounce of advocaat over the top of the milk covering the surface. 

Now watch as the advocaat drips around the ice and through the milk. This affect is best when the advocaat has been chilled.

name: Dyer Maker
instructions: Pour Maker's Mark bourbon whiskey and Jagermeister herbal liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sour mix, top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Dying Bastard
instructions: Place all ingredients into a tall glass over ice, stir, and serve.

name: Eager Beaver
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Eagle Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Eagle Eye
instructions: Shake and serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass.

name: Early Burn
instructions: Pour orange juice in about 3/4 way up and add 2-3 shots of Goldschlager.

name: Early Morning Sulk
description: Early Morning Sulk is a pick-me-up drink invented by a Glasgow hotel bartender called "Chief" in the early 2000's. Normally recommended (though not always accepted) to hotel residents who either had a poor nights sleep or were generally just moody in the mornings to perk them up for the day ahead. Apparently works wonders.Place 3 ice-cubes in a highball glass. Add gin, peach schnapps, and vodka. Top-up the glass with Coca-cola and stir ingredients slowly together with a swizzle stick. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add a straw, and serve.
instructions: Place 3 ice-cubes in a highball glass. Add gin, peach schnapps, and vodka. Top-up the glass with Coca-cola and stir ingredients slowly together with a swizzle stick. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Earthquake #2
instructions: Pour vodka, gin and creme-de-menthe over lots of ice.

name: Earthquake Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

name: Easy Creamsicle
instructions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain or pour completely into a highball glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Easy Money
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except grenadine) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Sprinkle grenadine on top, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Easy Rootbeer Float
instructions: Pour rootbeer schnapps and vanilla flavored schnapps into a cup. Pour in a can of rootbeer. Add ice or ice-cream if desired, and serve.

name: Ebola
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in pitcher. To add a cooler edge, throw in some crushed ice and a touch of cinammon.

name: Ebony Babe
instructions: Crush oreos and chocolate...add to Chocolate Milk, chocolate syrup and kahlua...stir in cinnamon with cinnamon sticks.

name: Ed-Mans Blues
instructions: Blend and shake all ingredients except soda water and cinnamon. Pour into a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Add soda water and top off with 2 dashes of cinnamon. Stir and lose your blues...

name: Edith Day Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour over shaved ice in a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Edith's Fizz
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: EDO Cocktail
instructions: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of melon and a green cocktail cherry.

name: Egg Cream
instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a tall glass. Add soda water, and serve with a straw.

name: El Bastardo
instructions:
Mix all at the same time into a blender. After blending for approx. 30 seconds, fill beer mug 3/4 way and start a chugin'. 

Oh, it'll burn like hell for about 2 minutes, but once that sauce burns through your stomach lining and virtually injects the alcohol into your blood stream, put the unfinished El Bastardo down because you're gonna hit the floor.

name: El Condor Pasa
description: Named in recognition of the Peruvian ceremony known as "Yawar Fiesta" or "Blood Celebration", in which a Condor is captured by baiting it with the meat of an animal, made drunk and tied to a Bull in an arena, before both are released and the Condor set free again.Add ingredients in the order given with the exception of the grenadine. Stir well. Add a splash of grenadine creating the illusion of a sunset; add lime wedge for garnish.
instructions: Add ingredients in the order given with the exception of the grenadine. Stir well. Add a splash of grenadine creating the illusion of a sunset; add lime wedge for garnish.

name: El Diablo
instructions: Stir tequila and creme de cassis over ice in a chilled collins glass. Fill with ginger ale, squeeze in the lime wedge's juice and drop in the spent shell.

name: El Jefe
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: El Nino
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain over ice in a hurricane glass, and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: El Swavo
description: El Swavo is one of the newer drinks in the Chicago area bars. Most popular with the college kids.Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: El Torro Loco
instructions: Add crushed ice, gin, vodka, and red bull to a cocktail shaker, or use two glasses  to mix. Pour into a collins glass over ice, add a splash of grenadine and garnish with cherries.

name: El Tropicale
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Eldorado
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Electric Banana
instructions: Pour ingredients in glass and shake vigorously.

name: Electric Blue Lemonade
instructions: Mix with ice and shake. Glow cubes optional.

name: Electric Bubblegum
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Shake and serve.

name: Electric Cool-Aid
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in shots and fill with equal parts cranberry and sour mix.

name: Electric Iced Tea
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Squeeze in lemon wedges, stir, and serve.

name: Electric Koolaid
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Electric Lemonade
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Electric Lemonade #2
instructions: Pour the vodka, gin, rum and blue curacao into a chilled collins glass. Top off with lemonade, stir and serve.

name: Electric Lizard
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Electric Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Electric Marcucci
instructions: Mix in this order. The blue curacao self-mixing with the sprite helps for show. Also not so keen in anything other than a clear container of course.

name: Electric Popsicle
instructions: Pour both the melon liqueur and blue curacao in the collins glass and fill with 7-up. Place the slice of lime on the top of the glass.

name: Electric Relaxation
instructions: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in the triple sec and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Electric Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the shots into a highball glass, fill with orange juice (to taste), and serve.

name: Electric Ski-mask
instructions: Add vodka and triple sec to a highball glass or old-fashioned glass. Add Rockstar energy drink, then add cranberry juice and serve.

name: Electric Smurf
instructions: Put three ice cubes in a glass then add Malibu and Blue Curacao. Fill glass half with Sprite half with Pineapple Juice. Stir and Serve.

name: Electric Tea
instructions: Combine in a pint glass, shake and serve with a lemon wedge.

name: Elephant Shake
instructions: Blend on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass.

name: Elf Tea #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Eliminator
instructions:
Mix all ingredients in a tall glass. Add more orange soda if it is unpalitable.

The first one is awful. By the third you will be begging for more. There won't be a fifth.

name: Elmo
instructions: Pour southern comfort, amaretto, vodka and sour mix into a shaker. Fill with sprite, shake, and strain (or roll) into a glass.

name: Embolism
instructions: Add rum and grenadine to a glass. Fill with coke. Ice optional.

name: Emerald City
instructions: Pour into an ice filled hurricane glass.

name: Emerald Cocktail #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail #4
description: A vibrant, refreshing drink to celebrate St. Patrick’s Day in style.Pour all ingredients over into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir together, garnish with a slice of fresh lime, and serve.
instructions: Pour all ingredients over into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir together, garnish with a slice of fresh lime, and serve.

name: Emerald Isle #2
instructions: Stir with ice, and serve.

name: Emerald Isle Cooler
instructions: Put ice cream into a collins glass. Add the creme de menthe and Irish whiskey, stirring well. Fill with carbonated water and stir one last time before serving.

name: Emily Emily
instructions: Muddle the kumquats in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add the other ingredients and shake vigorously. Double strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: En Sann En
instructions: Fill long drinks glass with ice-cubes, add vodka and sour-mix. Top with coca-cola, stir.

name: Enchantress
instructions: Combine alcoholic ingredients in glass over ice. Fill to top with milk, add splash of grenadine. Stir gently.

name: English Highball
instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water or ginger ale. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve.

name: English Pirate
instructions: In a large (20 oz or larger) mug or mason jar, pour in rum and fill to within 1 inch of top with sweetened iced tea. Add ice and enjoy. Lemon can be added to taste.

name: Enigma
instructions: Pour the rum, vodka, triple sec, Southern Comfort and amaretto into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of orange juice and cranberry juice. Top with a splash of grenadine. Stir well, and serve.

name: Entwistle's Error
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Eraser
instructions: Stir ingredients together with a couple of ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Eric's Bloody Bull
instructions: In a small pitcher or bowl combine tomato juice, bouillon, vodka, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, celery salt, lime juice, and lemon juice and stir to blend well. Divide the mixture between two highball glasses containing ice, and garnish with black pepper and celery.

name: Erika's Sweet Dream
description: Erika's Sweet Dream was created at Arrowhead Golf Course by accident by Erika M Len; now popular anywhere she goes. You can use any and all sweet fruit juices all mixed up just make sure you use Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay for the coconut rum.Fill a hurricane glass with ice; add triple sec and Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum. Add all juices. Place stir stick, straw and slice of favorite fruit (slice of pineapple, slice of orange) on rim of glass and serve.
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice; add triple sec and Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum. Add all juices. Place stir stick, straw and slice of favorite fruit (slice of pineapple, slice of orange) on rim of glass and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Erin's Gin & Tonic
instructions: Pour the gin into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with tonic water and top with grenadine syrup. Stir, garnish with maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Erotica
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into Collins glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Escape Route
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Eskay Slammer
instructions: Pour the Maker's Mark bourbon whiskey into a highball glass. Add the ice cold root beer, a small scoop of vanilla ice cream, and serve.

name: Eskimo Joe's Drink
instructions: Add rum, fruits, ice, juice, and yoghurt to a blender. Ensure the orange is peeled and seedless. Cut seeds out of apple. Blend for 1 minute and you're ready for the eskimo.

name: Essex Slag
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour apricot brandy in first then fill glass 2/3 with mango juice. Shake the vodka and cranberry together and strain over the top so that you are left with the two layers.

name: Ethiopian Camel Basher
instructions: Grenadine will sink to the bottom of the glass. The dash should be just enough to give a thin layer. Mix thoroughly. The correct mix will give a drink which is between pink & orange in color, but not one nor the other.

name: Ethnic Sugar
instructions: Mix all ingredients together except for the surge and stir. Fill the rest up with surge and enjoy.

name: Etyk
instructions: Shake and serve with ice!

name: Eugene Dangerous
instructions: Add ingredients over the rocks.

name: European Dr. Pepper
instructions: Pour the Coke on ice in a highball glass. Add the amaretto almond liqueur, and serve.

name: Eve's Apple Daiquiri
instructions: Combine the rum, sour mix and apple juice concentrate with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a round wine glass. Garnish with an apple wedge or a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Eve's Original Sin
instructions: Mix lemon juice, apple vodka, Sour Apple Pucker, and 99 Apples with ice in a cocktail shaker. Srain into glass. Fill with 7-up and garnish with Granny Smith apple slice.

name: Even Pair
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add tonic water, and serve.

name: Evening in Paris
instructions: Pour the pineapple juice, orange juice, lemon juice, peach vodka and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well for 30 seconds. Pour unstrained into a large glass (hurricane or otherwise) and add 7-UP. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Event Horizon
instructions: Blend ingredients at high speed and serve immediately.

name: Everbeer
instructions: Simply add a shot or more of everclear to your favorite mug of rootbeer and enjoy.

name: Everhart
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Evil Blue Thing
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Evil Jake
description: Evil Jake is the official drink of the music band. See http://www.eviljake.com for more details on the band.Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey into a collins or similar tall glass filled with ice cubes. Pour Coca-cola into the glass, and add Grenadine. Stir lightly. Pierce a maraschino cherry with a toothpick, top and serve.
instructions: Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey into a collins or similar tall glass filled with ice cubes. Pour Coca-cola into the glass, and add Grenadine. Stir lightly. Pierce a maraschino cherry with a toothpick, top and serve.

name: Evil Slider
instructions: Mix well and serve.

name: Evil Spell
instructions: Add crushed ice to a 10-oz glass until 1/3 full. Pour the Sortilege rye whiskey and fresh apple juice. Add a cinnamon stick. Stir and garnish with a slice of apple. Serve.

name: Evil Spell #2
instructions: Add crushed ice to a 10-oz glass until 1/3 full. Pour rye whisky, maple syrup, and fill with freshly pressed apple juice. Stir until maple syrup has dissolved and add cinnamon stick. Garnish with apple slice, and serve.

name: Evil Tea
instructions: Mix well, and pour over ice.

name: Ewa Beach Ice Tea
instructions: Build over ice, stir, and enjoy!

name: Excitabull
instructions: Pour the vodka, peach schnapps and Red Bull into a tall glass. Stir. Top with cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Executive Sunrise
instructions: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the creme de cassis into the center of the drink.

name: Exit the Brain
instructions: Fill the glass with cubed ice to the top. Start with the passion juice, then add the rum , and finally the grenadine. Top it off with the red bull.

name: Exotic Finn
instructions:
Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Add the first three ingredients and stir. Top up with sprite and garnish with mint leaves, a strawberry, a twist of orange and a straw. 

Ole Skeiedal, from Norway, took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.

name: Exotic Summernight
instructions: Mix vodka and juices, pour over ice in a glass, and layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Exploding Cherry
instructions: Pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.

name: Explosion
instructions: Pour the vodka, Cointreau and lime juice into a pint glass. Fill with a strong, sweet pear cider, or add to taste.

name: Extra Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Mix Peach Brandy, Peach Schnapps, and Triple Sec in a highball glass. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.

name: Extreme Punch
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, add cherry vodka, then fill with 1/3 of each: red bull, cranberry juice and orange juice.

name: Extreme Valentine
instructions: Mix ingredients with ice in a glass. Serve with an orange slice.

name: Exxtaacy
instructions: Mix in a shaker with ice. Then strain into glasses.

name: Eye of the Storm
instructions: Pour lime juice, captain morgan's, and coca-cola into a large collins glass. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Eye of the Tiger
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle dark rum on top, and garnish with an orange slice. Serve with straws.

name: Fading Vader
instructions: Put a few ice cubes in a tall beer glass. Add one shot of each liquor, then 5 shots of Red Bull. Must be served freezing cold! Served best with dry ice.

name: Fag Juice
instructions: Put the coconut milk in the glass first and then pour the liquors over it. Add 7-up and ice (equal parts) to top off, and serve.

name: Fahrenheit 151
description: This cocktail was concieved by adding the idea of a classic rum and coke with the growing popularity of energy drinks/alcohol. The product was the Fahrenheit 151, whose title was derived from the famous novel, Fahrenheit 451. There really isn't a relation between the two, but the name is catchy. Enjoy!First, add the Bacardi 151 into the Collins glass. Then, pour the half can of Red Bull, and proceed to add about 4 or 5 pieces of ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Coca-Cola and serve.
instructions: First, add the Bacardi 151 into the Collins glass. Then, pour the half can of Red Bull, and proceed to add about 4 or 5 pieces of ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Coca-Cola and serve.

name: Fairy From Hell
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Fairytale
instructions: Pour the vodka and white chocolate syrup together in a glass. Shake well. Then add the mixture of crushed ice and strawberries and voila'.

name: Fake Mountain Dew
instructions: Add all ingredients into a big glass and stir.

name: Fall Crisp
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Fall of Rome
instructions: Pour vermouth and brandy into a glass, add lime and fill with orange juice. Stir, add a splash of brandy on top, and serve with a straw.

name: Fallen Angel
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Famous Dwayne
description: Inspired by Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson's transformation from action star to versatile, fully credited actor. Created in 2006 at "The Rock Movie Marathon" in Tivoli, NY. Now served daily in many Queens and Brooklyn bars.Add vodka and triple sec to a highball glass. Add Rockstar energy drink, then add cranberry juice and serve. Stirring/shaking optional.
instructions: Add vodka and triple sec to a highball glass. Add Rockstar energy drink, then add cranberry juice and serve. Stirring/shaking optional.

name: Fancy Panties
instructions: Stir the pink lemonade and vodka in a glass filled with ice. Add Brut champagne or sparkling wine until full, and serve.

name: Fantaisie
instructions: Pour into a frosted wine glass, and serve.

name: Fart in the Ocean
instructions: Add almond-flavored tequila and chilled 7-up to a glass. Drop one sweet prune in each glass. Add ice if you wish.

name: Fashion Victim
instructions: Shake all but the Sprite in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over a glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Sprite to taste, and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Fast Buck
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemon-quarter shell, and serve.

name: Fat Bastard
instructions: Combine in glass over ice (first vodka, then godiva, then milk). Stir thoroughly, and serve.

name: Fat Boy
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Fat Cat Cooler
instructions: Pour everything into chilled highball glasses with ice. Serve with a straw.

name: Fat Charley
instructions: Pour the Bacardi rum, Malibu rum and 99 Bananas into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, adding a splash of cranberry juice to top. Stir and serve.

name: Fat Frog
description: The drink Fat Frog is a fruity combination of 3 of Europe's most popular selling 5% "alcopops" or malt-beverages. It's therefore most popular in Europe, namely Britain and British holiday destinations where the ingredients are more widely available.Get 2 pint glasses, pour one half of Smirnoff Ice into one pint glass and the rest in the other glass, then do the same with the orange breezer, then followed by the Blue WKD. Mix, and the drink should turn green. Add ice as desired, and serve.
instructions: Get 2 pint glasses, pour one half of Smirnoff Ice into one pint glass and the rest in the other glass, then do the same with the orange breezer, then followed by the Blue WKD. Mix, and the drink should turn green. Add ice as desired, and serve.

name: Fat Hooker
instructions: Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Fat Sailor
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Fat Titties
instructions: Stir ingredients over a few ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Faux Scrumpy
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Favorite Slammer
instructions: Measure the Amaretto, Southern Comfort and Vodka into a highball glass add a few cubes of ice, then fill glass with (real) orange juice.

name: Fearless Redneck
instructions: Pour in above order into a large glass or cup.

ingredients.name: 3 ozchilled Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey

name: Fedberg's Woodstock
description: Fedberg's Woodstock is a very popular drink in the northern parts of Denmark, made by a man named Nikolaj Hyldig.Pour all ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, stir and serve. Substitute the Faxe Kondi for Sprite if necessary.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, stir and serve. Substitute the Faxe Kondi for Sprite if necessary.

name: Feed Bag
instructions: Shake everything with except grenadine with ice; strain into a highball glass. Slowly pour the grenadine into the center of the drink, and garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Feel Like Holiday
instructions: Stir vodka and grenadine with ice. Pour into a champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.

name: Feel This
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Next add absolut, sloe gin, pineapple juice, southern comfort, and last midori. Add pineapple and cherry garnish.

name: Feeler Cocktail
instructions: Blend everything together in a blender and serve in champagne glasses.

name: Felicia
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Felix Longwater
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fenarie
instructions: Add Amaretto and top with Rose's Green Apple Mix. Add one scoop of sherbet, preferably lime sherbet.

name: Feni Highball
instructions: Pour the Kazkar Feni apple liqueur into a highball glass with several ice cubes. Add the fresh lime juice and fill with 7-Up. Stir, garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge, and serve.

name: Feni Mojito
instructions: Crush the apple slices with the sugar in the bottom of a highball glass. Stir thoroughly and top with ice. Add the Kazkar Feni cashew apple liqueur, top off with apple juice and stir. Garnish with an apple wheel and lime wedge, and serve.

name: Ferandina
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass, add a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Fickle Pickle
instructions: Pour the vodka, Midori melon liqueur, Crown Royal whisky and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add sweet and sour mix to taste. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, garnish with a cherry flag, and serve.

name: Fidel Castro
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add the rum and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Field of Green
instructions: Pour sloe gin and amaretto into a glass. Fill half-way with 7-up (optional), and fill completely with orange juice.

name: Fifth Avenue
instructions: Pour ingredients into a parfait glass (in order given) so that each ingredient floats on preceding one. Serve without mixing.

name: Fight Night
instructions: Pour Cognac in first, then squeeze the two lime slices in the glass, pour the Squirt in, then splash the grenadine on top.

name: Fiji Fizz
instructions: Shake everything (except cola) with ice; strain into a collins glass with ice. Fill with cola.

name: Final Exam Relief
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay coconut rum, amaretto almond liqueur and triple sec into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and fill up the rest of the glass with equal portions of pineapple juice and Sprite. Top with a little grenadine and some cherries if desired, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Finals Night
instructions: Fill a coffee mug half-full of crushed ice and add the ingredients to it.

name: Finlandia Bloody Mary
instructions: Shake everything (except celery) with ice; strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a leafy stick of celery.

name: Finnish Passion
instructions: Shake all ingredients, pour into a longdrink glass. Garnish with a boat of orange and red cherry.

name: Fire Engine
instructions: Pour it in a highball glass, w/ice if preferred. Should be served cold.

name: Fire Engine with Alarm
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Fire Fly
instructions: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass with ice. Add grenadine, stir, and serve.

name: Fire On Ice
instructions: Pour vodka in a highball glass. Fill balance of glass with cider, stir, and serve. Add ice cubes if you like.

name: Fire Starter
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Firecrotch
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Rim with lime and serve.

name: Fireman
instructions: Everything must be ice cold. Pour vodka into glass, add cranberry juice and peach juice, in that order. No ice, no shaking or stirring. If you did it right, you'll understand the name.

name: Fireman's Ice Tea
instructions: Mix 4 white alcohols as if you were making a long island (over ice). Near the top of the glass, add the grenadine and then the sprite. Garnish with cherry if wanted. Add more granadine to taste.

name: Fireman's Sour
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lime juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda. Stir well. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Firestarter
instructions: Mix the redrum, vodka and schnapps in the glass, then add the coke. Should the glass have room, add a few ice cubes, then serve.

name: Fireworks
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a twist of orange, and serve.

name: First 99 Problems
instructions: Fill glass halfway with ice, pour Grand Marnier, both rums and pineapple juice. Add sweetened lime juice, a few drops of grenadine, stir, and top it off with a lemon slice.

name: Fishbone
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add liquor, orange juice, and sour mix. Shake well. Add 7-up and serve.

name: Five Dollar Shake
instructions: Pour all ingredients into pint glass. Drink.

name: Five Hundred Proof
instructions: Shake and strain into a pilsner filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Fizzgig
instructions: Stir everything in a champagne glass. (Make sure the champagne is chilled first). Garnish with a lemon twist if desired.

name: Fizzy Ciclon
instructions: Put a few ice cubes into a highball glass. Pour Ciclon over top. Fill with Sprite. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Fizzy Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour schnapps and orange juice over 2 ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir gently.

name: Fizzy Gimlet
instructions: Pour the Plymouth gin and Rose's lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Fizzy Green Hunnit
instructions: Pour blue curacao and vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add Red Bull, stir, and serve.

name: Fizzy Navel
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Fizzy Peach
instructions: Put some ice into a glass. Add vodka, fill with tonic water.

name: Fizzy Watermelon
instructions: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice cubes in the order of appearance, do not stir, soda water will float at the top of the glass giving a two toned appearance, Garnish with 2 cherries on a sword, resting on the top of the glass.

name: Fizzy Windex
instructions: Mix rum and curacao over ice in a cocktail shaker, fill with Sprite, shake carefully, and pour into glass.

name: Fjellbekk (Mountain Stream)
instructions: Mix everything in a glass with ice.

name: Fjellfinn
instructions: Mix the two ingredients. Garnish with a birch leaf.

name: Flame Blazer
instructions:
Pour the extra dry vermouth, 1-oz only of vodka, Campari bitters and 1-oz only of orange juice into a cocktail shaker with 5 ice cubes. Shake for 10 seconds. Add the remaining 3-oz of orange juice, 1-oz only of cranberry juice, lemon cordial and stir. Strain into a jug. Add the absinthe and ignite. Allow the flame to extinguish by itself. 

Take the ice leftover from the cocktail shaker, place in a plastic bag, and crush with a blunt object like a hammer handle. Place back into the cocktail shaker, add the Midori melon liqueur, the remaining 1-oz of vodka and the remaining 1-oz of cranberry juice. Shake for 15 seconds. 

Fill a highball glass half-way with the entire contents of the cocktail shaker. Add the mixture from the jug, and top with grenadine. Stir, garnish with a lemon slice and serve with a straw.

name: Flamin' Dead Nazi
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Then put alcohol in glass and mix.

name: Flaming 7-7
instructions: Pour the Seagram's 7 Crown whiskey into a double-shot glass. Seperately, pour the 7-Up into a highball glass. Ignite the Seagram's 7 on fire (use extreme caution), and drop into the highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Flaming Ale
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, pour in vodka, midori and triple-sec. Fill to top with ginger ale and spoon in (do not mix) grenadine.

name: Flaming Anus
instructions: Combine all ingredients in mug. Let stand until room temperature. Enjoy!

name: Flaming Armageddon
instructions: Pour a can of Sparks energy drink shared between 2 seperate beer mugs. Shake tequila, Jagermeister, and Rumple Minze on ice and strain into 2 seperate shot glasses. Add 151 to the top of each and ignite. Drop shots into the beer glasses with Sparks in and drink. Serves 2.

name: Flaming Citrus Action
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an ordinary glass.

name: Flaming Cornholio
instructions: Mix the orange juice and jack daniel's in a beer mug and drop a shot glass of firewater in it.

name: Flaming Dr.
instructions: Pour both into a pint glass, mix and drink.

name: Flaming Gay Morgan
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, cherry liqueur and tonic water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry. If desired, float the Bacardi 151 on top of the drink and ignite (use extreme caution). Extinguish before serving.

name: Flaming Goat
instructions: Mix vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec and curacao. Add sour mix. Add curacao until it's dark purple. Fill glass with ice cubes and float bacardi 151 rum on top. Have the flame blown out before drinking, and add a straw.

name: Flaming Jesse
instructions: Put all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a collins glass, garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Flaming Layrnx
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Flaming Mr. Fish
instructions: Add the vodka and white sambuca to a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with raspberry lemonade, stir gently and serve.

name: Flaming Rockstar
