instructions: Combine all ingredients except orange slice and 151 in a shaker with ice. Shake lightly and strain over ice into glass. Add orange slice and enough 151 to light. Fire it up.

name: Flamingo Fuzz
instructions: Add rums to glass. Add a puff of whipped cream on top; drizzle cherry juice over whipped cream and top with a cherry.

name: Flamingo Punch
instructions: Build into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon wheel.

name: Flamingo Rita
instructions: Combine all ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Blend until frothy. Pour into a tall glass with a flamingo stirring stick or straw, and serve.

name: Flamingo Squeezer
instructions:
Squeeze the juice of the orange into an empty cocktail shaker, then add rum, cream of coconut and grenadine and shake. Fill pint glass with ice and pour the shaker contents over the ice. Place a tiny plastic pink flamingo on the rim and serve with a straw.

For flair, combine all the ingredients except the Grenadine and pour over the ice. Put the drops of grenadine on top, then right before serving, stir it front of your guest.

name: Flash Gordon
instructions: Mix everything into a glass, add ice and lime on top.

name: Flashback
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Flip a Pack
instructions: Combine all ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Keep adding ice and blending in stages until slurpee-consistancy. Pour into a hurricane glass. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Flip Passion
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Flirting with the Sandpiper
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Floradora
instructions: Build the gin, lime juice and raspberry liqueur in a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale, garnish with a wedge of lime and an edible flower, and serve.

name: Floradora Cooler
instructions: Add the lime juice, grenadine and sugar to a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add gin, and top with club soda. Stir well, and serve.

name: Florida Freeze
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 3/4 cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy. Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Florida Iced Tea
instructions:
Pour ingredients into a Collins glass 
filled with ice.Garnish with an Orange
slice.

name: Florida Orgasm
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Florida Pina Colada
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Florida Punch
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Florida Rum Runner
instructions: Mix in blender until ice is crushed into slushy form. Serve while frozen.

name: Florida Sling
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Floyd Collins
instructions: Pour the vodka, coconut rum and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add soda. Garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Fluxuation Cocktail
instructions: Pour mountain dew and banana liqueur into a glass, and stir. Slowly add the blue curacao so it takes on a type of swirling effect due to the bubbles; as fun to look at as it is tasty to drink.

name: Fly Swatter
instructions: Pour into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Add a sprig of mint, straws, and serve.

name: Flyin' Hawaiian
instructions: Pour midori, rum, and pineapple juice into shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice. Pour in sprite and stir lightly.

name: Flying Cow
instructions: Add liquors and banana to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Add cream to taste. Blend until smooth. Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Flying Gorilla
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Flying Grapefruit
instructions: Pour the rum, vodka, cranberry juice and lemon juice into a sugar-frosted highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add the cranberry juice, then the vermouth, and serve.

name: Flying Kangaroo
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass with crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks, and serve.

name: Flying Meister
instructions: Pour Red Bull into glass then drop in shot of Jager. Shoot the whole thing.

name: Flying Moose
instructions: Pour liquors into a highball glass, balance with sprite and top with grenadine.

name: Flying Penguin
description: Invented by Paul Bayly-Jones, named for the fact that it is something you never expect to find...A cocktail with a kick like Bruce Lee on horse steroids but a nice smooth taste.Pour 1.5 ounces each of Vodka, White Rum and Gin into a highball glass over two ice cubes.  Add a good spash (approx .25 ounces) of angora bitters and swirl with a metal stirring rod.  Add 5 ounces of Pink Grapefruit Juice. Add 1.5 ounces of sugar syrup. Slice a fresh lime into a slice approximately 1/2 of an inch wide.  Cut in half, squeezing one half directly into the drink (then drop the squeezed lime half in).  Make a small nick 2/3rds of the way up the second halfof lime and use to rim the glass then as a garnish.  Include a metal stirring rod.
instructions: Pour 1.5 ounces each of Vodka, White Rum and Gin into a highball glass over two ice cubes.  Add a good spash (approx .25 ounces) of angora bitters and swirl with a metal stirring rod.  Add 5 ounces of Pink Grapefruit Juice. Add 1.5 ounces of sugar syrup. Slice a fresh lime into a slice approximately 1/2 of an inch wide.  Cut in half, squeezing one half directly into the drink (then drop the squeezed lime half in).  Make a small nick 2/3rds of the way up the second halfof lime and use to rim the glass then as a garnish.  Include a metal stirring rod.

name: Flying Purple Squirrel
instructions: Combine the rums, curacao, grenadine and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an almond-embedded slice of lime, and serve.

name: Flying Squadron
instructions: First, add some ice. Then, pour in your jack daniels. Finally add pepsi and slosh around to mix. Enjoy your victory drink.

name: Flying Squirrel
instructions: Pour tequila and triple sec into a highball glass one-third filled with crushed ice. Add sour mix and lime juice. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Flying Swan
instructions: Take glass of choice, mix one part Parrot bay and one part Sour Apple Pucker over ice. Top with OJ and enjoy. Add oranges and cherries for decoration.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Flying Teetsie Fly
instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with ice. Pour gin and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix. Pour to top with tonic water. Mix lightly.

name: Flying Tiger
instructions: Fill glass with ice: add galliano, creme de menthe and vodka. Top glass off with orange juice.

name: Flying Zambo
instructions: Shake everything together and pour into glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: Foaming Pepsi
instructions: Fill a cup 3/4 of the way with Pepsi or Diet Pepsi. Add in the whiskey until it's about an inch from the top. Stir for 5 seconds. Add in 3-4 spoonfuls of milk. Stir until it starts getting foamy at the top. The foam should rise a bit.

name: Foamy Irishman
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 5 - 10 ice cubes in a blender. Blend until the ice is melted or close to it. The ice will melt soon anyway but leave the drink nice and cold. By the time the ice melts during blending it should have some nice head on it. (Hence the foamy.) Serve in glass of choice and enjoy.

name: Fog Cutter
instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a teaspoon of sweet sherry and serve.

name: Fog Horn
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Foggy Morning
instructions: Serve on ice - peach juice to taste.

name: Foghorn
instructions: Pour the gin into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale. Add half a lime, first squeezed over then dropped in. Stir well, and serve.

name: Fong Juice
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add malibu, then add pineapple juice. Stir.

name: Fontainebleau Sidecar
instructions: Mix or shake all ingredients, except grand marnier, with cracked ice in a shaker. Pour or strain into large chilled wine glass or snifter. Float grand marnier on top.

name: Foot in the Ass
instructions: Fill beer mug with 6 oz. of Vodka. Splash Apple Juice and Orange Juice in with it. Drink fast, cause it tastes bad. Get ready, it feels like a foot in the ass!

name: Force 12
description: A Royal Canadian Navy drink recipe using the flavorful Lamb's Navy rum made in Montreal.Pour the Lamb's Navy dark rum, Smirnoff vodka, pineapple juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices and a maraschino cherry.
instructions: Pour the Lamb's Navy dark rum, Smirnoff vodka, pineapple juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices and a maraschino cherry.

name: Forest Dream
description: Created by Benjamin Lei at the Eastcoast Bar & Grill in Singapore, Beacon.Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with lime wheel and serve.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with lime wheel and serve.

name: Forest Funk
instructions: Moisten the rim of the collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.

name: Formula 1
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, a sprig of mint, and serve.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Creme de Fraise des Bois

name: Formula 3
instructions: Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.

name: Formula 420
instructions: Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in order listed. Stir lightly.

name: Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
instructions: Pour all liqueurs into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake until frosted. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Stir, and serve.

ingredients.name: Johnnie Walker® Black Label Scotch whisky
Jack Daniel's® Old No.7 Tennessee whiskey

name: Four Twenty
instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass.

name: Four Wheeler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with one scoop (half a cup) of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Fox Poison
instructions: Begin with vodka, then blue curacao. After that, add the lime liqueur. Mix in the grenadine. Stir gently. Fill up with sprite and put in some ice cubes.

name: Fraises Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, strawberry liqueur, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Add soda water, and garnish with a strawberry and a twist of lemon peel.

name: Frangelico and Chocolate
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a mug of hot chocolate, stir briefly and serve.

name: Frangelico Float
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

name: Fraustadt
instructions: Fill the boston shaker with all the ingredients and a lot of ice cubes, then shake untill your hand goes cold. Pour up in a highball glass and put a lemon slice on the edge.

name: FrazzleBerry
instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger beer, add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Freddy Fudpucker
instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the galliano on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Free Silver
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Fremango
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: French 125
instructions: Pour brandy and sweet and sour mix into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled champagne and stir lightly. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: French 68
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, slowly fill with champagne, and serve.

name: French 75
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: French 75 (Cognac)
instructions: Combine cognac, sugar and lemon juice in shaker. Add ice and shake till chilled. Pour into champagne flute. Pour champagne over cognac concoction. Garnish with lemon curl.

name: French 76
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: French Colada
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks, and serve.

name: French Fantasy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: French Foam
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Add a dusting of lemon or orange sherbet on top, and serve.

name: French Fry
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, triple sec, lime juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: French Hooker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: French Lift
instructions: Add glass half filled with chilled sparkling wine. Add grenadine and fill with bottled water. Drop in blueberries.

name: French Mud Slide
instructions: Add all ingredients to a Collin's glass with ice.

name: French Pirate
instructions: Pour orange curacao into a champagne flute, add dark rum, and fill with champagne (preferably brut).

name: French Revolution
instructions: Pour the brandy and framboise into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a champagne flute. Add the champagne, and serve.

name: French Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the Grey Goose L'Orange vodka into a highball glass over several ice cubes. Fill with Orangina orange soda, stir briefly and serve.

name: French Style Pernod
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: French Summer
instructions: Pour chambord into a wine glass filled with ice. Add sparkling water, squeeze in a slice of lemon and orange, and stir.

name: French Sunrise
instructions: This is a layered drink mixed in two seperate steps. Begin by mixing 2 parts tequila, chambord, and cranberry w/ ice in shaker. Pour over ice in highball glass until just over half full. Next, mix remaining 2 parts tequila, triple sec, and orange juice w/ ice in shaker. Slowly layer (using back of spoon) into top of highball glass. Garnish with orange and / or lime wheel(s).

name: Fresh Air
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and lemon slices, and serve.

name: Fresh Berry and Wine Coulis
instructions: Blend everything together until smooth. Put into freezer until nearly frozen and serve.

name: Freson
instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Frey Jacobs Special
instructions: Simply pour everything into a highball glass to the half filled with ice cubes and stir to a lovely ice blue colour. As a variation, you can wait with the blue curacao and carefully add it to create blue cracks in the milk at the end.

name: Friday
instructions: Prepare mango fruit with rum and syrup in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a large highball glass, and fill with crushed ice. Squeeze in a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Friday Freeze
instructions: Blend all ingredents in blender at highest speed. Consistancy of the mix should be "semi - thick:" not so thick that a spoon would stand by itself in the mix, but not as thin as juice. If the mix is too thin, add sherbet, if too thick , add equal amount of juice and alcohol. Pour into glass and place in freezer for 15 minutes.

name: Fridays Frozen Mudslide
instructions: Begin by crushing the 8 ice cubes in a blender. When ice is finely crushed, add the remaining ingredients and blend for 45 seconds on blender's highest setting. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

name: Friesian
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a collins glass, and garnish with a cherry.

name: Frigid Hairy Virgin
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec and pineapple juice into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Frinky
instructions: Mix tequila, strawberry schnapps, and Kool-aid in a glass. Pour 7-up into mixture then put Pop Rocks on top to add fizzle.

name: Frisky
instructions: Mix the Fresca and the whisky and drink fast.

name: Frisky Steve
instructions: Start with ice. Add vodka to prefered level. Next add wanted amount of champagne and finish off the glass with ginger ale. Mix and drink.

name: Frisky Witch
instructions: Pour into glass, stir and enjoy.

name: Frobisher
instructions: Add gin and bitters to highball glass with ice. Stir and fill with champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Frog Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Frog in a Blender
instructions: Blend orange juice, blue maui and vodka, and pour in glass. Splash grenadine on top, but do not stir in.

name: Frogster
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add the blue curacao, add the tequila and finally for that yummy green color, fill the glass with the orange juice.

name: From Russia With Love
instructions: Pour over ice.

name: Frosted Apple
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a frosted collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Frostmark 5 on Ice
instructions: Stir together the absinthe and vodka in a mixing glass and strain into a highball glass half filled with ice. Fill the rest of the way up with Fresca soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Frosty Amour
instructions: Rim a collins glass with lemon and caster sugar, and fill with ice. Shake ingredients, strain into the glass, and add 7-up. Garnish with a slice of orange and a green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Frosty Dawn
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Frosty Kurant
instructions: Blend lemonade and liquor with ice until slushy. Add a dash of cranberry juice and lime cordial. Serve and enjoy.

name: Frosty Noggin
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a few drops of green creme de menthe and a rolled cookie, and serve.

name: Frosty Pineapple Crush
instructions: Pour the Absolut Citron vodka, pineapple vodka and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass 1/4 filled with crushed ice. Pour the RedRum rum on top. Put a slice of pineapple and a cherry on an umbrella and place on the side of glass as garnish.

name: Frosty Sailor
instructions:
Fill glass with ice. Squeeze lime wedge over ice. Add Captain Morgan.
Fill with root beer. Serve up and start sailin'.

name: Frozen Andes Mint
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and slightly thick. Pour into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Add straws, and serve.

name: Frozen Barcelona
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender with three-quarters of a cup of crushed ice. Pour into a london dock or sherry glass, garnish with a light dusting of cinnamon, and serve.

name: Frozen Bay Breeze
instructions: Blend everything together and serve garnished with a pineapple wedge if desired.

name: Frozen Berkeley
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Frozen Blue Hawaii
instructions: Blend until smooth.

name: Frozen Cappuccino
instructions: Combine the liqueurs, ice cream and cream in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass rimmed with cinnamon sugar. Garnish with a cinnamon stick. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Frozen Citron Neon
instructions: Pour the vodka, melon liqueur, blue curacao and lime juice into a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Domingo
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until puree-consistency. Pour into a parfait glass, garnish with a pineapple slice, and serve.

name: Frozen Dreamsicle
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Frozen Girl Scout
instructions: Blend. Add more or less milk to get a shake consistancy.

name: Frozen Grasshopper
instructions: Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake. Serve with a spoon and straw.

name: Frozen Kahlua Mudslide
instructions: Blend everything and pour. Top with cherry.

name: Frozen Midori Sour
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender with enough ice to freeze. Serve in a tall glass with a lime twist garnish.

name: Frozen Mint Julep
instructions: Blend everything except mint and pour. Garnish with mint sprigs.

name: Frozen Mudslide
instructions: Blend alcohol with ice-cream. Serve in a frosted glass.

name: Frozen Nipples
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth.

name: Frozen O
instructions: Combine Kool-Aid orange mix, sugar, and Bacardi O orange rum in a blender with ice. Blend until smooth and frosty, pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Frozen Orange Dream
instructions: In blender place about 8 ice cubes, 2 oz. Grand Marnier,and about 1/4 cup vanilla ice cream. Blend until smooth. Add a drop or two of orange food coloring for stronger color. Pour into a Hurricane glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Frozen Passion Margarita
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend. Strain into a margarita glass rimmed with coarse salt, garnish with a wheel of lime, and serve.

name: Frozen Peach Daiquiri
instructions:
Mix with shaved ice in blender; serve in wine glass. 

Variations: Substitute several large, ripe strawberries for the peach.

name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Frozen Pink Lemonade
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.

name: Frozen Purple Peedinker
instructions: In blender add 2 scoops of ice, add all ingredents & blend. Add ice as needed. Pour into glass & serve.

name: Frozen Rainforest
instructions: Mix the vodka, tropical blue Sourz, pineapple juice and lime juice in a shaker and shake. Crush some ice and pour it in to a highball glass, then add the mix from the shaker. Garnish with some pineapple and then dash some Monin Blue Curacao Syrup so it runs down through the crushed ice. Serve.

name: Frozen Steppes
instructions: Pour ingredients over finely shaven ice in a parfait glass, and stir well. Garnish with a slices of fruit, and serve.

name: Frozen Steve-O
instructions: Place ingredients into electric blender, blend until smooth.

name: Frozen Tequila Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass filled with finely shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Frozen Yeti
instructions: Mix ingredients in a blender.

name: Fruit a La La
instructions: Put all together in blender, and blend until smooth.

name: Fruit Booty
instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass with ice except the grenadine. Add the grenadine last by pouring slowly over a spoon. Garnish with lemon if so desired.

name: Fruit Booty #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

name: Fruit Breeze
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a shaker with ice. Strain into a glass with ice.

name: Fruit Daiquiri
instructions: Pour the rum, creme de cacao and one cup of crushed ice into a blender. Add the fruit liqueur and peeled fruit, to your choosing (use the same flavor for both) and blend well. Pour into an exotic glass; hurricane or equivalent, and serve.

name: Fruit Fusion
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, peach schnapps, Smirnoff vodka, Bacardi rum, Gordon's dry gin and Malibu rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice and pineapple juice. Shake well. Strain into a collinsl glass 1/4 filled with crushed ice. Add a dash of cranberry juice, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Fruit Loop
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.

name: Fruit Margarita
instructions: Add the tequila, triple sec, sour mix and fruit (choose one fruit) to a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Fruit Pastille
instructions: Place ice cubes into the glass. Pour over measure of gin, followed by the dry vermouth. Fill to desired level with orange juice. Gently pour in dashes of blue curacao so that about 2/3 of the orange turns green. Pour the dashes of grenadine to turn bottom of the drink red. Serve with a straw.

name: Fruit Salad #2
instructions: Pour a shot of Mango Rum, pour it in a glass. Then pour a shot of coconut rum, pour it in to your glass. Fill the rest of the cup up with about 4 oz. of Melon Gaterade and stir. Add fruit if you like, I personally like adding lime.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: Fruit Sensation
instructions: Fill glass with ice and add all the ingredients - mix well. Add straw and garnish if required.

name: Fruit Tingle #2
instructions: Pour the blue curacao and vodka over the ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and at the same time add the dash of cordial. Be sure not to go overboard with the cordial otherwise it overpowers the fruit tingle effect.

name: Fruitbooty 69
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir extremely well, and serve.

name: Fruitopia
instructions: Shake everything with ice and pour into glass.

name: Fruitopia
instructions: Pour ingredients, shake with ice and serve with a straw. Garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Fruitopia Snap
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper sour apple and watermelon pucker into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peach schnapps and Malibu rum, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Fruity as Fuck
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Raz and Stolichnaya raspberry vodka (Stoli Razberi) followed by the orange juice and Red Bull into a highball glass. Splash with cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of orange, with a cherry on a pick, and serve.

name: Fruity Ball of Fuck
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Fruity Blast
instructions: Mix all ingredient together in a blender with ice. Add more ice for more consistency.

name: Fruity Carebare
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Fruity Exploration
instructions: Drop 3 regular sized ice cubes in a collins glass. Pour cranberry-raspberry juice in, then orange juice, then pour in the 99 Apples or 99 Oranges leaving which ever flavor you like the most last. Stir gently and wait until the drink is sufficiently chilled before serving. You may want to change ratios depending on your tastes and sensitivity to alochol.

name: Fruity Fuck
instructions: Pour the banana liqueur, dark rum, Midori melon liqueur, peach schnapps, creme de cassis and grenadine into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice, garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Fruity Sprite Kicker
instructions: Add some ice into a beer mug. Add 4 oz. of Everclear, 6 oz. of strawberry margarita mix, and 8 oz. of sprite to the mug. Stir and enjoy.

name: Fruity Vodka Beverage
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a large glass.

name: Frye's Spiked Orange
instructions: Add orange or citrus vodka to tall glass. Pour in lemonade, OJ, and orange soda. Stir and drink.

name: Fu** Me Like A Beast
instructions: Combine all ingredients except 151, shake well with ice, pour into highball glass and top it off with bacardi 151.

name: Fubar Kool-Aid
instructions: Mix in shaker over cracked ice, pour into highball glass with ice and enjoy.

name: Fuck Me Like An Animal
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Fuck Me Over Again
instructions: Pour triple sec, light rum and tequila into a highball glass over ice. Stir together, then add orange juice and ginger ale. Serve.

name: Fuck Me Sideways
instructions: Pour the lemon vodka, peach schnapps and triple sec into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the juices, and stir vigorously. Top with extra grapefruit juice if desired, and serve.

name: Fuck Me Up, Scottie
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with cherries.

name: Fuck You #2
instructions: Fill a collins glass or pint glass half-way with Coca-cola. Add the Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey and Jagermeister. Add the rest of the Coke, and serve.

name: Fuck Your Buddy
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Put in order of jack, crown, amaretto, rum. Fill with the pineapple, and splash of grenadine. Stir.

name: Fucked on the Floor
instructions: First, begin with 2 shots of vodka and triple sec in your glass. Then add 1 shot of peach brandy and Malibu coconut rum. Add 1 splash of lemon and cranberry juices. Next, add the 2 splashes of orange juice and top with 2 of pineapple juice. Mix well and serve on ice and you have a drink that everyone can enjoy.

name: Fucked Up Float
instructions: Mix together kahlua, schnapps, vodka, ice-cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.

name: Fucked Up Shark
instructions: Pour the Jeremiah Weed whiskey into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao, triple sec and Southern Comfort peach liqueur and add a can of tonic water. Shake vigorously, despite the building pressure. Shake until much of the carbonation from the tonic water subsides and creates a petillent, clear teal beverage. Pour over a minimal amount of ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Fucking Arnold
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and place above ingredients. Shake and fill a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon and enjoy the original Arnold Palmer with a twist of the south!

name: Fudgesicle
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Fuji Devil Dog
description: The Fuji Devil Dog was invented by Jun Olermo at US Marine Corps Camp Fuji, Japan. It's a popular and well-known drink among many Marines around the world.Combine all ingredients (except grenadine) and pour over ice in a collins glass. Add a splash of grenadine for color. Decorate with a cherry and serve.
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except grenadine) and pour over ice in a collins glass. Add a splash of grenadine for color. Decorate with a cherry and serve.

name: Full House
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps, Kahlua coffee liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a 10-12 oz highball glass. Fill with 7-up. Stir, and serve.

name: Full Moon Fever
instructions: Add the three rums and the midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It's a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Full Nelson
instructions: Shake everything (except soda) with ice; strain into a highball glass with ice. Fill with soda.

name: Full Nelson #2
instructions: Build over ice in a tall glass.

name: Full Throttle
instructions: Combine with ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Fun Loving
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Fun Squeeze
instructions: Add everything into a highball glass with ice.

name: Funky Filly
instructions: Mix ingredients and strain over ice.

name: Funky Garlic
instructions: Chill all ingredients prior to serving. Pour into a highball glass, and stir well.

name: Funky Monkey
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with coconut flakes.

name: Furry Purple Squirrel
instructions: Pour the rums, blue curacao, grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime with an almond embedded in it. Pour the dash of coconut rum to finish, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Banana
instructions: Mix all parts together in a glass, or pitcher, depending on the amount of people you wish to serve.

name: Fuzzy Bastard
instructions:
Pour ingredients in order listed above into
a Hurricane glass filled with ice.Garnish
with an Orange Slice.

name: Fuzzy Bull Balls
instructions: Pour the Three Olives orange vodka and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Red Bull. add pineapple juice on top and serve.

name: Fuzzy Bunny
instructions: Mix in a colins glass until powder is dissolved. Serve.

name: Fuzzy Charlie
instructions: Pour the dark rum, creme de bananes, coconut cream and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and top with ginger ale. Garnish with a pineapple spear, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Chartreuse
instructions: Fill glass half full with crushed ice. Add midori, then fill glass the rest of the way full with ginger ale. This should result in a chartreuse colored drink. Add more midori to your taste.

name: Fuzzy Cola
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cola, stir well, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Comfort
instructions: Carefully pour the rum or vodka, then other ingredients. Stir.

name: Fuzzy Delight
instructions: Pour Arrow peach schnapps into an ice-filled highball glass. Add Bacardi white rum, fill with Sunny Delight california style, and serve.

ingredients.name: Sunny Delight® California Style orange juice

name: Fuzzy Ethan
instructions: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.

name: Fuzzy Evil
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake well, strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Fuzzy F**ker
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass. Serve over ice.

name: Fuzzy Fruit
instructions: Add everything to a highball glass with ice.

name: Fuzzy Fruity Brain Blitzer
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, raspberry liqueur, triple sec and everclear into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-up, and stir well.

name: Fuzzy Fucker
instructions: Shake everything with ice; pour into highball glass.

name: Fuzzy Goose
instructions: Pour all four liquors into a collins glass, then fill with ice. Next mix equal parts orange juice and sweet and sour until full. Tastes like candy.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Fuzzy Greyhound
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Fuzzy Hippo
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass with ice. Transfer to a shaker, shake well and pour back into the glass.

name: Fuzzy Leprechaun
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Leprechaun #2
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Logic
instructions: Pour all of it into a shaker with ice, shake and pour.

name: Fuzzy Melon
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Melon Ball
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur and peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, stir and serve.

name: Fuzzy Melonberry
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Fuzzy Mexican
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Mix equal parts of each ingredient in a highball glass, top with ice, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Navel #3
instructions: Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice (to taste) and stir to combine.

name: Fuzzy Nipple
instructions: Pour all liquids over ice and shake. Pour into highball glass and garnish with either an orange wheel or a cherry. Can also be made frozen.

name: Fuzzy Nuts
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Peach
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Pierced Navel
instructions: Pour over ice, stir.

name: Fuzzy Pirate
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Fuzzy Pucker
instructions: Pour the peach and raspberry schnapps over ice in a hurricane glass. Add orange juice, and layer half-and-half on top. Serve.

name: Fuzzy Pusser
instructions: Mix together in a pitcher. Pour into hurricane glass.

name: Fuzzy Pussy
instructions: Combine the vodka, peach schnapps and grapefruit juice together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Serve with a cherry on top.

name: Fuzzy Screw
instructions: Fill glass half with ice, add vodka, peach schnapps, and then orange juice. Stir.

name: Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
instructions: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a highball glass, and stir. Fill with orange juice. Top with galliano, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Shark
instructions: Blend everything (except curacao) together until smooth. Pour into glass and splash on the curacao.

name: Fuzzy Sunrise
instructions: Pour the tequila, peach schnapps and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink.

name: Fuzzy Tounge
description:
This drink is best if you can chill all the ingredients first. At a push, the Malibu can be switched for an extra shot of Archers. It can also be served in a Margarita glass if you feel fancy.

Its popular in the Aber Valleys of South Wales, and is often enjoyed drank outdoors in the summertime.Add the vodka, schnapps and rum to a cocktail shaker.  Add some crushed ice and shake well for about 10 seconds.  Open the shaker and add the mango and cranberry juice.  Shake until a frost forms.  Add some crushed ice to a hi-ball glass, put a straw in, and pour the drink in.
instructions: Add the vodka, schnapps and rum to a cocktail shaker.  Add some crushed ice and shake well for about 10 seconds.  Open the shaker and add the mango and cranberry juice.  Shake until a frost forms.  Add some crushed ice to a hi-ball glass, put a straw in, and pour the drink in.

name: Fuzzy Yellow Balls
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add liqueur, then fill with pineapple juice. Stir.

name: G-Spot
instructions: mix everything in a highball over ice, adding the lemonade lastl

name: G.I. Giraffe
instructions: Mix all the alcohol together using a whisk then add the banana chunks and chocolate chips to the alcohol. Then put the lemon on the side of the glass.

name: Gaawanger
instructions: Mix over ice in a highball glass and fill the rest of the glass with equal parts pineapple juice and ginger ale.

name: Gables Collins
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and garnish with a slice of lemon and a pineapple chunk.

name: Gail's Summer Storm
instructions: Mix ingredients in a tall glass over ice, stir and enjoy.

name: Gailwarning
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add sprite and top with lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Gainer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half full of ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a highball glass full of ice, and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Galapagos
instructions: Combine bitters, pineapple juice, pina colada mix, melon liqueur, lemon vodka and strega in a tall glass. Add whipped cream and serve with pineapple chunks, dessicated coconut and cherries on top.

name: Gale Warning
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Galliano Island Iced Tea
instructions: Serve with ice. Stir vigorously until it has the consistency and appearance of iced tea.

name: Galliano Milkshake
instructions: Blend until creamy, and serve in a hurricane glass. (optional; serve with a twist of lemon)

name: Gandy Dancer
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass.

name: Gang Related
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Works best if you add Hennessey first, then the Alize and Hpnotiq in any order after that. Stir and enjoy!

name: Gang Up
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass. Garnish with fruit, add straws, and serve.

name: Ganggreen
instructions: Take a highball glass or anything that will hold 12 oz. of soda and pour the soda in the glass. Next take one shot of the captain morgan's spiced rum and add it to the mountain dew. Finally, add one shot of the johnnie walker red label to the mix. Stir it and enjoy.

name: Gangsta's Charm
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass half-filled with ice, and serve.

ingredients.name: 2 1/2 oz Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey

name: Gary's Laugh
description: "My uncle, Gary, requested this in the days just before he passed away in June of 2007. I will always remember his unique laugh. This is my tribute to him. RIP, Uncle Gary. You will be missed."Mix all ingredients in a tall glass, laugh and enjoy.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass, laugh and enjoy.

name: Gary's Poison
instructions: Pour in rum, add triple sec, orange juice and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Gas and Coke
instructions: Pour over ice into a highball glass.

name: Gaston
instructions: Pour gin, lime juice and lemon juice into a highball glass and fill with 7-up.

name: Gator Booger
instructions: Mix in a tall glass with ice (or a frosted mug) and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Gator Wizz
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a tall glass, stir and serve.

ingredients.name: Mr & Mrs T® sweet and sour mix

name: Gatorape
instructions: Drink or drain about 1/3 of the gatorade. Pour in 1 shot of Absolut vodka (chilled), and 1 shot 7-up for fizz. Then fill up bottle with Red Bull.

name: GatorBeam
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Gay Bartender
instructions: Mix all ingredients into shaker. Shake and pour into glass with one handful of ice cubes. Serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Gay Pirate
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in glass with ice.

name: Gayhound
instructions: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

name: Gene Splice
instructions: Build in a highball glass and garnish with a lime slice.

name: General Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain over ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: General Lee
instructions: Combine the lime juice, club soda, and sugar into a collins glass. Stir, then add ice cubes, anisette, and gin. Stir again. Fill drink with ginger ale. Stir well and serve.

name: Generation X
instructions: Pour liquors in first, then add zima.

name: Genghis Thong
instructions: Combine in highball class with ice.

name: Gentle Ben
instructions: Mix together in a highball glass, add some ice and a straw. Serve.

name: Gentleman's Cocktail
instructions: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Genuine Singapore Sling
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker, fill with ice and shake until the shaker is well frosted. Strain into a tall glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and cherry.

name: George and Ginger
instructions: Pour george dickel over ice into a tall glass. Add ginger ale, and stir.

name: George of the Jungle
instructions: Fill glass half-way with cranberry juice. Add orange juice and lemonade. Top off with some UV Blue.

name: Georgia Mint Julep
instructions: Build in a collins glass and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Georgia Peach
instructions: Pour peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Top with orange and cranberry juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Georgia Peach #2
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, add southern comfort, peach schnapps and fill with orange juice. Mix. Top with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Georgia Peach Fizz
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass. Top with club soda. Stir and serve.

name: Georgia Peach Iced Tea
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice, add vodka, gin, and rum. Fill with sweet and sour mix. Pour peach schnapps on top.

name: Georgia Peach Tea
description: Created by Tony “T-Bone” Adams, Certified Professional Bartending Instructor for the Professional Bartending School of America, Dayton and Cincinnati campuses.Fill a tall or collins glass full of ice. Add alcohols and sour mix to fill. Shake vigorously, top with cranberry juice, garnish with a lime and serve.
instructions: Fill a tall or collins glass full of ice. Add alcohols and sour mix to fill. Shake vigorously, top with cranberry juice, garnish with a lime and serve.

name: Georgia Pie
instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Georgia Swamp Water
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a mason jar.

name: Georgia Tea
instructions: Fill glass with large ice cubes. Mix alcoholic ingredients in the glass. Fill the rest of the glass with dole pineapple-orange juice and stir.

name: Georgian Sunrise
instructions: Combine and blend all four ingredients and serve in a highball glass with a lime garnish.

name: German Bulldog
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: German Carbomb
instructions: Pour Heineken into a 16 oz. glass or mug, drop in shot of Jager, drink quickly.

name: German Chocolate Cake
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake and strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with four squirts of canned whipped cream (about 3/4 inches high) at 3, 6, 9 and 12 o'clock positions.

name: German Hooker (Die Deutsche Nutte)
instructions: In a shaker, half filled with crushed ice, combine tequila and apfelkorn. Shake well. Strain into a high-ball glass filled with a few ice cubes. Fill up with orange juice. Serve with salt and lemon as a usual tequila shot.

name: Get Laid
instructions: Mix raspberry liqueur, vodka, and pineapple juice in the mixer, shake, strain, pour into glass, then add splash of cranberry juice.

name: Geting
instructions: Start with the ice, add the vodka then the liquor then the ginger ale.

name: GG
instructions: Pour the galliano liqueur over ice cubes. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Ghetto Peach
instructions: Add Hennessy and Peach Schnapps, fill with orange juice and cranberry.

name: Ghetto Romance
instructions: Mix ingredients. Serve on the rocks or shake and strain.

name: Ghetto Screwupdriver
instructions: Combine ingredients in a beer mug.

name: Ghost
instructions: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice add 1 shot Jack Daniel's, 2 shots Vanilla Rum and top with Cream soda.

name: Ghostbuster
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Gibbs
instructions: Mix in a tall glass and stir well.

name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
instructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass w/ice and stir.

name: Gila Monster
instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker, top with orange juice.

name: Gilligan
instructions: Measure crushed ice into a cocktail shaker with a collins glass. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour the shaker back into the glass and garnish with a wedge of lemon.

name: Gin and Bitter Lemon
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water.

name: Gin and Juice
instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Fill a highball glass almost full of ice cubes, and dump ice into shaker. Shake well and pour drink into highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Gin and Pink
instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, tonic water, and bitters. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Gin and Tonic
instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Gin Balalajka
instructions: Mix the gin and juice and fill up with schweppes russian. The gin and juice may be shaken for better taste.

name: Gin Breeze
instructions: Stir liquors into collins glass over ice, fill with ginger ale, garnish with half an orange slice on glass rim.

name: Gin Cassis
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass.

name: Gin Cassis Fizz
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the centre of the drink.

name: Gin Cooler
instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

name: Gin Dog
instructions: Pour over ice in a pint glass and serve.

name: Gin Fix
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the gin. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake gin, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Gin Gin Highball
instructions: Build ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Stir, garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Gin Gin Mule
instructions: Muddle the lime juice, syrup and mint sprigs at the bottom of a mixing glass. Add gin and ginger beer and shake well. Pour over ice in a highball glass, top with soda and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Gin Highball
instructions: Pour gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve.

name: Gin Highball
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Gin Jock
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass, and stir with a swizzle stick.

name: Gin Lime Rickey
instructions: Mix the gin and tonic in a highball glass over ice and pour the lime juice. Drop two lemon wedges into the glass and serve.

name: Gin Limey
instructions: An interesting twist on the original. For those who like more lime taste, pour Seagram's Lime-Twisted gin over ice and fill with Tonic Water. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Gin Lollipop
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except water) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add water, garnish with an orange slice and a cherry, and serve.

name: Gin Lollipop
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass, and add water. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Gin Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Gin Rickey
instructions: Pour juice of lime and gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Gin Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and add gin. Pour into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Gin Squirt
instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

name: Gin Swizzle
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Gin Thing
instructions: Build gin and lime juice in a highball glass and fill with ginger ale.

name: Gin-Cassis Fizz
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

name: Gin-Dew-It
instructions: Pour 1 shot of your favorite gin into a highball glass half filled with ice. Add mountain dew till glass is almost filled, then give it a splash of sprite. Stir well, and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Gin-ger-ale
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Gina
instructions: Pour alcohol into a shot glass first. Splash a bit of pineapple juice in, then fill with cranberry juice, and garnish with a cherry on top. This is great if you mix it and pour it into a test tube to shoot.

name: Gina's Pussy
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Ginadine Fizz
instructions: Pour the gin, grenadine and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour (incl. ice) into a collins glass. Top with 7-Up, add a cherry and serve.

name: Ginein's Raspberry Surprise
instructions: Combine the vodka, rum, raspberry liqueur, triple sec, peach schnapps, and cranberry liqueur in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  Shake well for about 1 to 2 minutes. Pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Garnish with a strawberry and orange slice.

name: Ginger Bite
instructions: crush lemon and ginger togerther in a shaker. Add all the spirits. Shake and strain into a collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with lemon grass (halved) and a slice of fresh ginger.

name: Ginger Breeze
instructions: Shake rum, OJ and cherry brandy in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. and fill with ginger ale.

name: Ginger Float
instructions: Pour the amaretto almond liqueur and irish cream into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, to taste, stir briskly and serve.

name: Ginger Messiah
instructions: Shake the vodka, rum (dark or spiced) and orange juice with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a collins glass, Top up with ginger beer, stir and serve.

name: Ginger NoHenry
instructions: Stir ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Ginger Rum
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Ginger Scotch
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Ginger Spice
instructions: Pour spiced rum over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Ginger Swing
instructions: Pour curacao over ice in a highball glass, then fill the rest of the way up with ginger ale.

name: Ginger's Sweet Tooth
instructions: Place a handful of ice in a tall glass, add vodka, then fill with ginger ale. Top with 2-3 maraschino cherries.

name: Ginger-bang Champagne
instructions: Muddle fresh ginger in the bottom of a bar glass. Add chilled champagne and simple syrup, stir gently and immediately strain into champagne flute. Serve.

name: Gingerbread Man #2
instructions: Mix the ingredients with ice in a shaker and pour into a highball glass.

name: Gingeronno
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add a straw and serve.

name: Gingersnap
instructions: Shake kahlua, bailey's irish cream, frangelico, and jagermeister in an ice-filled shaker, and strain contents into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with cola.

name: Giraffe
instructions: Pour midori melon liqueur into a hurricane glass over ice. Add vodka and pineapple juice, then float the cranberry juice.

name: Girl From Mars
instructions: Place the Archers peach schnapps, vodka and strawberry puree in a glass and shake well. Add several cubes of ice and then add half-and-half until near the top. Slowly pour the grenadine syrup around the edge of the glass (it should produce some odd red colors around the glass, hence the name); serve.

name: Girl Scout Thin Mint Cookie
instructions: Fill a mug with hot chocolate, add a shot of creme de menthe, stir and enjoy.

name: Girls Night Out
description: A UK based drink originating in Ashby De La Zouch, Leicestershire, England. It has three Archers flavors, which you might not be able to find inside of the US.Pour each of the Archers flavors into a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, add a shot of grenadine, and serve.
instructions: Pour each of the Archers flavors into a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, add a shot of grenadine, and serve.

name: Gladiator
instructions: Mix the amaretto and southern comfort. Drop this mixture into a glass with the orange juice mixed with the 7-up.

name: Gladys Delight
instructions: Pour the vermouth, grenadine and ginger ale into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Glass Tower
instructions: Build in a collins glass and fill with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Glaucoma
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into glass.

name: Glicktail
instructions: Stir with ice and add more ginger ale (or club soda) to taste. Stir well.

name: Glitter and Trash
instructions: Pour gin into a highball glass filled with ice and fill with sprite. Top up with a splash of vodka.

name: Glo-meister
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Gloplug
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a glass with some ice.

name: Glow-Worm
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order. Do not mix. Float blue curacao on top.

name: Go With the Flow
instructions: Pour each ingredient over cracked ice into highball glass and stir gently. Serve.

name: Go-Go Girl
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add rum and mango nectar. Top off glass with pineapple juice. Stir. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Go-Go Juice
instructions: Combine all except 7-up in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice and fill with 7-up. Top with a lemon slice.

name: God's Alabama Slammer
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with lots of ice. Blend well, pour into a suitable glass and serve.

name: God's Great Creation
instructions: Pour whiskey and peach schnapps over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add frozen canned orange banana punch (no water). Add lemon juice and fill the rest with pepsi. Stir well and serve.

name: Godiva Chocolate Covered Banana
instructions: Blend in a bar blender until smooth. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with some of the remaining banana.

name: Godiva Chocolate Martini
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Godiva Cream
instructions: Pour the Godiva liqueur over ice in a wine glass. Add Bailey's and the vanilla extract. Top with the cream, mix, and serve.

name: Godiva Mudslide
instructions: Drink can be served over rocks or frozen. Swirl some chocolate syrup on the side of the glass for presentation.

name: Gold Fizz
instructions: Build over ice in a pint glass.

name: Gold Record
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Golden Almonds
instructions: Stir ingredients together with some ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Golden Beam
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

ingredients.name: Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey

name: Golden Cadillac
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Golden Cola
instructions: Fill a highball glass halfway with crushed ice. Add alcohol contents over ice. Pour coke over mixture. Mix well.

name: Golden Colada
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Golden Delicious
instructions: Pour sparkling apple cider into a highball glass. Add goldschlager, stir, and serve.

name: Golden Dream
instructions:
Fill shaker glass one third full of ice cubes. Add galliano, cream de cacao, triple sec, orange juice (non pulp), and light cream. Shake vigorously until creamy and strain into a champagne flute, or use a blender and blend until creamy.

Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with slice of orange.

name: Golden Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

name: Golden Friendship
instructions: Mix amaretto, sweet vermouth and white rum in a collins glass with ice, and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with an orange spiral and a cherry.

name: Golden Mountain Screw
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a glass and top off with ice.

name: Golden Nugget
instructions: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Golden Nugget #2
instructions: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Golden Oldie
instructions: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Golden Panther
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Golden Rye Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda) well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with soda, add a cocktail cherry, and serve.

name: Golden Screw
instructions: Build over ice in a higball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Golden Shower
instructions: Stir rum and banana liqueur with ice. Fill with sprite, and serve.

name: Golden Sip
instructions: Pour over lots of ice.

name: Golden Star
instructions: Place two scoops of ice-cream in a blender, add liquor, and blend until milkshake-consistancy.

name: Golden Sunrise
instructions: Pour amaretto, rum, and liqueurs into a mixing glass with/without ice. Top as desired with equal amounts of orange and pineapple juice, and shake well. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Goldilocks
instructions: Shake and strain into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Goober
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Good Fortune
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Good Old Days
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, add a cherry, and serve.

name: Goombay Smash
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass with ice and shake. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Goombay Smash #2
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice, add all ingredients and shake well.

name: Goombay Smash #3
instructions: Pour the Bacardi gold rum and Bacardi Coco rum, along with the pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake untill well chilled. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and add a splash of sweet and sour mix. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Goombay Smash Bahamas
description: This Bahamas version of the Goombay Smash was discovered on the Abaco Islands on Elbow Cay, several years ago. Tastes best when listening to Jimmy Buffett or similar island music.Fill a hurricane glass with crushed (or cubed) ice. Add ingredients and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry, and serve. Frozen pineapple/orange concentrate made into juice can conveniently be used as a substitute for both juices combined.
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with crushed (or cubed) ice. Add ingredients and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry, and serve. Frozen pineapple/orange concentrate made into juice can conveniently be used as a substitute for both juices combined.

name: Goombay Smash Charleston Style
description: Goombay Smash is a very popular drink in Charleston, SC at Coast Bar and Grille, so much so that it has it's own recipe for it up there.Cut banana into small pieces; mix with rums and juices and ice in a mixing tin; shake vigorously, pour into glass, and add a splash of grenadine for color.
instructions: Cut banana into small pieces; mix with rums and juices and ice in a mixing tin; shake vigorously, pour into glass, and add a splash of grenadine for color.

name: Goose Egg
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Gooseberry Jam
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker or blender with plenty of crushed ice. Shake until slightly frothy, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: GordBuster from Hell
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into an old-fashioned or highball glass, and serve.

name: Gordon's Mountain
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Gorilla Milk
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka and dark creme de cacao. Fill with milk, shake and serve.

name: Gorilla Milk #2
instructions: Stir or shake. Ice cream can be used instead of milk and blended in a blender.

name: Gorilla Smile
instructions: Combine all in a blender with 8-12 oz of ice, blend. Garnish with a banana slice speared through an umbrella.

name: Gorky Park Cooler
instructions: Shake or blend over ice and pour into a large, chilled wine goblet. Add ice cubes if necessary and garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: Graffiti
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled glass, garnish with a seedless grape, and serve.

name: Graham Cracker Smasher
instructions: Blend with ice and serve in a collins glass.

name: Grand Hawaiian Screw
instructions: Pour ingredients into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish a slice of orange or a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Grand Master
instructions: Pour the scotch, schnapps, and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Grand Mimosa
instructions: Pour grand marnier into a champagne flute. Fill almost to the top with champagne and top off with fresh orange juice.

name: Grand Royal Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda and stir.

name: Grandes Smoothie
instructions: Put ice cream, banana, strawberries, and strawberry syrup in a blender. Blend until consistency of a smoothie. Add vodka, and blend again. Serve in regular drinking glass.

name: Grandma's Peach Fuzz
instructions: Pour Southern Comfort, Apple Pucker, and Peach Schnapps on ice in Hurricane glass. Add Cranberry juice and splash of 7 up on top. Garnish with any fruit you like.

name: Grandpa's Cough Medicine
instructions: Add vodka, rum, whisky, red wine and cranberry juice to shaker filled about 3/4 full with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into large highball glass with ice, top off with ginger ale and stir if needed. (If preferred, substitute cranberry juice for another dark juice - cherry, grape, ect.)

name: Granny Apple Blossom
instructions: Mix apple schnapps, gold tequila and daiquiri mix in a collins glass filled with ice. Fill to the top with 7-up.

name: Granny Smackers
instructions: Fill a large pitcher half full with ice. Add one 12 oz. can of frozen lime-aide(Minuite Maid preferred), and using the same can, add one can of 7-Up, Stir, then add one can of bourbon whisky and stir again. Finally add one can of your favorite beer, then stir. Pour into mason jars with plenty of ice and enjoy!

name: Grape Ape
instructions: Mix ingredients as above in a tall glass.

name: Grape Ape #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Grape Beam
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with grape soda, and serve.

name: Grape Bubbolicious
instructions:
Pour the Skyy Vodka, Chamborde, Grape Pucker and Soda with a splash of cream into a shaker full of ice. 

Shake vigorously and strain into sugar rimmed collins glass.

name: Grape Coconut
instructions: Build over ice into a highball glass.

name: Grape Juice Rickey
instructions: Pour into a highball glass filled with broken ice.

name: Grape Rape
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into an ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a white grape.

name: Grape Soda
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice then build the drink starting with the blue curacao. After you pour the cranberry juice you'll want to give it a good shake and then fill with a splash of soda.

name: Grapeasaurus Rex
instructions: Pour vodka over ice. Top off with lemonade.

name: Grapefruit Nog
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Grapefruit Silhouette
instructions: Shake ingredients and pour into a collins glass. Serve with an orange slice. Tastes like grapefruit.

name: Grapes of Wrath
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour blue curacao and vodka into the glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with 1/2 cranberry juice and 1/2 grape juice. Then fill the rest of the glass with coke. Add a splash of pineapple at the top and then shake thoroughly.

name: Grapeschlager
instructions: Pour goldschlager over ice, then add the grape soda. Stir slightly, and enjoy.

name: Grappa Gimlet
instructions: Shake and pour over ice-cubes.

name: Grapple
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Grass Is Greener
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled champagne flute.

name: Grateful Dead
instructions: Shake ingredients, pour over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Grateful Dead #2
instructions:
Fill a collins glass with ice. Add all the white alcohol. Add the sour mix. Top off the glass with razzmatazz or chambord raspberry liqueur. Then shake to mix contents. 

This is a fruity version of a 'Long Island Iced Tea'.

name: Grateful Dead #3
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add each liquor, fill with sour mix and stir. Add a splash of 7-up or sprite, and serve.

name: Greazy Deigo
instructions: Empty zima into a glass. Add the bacardi, followed by the kool-aid. Mix until a light froth is achieved, and serve.

name: Greek Buck
instructions: Shake brandy and lemon juice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with ginger ale and float ouzo.

name: Greek Sex On The Beach
instructions: Put all ingredients in together, and shake. Serve in a glass filled up to 2/3 with ice.

name: Green Alien
instructions: Shake midori, lemon juice and lime juice with ice, and pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill up with sprite and soda to taste. Garnish with a lime wedge and add a straw.

name: Green Angel
instructions: Blend pisang ambon, peachtree schnapps, malibu and lemon squash together in a blender. Put ice cubes in a collins glass and pour the mix over. Fill up with sprite, and add a drop of blue syrup. Stir and serve.

name: Green Ant
instructions: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Green Bean
instructions: Serve chilled without ice, garnish with vegetable of choice.

name: Green Beetle
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice.

name: Green Booger
instructions: Put in some ice and just mix these 3 ingredients together. Stir it up and drink away.

name: Green Bull
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Green Coconut
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Green Creeper
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice.

name: Green Delight
instructions: Mix all the ingredients together, and serve cold.

name: Green Demon
instructions: Shake vodka, rum, and liqueur and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, add the cherry on top, and serve.

name: Green Dinosaur
instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir. Serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: Green Dinosaur #4
instructions: Add all ingredients and shake.

name: Green Doodoo
instructions: Pour ingredients into ice filled shaker, shake and strain into glass.

name: Green Dragon Cocktail
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Green Dream
instructions: Blend on low speed with ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Green Eggs
description: Heather Drobnoek made and named this drink after her best cover band in Pennsylvania to use as a drink special when the band plays.Pour the vodka and Irish cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the milk and green creme de menthe. Shake well, pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.
instructions: Pour the vodka and Irish cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the milk and green creme de menthe. Shake well, pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Green Eye-Opener
instructions: Shake everything but celery in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with celery.

name: Green Eyed Lady
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay pineapple rum

name: Green Fire
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Green Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Green Frog
instructions: Pour the Pisang Ambon into a highball glass. Add the sprite, a few drops of lime juice and ice cubes. Serve with a straw.

name: Green Gables
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a collins glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Green Glow
instructions: Mix over ice, shake, serve.

name: Green Goddamn
description: Green Goddamn was invented by undergraduates at University of Texas Austin in 1960. Proportions vary with thirst of consumer.Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cube. Serve with a long straw.
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cube. Serve with a long straw.

name: Green Goddamn #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Green Goddess
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, Scotch, dry vermouth and lemon-lime osda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Green Hell #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Fill with ice and add orange juice. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Green Island
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a parfait glass and top with creme de menthe. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: Green Kryptonite
instructions: Salt rim of glass. Shake Vodka and Melon Liqueur with ice. Strain into glass. Squeeze 1/2 of a lime into mixture.

name: Green Lantern
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in order, shake once and pour into a glass.

name: Green Machine
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill up with Mountain Dew soda. Stir slightly; the drink will turn a bright green. Serve.

name: Green Mamba
description: A popular drink in south eastern New York.Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add the Midori melon liqueur then equal amounts of sweet and sour mix and club soda. Top with Bacardi 151, and serve.
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add the Midori melon liqueur then equal amounts of sweet and sour mix and club soda. Top with Bacardi 151, and serve.

name: Green Meanie
instructions: Fill the bottom of a highball glass with a shot of sour apple pucker and fill with lemon-lime soda.

name: Green Meanie
description:
Invented by Mitchell Pfeiffer in St. Maarten, N.A. Very popular on the island. This drink is great for parties, especially in the summer when it is hot. Very refreshing. It is really easy to make a punch out of too. Also, this makes a great beach drink. Light, flavorful, and enough booze to have a kick.Best way to mix this is in a 16 ounce glass. Add your three ingredients, 2-3 ice cubes, and fill the rest up with lemonade (great for fraternity parties with the 16 oz plastic cups).
