If you like your drink a little stiffer, replace one ounce of lemonade with 1 ounce of Bacardi rum. 

To make a gallon (for punch) just add 8 ounces of each ingredient (not including rum) and the rest of the gallon is Lemonade.
instructions:
Best way to mix this is in a 16 ounce glass. Add your three ingredients, 2-3 ice cubes, and fill the rest up with lemonade (great for fraternity parties with the 16 oz plastic cups).

If you like your drink a little stiffer, replace one ounce of lemonade with 1 ounce of Bacardi rum. 

To make a gallon (for punch) just add 8 ounces of each ingredient (not including rum) and the rest of the gallon is Lemonade.

name: Green Mexican
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add tequila and midori, fill rest of glass with sour mix, and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Green Milkshake
instructions: Pour grenadine onto the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredients into a shaker with crushed ice and shake well. Finally, pour the contents of the shaker into a highball glass.

name: Green Monkey
instructions: Just pour a 1/3 of each bottle into a pint glass and enjoy

name: Green Ocean
instructions: Blend quickly and serve.

name: Green Orange
instructions: Pour vodka, Grand Marnier and orange juice into a collins glass filled with ice. Top with Midori melon liqueur. Garnish with an orange and lime wheel aside each other on the edge of the glass.

name: Green Quencher
instructions: In tall glass, mix midori, lime juice, sweet and sour, and vodka. Top off with tonic water and stir well.

name: Green Ranger
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Green Russian
instructions: Mix both ingredients together and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Green Scorpion
instructions: Mix jack daniels, vodka, and blue curacao with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Top with 7-up, to taste, and serve.

name: Green Slime
instructions: Pour green Gatorade over a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add Sprite, stir well, and serve for a fast and easy energy drink.

name: Green Snowball
instructions: Pour Stoli Citros into a glass. Add limeaid over top, and then add ice. Top up glass with Fresca.

name: Green Spade
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cup or highball glass, and serve.

name: Green Spade #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass, stir, and serve.

name: Green Sunset
instructions: Start with cocunut rum over ice. Add melon liqueur next. Fill almost to the top with pineapple juice, then add a splash of cranberry and 7-up on top. Garnish with a pineapple wedge. The pineapple tastes great if you let it soak til the drink is gone.

name: Green Tea
instructions: Mix chartreuse and sour mix on top of ice in a collins glass. Fill with coca-cola and, if you like, garnish with a lemon or lime slice.

name: Green Tide
description: Green Tide was invented by the great people of the Mayan Palace resorts in Mexico. This drink is sinfully good.Pour Dole pine-orange banana juice into a hurricane glass filled with ice until slightly over half full. Add Midori melon liqueur, lemon juice, vodka and Hiram Walker blue curacao. Stir, and serve.
instructions: Pour Dole pine-orange banana juice into a hurricane glass filled with ice until slightly over half full. Add Midori melon liqueur, lemon juice, vodka and Hiram Walker blue curacao. Stir, and serve.

name: Green Vodka
instructions: Mix and drink.

name: Green Wave
instructions: Pour alcohols into a hurricane glass and fill with equal parts of juices and sour mix. Add ice and serve.

name: Green Whale
instructions: Place blue curacao, vodka and sugar into a blender. Fill to desired level with pineapple juice and orange juice at a ratio of 1:2 - (ie. 1 oz pineapple, 2 oz orange). Shake well, and strain into collins glass(es).

name: Green Zima
instructions: Combine ingredients in a beer mug. Stir well.

name: Greenland
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange juice) with ice, and strain into a highball glass. Top with fresh orange juice, to taste. Garnish with an orange slice, a cherry and a mint leaf. Add straws, and serve.

name: Gregneck's Long Island
instructions: Shake cointreau, gin, rum, vodka, and sour mix. Strain over eight large ice cubes in iced tea glass. Top off with Coke, stir gently and serve.

name: Gremlin
instructions: Into a mason jar filled with cracked ice, pour 6 oz Canadian Whisky and 3 oz Sweetened lime juice. Stir with a fork.

name: Gremlin Fixer
instructions: Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Grenamirodi
instructions: Pour ingredients in to a shaker. Shake with crushed ice, or blend with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Grendel
instructions: Shake ingredients (minus lemonade) with ice and pour into a pint glass. Top with lemonade.

name: Greven
instructions: Pour vodka, passoa and orange juice over ice in the glass. Add the blue curacao and the lime. Do not stir.

name: Grey Goose Driver
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Greyhound
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

name: Grinch
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour over ice and let chill. Shake, strain and serve.

name: Grinch #2
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and pour in the four alcohols. Add the sweet and sour, and the same amount with a touch more of 7-up. Float the blue curacao on top to finish.

name: Grizzy Adams
instructions: Stir the vodka and the 7-Up Plus in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Groader
instructions: Mix ingredients in order.

name: Grocery Boy
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Grovspol
instructions: Start by pouring the whiskey, then bailey's, then cointreau. Add a splash of pepsi on top of it.

name: Grungeist
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Pour contents of the blender into a hurricane glass that has been frosted with sugar. Add a twist of lemon.

name: Gryffindor
instructions: Mix juices and Chambord with ice, strain. Garnish with an orange twist wrapped around a cherry with a sword-pick through it. Serve in a Hurricane Glass.

name: Guadka
instructions: Pour both ingredients chilled into a glass and enjoy.

name: Guarapita
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Guarikiten
instructions: Shake vodka and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a collins glass and top with Passoa.

name: Guava Colada
instructions: Pour the rum, guava juice and coconut cream into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a kiwi wheel, a tropical edible flower or a pineapple flag, and serve.

name: Guava Gibbons
instructions: Mix Malibu rum and guava juice together in a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Add fresca to taste, and serve.

name: Guavaberry Kir
instructions: Pour the guavaberry liqueur into a chilled wine glass. Add chilled dry white wine, to taste, and serve.

name: Guavaberry Royale
instructions: Pour the guavaberry liqueur into a frozen champagne glass. Top with chilled champagne, completely or to taste, and serve.

name: Guavaberry Sunset
instructions: Pour the guavaberry liqueur and grapefruit juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Carefully add the grenadine. Garnish with a slice of fruit and a dusting of ground cinnamon, and serve.

name: Guilty O.J.
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the contents into a highball glass, and top with grenadine. Garnish with 2 crushed maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Guilty Verdict
description: The Guilty Verdict drink was invented by Eric "Zuber" Zuber in Kelly's Korner bar of Hazleton, Pennsylvania. He explains the reason for the name.. "151 is a lot of proof, and we're putting it all on OJ. If there had been all that proof on OJ during the murder trial, it would have been a... Guilty Verdict".Pour Bacardi 151 into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add orange juice, and serve.
instructions: Pour Bacardi 151 into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add orange juice, and serve.

name: Gulf Stream
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, champagne, white rum, brandy, lemonade and lime juice over finely shaven ice in a sugar-rimmed parfait glass. Garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Gumby Dammit
instructions: Half-fill a pint beer mug with ice cubes. Add vodka and midori. Fill with cider. Sip.

name: Gumbys' Ruby Red
instructions: Mix the Rum, Ruby Red and Pineapple Juice, stir well and add ice cubes to the top for a delicious drink.

name: Gummy Sharks
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff vanilla vodka into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with Pepsi Blue, stir well, and serve.

name: Gummybear
description: "I was asked to "just make me something" one night and took a look at my bar and this is what I came up with. Everyone who tried it thought it tasted exactly like a gummy bear. The gummy bears were added later for the effect. Girls love it. Could easily be made as a bucket by just using a liter of each of the ingredients instead of an ounce."Shake all ingredients, except sprite, with ice. Pour into collins glass. Fill with sprite. Enjoy!!
instructions: Shake all ingredients, except sprite, with ice. Pour into collins glass. Fill with sprite. Enjoy!!

name: Gump Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice and sprinkle fresh-ground nutmeg on top.

name: Guthrie
instructions: Pour all liquors into a highball glass. Fill remainder of the glass with equal parts sweet and sour mix and Sprite or 7-Up.

name: Guttersnipe
instructions: Pour the Finlandia lime vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Cointreau orange liqueur then Kerns guava juice. Squeeze in a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Guy Punch
instructions:
Use a highball or old fashioned glass, pour ice up to two third the glass height.
Pour in the Vodka, Triple Sec, press the lime into the mix. Add the Red Bull and slowly pour in the Grenadine taking care not to stir in the Grenadine into the mix. Top off with Maraschino cherry and a slice of Orange on a Mix stick. Serve immediately.

name: H-Bomb #2
instructions: Fill a highball glass filled with ice cubes half way with Red Bull, then fill the other half with Hpnotiq liqueur. Serve.

name: H-Bomb Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: H.A.V.
instructions: Combine ingredients. Stir and pour into highball glasses over ice.

name: Habana Libre
instructions: Squeeze a lime wedge in a collins glass, and drop into the glass. Add grenadine and rums, fill with crushed ice, and stir well.

name: Hacksaw
instructions: Pour vodka first, then orange juice and orange soda on top, add ice to taste.

name: Hail Queen Candace
instructions: Build over ice starting with vodka, triple sec and fill with cranberry juice then the sour raspberry pucker. Garnish with a lime wedge and straw.

name: Hairless Chiahuahua
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hairspray
description: This fine drink tastes like a fresh do from the salon, and after a few sips you'll start to feel as light as a puff of hairspray.Use a clean highball glass, fill with ice cubes, add Bombay Sapphire Gin, and top off with some Sprite. A twist of lemon or lime adds color. For the advanced bartender, a curl of orange peel gives this drink a final salon touch.
instructions: Use a clean highball glass, fill with ice cubes, add Bombay Sapphire Gin, and top off with some Sprite. A twist of lemon or lime adds color. For the advanced bartender, a curl of orange peel gives this drink a final salon touch.

name: Hairy Armpit
instructions: Pour ouzo over three ice cubes in a highball glass, and fill with fresh grapefruit juice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hairy Ass
instructions: Pour the liquors into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well, and pour into a collins glass. Top with soda, and serve.

name: Hairy Happy Trail
instructions: Mix with whatever is available.

name: Hairy Jerry
instructions: Add dark rum to an ice-filled glass. Fill to the top with papaya juice.

name: Hairy Jerry
instructions: Pour dark rum into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with papaya juice, stir, and serve.

name: Hairy Navel
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hairy Sunrise
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender except grenadine. Pour into a collins glass and float grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Haitian Gold
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with fruit, add straws, and serve.

name: Hal Ligon
instructions: Add the vodka and orange juice to a collins glass filled with ice. Top with 7-Up.

name: Half-Man Half-Wit
instructions:
Shake and strain into a collins glass filled 
with broken ice. Add grenadine, garnish with fruit, and serve unstirred with a straw.

name: Halla Mountain Sunrise
description: Originally made with Korean soju, but equally good with vodka. Named for the tallest mountain in South Korea and uses Jeju Island tangerine juice. Made by Aaron Cupps at The Blue Agave, Jeju, South Korea.Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka, top off with tangerine juice. Pour in grenadine over a spoon like a tequila sunrise. Garnish as desired, and serve.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka, top off with tangerine juice. Pour in grenadine over a spoon like a tequila sunrise. Garnish as desired, and serve.

name: Hamlet
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Hammer & Nail
description:
This is really just a watered (or cola-ed) down version of the Black Tooth Grin invented by the late Dimebag Darrell Abott of Pantera fame.  

Resulting shot should look cloudy.  Drink several while listening to Dimebag thrash his guitar or "Sweating Bullets".  A must to pay tribute to the late Dimebag, or Pantera, or Megadeth.  Aaron McReynolds, Coleman, MI.Mix ingredients in any old glass.  Drink.  Repeat several times.  Enjoy!

The Crown is the Hammer.  The Seagrams 7 is the nail.  The cola is the board.  Congratulations!  You've just gotten schnookered!
instructions:
Mix ingredients in any old glass.  Drink.  Repeat several times.  Enjoy!

The Crown is the Hammer.  The Seagrams 7 is the nail.  The cola is the board.  Congratulations!  You've just gotten schnookered!

name: Hammer Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hammer Horror
instructions: Blend briefly in a highball glass and sprinkle with grated chocolate. Serve with straws.

name: Han Solo
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Build drink, in order, topping it with the Wild Turkey 101. A couple of extra lemons don't hurt, either.

name: Handball Cooler
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with club soda, and top with orange juice. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Hangman's Blood
description:
Apparently invented by Anthony Burgess, famed writer.  Popular at the Taco Bar.Add all five shots to a pint glass.

Top to desired level with stout beer, 5 oz is just about right.

Fill to top of glass with champagne.

Note:  No room for ice.  You don't need it if you chill most of the ingredients.  Highly suggested.
instructions:
Add all five shots to a pint glass.

Top to desired level with stout beer, 5 oz is just about right.

Fill to top of glass with champagne.

Note:  No room for ice.  You don't need it if you chill most of the ingredients.  Highly suggested.

name: Hangover
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a large glass. Shaken, not stirred.

name: Hangover Cure
instructions: Pour raspberry juice into beer mug, then add tequlia, rum, and amaretto slowly. Add coconut milk and sprinkle with your favourite spices.

name: Hanky Panky
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Happy Birthday Motherfucker
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Happy Camper #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Happy Colada
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice, and serve.

name: Happy Face
instructions: Pour gin, vodka, liqueur, tonic and pina colada into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Crack an egg and drop into shaker. Shake well and strongly. Pour the shaker contents (with ice) into glass and fill up the glass with orange juice. Garnish with two cherrys and a slice of lemon with puting it on the top of the egg foam so that it makes a happy face.

name: Happy Hollander
instructions: Pour into a wine glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Happy Holly-daze
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Happy Juice
instructions: Combine the schnapps and Malibu rum in a highball glass; add in the pineapple juice. Add in the mango nectar and guava juice til the taste is suitable (may want to go light on the guava juice for it's heavy distinctive taste) then top off with a splash of passion fruit juice, and serve.

name: Happy New Year
instructions: Shake brandy, port and orange juice well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Happy Youth
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy and orange juice over the sugar in a champagne flute. Add the champagne, and serve.

name: Hard Core
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass or wine goblet. Add the cola last. Hang orange on rim of glass.

name: Hard Eight
instructions: Add rum, lime juice and bitters to an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and a lemon spiral.

name: Hard Green Bricaki
instructions: Fill a glass with ice and add liquors. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Shake well and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

name: Hard Icey Nipple
instructions: Pour the jagermeister, Ice 101 peppermint schnapps and chocolate milk into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hard Lemon Ice
instructions: Combine lemonade and vodka with ice in a blender. Blend until slurpee consistency, and pour into collins glasses topped with a touch of raspberry syrup.

name: Hard Lemonade
instructions:
Pour the Jack Daniels, Sweet and Sour over ice into a collins glass (or similar). Now pour in the Squirt Soda allowing the soda bubbles to do all the mixing. Drink and enjoy! 

Adding a splash of Grenadine Cherry Syrup over the top will give it a sweeter flavor, almost like "pink-lemonade."

name: Hard Mick
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice and mountain dew, both amounts to personal taste, and serve.

name: Hard Root Beer
instructions: Combine Captain Morgan spiced rum with IBC Root Beer over ice in a collins or tall glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Hard Strawberry Lemonade
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender with one cup of ice. Blend at the highest setting. Serve in a hurricane glass with a straw, and garnish with lemon and/or strawberry. (Make sure if you don't get La Paz strawberry margarita mix, that you get a margarita mix that has strawberry puree, otherwise the drink isn't as good).

ingredients.name: sweet and sour lemon bar mix

name: Hardcore Gatorade
instructions: Mix together the Gatorade "Fierce" with Aftershock red cinnamon liqueur in a 12 or 16 ounce cup. Serve.

name: Hari Kari
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Harlee's Planters Punch
instructions: Measure light and dark rum into a glass. Add the juices and grenadine, shake well, then top with 151 rum. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Harlem Mugger
instructions: Build ingredients in order over ice in a collins glass.

name: Harlem World Seven
instructions:
Mix over ice cubes, pour into a suitable glass and consume immediately.

NOTE: It might taste funny because of the prune juice but you should get an effect out of it.

name: Harley Davidson #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Harm's Way
instructions: Shake all of the ingredients except the grenadine and strain into a collins glass full of ice. Dribble the grenadine over the top, give it all a half-stir and enjoy.

name: Harpic
instructions: Pour the vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur and blue curacao into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with lemonade, and serve.

name: Harrison Ford
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Harry Potter
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Serve,

name: Harry's Harveys Punch
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a large goblet. Garnish with a mint sprig and orange slice, and serve.

name: Harsh But Fair
instructions: Pour the vodka, southern comfort and blue curacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a champagne flute. Add the lime juice, and serve.

name: Harvard Cooler
instructions: Pour 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass. Add powdered sugar and stir. Add ice cubes and apple brandy. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Harvest Moon
instructions: Pour first 4 ingredients over ice into a collins glass, slowly adding grenadine as you stir.

name: Harvey Wall Climber
instructions: Pour vodka and orange juice into a half litre beer stein filled with ice cubes and stir. Float galliano on top.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
instructions:
In a glass with ice, add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka and orange juice.
Stir and float liqueur on top.
Garnish with orange slice.

name: HasherSmasher
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hate
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a shaker, and strain into a 12 oz highball glass. Serve.

name: Haus Special
instructions: Serve cold, with or without ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Have Fun with Your Dildo
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hawaii Five-O
instructions: Add all ingredients on top of ice in a highball glass.

name: Hawaiian Barbie
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Dole pineapple juice and tonic water, and stir. Place a chunk of pineapple on the top, and serve with a straw.

name: Hawaiian Cherry Popper
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a slice of pineapple. Add an umbrella, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Death
instructions: Put rum over ice, fill half way with punch, fill with 7-up.

name: Hawaiian Desire
instructions: Add all of the alcohol, fill with Sprite, then splash with lemon juice.

name: Hawaiian Dream
instructions: Pour the Maui blue Hawaiian schnapps, vodka and rum into a 16-oz glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with fresh chilled pineapple juice, stir briefly and serve.

name: Hawaiian Eye
instructions: Combine ingredients with a bit of cracked ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled tumbler and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Hawaiian Hammer
instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice. Shake and pour. Serves two.

name: Hawaiian Hillbillie
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add melon vodka then Hawaiian Punch, stir.

name: Hawaiian Hooker
instructions: Pour Amaretto and Southern Comfort over ice. Add pineapple juice and grenadine. Add splash of club soda. Shake and serve.

name: Hawaiian Island Sunset
instructions: Build in highball glass filled with ice, stir and enjoy!

name: Hawaiian Lust
instructions: Add the alcohol, fill with Sprite, and splash with lemon.

name: Hawaiian Mai Tai
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with pineapple spear, maraschino cherry and mint sprig. Serve.

name: Hawaiian Parrot
instructions: Pour the coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the glass with equal parts of Hawaiian punch and Sprite soda. Stir, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Hawaiian Punch #2
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Rain Drops
instructions: Build over ice, stir, and enjoy!

name: Hawaiian Russian
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Sea Breeze
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Seduction
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Shoreline
instructions: Mix juice and rum, then add curacao and let it sink to the bottom.

name: Hawaiian Sunrise #2
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass with 3 ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Sunset
instructions: Place ice cubes into the glass. Shake vodka, orange juice and cranberry juice in a shaker. Pour into glass. Top off with soda water. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice (optional).

name: Hawaiian Surfer
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass over ice.

name: Hawaiian Volcano #2
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Hayley's Comet
instructions: Mix vodka, rum, Midori, blue Curacao, tequila and pineapple juice with ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Pour into glass; top with Sprite. Garnish with cherries coated in sugar. Serve.

name: Haywire
instructions: Serve over ice. Regular 7-up and amaretto can be used if cherry 7-Up is not available. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Head On
instructions: Stir together the Malibu and 151 in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add other ingredients, stir and serve.

name: Head Shrinker
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a highball glass or Tiki mug, and serve.

name: Headcrack
instructions: Stir well with ice and a spoon.

name: Headless Californian
instructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass and add ice. Dash with bitters. Fill with equal parts ginger ale and orange juice. Decorate with slice of orange, and serve.

name: Headless Horseman
instructions: Put vodka and bitters into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with ginger ale, and stir. Add the orange slice and serve.

name: Heads Up 7 Up
instructions: Layer skittles on the bottom of the glass. Add 1 oz. Sour Apple Pucker and 6 oz. 7-Up on top. Enjoy!

name: HeadSpinner
instructions: Pour peach schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with Sprite or 7-Up, and serve.

name: Healthy But Hammered
instructions: Add ingredients into a highball glass, stir and enjoy. Perfect drink with breakfast.

name: Heartbreaker's Special
instructions: Pour vodka into a blender. Add passoa, orange juice and pineapple juice. Add crushed ice and flesh of an orange. Blend well, pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Heartburn
instructions: Mix these ingredients on the rocks except for the overproof rum, which you float on top of the drink!

name: Heat of the Heart
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Float some extra Cointreau on top. Garnish with blackberries and a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Heat of the Moment
instructions: In a shaker combine ice, lemonade and rum. Pour over chilled grapefruit soda in a hurricane glass. Top with cherries and lemon wedge.

name: Heat Wave
instructions: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a parfait glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Top with grenadine. Garnish with a fresh slice of peach, and serve.

name: Heather
instructions:
Combine ingredients and shake to mix. Pour over ice.

Best with fruit-flavored rum, especially passion fruit. If UV Blue is unavailable, this recipe is also good with any raspberry-flavored liquor as a substitute.

name: Heather Blush
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky and strawberry liqueur into a champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine or champagne. Garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Heaven
instructions: Pour liquors into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Heaven in Your Mouth
instructions: Fill blender with ice. Add 3 cups of Malibu Coconut Rum and 4 cups of Hawiian Punch Lemonade Berry. Blend until smooth. Garnish glass with a fun umbrella!

name: Heaven on Earth
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Heaven's Gate
description:
This drink was popular for a while, when it was invented by Tony Alexander, a bartender working in the MD, DC area. The invention came to be after the whole "heavens gate" deal with that loon Andrew Cunanan and all his followers draped themselves in purple cloth and committed suicide. 

Tony may have had a sick sense of humor, very dry, but he was a hell of a bartender. I wonder where he is now?Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur slowly down the side of a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes. The liqueur should sit evenly on the bottom. Add the Malibu coconut rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum to a cocktail shaker. Add the pineapple juice and shake well. Add the Sprite and stir steadily. Strain into the hurricane glass and the liquid should float on top of the Chambord raspberry liqueur. Top off with more Chambord, then with Cointreau floated on top. Serve.
instructions: Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur slowly down the side of a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes. The liqueur should sit evenly on the bottom. Add the Malibu coconut rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum to a cocktail shaker. Add the pineapple juice and shake well. Add the Sprite and stir steadily. Strain into the hurricane glass and the liquid should float on top of the Chambord raspberry liqueur. Top off with more Chambord, then with Cointreau floated on top. Serve.

name: Heavy Flow
instructions: Combine and mix vodka, schnapps and gin over ice in a tall glass. Pour and add equal parts of orange juice and sprite. Add 2 counts of grenadine and mix.

name: Heavy G
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mug or glass with a salted rim. Fill with ice and 7-up/sprite.

name: Hefty Smurf
instructions: Fill lower half of glass with ice cubes. Add rum and curacao. Fill glass with pineapple juice and a splash of 7-up. Stir slightly and serve.

name: Heidi Schnapps
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hell Bender
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass, and serve.

name: Hell Hole
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass, and serve.

name: Hell Mary
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker, fill with V8 juice and shake vigorously. Add black pepper to taste. Serve in a collins glass filled with ice, and garnish with celery and a lemon wedge.

name: Hell on Earth
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hellola
instructions: Pour the Stoli Razberi vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the lemonade and float the schnapps. Add a squeeze of lemon and a cherry and serve.

name: Helluva Hurricane
instructions: Pour dark rum, light rum, juices, and grenadine over ice into a pilsner/parfait glass. Add a half spoon of sugar, stir slightly, and top with high octane 151 rum and cherries/pineapple. Add an optional sugar cube, ignite and drink with a straw.

name: Help Wanted
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hematoma
description: The name Hematoma derives from how the blue curacao drizzles down the drink and creates a heavy bruised black and blue look. Credit goes to Lauren Simpkins, Corpus Christi, TX.Combine the Absolut vodka, grape juice, orange juice and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Pour blue curacao in on the top, and serve.
instructions: Combine the Absolut vodka, grape juice, orange juice and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Pour blue curacao in on the top, and serve.

name: Hemingway
instructions: Pour pernod into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Hemingway Hammer
description: This is a popular recipe from Key West, Florida, where it's rumoured to have been Ernest Hemingway's favorite drink. It is only properly made at Sloppy Joe's Bar, in Key West itself.Combine all ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a cocktail shaker or blender for 30 seconds. Pour into a highball glass and serve with a lime wedge.
instructions: Combine all ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a cocktail shaker or blender for 30 seconds. Pour into a highball glass and serve with a lime wedge.

name: Hendershlager
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hennessy and Cherry Coke
instructions: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a collins or other tall glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add cherry coke, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Hennessy and Coke
instructions: Pour Hennessy cognac into a large collins glass filled with ice. Add Coca-cola, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Hennessy and Vanilla Coke
instructions: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a collins or other tall glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add vanilla coke, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Hennessy, Apple and Red
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Henny Sunrise
instructions: Combine Hennessey, Cola and Sour mix in a Highball glass. Give it a short shake and top it with Grenadine.

name: Hennyville Slugger
instructions: Pour the cognac into a highball glass. Fill the remainder of the glass with sprite. Squeeze 1/2 of a medium size lemon into the drink and garnish with 1/4 inch lemon wedges.

name: Henry's Last Hurrah
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet, add a half-slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Her Period
instructions: Mix vodka, rum and grenadine with the Rose's lime juice. Pour into a  tall highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with Sprite. Add a splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Herbie Hancock
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Hercules
instructions: Pour rye over ice, adding cola, southern comfort, and lime. Stir and serve.

name: Hershey Highway
instructions: Coat the bottom of a collins glass with chocolate syrup. Fill the glass half-way with ice cubes. Add Kahlua coffee liqueur, Irish cream and creme de cacao. Fill with chocolate milk and shake gently. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings if desired, and serve.

name: Heste Pis
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with 3 - 4 ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hey Bitch, Come Here
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hey Kool-Aid
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add cherry vodka. Fill with lemonade.

name: Hiball
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Hidden Nightmare
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass.

name: Hidden Nightmare #2
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass.

name: High and Dry
instructions: Add bitters to glass (roll around sides of glass), add ice, then the Canadian club whiskey and finally fill with ginger ale.

name: High Moon
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and a half-slice of lemon, and serve.

name: High Octane Green Summer
instructions: Pour coconut rum over 3 ice cubes. Add chilled MDX and enjoy!

name: High on Irony
instructions: Pour the lime juice, soda, and punch into the glass, then add the rum and vodka. Shake and add ice. Top with a cherry. Serve.

name: High Quality H2O
instructions: Add ingredients in a collins glass over ice.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan's® Parrot Bay passion fruit rum

name: High Rise
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with finely shaven ice, and serve.

name: High Speed
instructions: Pour the Seagrams gin and Bacardi Limon rum into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Add the Red Bull, stir, and serve.

name: High Stakes Cocktail
instructions: Stir and strain into a highball glass half full of ice.

name: Highland Cooler
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky, Angostura bitters, orange juice and sugar into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Highland Sling
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and scotch. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Highlander
instructions: Shake and strain into a collins glass with ice. Garnish with a flag.

name: Highspeed
instructions: Pour all alcohols into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a highball glass. Add energy drink, and serve.

name: Hilde's Special
instructions: Fill a blender with ice, pour in the ingredients and blend it all together. Pour into a hurricane glass with a piece of orange on the glass.

name: Hill Topper
instructions: Build over ice. Stir and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Hillary Wallbanger
instructions: Pour the white wine and orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, float the galliano on top, and serve.

name: Hillary Wallbanger
instructions: Measure your ice with a collins glass (full up) and add it to a cocktail shaker. Add a dry white wine and orange juice, and shake well. Pour back into glass, and carefully layer galliano on top.

name: Hillbilly Bob's Mountain Drink
instructions: Shake all ingredients except coke. Pour over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.

name: Hillbilly Highball
instructions: Mix ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Hillside Blue
instructions: Shake the sour mix and the rum together. Pour over ice into a collins glass. Float the blue curacao and finish with one cherry and a slice of lemon.

name: Hiroshima Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball or old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Hobart
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add straws, and serve.

name: Hocus Pocus
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a champagne flute filled with finely shaven ice, and serve.

name: Hokie
instructions: Mix ingredients in a beer mug. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Hokkaido Highball
instructions: Pour the Bombay gin and sake into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the triple sec, swirl and leave briefly to chill before serving.

name: Holiday Captain Pepsi
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Holiday Spice Pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Holiday Hangover
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass. Garnish with a candy cane, and serve.

name: HollaDeck
instructions: In a tall glass add one handful of ice, then add 1 part spiced Rum, and finally fill with Mountain Dew.

name: Hollywood
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker and strain.

name: Home Alone
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Home Alone #2
instructions:
Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well.  Pour in a a sugar rimmed hurricane glass over crushed ice.  Garnish with a slice of pineapple and sugar dipped strawberry.

A nice alternative  is to blend it in a blender with the ice before adding garnishes... great summertime refresher!

name: Homicidal Maniac
instructions: Fill mug with ice, add ingredients, stir and enjoy. Or for more fun, put all ingredients (including the ice) into the blender and make a Frozen Homicidal Maniac!!

name: Honey Bunny
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Honeymoon
instructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine orange juice, vodka and nectar. Pour over ice and gently stir in ginger ale. Add twist of lime and serve.

name: Hong Kong Fizz
instructions: Dissolve sugar, shake and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add soda, straws and a muddler, and serve.

name: Honolulu Cooler
instructions: Pack a tall glass with crushed ice, add lime juice and southern comfort. Fill with pineapple juice and stir.

name: Honolulu Juicer
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add a pineapple chunk, and serve.

name: Hoochie
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add curacao, rum and melon liqueur. Fill with pineapple juice and add a splash of 7-Up.

name: Hook's Delight
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass.

name: Horn of Plenty
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and garnish with a half-slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Hornet
instructions: Combine gin and peppermint schnapps over ice, add cola, and top with a lime slice.

name: Horny Melon
instructions:
Make Kiwano Liqueur by dissolving 1/2 cup sugar in 2 1/2 cups boiling water. Mash the fruit of one ripe kiwano and add to the sugar water. Continue to boil for 3-5 minutes. Add 4 oz good vodka and allow to cool completely.

Using 3 oz of the Kiwano liqueur, mix ingredients over ice in Collins glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry and lime wedge.

name: Horny Monk
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half full of ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass full of ice.

name: Horny Schoolgirl
instructions: Pour ingredients over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Horny Shamrock
instructions: Pour the hawaiian schnapps, triple sec and orange juice (to taste) into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Horse Feathers
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Horse's Neck
instructions: Place the lemon peel spiral in a highball glass and drape one end of it over the rim of the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the brandy, ginger ale, and bitters into the glass. Stir well.

name: Horse's Neck with a Twist
instructions: Make a spiral of the whole lemon's peel. Place in a collins glass with one end hanging over the rim. Add ice cubes. Add Scotch whisky, and top with ginger ale. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hose Wallbanger
instructions: Measure ice into a cocktail shaker with a highball glass (one glass worth). Add tequila and orange juice and shake well. Pour everything back into the highball glass and carefully layer Galliano on top.

name: Hoss's Holdup
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake, strain into a highball glass almost-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hot African Punch
instructions:
Place 4 lbs of sugar in a large pan. Pour 4 bottles of brandy and 
2 bottles of Jamaican rum over sugar, stir until sugar dissolves. Set the liquid on fire, (may be difficult to light), and stir with a long metal spoon. Add 1 gallon of coffee.

name: Hot Anal Sex
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hot and Spicy Men
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour in liquor, fill with dr. pepper, stir, and drink it down!

name: Hot Apple Pie #5
instructions: Bring 1 gallon apple juice and 1 gallon apple cider to a boil on the stove. After it's boiling, add one cup sugar and 1 liter bottle of Absolute vodka. Remove from heat. Put back into 1 gallon jugs and place in fridge to cool. After it cools, serve it as is.

name: Hot Banana Action
instructions: In a collins glass, add 99 bananas liqueur and 3 slices of banana. If you'd like, you can add a splash of tabasco sauce to your liking. Eat the bananas after drinking.

name: Hot Buttered Jim
instructions: Stir the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey and the hot water together in a coffee mug. Float butter on top. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Mocha
instructions: Spoon the hot chocolate mix into the bottom of a large coffee mug. Pour hot coffee over the mix and stir. Add half & half and schnapps to taste. Top with a spray of whipped cream if desired.

name: Hot Butterscotch Cocoa
instructions: Mix ingredients in coffee mug, and top with whipped cream.

name: Hot Carl #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together with a couple ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hot Chocolate Mint
instructions:
Combine schnapps and cocoa in an irish coffee cup. Sweeten, to taste. Top with cream, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

Also known as Snuggler.

name: Hot Chocolate Sin
instructions: Prepare hot chocolate in a coffee mug, then add in a shot of Rumple Minze to give a nice minty flavor.

name: Hot Damn
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hot Damn Dew
instructions: Pour Mountain Dew into a collins glass with ice. Then pour in a shot of Hot Damn. Mix together by stirring slightly.

name: Hot Damn Pink Russian
description:
"A cinnamon twist on the classic white russian.  You can add more vodka, I've made it with 1.5oz or 2oz of vodka and really didn't effect the taste a lot. Great for getting you drunk, since it has a lot more alcohol than a regular white russian. Tastes great going down as well.", Aaron Bays, Murfreesboro Tennessee.In a ice filled collins or highball glass pour the vodka, coffee liqueur, 100 proof cinnammon schnapps. Fill with milk or half & half cream. Shake. 

NOTE:  Adding more vodka(1.5oz or 2oz) will not significantly affect the taste.
instructions:
In a ice filled collins or highball glass pour the vodka, coffee liqueur, 100 proof cinnammon schnapps. Fill with milk or half & half cream. Shake. 

NOTE:  Adding more vodka(1.5oz or 2oz) will not significantly affect the taste.

name: Hot Gold
instructions: Pour orange juice into a red wine glass and add amaretto. Garnish with the stick of cinnamon as a stirrer and serve.

name: Hot Land
instructions: Mix everything together in a collins glass.

name: Hot Latina
instructions: Fill the glass with ice cubes and add the tequila and vodka. Fill with pineapple juice and then gently pour the strawberry liqueur into the drink. Decorate with a chili and serve!

name: Hot Lava
instructions: Puree the strawberries and pour into a hurricane glass. Fill blender with ice to 1/3 full,and add all other ingredients (except pineapple slice) Blend until smooth. Gently pour the slush down the side of the glass, careful not to disturb the strawberry. Garnish with pineapple slice and an orchid flower. Enjoy your island treat invented by our one and only Sam Choy.

name: Hot Nuts
instructions: Pour Amaretto and Frangelico into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate.Top with whipped cream then slowly pour 1/8 oz. Cherry Brandy in a circular motion on to the whipped cream,top with a cherry.

name: Hot Orange
instructions: Mix all in blender to preference desired. Garnish with a slice of your favorite fruit.

name: Hot Pussy #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hot Rum Chocolate
instructions: Combine rum and cocoa in an irish coffee cup, and sweeten to taste. Top with cream, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Hot Russian Christmas
instructions: Take 2 packets of hot chocolate mix and put them into the coffee mug. Add the shots of eggnog cream, vodka, and Kahlua. Fill the rest of the coffee mug with hot water. Stir. You may need to heat the drink up in the microwave for 30 seconds before serving. When nice and hot, serve.

name: Hot Southern Night
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add firewater and Southern Comfort, fill with cola and serve.

name: Hot Tub
instructions: Pour cranberry juice over ice in a tall glass. Add the Grand Marnier, Absolut, Champagne and Chambord. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Hot Whiskey
instructions: Pour the whiskey into a whiskey sour glass. Add cloves into the fresh lemon and place into the whiskey. Fill with hot water and dissolve in the sugar. Serve immediately.

name: Hot Young Lady
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, no ice. Shake well and pour into collins glasses.

name: Hot, Wet and Sticky
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Hotel California
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add champagne, straws, and serve.

name: Hotflash
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Shake well and strain into a collins glass full of ice cubes.

name: Hottness
instructions: Pour the Skyy spiced vodka and Vernors ginger ale into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Hounddog
instructions: Muddle strawberries and limes in boston shaker. Add chambord, midori and vanilla vodka. Top with ice and shake. Serve topped with lemonade and garnished with a lime.

name: Howling Dingo
instructions: Add ice to jar, then amaretto, then add rum. Then fill the rest of the Mason-jar up with Dr.Pepper, stir slowly.

name: Hoya
instructions: Measure ice into a cocktail shaker using a highball glass. Add gin and orange juice and shake well. Pour contents of shaker into highball glass. Add ginger ale and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Hpno-nana
instructions: Put ice in glass and pour Hpnotiq and Banana Rum over the ice. Fill rest of glass with Sprite.

name: Hpnotiq and 7
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Champagne
instructions: Pour the Champagne into a Champagne flute. Add the Hpnotiq liqueur, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Gaze
instructions: Shake everything together with ice and strain into glass.

name: Hpnotiq Heaven
instructions: Pour the chilled Hpnotiq liqueur and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly add Chambord raspberry liqueur. Garnish with cherries, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Long Island Ice Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a collins glass (incl. ice) and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Margarita
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq, triple sec, Jose Cuervo gold tequila and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill to the top with sweet and sour mix, and serve.

name: Hpnotize
instructions: Build over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Hufflepuff
instructions: Mix liquor with ice and strain directly into the cream. Mix. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Hug the Toilet
instructions: Add vodka and tequila to cup or tall glass. Fill about 2/3 of the cup with Sunny Delight, then the rest of the way with lemonade. Finally put 2 or 3 squirts of lemon juice in and stir.

name: Hula Bob
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a tall glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hula Girl
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Hula Shake
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a frosted collins glass, garnished with a pineapple wheel and maraschino cherry.

name: Hulk
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq liqueur and Hennessy cognac into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite or 7-UP, stir well, and serve.

name: Humble Hippie Holiday
instructions: Mix all ingredients. Freeze this mixture until slushy. Fill glasses 3/4 full with slush and top with 7-up and a tablespoon of sour mix.

name: Hummer
instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Hummingbird
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

name: Hummingbird #2
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Hunka Hunka Burnin Luv
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.

name: Hurricane
instructions: Pour all but the juices, in order listed, into a hurricane glass three-quarters filled with ice. Fill with equal parts of grapefruit and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Hurricane #2
instructions: Pour gin, rums, amaretto, and triple sec into a hurricane glass with ice. Add equal amounts of grapefruit juice and pineapple juice until almost full. Top with grenadine to taste.

name: Hurricane Boston
description: Hurricane Boston is a simplified version of the popular New Orleans classic, the Hurricane.Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a hurricane glass.
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a hurricane glass.

name: Hurricane Carolyne
instructions: Mix everything but the overproof rum in a mixing glass. Stir well and pour over ice in a collins glass. Float the overproof rum carefully on top.

name: Hurricane Ethel
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Hurricane Hawaii
instructions: Shake rums, passion fruit juice, lime juice and grenadine together. Pour into ice filled hurricane glass.

name: Hurricane Leah
instructions: Pour over ice into a hurricane glass, and stir. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Hurricane Patty
instructions: Build over ice in a hurricane glass and shake.

name: Hurricane Sunrise
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass with ice as desired, and mix well. Garnish with maraschino cherries and orange slices (optional), and serve.

name: Hurricane, New Orleans Style
instructions: Combine all ingredients, mix well (shake or stir). Pour over crushed ice in hurricane glass. Best enjoyed through a small straw. Garnish with fruit wedge if desired.

name: Hyatt Club
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry. Serve.

name: Hybris
instructions: Build in a highball glass, on ice. Decorate with lime.

name: Hypno Fusion
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Hpnotiq Liquer and fill with Sprite. Add a splash of grenadine, stir, and serve.

name: Hypno-Sunburst
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour the Hypnotiq, tequila, and Club Soda, then top it off very slowly with orange juice.

name: Hypnocrite
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq into an 8-oz highball glass. Fill the rest with Sprite, and serve.

name: Hypnotic Bawls
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and pour into a tall glass.

name: Hypnotic Pussy
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: I.B.U.
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and serve.

name: IAS-Special
instructions: mix aquavit and banana liqueur insert dash with lime fill up with 7-up Served with ice cubes strawberry

name: Ice Bear
instructions: Mix vodka and Curacao. Pour in a high glass. Fill it up with soda.

name: Ice Bomb
description: As established at bars within the University of Illinois, USA. A popular student drink.Pour all liquors into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite soda, and serve.
instructions: Pour all liquors into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite soda, and serve.

name: Ice Breaker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, garnish with a fruit flag, and serve.

name: Ice Breaker #3
instructions: Pour the Pernod and creme de menthe into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the lime juice and fill with lemonade; stir. Garnish with a sprig of mint (optional), and serve.

name: Ice Cream Float
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add vanilla schnapps, fill glass with favorite soda (anything you would put on ice cream...root beer, dr. pepper, orange) leaving 1/2 inch headspace. Fill with cream.. not milk. Serve.

name: Ice Cream Hogarth
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blend, and blend well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Ice Cream Schnapps
instructions: Scoop ice cream into glass, pour butterscotch schnapps and coke over top ice cream.

name: Ice House Highball
instructions: Build the vodka and lemonade in a large pint glass filled with ice, and top with a dash of creme de menthe. Garnish with an edible orchid flower.

name: Ice Palace
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange and a cherry (if desired) and serve.

name: Ice Pick
instructions: Put vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

name: Ice Pick #2
instructions: In a large ice filled glass, pour vodka, then tea. Add a lemon wedge for garnish. Surprisingly refreshing.

name: Ice Storm
instructions: Take all the ingredients and place them in a blender. Pour into two 16 oz. glasses and relax.

name: Ice-T
instructions: Shake or stir. Serve with ice cubes.

name: Iceberg
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a blender, blend, and pour into a frozen highball glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or chocolate shavings.

name: Iceberg In Radioactive Water #2
instructions: Add ice-cream last. Enjoy!

name: Iced Captain
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a large highball glass and mix together. Serve.

name: Iced Coffee a l'Orange
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Iced Comfort
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Iced Fritter
instructions: Stir the Tia Maria coffee liqueur and chocolate milk together with 3 ice cubes in a highball or other tall glass. Serve.

name: Iced Jack
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Iced Jim
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a big highball glass, almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Iced Tea and Malibu
description: Iced Tea and Malibu is a very popular drink combination on the patios in Calgary Alberta, Canada.Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Iced Tea Cocktail
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Iced Velvet
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour black velvet canadian whisky over the top. Fill with iced tea. Stir with a straw.

name: Iced Wild Turkey Hill
instructions: Pour Wild Turkey whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Turkey Hill iced tea, stir and serve.

name: Ichabod Crane
instructions: Blend the ice cream with the Bols Pumpkin Smash and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur in a blender. Blend well and pour into a Champagne flute. Pour Bacardi 151 rum over the top and garnish with nutmeg or cinnamon.

name: Idaho Dimetapp
instructions: Combine the vodka and rum in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add the chilled grape soda and serve.

name: IED (Improvised Explosive Device)
description: This recipe was created by 2nd Platoon, Military Police Company C, United States Marine Corps (Reserve), quote "After 2 combat tours in Iraq over the past 2 years, we decided to honor those of us injured and to toast our fellow Marines killed by IEDs in Iraq. We just developed it in the barracks and will be taking it public the night of the Marine Corps Birthday Ball, November 10th [2004]."Combine Jagermeister (smoke), Goldschlager (fragmentation), and Jose Cuervo tequila (because we had 1 Mexican in the platoon) in a highball or old-fashioned glass. After all ingredients have been combined drop some lit Bacardi 151 rum into the glass and shoot. After a couple of seconds when the intital shock has wore off you yell BAM!!
instructions: Combine Jagermeister (smoke), Goldschlager (fragmentation), and Jose Cuervo tequila (because we had 1 Mexican in the platoon) in a highball or old-fashioned glass. After all ingredients have been combined drop some lit Bacardi 151 rum into the glass and shoot. After a couple of seconds when the intital shock has wore off you yell BAM!!

name: Igloo Sue
instructions: Fill glass with ice or snow. Pour in lemonade. Add vodka. Splash in grenadine (it should seep to the bottom).

name: Illiad
instructions: Shake Amaretto and Ouzo with ice in a shaker. Strain into a highball glass. Juice or blend 2 strawberries and pour on top of drink and let it seep down into the cocktail. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Imagination
instructions: Pour rye whiskey into a highball glass. Add the desired amount of ice. Fill to the top with ginger ale and add a splash of lime. Stir until well mixed.

name: Imitation Beer
instructions: Pour the rum into a beer mug or glass, and fill with lemonade. Sweeten with sugar, to taste. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Imperial Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: In the Sack
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Incredible Crunkness
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Incredible Goose
instructions: Stir in equal amounts in a highball glass over ice, and serve.

name: Incredible Heart
instructions: Fill 3/4 of the glass with pink champagne, then fill the glass with Hpnotiq.

name: Indian Summer Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Indifferent Miss
instructions: Pour the rum, lime juice and simple syrup into a highball glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with club soda, stir gently, and serve.

name: Indigo Blues
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Indycar
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Infidelity
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice, and shake well. Strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Insane Asylum
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: International Akbar
description:
San Diego Lifeguard Charles O. Ware invented this drink while on vacation in Greece with his wife, Melissa, and baby, Tatum in the spring of 2005. The drink was inspired by San Diego Lifeguard Seargant and rum afficianado Darell Esparza's 3-legged cat, Akbar (arabic for "great one").

It's officially called the "International" Akbar only because Cuban rum is not legally available in the U.S. This drink has become the official summer drink for all lifeguards and their friends and family here in San Diego. 

In fact, the Trader Joe's in Pacific Beach is often sold out of their dark Cruzan Rum (cheap, but tasty) and San Pellegrino sodas, due to ones ability to purchase enough ingredients for 12 Akbars with only $12.00 in your pocket. Delicious!!!Squeeze lime wedge and drop into bottom of glass. Fill highball glass with ice. Add shot of dark rum. Fill to rim with San Pellegrino Aranciata, stir and serve.
instructions: Squeeze lime wedge and drop into bottom of glass. Fill highball glass with ice. Add shot of dark rum. Fill to rim with San Pellegrino Aranciata, stir and serve.

ingredients.name: 5 oz San Pellegrino® Aranciata orange soda

name: International Bar Fly
instructions: Place a single ice cube into a champagne flute. Add liquors, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Intimate Encounter
instructions: Pour the coconut rum, Bailey's irish cream, amaretto almond liqueur and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add milk to taste. Stir slightly, and serve.

name: Invinceabull
instructions: Fill tall glass with Ice, pour in rum, then pour in Red Bull, and then top off with sugarfree Red Bull. Mix all together.

name: Invisible Man
instructions: Add triple sec, brandy, gin, and orange juice to a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Irish C-4
instructions: Pour Jim Beam and Jameson into a beer mug, than fill with one can of guinness stout. Float bailey's and irish mist on top, stir and serve.

name: Irish Chocolate Milk
instructions: Put a few ice cubes into a highball glass. Add shot of Bailey's and the half-shot of Creme de Cacao. Stir together before adding the milk, then add the rest.

name: Irish Coconut
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice. Strain into an iced highball glass, top with soda, stir, and serve.

name: Irish Comfort
instructions: Combine southern comfort and blue curacao in a highball glass over ice. Add enough orange juice to fill the glass. The orange juice and blue curacao will combine to form a lovely green shade!

name: Irish Cream #1
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Blend on lowest setting until frothy or well blended. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Irish Cream #2
instructions: Put everything into a blender and mix. Makes about three small mason jars.

name: Irish Cream BTB
instructions:
Mix all the ingredients thoroughly, except for the whipping cream. You can use a mixer (recommended) or by hand. After all the ingredients are mixed well you will add the whipping cream, mix lightly, do not overmix.

BTB = Better Than Bailey's

name: Irish Cream Liqueur
instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add syrups, and serve in wine glasses.

name: Irish Curdling Cow
instructions: Pour irish cream, vodka, and bourbon into a highball glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

name: Irish Dream
instructions: Combine the hazelnut liqueur, irish cream, brown creme de cacao and vanilla ice cream in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Pour into a frosted pilsner glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles or shavings, and serve.

name: Irish Hot Chocolate
instructions: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate. Top with whipped cream or marshmellows and a cherry.

name: Irish Immigrant
instructions: Pour Irish Cream on top of Vanilla Coke. Top with two scoops of Vanilla.

name: Irish Lady
instructions: Almost fill a champagne flute with champagne. Add midori and orange juice, and serve.

name: Irish Mint
instructions: Pour the milk first and then the irish cream - the parts are only guesses, I tend to go by color. You want a creamy beige that has only a slight hint of alcohol. Add just enough creme de menthe so as to turn the drink slightly green. Stir it up and serve cold.

name: Irish Mudslide
instructions: Use a chilled beer mug. Add Irish cream and fill with root beer.

name: Irish Orgasm
instructions: Mix ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Irish Pinata
instructions: Fill glass with ice and add milk. Add St. Brendan's Irish Cream, vodka, Bailey's Mint Chocolate, then Kahlua. Stir gently.

name: Irish Pride
instructions: Layer in a highball glass and mix.

name: Irish Redhead
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Irish Rickey
instructions: Pour irish whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Irish Rider
instructions: Combine whiskey, triple sec and sour mix. Shake with ice and pour all into the glass. Drizzle raspberry liqueur on top.

name: Irish Slide
instructions: Pour the two shots of Three Olives Vodka into miker along with the eight ounces of grapfruit juice.  Mix.  Pour into hurricane glass.  Best if served chilled.

name: Irish Spring
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

name: Irish Tea
instructions: Make a cup of tea. Add sugar or sweetener if wanted. Add Bailey's Irish Cream to your liking.

name: Irish Trash Can
instructions: Fill glass full of ice, then add all liquors and stir. Add full can of Red Bull. It will float and slowly seep down the glass, turning the mix green, hence the name Irish Trash Can!

name: Irish Vanilla Coffee
instructions: Pour into a coffee mug 4 oz. of coffee. Add 1 1/2 oz. each of Bailey's Irish Cream and Absolut Vanilla Vodka. Stir lightly and top, if desired, whipped cream.

name: Irish Wake
instructions: Pour orange juice over ice into a collins glass. Add rums and stir. Then add blue curacao and top with a red and a green cherry.

name: Irish Whip
instructions: Mix vodka, pernod, rum and creme de menthe together with a few ice cubes in a pint glass. Fill with equal parts of 7-up and orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Irish Whiskey Highball
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Iron Bar Sling
instructions: Shake, strain into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Iron Hindu
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cardamom) with plenty of ice and pour into a hurricane glass. Grind a moderate amount of green cardomom on top. (This is extremely important, and gives the drink it's characteristic purfume.) Garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Island Affair
instructions: Shake melon liqueur, cointreau and juices and strain into a pina colada glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add curacao, and float cream on top. Garnish with fruit, and serve with straws.

name: Island Breeze
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Island Breeze #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass. Add ice as desired, and serve.

name: Island Doctor
description: The Island Doctor was created at a Pirate party in Atlanta GA, May 2004. Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum and Dr. Pepper together over ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum and Dr. Pepper together over ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Island Girl
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass, roll, and serve.

name: Island Jack
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except cola) in a mixing tin. Pour over ice in a collins glass, top with cola, and serve.

name: Island Jim
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain over ice in a collins glass, top with cola, and serve.

name: Island Punch
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add the white rum. Fill with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. Add a dash of grenadine, and garnish with cherries.

name: Island Tide
instructions: Pour anejo rum and bacardi limon into a collins glass; with ice if desired. Almost fill with peach juice, and add lemon juice. Stir, and sink 3 mandarin orange and 2 peach slices to the bottom. Garnish the glass with a lemon slice, peach slice or mandarin orange slice if desired, and serve.

name: Island Toy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: It's Not That Bad...
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Add small pieces of ice, and garnish with cherry. Serve extra cold!

name: Italian Colada
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with an amarelle cherry, and serve.

name: Italian Dream
instructions: Pour the Irish cream, amaretto and light cream into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and serve.

name: Italian Greyhound
description: An extension on the Greyhound drink, popular in summer. Credit to Andrew Hildebrand, a bartender at the W hotel, San Diego.Stir the vodka and grapefruit juice together in a highball glass. Float the Campari over a barspoon onto the top, and serve.
instructions: Stir the vodka and grapefruit juice together in a highball glass. Float the Campari over a barspoon onto the top, and serve.

name: Italian Nut
instructions: Shake. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Italian Passion
instructions: Pour amaretto and Galliano over ice in a collins glass, then fill with passion fruit juice. Stir, then top with cherry brandy and add a straw and cherry as garnish.

name: Italian Samurai
instructions: Fill glass halfway with ice. Add ingredients. Stir.

name: Italian Screw
instructions: Add to a highball glass. Add vodka, galliano, and fill with pulpless orange juice.

name: Italian Screwdriver
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a sugar-rimmed parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Italian Soda
instructions: Pour vodka over ice and fill with ginger ale.

name: Italian Soda #2
instructions: Pour chambord into bottom of the glass. Top with soda water. Do not stir. Serve with straw.

name: Italian Sunset
instructions: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice and top with club soda to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Italian Surfer
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice filled glass. Stir to mix.

name: Italian Tickler
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, stir gently, and serve.

name: Ivan's Holiday
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff vanilla vodka, Smirnoff green apple vodka, Monin cinnamon syrup and apple juice into a highball glass filled up with ice. Put a shaker on the glass and shake it well. Squeeze a wedge of lime in it and serve.

name: J C
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass over 3 - 4 ice cubes. Add a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Jack and Cherries
instructions: Put the ice cubes into a tall glass, and add Jack Daniel's Tennessee whiskey. Stirring continuously, add the Coca-cola, grenadine, cherry juice, and top off with a cherry.

name: Jack and Cherry Coke
instructions: Pour Jack Daniels into a large glass half-filled with ice. Pour cherry coke into the glass. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Jack and Coke
instructions: Pour jack daniels into large glass filled with ice. Pour coca-cola into the glass. Stir lightly.

name: Jack and The Dr.
instructions: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey and Dr. Pepper into a tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Jack Bauer
instructions: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker over ice, shake, strain into shot glasses. Drop glasses into mug of Keith's, as done with a depth charge. Chug beer and catch shot glass.

name: Jack Brisk
instructions: Pour Jack Daniels into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes, then fill with lipton brisk, stir and serve.

name: Jack Colada
instructions: Add Jack Daniel's to glass, then pour in pina colada mix. Top with a cherry and a pineapple wedge and enjoy.

name: Jack Daniel's Lynchburg Lemonade
instructions: Add ice and stir. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries.

name: Jack Gin
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice and dump it into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour contents of shaker into collins glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Jack Hammer
instructions: Pour the vodka, irish cream and peppermint schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with milk, to taste, and serve.

name: Jack Hammer #2
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Jack Hammer #3
instructions: Build in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Jack Honey Slushee
instructions:
Mix the first four ingredients together and store in a freezable container. Place in freezer for 24 hours until frozen to slush consistency.

Make sure you use strong rum (140+), or it will freeze solid.

Serve in a pina colada or old fashioned glass. Add a dash of bitters and some freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Jack Leg
instructions: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey, Amaretto Di Saronno, pineapple juice and Sprite over ice in a mason jar, and serve.

name: Jack Lemmon M.D.
instructions: Pour jack daniels and lemon juice over ice. Top off with dr. pepper. Garnish with a lemon slice. Stir.

name: Jack Me Off
instructions: Pour the Applejack brandy and Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Jack Me Up
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Jack n' Off
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Cherry garnish

name: Jack Pepper
instructions: Pour Jack Daniel's into a collins glass over ice. Fill with dr pepper, stir and serve.

name: Jack Rogers
instructions: Pour jack daniels over ice in a collins glass. Fill with coke, and lace with grenadine, to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional), and serve.

name: Jack Your Melon
