instructions: Pour the mountain dew in any kind of ordinary glass. Add the shots of watermelon schnapps and jack daniels to the glass, stir, and serve.

name: Jack's Bagpipe
instructions: Pour the Gentleman Jack bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and add butterscotch schnapps. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Jack's Jam
instructions: Combine ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Jack's Vanilla Coke
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a tall glass, and add 3 - 5 ice cubes. Stir with a stirrer to get the vanilla off the bottom.

name: Jack-Off
instructions: Pour in one shot of jack daniel's on ice, more if you like your drinks strong. Then pour about a half of a can of coca-cola on top, leaving room for the iced tea. Finally, fill to the top with very strong iced tea (try three times the amount of powder).

name: Jack-Off #2
instructions: Pour 2 ounces of Jack Daniel's into a collins glass. Add the Smirnoff Ice, then top with an extra ounce of Jack Daniel's. Drink slowly.

name: Jackalope Punch
description: Jackalope Punch is adapted from another drink in order to make use of lovable Dole Pineapple Passion Mango juice. The drink has a nice kick even though it tastes pretty mild.Combine ingredients, shake, and strain into a collins glass with ice. You can adjust the sweetness as desired by adding more grenadine. For more bite use 1 oz 99 Bananas.
instructions: Combine ingredients, shake, and strain into a collins glass with ice. You can adjust the sweetness as desired by adding more grenadine. For more bite use 1 oz 99 Bananas.

name: Jackass
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a red wine glass; swirl until mixed. Add several ice cubes and serve.

name: Jackson 5
instructions: Mix the shots of rum, vodka, amaretto over ice, add a dash of sour mix, then fill the rest with cranberry juice.

name: Jackson Jack
instructions: Pour Yukon Jack into a beer mug filled with ice. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Jacobo's Melon Bomb
instructions: Pour the Cherry 7-UP into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Smirnoff watermelon vodka, and top with Red Bull. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Jacobs Haze
instructions: Mix vodka, jagermeister and red bull in a glass. Add ice and a slice of kiwi.

name: Jade Isle
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) in a shaker cup. Strain into a hurricane glass 1/2 filled with chipped ice. Garnish with a cherry and a long straw.

name: Jagasm
instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add jager and rootbeer schnapps, then fill with Pepsi, and serve.

name: Jager and Dew
instructions: Pour the Mountain Dew into a pint glass (half full), then add in a shot of Jagermeister. You can drink slowly with ice or chug without. Taste of drink will not change with time like some of the other similar ones (Jagermeister and Red Bull).

name: Jager Tonic
instructions: Add jagermeister to a highball glass with three ice cubes. Fill with tonic water and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Jager Vacation
instructions: Add all three ingredients in a shaker or blender, and mix with ice.

name: Jagerade
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes; stir and serve.

name: Jagermonster
instructions: Pour Jagermeister over ice in a 12 oz highball or old-fashioned glass. Add a dash of grenadine, add orange juice, and serve.

name: Jagger's Satisfaction
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Jaguar
instructions: Mix in a highball glass. Add ice if desired.

name: Jailbreak
description: Jailbreak was invented in Burrell's Field, England. Vodka may be substituted for the whisky.Pump Guinness and Coke into a wine glass. Mix Kahlua, Jack Daniel's and Amaretto separately, with some crushed ice. Pour over the Guinness and Coke. Serve, unstirred.
instructions: Pump Guinness and Coke into a wine glass. Mix Kahlua, Jack Daniel's and Amaretto separately, with some crushed ice. Pour over the Guinness and Coke. Serve, unstirred.

name: Jake Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Jake White Special
instructions: Pour the rum into a collins glass 1/3 filled with ice. Fill glass with cream soda. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Jake's Bloody Mary
instructions: Pour the vodka, dry sherry, lime juice, V8 juice and tomato juice into a beer pilsner over ice and mix well. Season as desired; roughly 3 drops of Tabasco sauce and Worcestershire sauce. Finish with a pinch of celery salt and pepper. Serve with a stick of celery or carrot.

name: Jakesade
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Jamaica Fever
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker, and pour into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add a pineapple chunk and a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Jamaica Granito
instructions: Pour the brandy and triple sec into a collins glass. Add the lemon sherbet. Fill with club soda, dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Jamaica Me Crazy
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in rum and tia maria. Add pineapple juice.

name: Jamaican 10-Speed
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, melon liqueur and creme de bananes into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice and a splash of milk. Stir well, and serve.

name: Jamaican Ass-Kicker
instructions: Pour in the rum. Top with cola.

name: Jamaican Bahama Mama
instructions: Pour the white rum, juices and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass. Float spiced rum and grenadine on top, and serve.

name: Jamaican Blues
instructions: Pour the dark rum, blue curacao, coconut cream and pineapple juice into a blender with 1 1/2 cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish with a pineapple piece, and serve.

name: Jamaican Bum
instructions: Pour the shots into a glass over ice, fill with 7-up, add cream and stir. Garnish with any fruit or cherry.

name: Jamaican Cabdriver
instructions: Put ice into a glass. Add orange juice and coconut rum. Lastly add cranberry juice to taste and stir well.

name: Jamaican Coke
instructions: Stir all ingredients except cola in a glass half full of ice, then top up with cola.

name: Jamaican Collins
instructions: Shake rum, pineapple juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water.

name: Jamaican Crawler
instructions: Pour the white rum, melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Float grenadine on top, and serve.

name: Jamaican Crow
instructions: Fill a collins glass almost full with ice, and your shaker half full with ice. Pour all ingredients except soda into shaker and shake well. Strain into glass. Add the carbonated water (club soda) and stir well. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry if available.

name: Jamaican Fizz
instructions: Pour the rum, pineapple juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda, stir, and serve.

name: Jamaican Hurricane
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Jamaican Iced Tea
instructions:
Basically a Long Beach Iced Tea with Myers in place of light rum, and pineapple in place of cranberry juice. Best if prepared in a mixing cup with ice, shaken, and poured (ice and all) into a hurricane glass. To serve in a Collins glass (which is usually somewhat smaller), cut the bottle pours back to 1/2 oz each, and mixers back to 1 oz each.

To make a flag garnish, spear whatever fruit you are using (in this case a split chunk of pineapple) all the way through with a toothpick.  Stick a maraschino cherry on the exposed top end of the toothpick, then hang the whole thing on the side of the glass.

name: Jamaican Juice
instructions: Add 3 ice cubes to a mason jar. Using the exact amounts as above, pour the rum and juice into the masor jar and mix.

name: Jamaican Lifesaver
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Jamaican Me Crazy
instructions: Mix in a shaker glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Rebel
instructions: Mix all ingredients together.

name: Jamaican Rum Bamboozle
instructions: Pour small amount of bitters over ice, strain, then add all the rum. Throw in pineapple juice, coconut extract, and a splash of grenadine, with a thin slice of mango for garnish.

name: Jamaican Rum-Ginger Zinger
instructions:
Bring 2 cups water to boil in medium saucepan. Remove from heat. Mix in grated fresh ginger and 1 teaspoon lime juice. Cover and let stand 1 hour. add brown surgar; stir to dissolve. Strain ginger beer into bowl, pressing firmly on solids to extract as much liquid as possible (mixture will be cloudy). Cool completely. Transfer ginger beer to jar. Cover and chill at least 2 hours or up to 1 week. 

Mix rum, Simple Syrup, falernum, ginger beer, and remaining 3/4 cup lime juice in pitcher. Fill tall glasses with ice. Pour mixture over. If desired, garnish rim of each glass with lime peel curl.

name: Jamaican Rumshaker
instructions: Shake the Tia Maria and Malibu in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, top with Sprite, and serve.

name: Jamaican Screw
instructions: Mix rum and orange juice together (stirring) then pour over ice.

name: Jamaican Sunset
instructions: Shake and strain this drink into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Float myer's rum and garnish with a pineapple, orange, or cherry pinwheel.

name: Jamaican Sunset #2
instructions: Combine the vodka and the coconut rum. Fill with orange juice and add a splash of grenadine. Shake or stir.

name: Jamaican Twist
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, Midori melon liqueur and creme de bananes into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and pour the contents into a tall glass. Add pineapple juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Jamaican Zombie
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a frosted zombie glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: James Bond
instructions: Saturate a sugar cube or teaspoon of sugar in a champagne flute with angostura bitters. Add vodka, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: James D
instructions: Combine ingredients. Stir.

name: JammyJami'n
description: The drink was invented on the island of Aruba, by Ytienne Fricke where it is very popular. It is based on the island, and it's people who like to jam with a Energy that can't be compared. And still have the time to kickback and refresh by sunset.Into a mixing glass you pour the amount of vodka, rum and peach schnapps. Squeeze the lemon & lime wedges add sugar, Jammy three  dashes of Angostura lemon-lime bitters, then shake and strain on ice into a hurricane glass, then pour red bull on top with a splash of cranberry.
instructions: Into a mixing glass you pour the amount of vodka, rum and peach schnapps. Squeeze the lemon & lime wedges add sugar, Jammy three  dashes of Angostura lemon-lime bitters, then shake and strain on ice into a hurricane glass, then pour red bull on top with a splash of cranberry.

name: Jan Juice
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass

name: Janosik's Letisko
description:
Borovicka is the national hard spirit of Slovakia. It is most well known as Spisske Borovicka from the SPIS (north east part of Slovakia) area. The most wide-spread version is the one from www.oldherold.com in Trencin (West part of Slovakia). Janosik is the national hero of Slovakia (kind of a Robin Hood) and Letisko is the Slovak word for Airport, hence the name. Semtex is the other national drink here and combined with Borovicka make this drink.
It is sweet, it is refreshing, you can't taste the alcohol... Put 2 slovak units (1 slovak unit = 0,05l = 1.7 US ounches) of the hard spirit Borovicka in a typical 0,5l beer glass (that is what Pilsner is served in Pilsen!). Add one can of Semtex Forte (with CO2). Stir well. Can be consumed like a soft drink.. but hell...
instructions: Put 2 slovak units (1 slovak unit = 0,05l = 1.7 US ounches) of the hard spirit Borovicka in a typical 0,5l beer glass (that is what Pilsner is served in Pilsen!). Add one can of Semtex Forte (with CO2). Stir well. Can be consumed like a soft drink.. but hell...

name: Japanese Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Japanese Jack
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Japanese Jim
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Japanese Sex Slick Style
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum and Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Jaq'ed Up Screwdriver
instructions: Pour into a large crushed-ice-filled cup and pour back into the collins glass. Use a plastic stirring utensil if desired.

name: Jared's Concoction
description: This drink was created by Jared Peterson to proove his buddy couldn't handle anything he was given. It worked. Jared's Concontion is now a popular recipe at Michigan Tech.Shake all ingredients well in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a 12 oz beer pilsner and chug.
instructions: Shake all ingredients well in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a 12 oz beer pilsner and chug.

name: Jason Ball
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Jason Voorhies
instructions: Layer whipped cream first, then the vodka, then the root beer. When done layering, try and center the club soda into the root beer without upsetting the liquors.

name: Java Cooler
instructions: Shake everything but the tonic water in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice and fill with tonic water.

name: Javahopper
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice.

name: Javanese Sunrise
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir slowly, and serve.

name: Jawbone
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice.

name: Jay's Rootbeer Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients except the cola into a flash cup. Flash for 10 sec. or till foamy. Serve in a beer mug, preferably chilled, half-filled with ice. Add a splash of cola on top.

name: Jaygo
description: Jaygo should taste like strawberry licorice when mixed correctly...Stir ingredients together well in a tall glass or cup, and serve.
instructions: Stir ingredients together well in a tall glass or cup, and serve.

name: JB Black and Pepsi
instructions: Fill a glass with about a 1/5 of ice, then pour Jim Beam Black Label until ice is covered. Fill the rest with Pepsi cola, and serve.

ingredients.name: 3 oz Jim Beam Black Label bourbon whiskey

name: JC Slammer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Pour into beer mug over crushed ice.

name: JD's Private Beach
instructions: Add the blue curacao with 1/3 cup of crushed ice to a blender, and blend until slushy. Pour the creme de bananes, Malibu rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a hurricane glass. Pour the slushy blue curacao over the back of a spoon into the glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, add blue straws, and serve.

name: Jeannie in a Bottle
instructions: Combine ingredients in shaker. Shake vigorously with ice and pour (incl. ice) into highball glass. Serve.

name: Jeannie's Dream
instructions: In a hurricane glass (or a long drink glass), pour orange juice, pineapple juice and 7-Up. Add malibu rum and stir gently. Slowly add, as a top off, the sloe gin, so that the red color slowly mixes down through the rest of the drink.

name: Jedamski's Tropical Orgasm
instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice. Coat the rim of the glass with sugar, strain shaker contents over ice and add the cherry.

name: Jedi Mind Trick
instructions: Combine all contents (except cherries) in a blender until smooth. Pour into a mug and garnish with cherries.

name: Jelly Donut
instructions: Pour the Tropicana kiwi-strawberry juice, the Bacardi white rum, and the DeKuyper razzmatazz liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Float about 1/2 inch of half-and-half onto the mixture; done by slowly pouring the cream over the back of a spoon so that the cream stays separate from the rest of the drink. Serve.

name: Jen's Hot Chocolate Butterscotch
instructions: Add one shot of butterscotch schnapps to the hot chocolate. Top off with bailey's.

name: Jen's Mountain Gin
instructions: Rub lime peel around the rim of a highball glass. Dip the glass upside-down into sugar. Mix lemon gin and mountain dew together, and pour into the glass over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Jennifer's Junebug
instructions: Pour the vodka, coconut rum, Midori melon liqueur, banana liqueur, pineapple juice and sweet and sour mix into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Jenny Great
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Jeremiah
instructions: Mix all ingredients except milk in a mixing glass. Add ice, then fill the glass with milk. Shake vigorously, pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Jersey Lemonade
instructions: Add all ingredients to a collins glass filled with ice. Stir, and serve.

name: Jersey Shore Cherry Lemonade
instructions: Add sugar, vodka, and sour mix over ice and shake. Fill with sprite/7-up, and top with grenadine or cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry and lemon wedge.

name: Jersey Thunder
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir well and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Jessica Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Jet Pilot
instructions: Add ice cubes to a mason jar glass. Pour in the rums, followed by the juices. Add the grenadine. Top with a double shot of southern comfort. More juice could be used to mask liquor. Drink can be stirred if preferred.

name: Jeweler's Hammer
instructions: Add vodka to white grape juice. Alter the concentration of vodka slightly (to taste) and pour over ice.

name: Jewish Bulldozer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, stir briefly and serve.

name: Jihad
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Jim and the Doctor
instructions: Stir both ingredients together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Jim Barqs
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass, stir and serve.

name: Jim Beam and Coke
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a 16-oz glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill glass with Coca-Cola, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Jim Beam and Ginger
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a 16-oz glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill glass with ginger ale, (any brand), stir lightly and serve.

name: Jim Beam's Clermont Lemonade
instructions: Add ice to and stir together in a collins glass. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries. Serve.

name: Jim Kroener
instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a mason jar and enjoy!

name: Jim Pepper
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with Dr. Pepper soda, stir lightly and serve.

name: Jim Rogers
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with coke, and lace with grenadine, to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional) and serve.

name: Jim's Cream
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam Bourbon whiskey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the cream soda, stir and serve.

name: Jim's Special
instructions: Add vodka, cherry brandy, grenadine and ice to a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Jim's Wild Cherries
instructions: Combine ingredients in a plastic beer cup.

name: Jimmy's Heaven
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a large collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add a can of Nestea peach iced tea. Stir and serve.

name: Jimmy's Jetplane
description: This cocktail was invented by Jimmy Walsh who while messing around with Hpnotiq stumbled upon a mix which tasted very similar to a popular type of candy here in New Zealand.   The cocktail sells extremely well thanks to its appearance, novelty value, and its ease to drink.Shake all ingredients and strain into a highball glass full of ice.   Garnish with a lemon wheel and an aeroplane shaped candy.   The perfect candy is a gummi like substance that comes in many colours.
instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a highball glass full of ice.   Garnish with a lemon wheel and an aeroplane shaped candy.   The perfect candy is a gummi like substance that comes in many colours.

name: Jimmy's Special
instructions: Put the cognac in a glass and after that, the champagne.

name: Jimmy.A Special
instructions: Pour the liqueurs into a cocktail glass. Add lemonade, and serve.

name: JMO Sling
description: This variation on the Singapore Sling is popular in Ohio and central Pennsylvania.Combine the gin, sloe gin and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, and serve.
instructions: Combine the gin, sloe gin and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, and serve.

name: Jo-Jo Cool-Aid
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add southern comfort and amaretto. Fill the rest of the glass with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Jock Collins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the scotch, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Jock Strap
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass.

name: Jocose Julep
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except carbonated water) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

name: Joe Collins
instructions: Pour scotch and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola and stir lightly. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Joe's Cash Money
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into ice filled glass.

name: Joe's Killer Bee
instructions: Mix all ingredients then top with 151 proof rum.

name: Joe's Orange Highball
instructions: Add the Kamora to a 12-oz serving of Bacardi Silver O3, and serve.

name: Jogging on the Beach
instructions: Measure out Bacardia Grand Melon into a shot glass. Pour 11 oz Ginger Ale into tall highball glass. Mix in Bacardi Grand Melon. Enjoy!

name: Johanna
instructions: Mix and top it with some ice cubes.

name: John Collins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: John Cooper Deluxe
instructions: Mix 1/2 vodka, 1/4 OJ and 1/4 vodka in any glass.

name: John Daly
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add absolute citron and triple sec. Fill glass with equal parts lemonade/iced tea. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: John Deer
instructions: Pour the lime vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite soda, and serve.

name: John Rocker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange wedge, and serve.

name: John Stalker
description: John Stalker was made by Jon Stapley of Ben Hodgkiss Bristol University (Durdham Hall) 2001, England. It's now popular throughout Bristol.Use proper alcoholic grenadine (e.g Harvey's of Bristol). Combine the tequila and grenadine in a highball glass, top with 7-up, stir briefly and serve.
instructions: Use proper alcoholic grenadine (e.g Harvey's of Bristol). Combine the tequila and grenadine in a highball glass, top with 7-up, stir briefly and serve.

name: John's Delight
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, pour into a collins glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple & cherry, enjoy.

name: Johnny Bravo
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, peach schnapps, DeKuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps and blue curacao into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Johnny Cat
instructions: Place gin or vodka, triple sec, vermouth, grenadine and ice into a shaker. Shake well and pour into a red wine glass. Fill with tonic water or club soda.

name: Johnny K8
instructions: Pour the first 3 ingredients into a shaker and shake. Pour over ice and top up with tonic. Layer with blue curacao.

name: Johnny on the Beach
instructions: Mix over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Johnny on the Spot
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Johnny Puke
description: A nasty looking but nice-tasting orange highball.Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Johnnie Walker® Red Label Scotch whisky

name: Johnny Rev
instructions: Pour vodka and tonic water over a fair amount of ice in a highball glass. Squeeze juices from lime and mandarin slices and garnish. Make sure to use ripe, sweet limes to counterbalance the tonic water.

name: Johnny's Love Juice
instructions: Pour the vodka, rum, gin, triple sec, cranberry juice, orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Float the amaretto on top. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Johnson Cocktail
instructions: Pour the blackberry brandy and rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Top with chilled Sprite, stir briefly and serve.

name: Jojo
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Jojo and Alex Special
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except grenadine) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Gently pour grenadine across the top. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Jolly Dew
instructions: Empty a can of mountain dew in a cup with ice. Add in the amaretto and enjoy the jolly rancher flavor.

name: Jolly Green Giant
instructions: Mix just like you would a screwdriver, except substitute with lime vodka.

name: Jolly Jumper
instructions: Put together, fill with orange juice, add ice and drink.

name: Jolly on the Rocks
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass over a handful of ice cubes. Cherry optional.

name: Jon Jon
description: Jon Jon was made by Jonathan Gandy and the owner of Stonewalls Pub in Sheaperdstown West Virginia.Almost fill a pint glass with ice and pour your liquors (except 151). The Red Bull and orange juice should definatly be poured to taste. Not many people like Red Bull in drinks and prefer more OJ than RB. If your ok with Red Bull it should be poured in equal amount with the OJ. Pour everything into a cocktail shaker and shake well, then pour back into the glass. Pour a small amount of 151 on the top (optional) and do not mix. Serve with a straw.
instructions: Almost fill a pint glass with ice and pour your liquors (except 151). The Red Bull and orange juice should definatly be poured to taste. Not many people like Red Bull in drinks and prefer more OJ than RB. If your ok with Red Bull it should be poured in equal amount with the OJ. Pour everything into a cocktail shaker and shake well, then pour back into the glass. Pour a small amount of 151 on the top (optional) and do not mix. Serve with a straw.

name: Jon Lee Hooker
instructions: Mix liquor and syrup with some ice in a highball glass, add 7-up and enjoy.

name: Jon's Rum 'n Coke
instructions: Pour rum over ice in a highball glass. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill with coke and give it a stir! Delicious!

name: Jona's Special
instructions: Chill all ingredients. Add vodka, then Battery, then Sprite. Add a twist of lemon and stir.

name: Jonathan Strange
instructions: Fill the sleeve half way with champagne. Slowly pour the Guinness in after - wait for the head to go down a bit before drinking.

name: Jones
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Jones Juice
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice to the top. Nearly fill with vodka of your choice. Top off with under a shot of mountain dew for flavor. Serve.

name: Jonny Love Juice
instructions: Put everything into a highball glass.

name: Jordan's Blue Razz Buzz
instructions: Combine preferred vodka with Rose's blue raspberry mixer over ice in a highball glass. Fill glass with cold Sprite, stir and serve.

name: Jordan's Cherry Coke
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort in a glass. Add the sweet Vermouth and cherry juice. Fill the rest of the glass with coke. Garnish with a couple of cherries.

name: Josephina's Watermelon Crawl
instructions: Mix ingredients together in glass.

name: Joumbaba
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Joy Ride
instructions: Muddle lemon and sugar in a mixing glass. Add ice, absolut citron, campari and sweet and sour. Shake well and dump into a hurricane glass. Spritz with soda.

name: JT Delight
instructions: Add the vodka, tropical schnapps, orange juice and the cranberry juice in that order into a collins glass and serve.

name: Juan Blue
instructions: Pour tequila, orange juice, grapefruit juice, lemon juice and bitters in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Carefully float the curacao on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon, and serve.

name: Juan More
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-full of th ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Jubilee
instructions: Pour tequila, gin, vodka, curacao, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Jubilee on the Square
instructions: Pour the Bacardi white rum, Malibu coconut rum, Midori melon liqueur, pineapple juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Jufu Cocktail
instructions: Shake. Serve on the rocks.

name: Jug Wobbler
instructions: Serve in an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Juicy Cocktail
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker, pour over ice and enjoy!

name: Juicy DJ
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass over ice. Garnish with slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Juicy Fruit #2
instructions: Combine both ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of banana, and serve.

ingredients.name: Sunny Delight® California Style orange juice

name: Juicy Fruit Remix
instructions: Shake all ingredients together and add into a glass with ice.

name: Juicy Lucy
instructions: Pour vodka, gin and curacao into a tall glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and sprite, and serve.

name: Juicy Pirate
description:
Stolen from a drink recipe using Hawaiian Punch. Eeww. Popular in the Southern region of the Appalachain Mountain Range...smooth sailing, great partys! The best pillaging and plundering around. 3rd Annual Pirates of The Carribean Movie Premire Party! (For all ages...the young 'uns get Juicy Pirates w/out Captain Morgan. Duh.)
Thanks to Mad Bess, Pirate Queen (and really fun Mom) for this one ;o)Avast, me hearties! Here be the best Pirate drink this side of World's End! It's easy, too, for all your numb-skull scallywag galley crew. And the best part- it wards off scurvy as it's made with 100% juice- not bilge-rat killing high fructose corn syrup. 

Don yer best Pirate costumes, and heave ho! Aye!

Mad Bess
Yo-Ho, Yo-Ho, a Pirates life for me....
instructions:
Avast, me hearties! Here be the best Pirate drink this side of World's End! It's easy, too, for all your numb-skull scallywag galley crew. And the best part- it wards off scurvy as it's made with 100% juice- not bilge-rat killing high fructose corn syrup. 

Don yer best Pirate costumes, and heave ho! Aye!

Mad Bess
Yo-Ho, Yo-Ho, a Pirates life for me....

name: Juicy Tiger
instructions: Mix all ingredients and blend well. Add more coca-cola if needed. Serve with a slice of lemon and a straw.

name: Juiffee
instructions: Mix ingredients in a a highball glass.

name: Jump Starter
instructions: Mix in a chilled glass.

name: Jumper Cable
instructions: Pour rum over ice, fill with jolt cola, and stir.

name: June Bug
instructions:
Pour ingredients as listed above into a
Collins glass filled with ice.
Stir and serve.

name: June Sparkle
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry, and serve.

name: Jungle Boogie
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Jungle Jizz
instructions: Throw it all in a blender or food processor and hit frappe!

name: Jungle Juice #3
instructions: Mix everything except orange juice. Shake well and add the orange juice. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Jungle Power
instructions: Add a handful of ice to a glass. Fill the glass with 2/3 of ice tea (peach or lemon) and add 1/3 of Pisang Ambon. Take a slice of lemon and put in at the top of the glas.

name: Jungle Wild
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Add lemonade, and garnish with fruit. Serve with straws.

name: Jurere 12
description:
Created by Luke Garcia (myself), from Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. This drink was supposed to be a regular Blue Lagoon, but there was no more lemonade, so i used coconut water instead, and it turned out to be pretty diferent and tasty.

The coconut water is a VERY popular non-alcoholic drink in Brazil and some other tropical countries, naturally isotonic and lightly sweet. I was appalled to see that there's no more than ONE drink using it on it's recipe here on this website. Now there's two!Pour all 3 ingredients in a mixer, shake well, and serve it in a glass cup.
The ingredients should be already cold when served, but if that's not the case, add some ice. The coconut water can be natural (straight from the coconut) or bottled.
instructions:
Pour all 3 ingredients in a mixer, shake well, and serve it in a glass cup.
The ingredients should be already cold when served, but if that's not the case, add some ice. The coconut water can be natural (straight from the coconut) or bottled.

name: Just Peachy
instructions: Mix together the peach schnapps and the iced tea and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Just What the Doctor Ordered
instructions: Pull half a pint of lager into a pint glass, add two shots of kahlua, then fill with Dr. Pepper, mixing gently as you pour.

name: K-12
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: K-Town Cherry Cola
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Cover and shake; serve immediately.

name: Ka-boom
instructions: Mix lime, banana liqueur, and rum in glass. Add pineapple juice and stir. Add ice to fill glass. Add grenadine last and do not stir. Garnish with slice of lime and a cherry.

name: Kahlua Cobweb
instructions: Add the ice cream to a highball glass. Pour the Bundaberg rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur. Top with coke, and serve.

name: Kahlua Cookie
instructions: Combine all in a blender. Blend extremely well, pour into a large glass (ie. hurricane) and serve.

name: Kahlua Cream Soda
instructions: Shake kahlua and cream, and strain into a highball glass. Add soda, and serve with a straw.

name: Kahlua Earthquake
instructions: Add Kahlua and Tequila to glass, add ice and top up with Cola.

name: Kahlua Frost
instructions: Blend everything until smooth. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Kahlua Hot Chocolate
instructions: Combine kahlua and cocoa in an irish coffee cup, and sweeten to taste. Top with cream, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Kahlua Mudslide
instructions: Shake everything with ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Kahlua Peppermint Pattie
instructions: Pour Kahlua and peppermint schnapps into glass over ice, add cream, and top off with club soda. Stir with a straw.

name: Kahlua Twist
instructions: Pour tequila and kahlua into a hurricane glass. Fill the rest with chocolate milk. Stir well.

name: Kai's Drunken Love
instructions: Stir ingredients together and serve in a tall glass.

name: Kalamazoo
instructions: Stir well with a few ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Kali Fury
instructions: Pour Malibu Rum into a Lg. Rocks(Bucket)glass or Collins glass filled with ice then pour in juices and top with 1/2 oz. Creme de Banana.

name: Kalimotxo
instructions: Best served cold in a highball glass, but without ice.

name: Kalte Muschi
description: The Kalte Muschi is a German invention (translates to "cold pussy") said to originate from Spain under the name "Cale mucho" as a good drink at higher temperatures; very refreshing. It's now become very popular among German sports teams - especially among Hockey teams of both sexes, with the special kick of the ambiguous sense of the name.Pour the red wine into a 16-oz mug or glass (ie. beer mug), then slowly add Coca-cola (don't use cheap cola), lemon slices and ice cubes.
instructions: Pour the red wine into a 16-oz mug or glass (ie. beer mug), then slowly add Coca-cola (don't use cheap cola), lemon slices and ice cubes.

name: Kamakazie Razzberry
instructions: Pour welch's concentrate into pitcher, then fill can with vodka and pour into pitcher. Finally fill can with raspberry schnapps and pour into pitcher. Add crushed ice and shake.

name: Kameleon
instructions: Firstly, build ingredients in the order given in a collins glass over ice. Layer the Pimms on top.

name: Kamora Copper
instructions: Add everything ogether in a chilled champagne glass.

name: Kamora Quencher
instructions: Add Kamora to a highball glass with ice, fill with carbonated water and squeeze & drop in the lime wedge.

name: Kamora Rich Rewards
instructions: Blend ingredients together until smooth and serve with cookies.

name: Kamora Satin Tango
instructions: Blend everything together with a few ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple spear.

name: Kamora Vanilla Shake
instructions: Blend everything until smooth. Serve with vanilla wafer cookies.

name: Kampai Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec, pineapple juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add bitters. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Kanapeas Kick
instructions: Pour the Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the orange vodka and sweet and sour mix. Splash with Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Kansas City Ice Water
instructions: Pour gin, vodka and lime juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Kappa Colada
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a collins glass with ice.

name: Karen Koolatta
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Pour Grand Marnier over ice. Add iced tea, garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Karen's Melons
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up or Sprite. Try to toss the lime wedge from behind your back and into the drink.

name: Karl Malden
instructions: Pour into a highball glass in order listed. Add a twist of lime if you prefer.

name: Karlsson
instructions: Shake well and pour into a glass. Substitute banana liqueur for pisang ambon if needed.

name: Karlsson's Dream
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker, shake well, and strain into a highball glass.

name: Karma Chameleon
instructions: Pour vodka, peach schnapps, sprite, and lastly grenadine to taste. Mix well. Serve over ice.

name: Karma Killer
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec and peach brandy into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the fruit juices, stir well, and serve.

name: Karoff
instructions: Pour the vodka, cranberry juice and club soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Kashmeister
instructions: Add some ice if you want, then stir to mix it together.

name: Keep it Up
instructions: Pour champagne, cognac and orange juice into a champagne flute. Add one sugar cube, saturated in angostura bitters, and a twist of orange. Serve with a muddler.

name: Kellikilla
instructions: Pour Midori melon liqueur over ice in a highball glass. Add Sprite, pineapple juice and cranberry juice on top.

name: Kelly-K
instructions: Pour the vodka and Campari into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Kentucky Appleseed
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Kentucky Crack
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Kentucky Gentleman Top Hat
instructions: Mix the bourbon, amaretto, and hazelnut liqueur into a tall glass and top off with the soda. Serve.

name: Kentucky Mule
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add bourbon, fill with ginger beer and a splash of lime juice. Stir and drink!

name: Kentucky Swampwater
instructions: Build over ice.

name: Kentucky Wildcat
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and stir gently. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Kentucky Wilddog
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and stir gently. Garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Kermit
instructions: Add ice and shake. Top up with orange juice.

name: Kerry Cooler
instructions: Shake everything except soda with ice; strain into a highball glass. Top with the club soda.

name: Kerry-Jo
description: The Kerry-Jo drink is similar to a Kir Royale, only better!Pour the Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly drizzle in cherry brandy.
instructions: Pour the Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly drizzle in cherry brandy.

name: Kevin on the Floor
instructions: Pour the rums over some crushed ice in a tall collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Kevin's Special Blend
instructions: Put iced tea mix into a glass and fill about half full of water. Add rye whiskey, then fill remainder of glass with water. Stir. Add ice cubes. The colder this drink is, the better.

name: Key Largo Kooler
instructions: Mix juices and alcohol in a mixing tin, flash blend, and pour over ice in a 23 oz. squall glass and float bacardi 151 rum. Garnish with an orange flag and umbrella.

name: Key Lime Quencher
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 12-oz. (1 1/2 cups) of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a 16-oz hurricane or specialty glass. Garnish with a lime wheel, sprinkle with graham cracker crumbs, and serve.

name: Key West Cooler
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail tin. Shake. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Key West Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the vodka into a frozen highball glass, and add the lime juice. Fill with orange juice and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Key West Song
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice, and pour into a highball glass.

name: KGB
instructions: Shake everything (except lemon twist) with ice; strain into a highball glass with ice. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: KiBerry
instructions: Half fill glass with ice, add VaniilaCuddy's, then remainder with Kiwi-Strawberry.

name: Kick In The Glass
instructions: Pour the Bacardi O in a large glass, add a splash of cranberry juice, then fill with orange juice. To top it off, add a generous scoop of vanilla ice cream. Let the ice cream melt a little bit and enjoy.

name: Kick Yer Ass Sas
instructions: Pour shots and soda over ice in a mason jar or antique glass and experience a taste of the old west.

name: Kickstand
instructions: Pour amaretto and southern comfort into a highball glass, and layer kahlua and irish cream.

name: Kid Curry
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Kiki Tiki
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixer filled with ice. Shake and pour into a highball glass.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Kill Me Now
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass.

name: Kill Me Now Kahlua
instructions: Mix all ingrediants except for cherry, in a blender. Pour in highball glass and add the cherry for garnish.

name: Killeberg
instructions: Pour whiskey into a beer mug. Then fill the glass with 50/50 beer and wine.

name: Killer Ice Tea with Orange
instructions: Almost fill the glass with ice cubes, then add the alcoholic drinks. Fill about 2/3 of the height with them. Add the Coke, stir it. Add a slice of orange, and maybe a red cocktail cherry, and serve.

name: Killer Kool-Aid
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Serve, unstirred.

name: Killer Kool-Aid #2
instructions: Shake and strain, then pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a flag, or a flag and a pineapple wedge, if carried by your bar.

name: Killer Kool-Aid #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, add a straw, and serve.

name: Killer Vacation
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice. Float grenadine on top.

name: Kim Special
instructions: Build over ice in a tall glass and serve.

name: Kim's Cherry
description: Created at the Woodshed Tavern in Oswego, NY by a bouncer/bartender pair on a lonely sunday night. Evolved from the standard Kamikaze drink, and was named for the bartender. Note: drinks very easily with minimal amount of alcoholic taste or kickback. Very powerful for a single drink.Add a few cubes of ice to a collins glass. Add the cherry vodka and triple sec, and fill with lemon-lime soda (7-Up, Sprite etc). Stir gently, and serve.
instructions: Add a few cubes of ice to a collins glass. Add the cherry vodka and triple sec, and fill with lemon-lime soda (7-Up, Sprite etc). Stir gently, and serve.

name: Kinda Tasty
instructions: Put in highball glass with ice and stir.

name: King Burro
instructions: Combine the coffee liqueur, light rum, coconut cream, milk and banana in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish with a slice of banana and serve.

name: King Kenneth
instructions: Pour the Campari, peach schnapps, orange juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass and top with tonic water. Stir well, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: King Kong
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender, and combine on medium power for 45 seconds. Serve in a pitcher with a cute umbrella and a straw.

name: King of Denmark
instructions: Stir the pernod and black, and add several big ice cubes.

name: King of Krunk's Juice
instructions: Mix together and drink. A sweet, but tasty drink.

name: King of Poland
instructions: Pour the scotch, add lemon juice, add crushed ice, then top off with the vodka. Serve in a highball glass, drink as a shot.

name: King Olaf
instructions: Shake everything (except soda) with ice; strain into a highball glass with ice. Fill with club soda.

name: King Peach
instructions: Put ice, ginger ale, ice cream and peaches into blender and blend for 30 seconds. Add peach schnapps and blend again. Serve immediately garnished with peach slices.

name: King Willy
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur onto two ice cubes in a highball glass. Add a few drops of green curacao, and fill with 7-up or sprite. Pour a few drops of grenadine in a way that will look like its shaping a stripe down the drink.

name: King's Peg
instructions: Pour the brandy and champagne into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: King's Ruin
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Kinky Orgasm
instructions: Pour bailey's, amaretto and kahlua into a highball glass. Fill with milk, add strawberries or vanilla ice-cream if desired, and serve.

name: Kinky Sex
instructions: Pour the whiskey, Southern Comfort, ginger ale and lime juice into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add a slice of lime to the rim of the glass, and serve.

name: Kir
instructions: Combine ingredients in a large white wine glass. Twist the lemon peel to release the oil and drop it into the glass.

name: Kirsch and Cassis
instructions: Pour the creme de cassis and kirsch into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain over 2 ice cubes in a wine glass. Add soda water to taste, and serve.

name: Kirsch Cuba Libre
instructions: Squeeze lime juice directly into a collins glass. Add spent shell, fill with ice and add remaining ingredients. Add straws, and serve.

name: Kismet Hardy
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a wine goblet, garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Kiss Me Quick
instructions: Mix in a highball glass.

name: Kiss Off
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Kiss on the Lips #2
instructions: Stir ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Kiss Your Mother
instructions: Combine ingredients in a glass. Let it layer out, or mix it to get a stunning green effect.

name: Kist from Jim
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam into a collins glass. Fill with Sunkist soda depending on how strong you want it. Stir and serve.

name: Kitchen Sink
instructions: In collins glass, over ice, combine all liquors then fill glass with sweet and sour mix. Top with Lemon-lime Soda, stir. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Kitchenberry
description: A strangely blueberry-flavored concoction.Pour the apple vodka into a highball glass. Fill with chilled Coke (diet or not) and serve.
instructions: Pour the apple vodka into a highball glass. Fill with chilled Coke (diet or not) and serve.

name: Kitten Cuddler
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except sprite) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add sprite. Garnish with a cherry, slices of orange and lemon, and serve.

name: Kitty Nectar
instructions: Pour liqueurs in a shaker 2/3 full of crushed ice. Strain and top with 7-up.

name: Kiwi Casa
instructions: Stir the rum and kiwi juice together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Add soda, garnish with a fresh slice of kiwi, and serve.

name: Kiwi Colada
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in pina colada glasses.

name: Kiwi Lemon
instructions: Mix in a highball glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of kiwi.

name: Kiwi Sparkle
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Kleinfeld
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Pour entire contents of shaker into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Klingon Blood Wine
instructions: Add tabasco sauce to an ice-filled beer mug/glass. Pour in the tequila, rum and grenadine, and fill with cranberry juice. Shake twice and serve.

name: Klondike Cooler
instructions: Mix powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add blended whiskey. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add twist of lemon peel and orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Klukwan
instructions: Mix Bacardi Razz with Sprite over ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Knacky
instructions: Pour apfelkorn into a highball glass. Add peach juice and fill with iced tea.

name: Knock-Out
instructions: Fill a 475ml glass with ice - about 1/4 of the way. Pour beer into glass. Pour white rum & dark rum into glass. Top-up with apple juice, and serve.

name: Knoxville Lemonade
instructions: Pour peach schnapps and vodka into a mason jar three-quarters filled with ice cubes. Add lemonade and ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of orange, add two straws, and serve.

name: Kodi Odie
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass. Add ice if desired, and serve.

name: Kodiak Sled Dog
instructions: Blend everything to a milkshake consistency. Makes one serving.

name: KOJ
instructions: Add ingredients to glass and mix lightly.

name: Kokomo Joe
instructions: Combine ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Kona Village Mai Tai
instructions: Mix first 6 ingredients in a pitcher. Fill highball glasses with ice. Pour the mixture over. Garnish with pineapple wedges, if desired.

name: Kongepjolter
instructions: Pour the cognac into the mug, and mix in the champagne.

name: Kooky Boa
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: KoolShock
instructions: Place a few ice cubes into the glass, add the aftershock, then the kool-aid. Stir to mix. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Korean Karbomb
instructions: Pour the vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add equal amounts of orange juice and Red Bull, stir and serve.

name: Kori's Saturday Night Special
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. If it gets too thick, add some cream. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Kosmo
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker, and shake well. Serve over ice in a chilled collins glass.

name: Krazee Keith
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, anisette, cherry brandy and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the cola and stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Kremlin
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Krook's Quencher
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry, and serve.

name: Krunk Kitty
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: Krypto Kami
instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass.

name: Kryptonite Kooler
instructions: Mix the rum, maui, and pineapple juice together. Add ice, and enjoy.

name: Kula-for-Shula
instructions: Combine the Bacardi 151 rum, vodka, and Gatorade Citrus Cooler together over ice in a collins glass, and stir. Finish with a splash of amaretto almond liqueur, and serve.

name: Kuni's Helper
instructions: Blend ice cream, strawberry liqueur and milk in a bar blender until homogenous. Pour into collins glasses to 2/3 full. Top glasses with cola. Enjoy watching it set for about 30 seconds. Serve with a spoon.

name: Kurant
instructions: Put some ice cubes into a highball glass. Pour absolut kurant into the glass and fill up with schweppes russian. Serve with a straw.

name: Kurant Collins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the absolut kurant, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda.

name: Kursk
instructions: Pour vodka and curacao into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill it up with battery.

name: KY Special
instructions: Fill the glass two-thirds with ice. Pour orange juice and Sprite over ice, then peach vodka. Add 2-3 drops of purple food coloring. Stir, and serve.

name: L'Aunisien
instructions: Serve in a champagne flute.

name: L.A. Sunrise
instructions: Pour the vodka, creme de bananes, orange juice and pineapple juice into a parfait glass filled with ice cubes. Float rum on top. Garnish with a lime wheel and a cherry, and serve.

name: L.A. Sunset
instructions:
Add the Jagermeister, amaretto, triple sec, pineapple rum, and the Di Saronno (0.15 oz is an estimate, just use a small amount, mainly for color) to a collins glass. Swirl the ingredients together until mixed. Fill the remaining volume of the glass with pineapple juice and full pulp orange juice poured in the center of the glass. 

If poured correctly the ingredients should mix so that the drink has an overall yellow/orangeish-brown color with the brown occupying the lower three-quarters of the collins glass. No extra mixing should be necessary. The pulp of the Orange Juice should swirl in the brown region of the drink giving it an overall "smoggy" appearance, not unlike a Los Angeles Sunset.

name: L.I.E.
instructions: Pour all liquors into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add a small splash of orange juice, top with Coca-cola (or equivalent), and serve.

name: La Bang-Bang
instructions: Muddle lime and lemon wedges with orange wheel in bottom of collins or tall glass. Fill glass with ice, then pour Grey Goose L'Orange Vodka over ice and muddled fruit. Add the ginger ale followed by grenadine and stir. Serve.

name: Ladies Night
instructions: Chill all ingredients. Add together in a beautiful champagne glass and share with the ladies.

name: Lady Cello
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a sugar-rimmed highball glass. (Use limoncello and sugar.) Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Lady Godiva
instructions: Shake sugar, triple sec, lime and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a highball glass and fill with brandy.

name: Lady in Green
instructions: Shake, strain into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Lady L
instructions: Shake with 7-up and a splash of pineapple juice. Pour into a tall glass over crushed ice. Color the top with a splash of cherry syrup, and add a cherry for garnish.

name: Lady Luck
instructions: Pour Stoli Razberi, Malibu, Captain Morgan's, Midori, and Amaretto into a mixing tin. Add a splash of sour mix, equal parts of pineapple juice, orange juice, and cranberry juice. Shake well. Fill collins glass with ice and strain the mix into it. Settle grenadine down the side of the glass and garnish with two cherries and a slice of orange.

name: Lady Marmalade
instructions: In a wine glass, mix gin and cointreau. Top up with lemonade then float cherry advocaat on the top. Garnish with a citrus wheel.

name: Laffy Taffy
instructions: Build in highball glass, top with 7-up and a cherry.

name: Lake Breeze
instructions: Pour the coconut liqueur, cranberry juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda, garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Lake George Iced Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola), and pour into a highball glass. Fill with pepsi, stir gently, and serve.

name: Lakeside Lemonade
instructions: Pour the Absolut Citron and triple sec into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with sweet and sour mix, and add a splash of lemon-lime soda and splash of cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Lambada
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour over crushed ice in a fancy glass.

name: Lani
instructions: Pour passoa and grapefruit juice into a glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

name: Lark
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled wine goblet. Garnish with a cherry, slices of orange and lemon, and serve.

name: Larney
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemonade, garnish with an orange slice and cherry, and serve.

name: Larry's Potion
instructions: Pour the Stoli Persik peach vodka and Ketel One into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add Coca-cola, orange juice and cranberry juice. Add a splash of lime, garnish with 2 lime slices and serve.

name: Las Vegas
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve, with straws.

name: Laser Beam
instructions: Combine all liquors in a collins glass filled with ice. Shake well. Garnish with an orange and a cherry.

name: Lash
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add vodka and amaretto. Fill the remainder of the glass with sprite or 7-up and serve.

name: Latin Love
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender until smooth consistency. Rim a hurricane glass with grenadine and coconut shavings, and pour in the mixture. Serve.

name: Latin Lover
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, add a pineapple chunk, and serve.

name: Laura's Surprise
instructions: Add banana, strawberries, pineapple, ice, and captain morgan's into a blender and mix until slushy. Pour into a glass, top with a cherry and an orange slice on the side of the glass.

ingredients.name: 2 shots Captain Morgan® Original spiced rum

name: Lauren's Razzle Dazzle
instructions: Pour the Stoli and Chambord into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with club soda, top with a splash of 7-Up and serve.

name: Lava Flow
instructions:
Blend banana, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in a blender and set aside. In the bottom of a hurricane glass, stir together both rums and strawberries.

Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix slowly into the glass. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!

name: Lava Lamp
instructions: Pour a shot of DeKuyper raspberry pucker schnapps into a shot glass. Place the shot glass inside the bottom of a pint glass. Pour Bacardi silver rum around the outside of shot glass (but inside the pint glass) and carefully float some on top of the raspberry pucker by pouring over the back of a spoon pressed against the inside of the shot glass. Top it all off with Guinness. If done correctly, all ingredients should stay separated until the drink is downed in one fell swoop.

name: Lava Lamp
instructions: Pour grenadine over ice in a highball glass. Add absolut citron, and fill with apple juice.

name: Lavendar Lushmaker
instructions: Combine ingredients and pour over ice.  Serve with straw and fresh flowers for garnish.

name: Lawn Boy
instructions: Put the ice in a blender, pour the vodka over it, toss in the mint, and fill with limeade. Blend until smooth, adding sugar little by little until it's just right. More vodka may be added during blending as well.

name: Laze on the Deck
instructions: Pour the white sambuca into a highball glass. Fill up to the top with coca-cola, and serve.

name: Lazy Afternoon
instructions: Pour the dark rum, light rum, cherry brandy and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a pineapple slice, and serve.

name: Lazy Daze
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemonade and float cream on top. Garnish with a cherry and mint sprig, and serve.

name: Le Grand Sunset
instructions: Pour the vodka and grand marnier over ice cubes in a highball glass. Almost fill with orange juice. Dribble with grenadine. Shake gently to mix, and serve.

name: Le Perroquet
instructions: Pour campari, gin and orange juice into a champagne flute. Top with champagne, garnish with a twist of lemon and orange peel, and serve.

name: Leadville Hot Chocolate
instructions: Add everything to a coffee mug and fill to the top with hot half and half.

name: Leah's Last Hope
instructions: Add ice, mix and serve.

name: Leah's Last Hope #2
instructions: Add ice, mix, and serve.

name: Leah's Piece of Ass
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Leamos' Mai Tai
instructions: Place light rum and triple sec in hurricane glass. Add ice and pour over the orange,  pineapple and lime juice. Add the grenadine. Then float the dark rum on top, and serve.

name: Leap Frog Highball
instructions: Pour gin and juice of lemon over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Leaving Las Vegas
instructions: Pour triple sec, vodka, rum and gin into a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, and sweeten to taste. Add a splash of sprite, stir, garnish a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Lebanese Snow
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with one cup of ice until smooth. Pour into a large red wine glass. Garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: LeFreak
instructions: Fill 1/2 highball glass with ice, and add both liquors. Fill glass with milk or half-and-half.

name: Left Handed Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the vodka and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Leg Opener
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour brandy over the ice followed by Butterscotch Schnapps.

name: Leg Spreader #3
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add all but the Pepsi. Shake vigorously. Fill a highball glass with ice and pour strained mixture into glass. Add the Pepsi and stir. Serve.

name: Legspreader
instructions: Mix in glass and enjoy.

name: Legspreader #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Lei Lani
instructions: Pour the rum, lemon juice, pineapple juice, papaya juice and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine, and stir well. Top with soda water. Garnish with a fruit flag or pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Lemmings Leap
instructions: Pour the vodka, Malibu rum and gin into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Float orange juice on top, and serve.

name: Lemon Daisy
instructions: Stir the lemon juice, grenadine and simple syrup together in a white wine glass. Add ice, top with equal parts 7-up and soda water, and serve.

name: Lemon Fizz
instructions: Pour triple sec and vodka into glass. Add lemonade, ice and club soda. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Lemon Grass
instructions: Add crushed ice to the highball class then add the cointreau. Fill with lemonade. Add a 1/2 shot of blue curacao to make it turn green. Serve with a slice of lemon.

name: Lemon Joe
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon rum and Absolut Citron vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Lemon Lord
instructions: Pour the Lord Calvert into a tall 16-oz glass with a few ice cubes. Squeeze the juice from half a lemon with pulp into the glass. Fill with fresca. Serve.

name: Lemon Mint
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Lemon Rum
instructions: In a Collins glass, fill with ice, add Parrot Bay coconut rum and fill with your choice of lemonade or pink lemonade.

name: Lemon Sherry Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange slice, and serve.

name: Lemon Tree
instructions: Blend briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice in a highball glass. Add straws, and serve.

name: Lemon Twister
instructions: Shake together, stirring bruises the vodka.

name: Lemonade Lush
instructions: Mix ingredients in an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Lemonberry Twist
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a collins glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Lemony Summer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Lennart
instructions: Pour pear brandy and lime juice over ice in a glass. Fill with sprite.

name: Lennart #2
instructions: Pour pear brandy over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a slice of lime.

name: Leprechaun's Lunch
instructions: Pour the Bailey's irish cream, creme de menthe and creme de cacao over two ice cubes in a small (8-oz) highball glass or equivalent. Fill with milk, stir, and serve.

name: Lesbian Joy
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve with straws.

name: Lesbian Lover
instructions: Pour zima into a frozen pilsner. Add a shot of coconut rum and enjoy.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Lesbian Slumber Party
instructions: Fill blender with ice. Add ingredients and fill with milk. Blend, pour into chilled glass. Garnish with a marshmallow and serve.

name: Lethal Injection
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except grenadine and shake. Pour drink into collins glass. Drop grenadine into center of the drink.. Serve with an orange wedge.

name: Lethal Lemonade
instructions: Pour the vodka and lemonade over 3 ice cubes in a collins glass. Don't pour everything; first adjust proportions to desired strength, then serve.

name: Lethal Weapon
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a tall glass and serve with ice. As an option, use two cans of mountain dew if the drink seems too strong for you.

name: Letitia's Penisbutter Cup
instructions: Combine all ingredients, pour over ice, and enjoy.

name: Lewie
instructions: Fill a pilsner glass with ice. Add rum, amaretto and orange juice. Shake. Top with a splash of grenadine. Adjust rum and amaretto to taste.

name: Lexington Lemonade
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with two cherries.

name: Liberty Blue Champagne
instructions: Shake first 4 ingredients over ice and strain into a sugar rimmed champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

name: Libido
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Cointreau and Raspberry Vodka. Top off with sour and garnish with a cherry.

name: Lick and a Promise
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, Cointreau, cranberry juice and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle Midori melon liqueur on top, and serve.

name: Lick Me Silly
instructions: Place all indredents into a shaker, shake away....Pour into a glass of your choice, fill a 1/4 full, then top up with a little ice and lemonade. Serve with a straw and drink away.... this drink gets you blind drunk, trust me I know.

name: Lick out a Sheep
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass. Pour over finely shaven or crushed ice in a champagne flute or equivalent. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Lickalotapuss
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper watermelon pucker and 7-up into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Lace with amaretto, and serve.

name: Licorice Mist
instructions: Combine the sambuca, coconut liqueur and cream with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Use a black licorice stick, ends cut off, as a straw, and serve.

name: Licorice Twist
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Licorice Vyos
instructions: Chill both Jagermeister and Coke. Pour a shot of Jagermeister into chilled glass, then pour Coke over it. Drink through licorice straw, or eat licorice on the side.

name: Life Is Good
instructions: Pour Stoli Razberi and Sprite into a highball glass. Add a splash of cranberry juice and Red Bull energy drink, stir, and serve.

name: Light and Dark
instructions: Add rums, sour mix and ice to a shaker and shake. Pour into a whiskey sour glass or 10 oz. goblet. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Lightning Lemonade
instructions: Take a glass and fill it with ice and 3/4 lemonade. Then pour in the three shots and stir. Garnish with a lemon if desired.

name: Lil Naue
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a red wine glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Lilly Pad
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice, and stir well. Float the blue curacao on top. Cut a lime slice in the shape of a lilly pad and place on top, placing a small gummy frog candy on top of that to finish, and serve.

name: Lime Avenger
instructions: Pour the lime vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Lime Chiver
instructions: Muddle the fresh lime with the caster sugar, then add the liquors and shake with plenty of ice. Pour into a highball glass, add a dash of lemonade, and serve.

name: Lime Chu-Hai
instructions: Pour the shochu and lime juice over ice. Stir, and fill the glass with soda water.

name: Lime Giant
instructions: Build over ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Lime Lambada
instructions: Pour the lime liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cola, and serve.

name: Lime Rickey
instructions: Build all ingredients in a collins glass and top with soda. Garnish with a spiral of lime peel, and serve.

name: Lime Stripper
instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice, pour liqours in together, then fill with limeade.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Lime Vodka Collins
instructions: Fill a collins glass 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add vodka, lemon juice and sugar. Top with club soda.

name: Limestone Cocktail
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add collins mix, and stir well. Add lime juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Limey
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except lime twist) in a blender with approximately 1/2 cup of crushed ice. Blend at low speed. Serve in a champagne flute with a lime twist as garnish.

name: Limon and Ginger
instructions: Serve pre-chilled or on-the-rocks in a highball glass.

name: Limon Collins
instructions: Stir the Stoli Limonnaya vodka and lemon juice together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Limon Spritzer
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon into a collins glass. Fill with the can of Sprite. Add a piece of lemon, and serve.

name: Limon Squeeze
description: The Limon Squeeze, contributed by Karen Barteld, is a great refreshing lemon-flavored drink for the hot summer weather.Pour the Bacardi Limon into a highball glass. Fill with Sprite or 7-Up. Garnish with a lime, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon into a highball glass. Fill with Sprite or 7-Up. Garnish with a lime, and serve.

name: Limon Sunrise
instructions: Pour the Stoli Limonnaya vodka and orange juice into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Slowly add grenadine, stir gently, and serve.

name: Limonaide
instructions: Take a tall or short glass and fill with ice. Mix in the bacardi and the lemonade in equal parts.

name: LimonDew
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon rum and Mountain Dew over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Limongrad
instructions: Pour the lemon vodka and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Lindsey's Night Cap
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mug, and serve.

name: Linux Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola, garnish with lime peel, and serve.

name: Lion Tamer #2
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass. Add Sprite and a splash of lemon juice. Add ice, and serve.

name: Lipstick Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a small frosted hurricane glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Liquid After-Eight
instructions: Pour the creme de menthe into a highball glass. Fill the glass with cold chocolate-milk.

name: Liquid Babysitter
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Liquid Bakewell Tart
instructions: Pour the amaretto Di Saronno into a collins (highball) glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Newcastle Brown Ale. Stir and serve.

name: Liquid Big Red
instructions: Retrieve your choice cup and add ice. Once the ice is in, add the 2 oz. Goldschlager and then add the 2 oz. Jagermeister. Pour Dr. Pepper until the cup is full. Make sure to check out the foam, there should be gold flecks sitting on top of your drink.

name: Liquid Caramel
instructions: Pour the Bailey's irish cream, Kahlua coffee liqueur and butterscotch schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake quickly, and strain into a highball glass. Top with milk, stir well and serve.

name: Liquid Cocaine "Top Shelf"
description: This is as created by Julie at Pug Mahon's in Billings, MT. "Nobody else makes them like this, that I have ever found at least.  If it is made right it should have a refreshing pineapple/fruit punch flavor that goes down very smooth with little/no alcoholic bite."In a highball glass filled with crushed ice combine all ingredients except Grenadine, top with a splash of Grenadine syrup, straw, and serve.
instructions: In a highball glass filled with crushed ice combine all ingredients except Grenadine, top with a splash of Grenadine syrup, straw, and serve.

name: Liquid Cocaine #6
instructions: Mix together in a champagne flute and drink.

name: Liquid Cocaine 8-Ball
instructions: Mix together and wait for the effects.

name: Liquid Courage
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and liquify until shake-like consistancy. Serve in beer mugs.

name: Liquid Crystal
instructions: Shake everything except cola and grenadine in a cocktail shaker. Pour into glass and fill with cola. Top with grenadine.

name: Liquid Ecstasy
