instructions: Build bacardi, midori, blue curacao, lemon juice and pineapple juice in that order over ice in a highball glass, or shake and strain into a martini glass. Add a slice of lemon to either the highball glass or the rim of the martini glass. Serve with two straws.

name: Liquid Herpes
instructions: Pour the rum, goldschlager and milk into a highball glass. Stir ingredients. Pour tobasco sauce in after toasting and before drinking. Do not stir the tobasco sauce. Serve with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Liquid Jello
instructions: Mix kool-aid according to instructions. Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Pour in citrus vodka. Add kool-aid until glass is full.

name: Liquid Kryptonite
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Liquid Leg Spreader
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Liquid Marijuana
instructions: Put all measured ingredients in glass and fill the remainder with pineapple juice. Shake vigorously. Garnish with a flag.

name: Liquid Panty Dropper
instructions: Combine all alcoholic ingredients except peach schnapps. Fill most of the way with orange juice, leaving room for a few splashes of cranberry and pineapple juice and a float of peach schnapps on top. Garnish with two cherries.

name: Liquid Panty Remover #3
instructions: Vigorously shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Liquid Screw
instructions: Fill cup halfway with ice. Pour 2 shots of Rum, 2 shots of peach schnapps, 2 shots of vodka, fill with 7-up.

name: Liquid Sword
instructions: Mix liquors in a tall glass with ice and fill with orange juice.

name: Liquid Uranium
instructions: Stir ingredients together with 3 - 5 ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Liquid Valium
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, pour liquors and fill with equal parts orange and cranberry juice. Shake and serve with an orange and cherry garnish.

name: Lisa Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in glass with ice. Stir, add straw and umbrella (optional).

name: Lisa's Rooted Beer Float
instructions: First chill the Beer Mugs in the freezer. Place 2 oz. root beer schnapps in glass then the 1 oz. vanilla schnapps. Tilt glass and slowly pour in about 8 oz. of vanilla coke. Slowly set it upright and place two tablespoons of Cool Whip. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Lisa's Special
instructions: Measure a highball glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients and shake well. Pour drink into highball glass.

name: Lithium
instructions: Place the ice cubes in the bottom of a collins glass with the sugar. Add the vodka, followed by the milk. Stir and serve.

name: Lithium Motherfucker
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Litnos' Lemonade
instructions: Layer the Crown Royal Canadian Whisky and the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay over ice in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Fill with mountain dew, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Little Bastard
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Little Bigman
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice cubes.

name: Little Eva
instructions: Pour the Burgundy wine, triple sec, and lime (or lemon) juice over ice in a white wine glass. Stir, and add the soda. Stir again gently, and serve.

name: Little Green Frog
instructions: Prepare lemon-lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients. Pour over ice into hurricane glasses.

name: Liz's Lemonade
instructions: Fill pint glass half with ice. Crush mint with mortar and pestle or bottom of glass on a flat surface. Put mint on ice and fill the rest of the glass with ice. Pour in Tequila and then fill remainder with lemonade and stir.

name: Lizbuth
instructions: Pour the rum, amaretto, coconut cream, pineapple juice and half-and-half into a blender with 6 ice cubes. Blend well and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Loaded Doctor
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Loch Ness Mystery
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Lockhart Zoo
instructions: Shake all ingredients except beer in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over ice. Add beer on top.

name: Loco Lemonade
instructions: Pour in order; tequila, grenadine then lemonade into a highball glass with 4 ice cubes. Squeeze the lemon juice from roughly half a lemon over the top, and serve.

name: Loco Motion
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, DeKuyper Razzmatazz and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well, pour entire contents of the shaker into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Loftus Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime juice) well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, add lime juice, and serve.

name: Log Cabin
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with orange soda, and serve.

name: London Buck
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: London Bus
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, add a cherry, and serve.

name: London Fog
instructions: Shake gin and pernod with cracked ice. Strain into a red wine glass packed with shaved ice.

name: London Fog #2
instructions: Frappe in a highball glass.

name: London Freeze
instructions: Shake ice cream and gin in a cocktail shaker until sufficiently mixed. Pour into a collins glass and add carbonated water. Stir well.

name: London Iced Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a collins glass three-quarters filled with ice. Top with coca-cola and stir. Garnish a wedge of lemon, and serve.

name: Lone Tree Cooler
instructions:
Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. 

Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over the rim of the glass.

name: Lone Wolf
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice cubes and garnish with a cherry.

name: Lonely Night
instructions: Add the coffee liqueur, irish cream, hazelnut liqueur and vanilla ice cream to a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Long Beach Cocktail
instructions: Mix as a long island ice tea.

name: Long Beach Ice Tea
instructions: Garnish with fresh lime cuts.

name: Long Beach Iced Tea
instructions: In a tall glass, pour shots over ice and top off with cranberry juice and lemon wedge (squeeze if you like). Give the drink a little shake (if you like) and drink up!

name: Long Happiness
instructions: Muddle in the bottom of a boston shaker the ginger and pineapple. Add vodka, gin, and pineapple juice. Shake and strain into a collins glass, top with ginger beer, garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Long Island Cocktail
instructions: Combine and mix all ingredients in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Long Island Fruit Punch
instructions: Fill all ingredients in pint glass, give one quick shake and serve with ice.

name: Long Island Ice Tea (Low Cal)
description:
These directions are a combination of several comments made for the "Long Island Ice Tea recipe".

About 80 percent fewer calories and about 1/3 the carbs.  Nice when you have to watch your girlie figure.Take a long piece of lemon rind and twist it hard to release the oils in an empty glass, rub it around the inside of the glass, and throw it in the bottom.  Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top.
instructions: Take a long piece of lemon rind and twist it hard to release the oils in an empty glass, rub it around the inside of the glass, and throw it in the bottom.  Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
description: The Long Island Iced Tea (LIIT) is the basis of many elaborate mixed-drinks. It dates to the 70's, named after the continental USA's largest island Long Island, in New York. Although it doesn't contain tea, it's taste is similar. The drink sits in the top 5 of most popular cocktails and is regularly mentioned or seen served in television and films (worthy mentions are The Simpsons, Sex and the City and Cruel Intentions).Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.
instructions: Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.

name: Long Island Iced Tea - Premium
instructions: Mix all ingredients except Coke in a glass over ice.  Pour Coke slowly over mixture to give iced tea color.  Garnish with lemon/lime wedge.

name: Long Island Pucker
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Long Island Raspberry Iced Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients except raspberry liqueur in a cocktail shaker with a bit of ice. Pour into a highball glass. Carefully layer the raspberry liqueur on top and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Long Island Sunset
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass, shake, and strain into a highball glass. Add a cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Long Island Taxi
description: A popular cocktail at the Lakewood Lounge, Kansas City, Mo, where Long Island Taxi originated via a guy named Matt. Pour all liquors into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add orange juice to taste, and shake. Strain into shot glasses or a single highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Pour all liquors into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add orange juice to taste, and shake. Strain into shot glasses or a single highball glass, and serve.

name: Long Island Tea
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Long Island Tears
instructions: Pour 1 shot of each liquor into a tall glass filled with ice. Add 6 to 8 ounces of sour mix and a splash of Sprite. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon. Drink fast through a straw.

name: Long Iver Iced Tea
instructions: Pour liquor over ice. Fill 3/4 full with sour mix. Shake. Top with cola and add a lemon wedge.

name: Long River Tea
instructions: Add all ingredients (except Coke) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with Coke, stir lightly and serve.

name: Long Tall Cowboy
instructions: Pour the schnapps, Bailey's and milk into a cocktail shaker over the ice. Shake, then strain into a long frosted glass, and serve.

name: Long Vodka
instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Pour on the vodka, add a slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and serve.

name: Long Walk off a Short Pier
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall 16-oz glass filled with ice cubes. Top with Coca-cola, completely or to taste. Stir well, and serve.

name: Longaberger Lemonade
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice.

name: Longdog
description: Invented by Steve "Longdog" Kemmo on a late night session in Milan, May 2004. A merge of a Long Island and a Bulldog, Longdog is a surprisingly refreshing drink that hits the spot.Pour the gin, tequila, triple sec and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass, unstrained. Leave a little room at the top; fill with the lemonade. Stir briefly, garnish with lime and serve.
instructions: Pour the gin, tequila, triple sec and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass, unstrained. Leave a little room at the top; fill with the lemonade. Stir briefly, garnish with lime and serve.

name: Longhorn
instructions: Combine ingredients in a large glass.

name: Loopy Lemonade
instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add absolut citron, squeeze two lemon wedges and add three packages of sugar. Fill remainder of glass with 7-up and sweet and sour mix.

name: Loose Caboose
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice, and shake well. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Loudmouth
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice cubes.

name: Lounge Lizard
instructions: Pour the rum and amaretto into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with chilled cola, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Love Assounta
instructions: Mix all ingredients and shake it. Then put the mixing over 3 pieces of ice in a highball glass.

name: Love Byte
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour all contents into a highball glass. Garnish with a piece of pineapple and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Love in the Afternoon
instructions: Blend ingredients in a pina colada glass until smooth. Add half a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a strawberry, add straws, and serve.

name: Love Juice
instructions: First add rum, followed by other ingredients, and mix well. Serve on the rocks with an orange slice in a collins glass (approx. 14 oz.).

name: Love Juice #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Love Potion #69
instructions: Pour the coconut rum and peach schnapps into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice, and fill with cranberry juice. Splash rum on top, and serve.

name: Lovegin 'n Juice
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Lover's Kiss
instructions: Pour the amaretto, cherry brandy, brown creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well, and strain into a parfait glass. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Lover's Kiss #2
instructions: Fill a parfait glass with ice-cubes, add ingredients and stir until pink. Absente may be used instead of Absinthe with several dashes of wormwood extract.

name: Lover's Moon
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mason jar. Garnish with a couple of strawberries.

name: Lucka
instructions: Combine ingredients in your favorite blender. Blend until smooth. Add more sherbet for a thicker drink.

name: Lucky Driver
instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Garnish with one orange slice, and one lemon slice. Use only freshly squeezed juice for best results.

name: Lucky Seven
instructions: Combine the seven liquors, straight, into a tall glass. Top it with three splashes of cranberry, lime, and orange juices.

name: Lucky Stiff
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Ludvika Walker
instructions: Mix and add some ice.

name: Luftschlange
instructions: Shake all ingredients. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Lumumba
instructions: Stir ingredients together briefly in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Lunar Landing
instructions: Stir ingredients together well in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Lunchbox Lemonade
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass filled with ice cubes (or pre-chill ingredients), stir well, and serve.

name: Luscious Leslie
instructions: Pour equal shots of Malibu coconut rum, Southern Comfort, amaretto almond liqueur and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Fill the remainder of the glass with pineapple juice, and add just a splash of grenadine. Shake well to mix all ingredients, and serve.

name: Luscious Lou
description: Luscious Lou was made by Lou Rudy, general manager and bartender at Cafe Topsy and Dublin 6 in New York City (NYC), USA.Pour the Stoli Ohranj (orange vodka) into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Cointreau, orange juice and cranberry juice. Top off with club soda, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Stoli Ohranj (orange vodka) into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Cointreau, orange juice and cranberry juice. Top off with club soda, and serve.

name: Lutteur
instructions: Pour into a collins glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Luxor Boom-Boom
instructions:
Add all alcohols to a shaker with ice. Fill remaining space with 1/3 apple juice and 2/3 orange juice. Shake vigorously, strain into a highball glass and serve.

The most popular cocktail of Luxor Plaza. (a disco in Deventer - the Netherlands)

name: Lychee Cooler
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour mango rum, then splash the grenadine down side of glass to make it settle to bottom, then fill with 7-up. Garnish with a cherry.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: Lychee Love
instructions:
Blend all ingredients except grenadine with ice. Add grenadine down the side of the glass to create a 'sunrise' effect. 

Use pure mango juice as it is 100% fruit juice, instead of a mango nectar (~20% fruit juice) or mango fruit drink (~6%), as it improves the flavour.

More or less grenadine can be added to taste.

name: Lychee Nut Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, and blend well. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Lyndy
instructions: Shake with ice and serve.

name: Lynyrd Skynyrd
instructions: PourJim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add orange soda and orange juice, and stir. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: M.V.P.
instructions: Pour vodka, midori, and malibu into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Stir or shake.

name: Mac Dawg
instructions: Add a 1/2 can of Red Bull and 1 shot of vodka to a glass with some ice. Finally add a splash of grenadine.

name: MacAttack
instructions: Add gin and midori to a shaker with ice, and fill with equal parts of grape juice and club soda. Shake and strain over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Mach 6
instructions: Blend ingredients in a highball glass until smooth. Add three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a cherry, and serve with straws.

name: Machiavelli Pina Colada
instructions: Combine all ingredients togehter in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and empty contents into a pina-colada glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Machu Picchu
description:
Reminiscent of a tequila sunrise, this Peruvian-born cocktail ;- named after one of the most exquisite places on earth - is quite festive! It's deep green (thanks to a bit of creme de menthe) on the top and orange in the middle, and the grenadine sits on the bottom (but soon starts to rise). This is a fun cocktail to make and serve with colorful straws and umbrellas.Fill a tall glass with ice cubes. Pour in 1 ounce of the pisco, the orange juice and the grenadine. In a cocktail shaker, combine the remaining pisco, creme de menthe and three ice cubes and shake well (this will lighten the creme de menthe so that it floats on the top).

Pour on top of the orange juice mixture in the tall glass and add a straw, but don't stir or the colors will blend together.
instructions:
Fill a tall glass with ice cubes. Pour in 1 ounce of the pisco, the orange juice and the grenadine. In a cocktail shaker, combine the remaining pisco, creme de menthe and three ice cubes and shake well (this will lighten the creme de menthe so that it floats on the top).

Pour on top of the orange juice mixture in the tall glass and add a straw, but don't stir or the colors will blend together.

name: Machu Picchu
description:
Invented in one of the many disco/bars in Cuzco, a beautifull city in Peru famous for having been tha capital of the Inca empire and very popular among tourists, as from there you can get to the lost city of Machu Picchu.1. Fill a 12-oz highball glass half way up with orange juice. Pour some grenadine syrup carefully... it should go straight to the bottom, not mixing with the orange juice. 

2. Gently place two ice cubes on the highball glass and then, in a mixing glass, mix the pisco with a mint liqueur. Pour the pisco/mint mixture very slowly over the ice cubes, so that it floats without mixing with the orange and/or grenadine.

3. You should get a beautifull red-orange-green cocktail. When serving, instruct your guests to drink it from a straw, pulling it up as they drink, in order to get the three different flavours.
instructions:
1. Fill a 12-oz highball glass half way up with orange juice. Pour some grenadine syrup carefully... it should go straight to the bottom, not mixing with the orange juice. 

2. Gently place two ice cubes on the highball glass and then, in a mixing glass, mix the pisco with a mint liqueur. Pour the pisco/mint mixture very slowly over the ice cubes, so that it floats without mixing with the orange and/or grenadine.

3. You should get a beautifull red-orange-green cocktail. When serving, instruct your guests to drink it from a straw, pulling it up as they drink, in order to get the three different flavours.

name: Mackenzie
instructions: Throw a few rocks into a collins glass. Squeeze in a segment of lime (about 1/2 oz). Pour the Bombay Sapphire gin into the glass and add the cranberry juice. Top up with orange juice and throw in the other segment of lime. Pain free and delicious.

name: Mad Bomber
instructions: Pour the gin into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola, stir well, and serve.

name: Mad Russian
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add 1 shot each of vodka and Kahlua and 1/2 shot each of Baileys and butterscotch and fill with milk. Shake or stir.

name: Maddress
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add the juices, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Madras
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except lime wedge) into a highball glass over ice. Add the lime wedge and serve.

name: Maestro
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, sherry, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice and top with the ginger ale. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: MagFest Mule
instructions: Mix equal amounts of each ingredient and pour into test tube chill before serving.

name: Maggie's Yellow Skoda
instructions: Chop up the two bananas and place in a blender with the creme de bananes, galliano and vanilla ice cream. Blend until frothy and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of banana, sit back and enjoy!

name: Magic Dew
instructions: Mix equal parts blue maui and mountain dew in a hurricane glass.

name: Magic Mountain Dew
instructions: Pour the Absolut Citron vodka and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with mountain dew, stir briefly and serve.

name: Magic Pixie
instructions: Fill a 10-oz highball glass with ice. Add the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps, DeKuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps and Jacquins peach schnapps. Fill the remainder of the glass with an even amount of Sprite and Ocean Spray cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Magic Punch
instructions: Add ingredients to an ice-filled collins glass and shake.

name: Magic Spritzer
instructions: Stir ingredients over crushed ice in a wine glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Magic Trick
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a pint glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Magic Woman
instructions: Pour blue curacao, rum and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Blend briefly, fill with sprite and add a splash of lemon juice.

name: Magic's Tornado
instructions: Shake well with ice and serve in a highball glass with a slice of green lemon.

name: Magnolia Blossom
instructions: Pour the gin, cream and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mahwah Iced Tea
instructions: Add the whiskey and southern comfort to a highball glass. Fill with iced tea, and drop in a couple of ice cubes.

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Pour light rum, creme de almond and triple sec, in order, into a collins glass. Almost fill with equal parts of sweet and sour mix and pineapple juice. Add dark rum, a large straw, and serve unstirred.

name: Mai Tai #2
instructions: Pour the white rum, orgeat syrup, triple sec and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #3
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass with a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #5
instructions: Combine all ingredients (sugar to taste) in a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #6
instructions: Pour the rums, orgeat and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Mai Tai Mai
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, apricot liqueur, pineapple juice and grenadine into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add the soda, stir gently, and serve.

name: Mai Tai Swizzle
instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Add the spent lime shell and swizzle briefly. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and mint sprigs.

name: Maiden Head
instructions: Mix chilled ingredients; cherry brandy, 7-up and snapple with a stirring stick. Top with whipped cream and a cherry in a white wine glass.

name: Maiden's Dream
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with/without ice, and serve.

name: Maier Special
instructions: Pour the vodka, blackberry brandy and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mail Man's Daughter
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort and peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of sour mix and lemon-lime soda. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Makers Mark Punch
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher, serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Maktak Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice; strain into a collins glass. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Malaria Killer
instructions: Pour campari into highball glass over ice, add the tonic water and stir with a spoon. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Malaysian Pina Colada
description: The Malaysian Pina Colada is a favorite recipe of at the University of Chicago's Compton House.Combine ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Pour into a pina-colada glass, and serve with a straw.
instructions: Combine ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Pour into a pina-colada glass, and serve with a straw.

name: Mali P&S
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice, and serve.

name: Malibootie
instructions: Combine ingredients in a container. A bottle with a sport top can be put in the freezer to create a nice slushie effect.

name: Malibu and Soda
instructions: Mix in a cup with ice.

name: Malibu Barbie
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Malibu Barbie #2
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with pink lemonade, stir and serve with a straw.

name: Malibu Bay Breeze
instructions: Blend ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Malibu Breeze
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the grenadine and top with pineapple juice. Stir and serve.

name: Malibu Cherry
instructions: Stir ingredients together with 3 or 4 ice cubes in a highball glass. Add 2 or 3 maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Malibu Creme
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: Malibu Delight
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Malibu Dew
instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass. Fill with mountain dew, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Malibu Dreams
instructions: Combine the malibu and grenadine. Fill with 7-up or lemon-lime soda.

name: Malibu Express
instructions: Blend and serve on ice.

name: Malibu Fizz
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add Malibu, then cranberry and top with Fresca. Serve with lime garnish.

name: Malibu Fun
instructions: Mix equal parts of coconut rum and cranberry together.

name: Malibu Heaven
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Malibu Hooter
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, and mix ingredients in order. Stir well and enjoy!

name: Malibu Italian Surfer
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice.

name: Malibu Jane
instructions: In a mason jar, pour in the coconut rum. Add milk, three teaspoons of cocoa powder, and let stand for one minute.

name: Malibu Juice
instructions: Pour the malibu rum into a glass and fill with fruit juice; orange, pineapple or banana.

name: Malibu Milk Shake
instructions: Add malibu rum, sugar and your desired amount of ice to a blender. Fill with milk, and blend until smooth with a frothy head. Serve in glasses immediately.

name: Malibu Mocha Milkshake
instructions: Add malibu rum and sugar to a hurricane glass. Fill to three-quarters full with milk, and whip to blend. Add creme de cacao, stir, and drop in 3 - 4 ice cubes.

name: Malibu Mojito
instructions: Muddle lime wedges, mint leaves, and sugar with a splash of club soda. Fill glass with ice and add the Malibu rum & 1 oz. club soda. Shake all ingredients together. Try not to shake too hard so you don't flatten the soda.

name: Malibu Peach
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a highball glass. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Malibu Pink Panther
instructions: Crush a hand full or two of ice into a blender, add the frozen pink lemonade and malibu rum, and blend for 30 seconds or until smooth-like consistensy. Add in your desired amount of whipped cream and blend further until smooth. Serve.

name: Malibu Pop
instructions: Shake malibu rum and blue curacao in a cocktail shaker. Add the juices, and pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Malibu Punch
instructions: Pour malibu rum into an ice-filled collins glass and fill with pineapple juice. Add grenadine and a splash of 7-up.

name: Malibu Reggae Rainbow
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Pour in the Malibu rum, then Midori melon liqueur (which will sink to the bottom). Gently pour in pineapple juice. Do not shake. Gently splash in a bit of cranberry juice. Do not mix. Drink will be layered, from top to bottom; green, yellow, red.

name: Malibu Rum Rusher
instructions: Combine the Malibu coconut, pineapple and mango rum with the orange juice and grenadine in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy; add more ice if required. Pour into a pina-colada glass, and serve.

name: Malibu Screw
instructions: Add chilled orange juice to vodka and malibu rum over ice (if desired).

name: Malibu Seven
instructions: Mix the 7-up and rum together in a cup of ice.

name: Malibu Smash
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass with ice, mix, and serve.

name: Malibu Summer Splash
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Malibu Sunrise
instructions:
Pour malibu rum in a highball glass, and top with orange juice. Stir. 

Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side. (by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly) 

The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Enjoy!

name: Malibu Sunset
instructions: Pour Malibu rum into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Add pineapple juice and orange juice. Top off with a splash of cranberry juice, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Malibu Surfer
instructions: Pour above listed ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Malibu Twist
instructions: Fill glass 1/2 full of ice. Pour in Malibu Rum. Next add 7-up and OJ, then stir. Add splash of Grenadine for color.

name: Malibu Twister
instructions: Pour malibu rum into a glass, and add tropicana; orange, strawberry or pineapple. Add cranberry juice, and stir.

name: Malibu Woo Woo
instructions: Add the vodka and Malibu to a cocktail shaker with ice, shake vigorously. Pour into a chilled highball glass and top up with cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Malibu Zinger
description: The Malibu Zinger is a fantastic drink created by Paul Brunelle, Edmonton, Canada 10 years ago, and most people who like cocktails say it is the best they've ever had. Great on summer nights, and not at all complicated.Pour Malibu rum and peach schnapps into a hurricane glass three-quarters filled with ice. Slide down 2 drops of grenadine to the bottom. Add equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice, leaving a little room at the top. Add a dollop of whipped cream, and drizzle grenadine down it. Ask the recipient to stir in the whipped cream before trying.
instructions: Pour Malibu rum and peach schnapps into a hurricane glass three-quarters filled with ice. Slide down 2 drops of grenadine to the bottom. Add equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice, leaving a little room at the top. Add a dollop of whipped cream, and drizzle grenadine down it. Ask the recipient to stir in the whipped cream before trying.

name: Malibu Zombie
description: An old fashioned Zombie, except the juices have been replaced with flavored rum. Certainly gets the job done.First add the gold and dark rum, stir, then add the five Malibu rums. Stir again, then serve in a collins glass with ice. Add the half ounce of Bacardi 151 and it's complete!
instructions: First add the gold and dark rum, stir, then add the five Malibu rums. Stir again, then serve in a collins glass with ice. Add the half ounce of Bacardi 151 and it's complete!

name: Malibulicious
instructions: Put the drinks and the syrup in the glass. Fill in with the 7-up.

name: Mallis 97
instructions: Shake ingredients in a glass with a few ice cubes.

name: Mama Mia #2
instructions: Heat up the coffee and coffee brandy. Add the vodka cold, and top the mug up with whipped cream.

name: Mamacita
instructions: Pour malibu rum, passoa and cointreau into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with guava syrup and shake well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple chunk.

name: Mambo's Dream
instructions: Pour the dark rum, banana liqueur, juices and triple sec into a highball glass filled with crushed or shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mamie Gilroy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Mamie's Sister
instructions: Pour the gin and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir well, and serve.

name: Man in the Melon
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, vodka, Cointreau, lemon-lime soda and club soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Man-Bull
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour one shot of orange vodka. Next add approx. 1/3 can of red bell. Then fill remainder of glass with 7-up and cranberry juice.

name: Mancran Cocktail
instructions: Shake or stir with ice cubes. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Mandarin Crush
instructions: Add absolut mandrin to an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with orange soda.

name: Mandarin Mojito
instructions: Add mint and lime wedge into Collins glass, then muddle. Fill glass with ice. Add half Sprite (or 7-up) and the other half with sweet and sour mix. Shake in mixing tin and pour.

name: Mandarin Split
instructions: Shake once, and strain into a collins glass.

name: Mandarin Sunrise
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mandarin Sunrise
instructions: Combine absolut mandrin, peach schnapps and juices in a shaker with ice. Pour into a collins glass, fill with 7-up and stir. Sink the grenadine and garnish with a twist of lime.

name: Mandarine Imperiale
instructions: Shake mandarine, egg white, lemon juice and syrup well and strain into a wine glass. Pour in the champagne.

name: Mandarine Passion
instructions: Pour mandarine napoleon and gin into a highball glass and fill with passion fruit juice. Add two cubes of ice and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Mandarine Summertime
instructions: Pour mandarine napoleon and gin into a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Add a touch of grenadine, two cubes of ice and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Mandelbrot
instructions: Shake ingredients (except lemon wedge) with ice; strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Mandeville-Polar
instructions: Funnel the rums, pernod, lemon juice and grenadine into one small cola bottle (185-200ml), roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard, stein or british pint), and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle.

name: Mandy Sea
instructions: Blend the amaretto, triple sec, sour mix and juices in a mixing cup. Pour over ice in a collins glass and top with grenadine and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with a flag or two cherries.

name: Mango Bellini
instructions: Fill a champagne flute one-third full with mango juice. Top with champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of mango.

name: Mango Champagne
instructions: Combine mango juice and champagne in a champagne flute. Add a few cubes of mango and a few ice cubes.

name: Mango Chimp
instructions: Pour mango juice and milk into a highball glass. Stir, add rum, and serve.

name: Mango Daiquiri
instructions: Combine the rum, orange curacao, mango pieces and sour mix in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Pour into a tall glass, garnish with a mango stick and serve.

name: Mango Daiquiri #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend for a short time at a high speed. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish with a cherry and straw. Serve.

name: Mango Mixer
instructions: Add 3 ice cubes to a 12-oz highball glass, then add the gin, mango juice and orange juice. Top the drink off with a dash of lemon juice. Serve.

name: Mango Mosa
instructions: Pour the mango liqueur and mango juice into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, garnish with a slice of star-fruit, and serve.

name: Mango Sour Candy Apple
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Mango Sunrise
instructions: Pour the mango liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, and top with grenadine. Serve unstirred.

name: Mango Tango
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Manhandler
instructions: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Manhattan Iced Tea
instructions: Fill a collins with ice. Add and mix all ingredients. Garnish with a lemon, and serve.

name: Manila Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes, and serve.

name: Manila Flame
instructions: Pour the Manila dark rum, juices, passion-fruit nectar and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a pilsner glass, and serve.

name: Manilla Gorilla
instructions: Combine the vanilla vodka, banana liqueur and cream in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake gently. Serve in highball or shot glasses.

name: Mansion Mind Eraser
instructions: Pour the kahlua, bailey's and rum over ice cubes in a collins glass, and fill with 7-up. Serve with two straws.

name: Maple's Antigel
instructions: Boil water. Add gin, pure Maple Syrup and boiling water to a coffee mug.

name: Maraschino Collins
instructions: Pour the vodka, fresh lemon juice and sweetened maraschino juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a tall glass (12-16 oz) half-filled with crushed ice. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry. Add a teaspoon of sugar optional. Serve.

name: March Madness On Crack
instructions: Mix everything together and drink it.

name: Marcos
instructions: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in a highball glass. Fill the glass with crushed ice cubes. Pour the tequila and the grapefruit juice into the glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Mardi Gras Flasher
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with/without ice. Add more grenadine if desired, stir again and serve.

name: Maria's Delight
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender with ice cubes. Pour into a highball glass and fill up with ginger ale.

name: Marianne
instructions:
1. Blend strawberries, raspberries and apple juice until slushy.

2. Fill champagne flutes half way with the fruit mix. Fill the remainder of the glasses with champagne, and stir until champagne and fruit mix are mixed.

3. Top each off with whipped cream (optional).

name: Marilyn's Green Thing
instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice, then add liquors and a splash of pineapple juice. Top off with sour mix, pour everything into a strainer, shake well, pour back into glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice, if available.

name: Marmalade Highball
instructions: Pour the curacao into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Maroon Lipstick
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Marrakech Express
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a collins glass.

name: Marryat's Mint Julep
instructions: Add ingredients to a collins glass and fill with crushed ice. Mix gently, rum rim with a piece of fresh pineapple, and serve.

name: Marsupial
instructions: Combine raspberry Sour Puss and banana liqueur in a collins glass. Top with 7-Up(to taste), ice and orange or lemon slice.

name: Martian Sex Monster
instructions: Blend the galliano, cognac, and ice cream briefly in a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle the melon liqueur on top, and serve with straws.

name: Martini Bovine
instructions: Place Martini & Rossi vermouth and white wine into a beer mug. Mix the two together, add vodka and top off with Strongbow. Serve.

name: Marvin The Martian
instructions: Pour the cherry-flavored brandy into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Mary Poppins
instructions: Pour the dark rum, apricot brandy and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well and pour into a collins glass. Top up with ice and drizzle the creme de cassis and grenadine over the top. Serve.

name: Mary's Dream
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec, orange juice and orange bitters into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Marzo Madness
instructions: Pour the Jose Cuervo into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the rum and top with lemon juice. Serve.

name: Masculating Madness
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice.

name: Mashed Kermit
instructions: Prepare vodka jelly as on the packet of jello, however substitute vodka in place of the water (required additional vodka to above). Mix the above liquids; vodka, blue curacao and orange juice in a highball glass. Drop a lump of the prepared jelly into the glass, and down the entire drink.

name: Massacre
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Masterblaster
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Matrix's Blue Pill
instructions: Add ice into the shaker and then, add the following liquors. Shake for 20 sec. Pour using a strainer into a low ball glass or a hurricane glass. Add a lemon slice for decoration.

name: Matt's Tropical Punch
instructions: Build on the rocks and stir with a straw.

name: Matteress
instructions: Pour vodka over a few ice cubes in a highball glass, followed by orange juice. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Matti Nyknen
instructions: Shake the vodka, lemon juice and sugar with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Matty's Magic Mixture
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mug and stir until fizzy.

name: Maui Breeze
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple spear, a cherry and an orchid, and serve.

name: Maui Cocktail
instructions: Add the Mountain Dew Code Red to a highball glass over ice, then add in the rum, and serve.

name: Maui Eruption
instructions: Pour the Maui schnapps and Malibu rum into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Maui Fizz
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Maui Twist
instructions: Blend everything (except lemon wedge) together until smooth, and pour into glasses. Garnish with lemon wedges.

name: May Blossum Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Mazerati
instructions: Pour the absolut citron into a highball glass, balance with cranberry juice and top with a little 7-up. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Mazrick
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: McGuire's Fuzzy Irishman
instructions: Add to a highball glass with/without ice.

name: McShake
instructions: Combine in a blender - chocolate syrup to taste. Blend until desired thickness.

name: Mean Green Love Making Machine
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker, shake, and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Mean Green Machine
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Mean Machine
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Medinah
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Mix well in glass and serve.

name: Medusa Punch
instructions: Fill a container (size of an iced-tea pitcher) almost halfway with ice. Fill to slightly above ice with a decent California White Zinfandel. Add one part peach schnapps, and a splash of sour mix. Fill the remaining space (should be a little less than a quarter of the pitcher) with cranberry juice. Seal and shake vigourously. Serve in glasses.

name: Meema
instructions: Into a glass, add 1 part amaretto, 1 part peach schnapps, and 1 part vodka. Then, add 3 parts cranberry juice and serve with or without ice.

name: Mega Mixer
instructions: Stir everything together.

name: Meister Mind Meld
instructions: Pour the coca-cola into a highball glass. Add the amaretto, and drop in an ice cube.

name: Mekong
instructions: Mix the first ten ingredients (malibu, peach, strawberry, banana, melon, blue, orange juice, pineapple juice, pina mix, 7-up) in a shaker. Pour into a hurricane glass, then top with cream. Serve with fresh fruit (except lime), and some filberts if desired.

name: Mel's Summersault
instructions: Pour the vodka, creme de cassis and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add grapefruit juice, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mel's Swing
instructions: Shake all three ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Melanie Pimm
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with slices of orange, lemon and lime speared with a cherry, and serve with straws.

name: Melberry
instructions: Pour midori, chambord and raspberry juice into a shaker. Add a squeeze of lemon and lime juice. Shake, and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Mellow Hiker
instructions: Combine alcohol over ice and add mountain dew. Stir and garnish with a melon ball if desired.

name: Melon Ball
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a melon ball and a slice of lime on a stick, and serve with straws.

name: Melon Breeze
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Pour in the Malibu coconut rum. Fill with pineapple juice, top with Midori melon liqueur, and serve.

name: Melon Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a pina colada glass with a slice of pineapple, cherry and straws.

name: Melon Daiquiri
instructions: Blend ingredients with a handful of ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a large goblet, garnish with melon balls, and serve.

name: Melon Island
instructions: Combine the vodka, pisang ambon, passion-fruit liqueur, vanilla ice cream and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, slice of lemon and mint sprig, and serve.

name: Melon Madness
instructions: Mix all ingredients above, pour in pineapple juice last. Serve over ice.

name: Melon Man
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda) with ice; strain into a highball glass with ice. Fill with lemon-lime soda.

name: Melon Pants
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add the ingredients and stir. Garnish with a chunk of watermelon if desired.

name: Melon Patch
instructions: Stir the melon liqueur, triple sec and vodka together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Melon Spritz
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with soda, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Melon Tonic
instructions: Add vodka, melon liqueur, and lemon juice over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake 3-4 times, then add tonic water or club soda and shake once. Strain into cocktail glass or pour over ice into a highball glass.

name: Melonade #2
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the lemonade, and top with grenadine. Garnish with a lemon or a cherry, and serve.

name: Melonball
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur and vodka into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice, or orange juice.

name: Meloncholy Baby
instructions: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Memory Loss
instructions: Pour the rum and the vodka over ice into the glass, and then add the rum. Then pour in the apple juice and squeeze the lemon on the top. Do not stir.

name: Menstrual Cycle
instructions: Pour the sour lemonade into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the sloe gin (see how pretty they "bleed together") then add the vodka. Stir and serve.

name: Merry Widow Fizz
instructions: Shake ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Mess You Up
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Metromelt
instructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste in a large mug. Add liquors, top with whipped cream, sprinkle with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Mexican Bike Race
instructions: Pour everything into a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Mexican Cappuccino
instructions: In a large coffee mug, pour the kahlua and tequila into the bottom. Brew cappuccino per the instructions for your machine. Fill the cup with espresso, top with the frothed milk and serve.

name: Mexican Colada
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Mexican Dew
instructions: Pour the tequila into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Mountain Dew, stir gently and serve.

name: Mexican Dream
instructions: Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur, milk and ice cream in a blender. Blend until milk-like consistency. Pour into a hurricane glass, add straws, and serve.

name: Mexican Flag
instructions:
Carefully layer ingredients into a highball glass (using a spoon), in the order given; grenadine, creme de menthe, tequila. 

The layers form the mexican flag.

name: Mexican Grasshopper
instructions: Shake the green creme de menthe, Kahlua coffee liqueur and light cream with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Kelman
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Mexican Missile Sunrise
instructions: Shake ingredients together, pour in glass with crushed ice. Garnish with fresh strawberry and straw.

name: Mexican Mocha
instructions: Combine the espresso, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and chili pepper in the bottom of your coffee mug. Add the alcohol and chocolate. Stir with the cinnamon stick. Add hot water, milk/cream optional, drink and enjoy!

name: Mexican Mountain
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Mexican Riptide
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mexican Screw
instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mexican Virgin
instructions: Pour into a mixing glass and stir. Serve in an 8 oz. glass over ice.

name: Mexican Wife Beater
instructions: Pour the lemon juice, gold tequila and triple into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a beer glass. Fill glass with Stella Artois lager, and serve.

name: Mexicola
instructions: Pour tequila and juice of lime over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with cola, stir, and serve.

name: Miami Beach
instructions: Mix ingredients together, over ice, in a collins glass. Pour into a shaker. Shake a couple times and pour ingredients back into glass. Garnish with lemon.

name: Miami Hurricane
instructions: Mix with ice cubes in a hurricane glass.

name: Miami Ice
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except peach schnapps) into a beer mug. Stir gently, and almost-fill with ice. Add peach schnapps, and serve.

name: Miami Iced Tea
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Micheal's Downfall
instructions: Pour the rum and grenadine into a glass over 4 ice cubes. Fill with equal parts orange and cranberry juice.

name: Michelle's Indigo
instructions: Shake everything but blue curacao, 7-up and sugar in a shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in sugar and fill with 7-up. Drop the blue curacao into the center of the drink and serve without stirring.

name: Mickey's Fin
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mid-Summer Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange juice) together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, add orange juice and serve.

name: Midland Mayham
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a beer mug / pint glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Midnight Flight to Malibu
instructions: Build with ice. Can be shaken, or left layered.

name: Midnight Kiss
instructions: Pour the vodka into a sugar-rimmed champagne flute and fill the rest of the glass with Champagne. Top with the Curacao, and serve.

name: Midnight Lemonade
instructions: Combine berry tattoo schnapps and lemonade in a collins glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of 7-up, and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Midnight Liaison
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, parfait amour and lastly the lemonade into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Drop in the grenadine at the side of the glass so that it sinks to the bottom, and serve.

name: Midnight Martini
instructions: Stir the gin and vermouth together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a black olive, and serve.

name: Midnight Martini #2
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass, Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Midori 2000
instructions: Build over ice and garnish with a pineapple wedge, three pineapple leaves, and two cherries.

name: Midori Champagne
instructions: Stir together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Strain into a champagne glass, and serve.

name: Midori Chan
instructions: Add ingredients to a blender with ice and mix until desired consistency is achieved. Strain into a highball glass with/without ice.

name: Midori Colada
instructions: Blend ingredients. Best served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: Midori Dream
instructions: Pour the vodka and Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with chilled Sprite, stir gently and serve.

name: Midori Ecstacy
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, rum, blue curacao and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with pineapple juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Midori Green Russian
instructions: Pour midori and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream, to taste.

name: Midori Illusion
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, vodka, Bacardi white rum, Cointeau, blue curacao and pineapple juice (to taste) into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with lemonade, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Midori Madness
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except sweet and sour mix) in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour entire contents into a hurricane glass, top with sour mix and serve.

name: Midori Mai Tai
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Midori Mimosa
instructions: Pour midori melon liqueur and sweet and sour mix into a champagne flute. Add champagne.

name: Midori Pearl Diver
instructions: Add Midori and Malibu to a highball glass full of ice. Fill glass with pineapple juice. Stir and serve.

name: Midori Sour
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the midori, sour mix and sprite, give a quick stir, and add cherries.

name: Midori Sour #2
instructions: Pour midori into a highball glass, add sweet and sour until three-quarters full, and fill with sprite. Stir.

name: Midori Sour Ultra
instructions: Mix ingredients in a boston shaker with cracked ice. In a highball glass or champagne flute (optional), fill glass three quarters full with ice. Pour one tablespoon of cherry juice into the glass before pouring in mixed ingredients. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and lemon wedge. Drink through a straw.

name: Midori Splice
instructions: Build all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Float fresh cream last.

name: Midori Sun
instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into a hurricane glass. Vary lemon-lime mix to taste. Garnish with a lime wedge or a cherry, a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Midweek Tweak
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Mig Cocktail
instructions: Fill a glass with ice and add the ingredients. Works well with any fruit juice.

name: Migration
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass over ice.

name: Mike Davis
instructions: Pour the gin into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Combine the grenadine, sugar and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into the collins glass. Add club soda, stir gently, and serve.

name: Mike's Bloody Mary
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka, celery salt, pepper, hot sauce, steak sauce and worcestershire. Add pickle juice (or try pepper juice) and then tomato juice. Stir, then add horseradish and stir again. Celery, pickels, and olives make great garnish!

name: Mike's Chocolate Pudding
instructions: Pour kahlua and irish cream into a collins glass three-quarters filled with ice. Add coke, then the cream. Stir together. Top off with a small shot of whipped cream.

name: Mike's Cosmopolitan
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mike's Long Beach
instructions: Shake all the ingredients, except the cranberry juice, with ice and strain into a hurricane glass filled 3/4 with ice. Top with cranberry juice and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Mike's Red Menace
instructions: Add vodka to the highball glass. Pour red Orange juice over it until it fills 60% of the glass. Add tequila and more orange juice until the glass is full. Splash a bit of lemon juice in everything and add a tablespoon of sugar. Stir and garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Mike's Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients together and serve in a glass.

name: Mikey Mike
instructions: Mix ingredients in a tumbler and shake thoroughly. Pour over ice in a tall glass.

name: Mikey's Grape Drink
instructions: Pour the vodka into an empty mixing glass, and add cran-grape juice and lemon-lime soda. Stir, then pour into a collins glass with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mile Highball
instructions: Pour into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Add lemon twist and serve.

name: Miles
description:
This cocktail was invented in honour of a barman by the name of Miles at the University of Aberdeen Student Union bar 'Sivells' (now defunct) during the 1990's. Usual UK Imperial measurements (25 ml/ 35 ml) are intented to be used, as the drink was made at the time with each of the 35 ml measurements being doubled.

Some drinkers like to top up the lemonade once the drink is partially drunk.Take an Imperial pint / 0.5 lt glass and add in several ice cubes. Pour the Midori liqueur, vodka & peach scnapps over the ice and then add the lemonade to fill the glass to the top. Give the mix a gentle stir & it is ready to drink.
instructions: Take an Imperial pint / 0.5 lt glass and add in several ice cubes. Pour the Midori liqueur, vodka & peach scnapps over the ice and then add the lemonade to fill the glass to the top. Give the mix a gentle stir & it is ready to drink.

name: Milhaus
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice. Serve with some orange slices.

name: Milk 'n' Cookies
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass. Fill with milk.

name: Milk of Amnesia
instructions: Add ice cold champagne to a champagne flute, and slowly add chilled chambord until desired raspberry flavor is achieved. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Milk Punch
instructions: Shake liquors and milk with cracked ice and sugar syrup and strain into a chilled highball glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Milk Shake 43
instructions: Pour licor 43 over ice, shake and strain into a highball glass. Vary ingredients to taste.

name: Milk Tooth
instructions: Pour jack daniels, creme de cacao, blackcurrant cordial and sweet and sour into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an iced collins glass. Add pineapple juice, place shaker over the glass and give one hard shake; up and down. Remove shaker and serve.

name: Milky Nooky
instructions: Shake and serve in a highball glass.

name: Milky Way
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker, shake, and serve with cut apple, lemon, and pineapple-leaves.

name: Miller's Killer Cocktail
instructions: Fill a glass 3/4 full of ice. Pour cherries and cherry juice over ice. Add lime vodka and sprite. Shake once briskly to mix and get a fizz on top of the drink. Serve.

name: Milnd's
instructions: Pour the mountain dew and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Stir, add the grenadine (without stirring), and serve.

name: Milpsi
instructions: Pour milk into a highball glass, add the pepsi and drink before seperation occurs.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into a collins glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir very gently, and serve.

name: Mimosa Moon
instructions: Chill all ingredients. Pour into champange flute.

name: Mind Bomb
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Mind Over Marny
instructions: Pour vodka into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Add the juices, and top with club soda.

name: Minerstown Sling
instructions: Add together with ice and stir.

name: Minnesota Slammer
instructions: Layer the cherry brandy, peach schnapps and apple schnapps in a large hurricane glass. Add sour mix on top, fill the remainder with Sprite, and serve.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all ingredients and fill to the top with cream.

name: Mint Chocolate Dream
instructions: Pour the peppermint schnapps, godiva liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a highball glass. Fill with ice cold milk, and serve.

name: Mint Chocolate Dream
instructions: Pour the Bailey's Irish cream, creme de menthe and hot chocolate into a mug. Top with whipped cream, and shaved chocolate pieces (optional), and serve.

name: Mint Chocolate Milk
instructions: Heat milk approx 1.5 minutes in microwave. Then mix all ingredients and serve.

name: Mint Collins
instructions: Shake gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add slices of orange and lemon, top with a cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Mint Highball
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Muddle mint leaves, powdered sugar, and water in a collins glass. Fill the glass with shaved or crushed ice and add bourbon. Top with more ice and garnish with a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.

name: Mint Mojito
description:
"This drink comes from Cuba, where the produce is readily available. It's my favorite drink to have, upscale and unique. When you go out you'll find that most places won't make it because fresh mint is hard to come by, but if you're ever in the grocery store, check the produce section. If they have it try it out.

Its a light, refreshing drink thats great to have poolside, or with anything. It cools that hot sticky feeling in your mouth, with smooth mint and tangy lime, its a great balance between bitter, sweet, and mint.

You can also try adding in other fresh fruits when you muddle, and use their  liquors or bitters to bring out their flavors.

Try using fresh strawberries, or raspberries and raspberry vodka. "In a highball glass, drop the limes, then mint, and add the sugar. 
Muddle together, but don't break down the mint too much, otherwise, You'll be sipping mint bits. If you don't have muddler, you can use a wooden spoon, or the bottom of an ice cream scoop handle. You want to basically crush the juice out of the limes, while using the sugar to grind against the limes and mint to release their oils and flavors. You're not trying to dissolve the sugar here.

Next pour in the alcohol. I like grey goose because its particularly light, you can use whatever you have on hand, or use 3 oz of Barcardi Limon in place of the light rum and grey goose.

Some people add the ice here, but I don't recommend it, because if you do, then the sugar is hard to dissolve, and you end up sipping grains of sugar, so rather, stir with a bartender's swizzle stick, or whatever you have on hand, don't shake though, cause it'll damage the mint, breaking it apart. 

Once the sugar is dissolved (you can usually tell after about 20 vigorous stirs, or when you look at the bottom of the glass and see no sediment), and lots of ice, and top off with club soda, about 3 oz or just to the top.

Stir to mix in the club soda, and drop in a straw and enjoy!
instructions:
In a highball glass, drop the limes, then mint, and add the sugar. 
Muddle together, but don't break down the mint too much, otherwise, You'll be sipping mint bits. If you don't have muddler, you can use a wooden spoon, or the bottom of an ice cream scoop handle. You want to basically crush the juice out of the limes, while using the sugar to grind against the limes and mint to release their oils and flavors. You're not trying to dissolve the sugar here.

Next pour in the alcohol. I like grey goose because its particularly light, you can use whatever you have on hand, or use 3 oz of Barcardi Limon in place of the light rum and grey goose.

Some people add the ice here, but I don't recommend it, because if you do, then the sugar is hard to dissolve, and you end up sipping grains of sugar, so rather, stir with a bartender's swizzle stick, or whatever you have on hand, don't shake though, cause it'll damage the mint, breaking it apart. 

Once the sugar is dissolved (you can usually tell after about 20 vigorous stirs, or when you look at the bottom of the glass and see no sediment), and lots of ice, and top off with club soda, about 3 oz or just to the top.

Stir to mix in the club soda, and drop in a straw and enjoy!

name: Mint Tingle
description:
The mint tingle is wonderful for a pallete cleanser between courses served in small tea cups or big sake cups. Smooth, fast, and refreshing!Pour Tanqueray into a highball. Add Metromint peppermint flavoured water to taste ( 2.5 oz is a good place to start) and lightly crush 2 mint leaves into your palm and float them in the glass.

If the gin is room temperature, you may want to strain it through ice first.
instructions:
Pour Tanqueray into a highball. Add Metromint peppermint flavoured water to taste ( 2.5 oz is a good place to start) and lightly crush 2 mint leaves into your palm and float them in the glass.

If the gin is room temperature, you may want to strain it through ice first.

name: Mint Vacation Treat
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth.

name: Minty Crotch
instructions: Add the white rum, banana liqueur, apple schnapps and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously with ice. Pour into a collins glass, top up with ice and drizzle the creme de menthe over the top. Serve.

name: Mir
instructions: Pour both shots over rocks in a highball glass. Fill with coke, or soda of your choice.

name: Miramar
description: "This is from when i was in college at Valdosta State University in Southwest Georgia.  We used to drink these at a party house on Miramar Street near campus, hence the name "Miramar".  Great tasting and very pretty in any type of glass!"Fill ice cube tray with pineapple juice, drop in one berry (for aesthetics), let freeze.  Mix 1 oz. pineapple juice, 3 oz. cranberry juice, ice & shake.  Strain and pour in a martini glass.  Top off with pineapple ice cubes.
instructions: Fill ice cube tray with pineapple juice, drop in one berry (for aesthetics), let freeze.  Mix 1 oz. pineapple juice, 3 oz. cranberry juice, ice & shake.  Strain and pour in a martini glass.  Top off with pineapple ice cubes.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay pineapple rum

name: Miss Kitty
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine gin, lemon juice, pineapple juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Miss Pastore
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, Campari bitters, Angostura bitters, orange juice, superfine sugar and lemon juice into a highball glass rimmed with sugar and lemon. Stir vigorously, and serve.

name: Miss V
instructions: Shake and serve over ice.

name: Miss Zoe's Hello Kitty
description: Created by Miss Zoe, located in Terre Haute, Indiana, for her Hello Kitty themed, 24th birthday party. Popular only among a selected group, til now.Blend strawberry vodka and peach schnapps with crushed ice in a pina-colada glass. Add a crushed strawberry popsicle, which should settle at the bottom of the glass. Top with whipped cream and a strawberry, and serve.
instructions: Blend strawberry vodka and peach schnapps with crushed ice in a pina-colada glass. Add a crushed strawberry popsicle, which should settle at the bottom of the glass. Top with whipped cream and a strawberry, and serve.

name: Mississippi Magic
instructions: Blend briefly in a wine goblet filled with crushed ice, and serve with straws.

name: Mississippi Mud Pie
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a highball glass on the rocks.

name: Mississippi Planters Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Missle Pop
instructions: Pour vodka, pineapple juice and fruit punch into an ice-filled glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Mist and Cola
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mist Iced Tea
instructions: Add the Canadian Mist whisky and lemon juice to a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the iced tea, splash lemon-lime soda, and serve.

name: Mistea
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a glass mug. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Mistletoe
instructions: Combine creme de almond, white creme de cacao, swiss mocha cream and grenadine in an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with half-and-half, and top with coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

name: Mistolin
instructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the orange juice, and pour the cranberry juice. Stir gently.

name: Mistress
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle with campari, and serve with a cherry.

name: Mitch's Jim Beam Drink
instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass, stir, and serve.

name: Mitchell's Bloody Mary
description:
"I took the traditional recipe for Bloody Mary, and decided to use a mixture of Mott's Clamato and Tomato juice for a tangy twist.  I substitute Worcestershire sauce with very stout beer for beefy flavor, and use a pinch of horseradish with a dash of cayenne and black pepper instead of Tobasco sauce for added warmth.
**Drinkers with shellfish alergies can substitute the Clamato for tomato juice or V8, spiced to preference**
This drink is popular wherever there are Bloody Mary drinkers!"1) Fill a highball glass 2/3 with ice.
2) Twist lime over ice and drop in glass.
3) Add 1 dash black pepper, 1 dash cayenne pepper, 1 pinch celery salt, 1 pinch Horseradish.
4) Add 1.5 oz vodka, 1 oz stout beer, 2 oz Mott's Clamato, 3.5 oz tomato juice or V8.
5) Spear 2 black olives to the middle of celery stick, sink celery stick, and stir.
7) Eat olives when visible, and eat celery stick to finish drink.
instructions:
1) Fill a highball glass 2/3 with ice.
2) Twist lime over ice and drop in glass.
3) Add 1 dash black pepper, 1 dash cayenne pepper, 1 pinch celery salt, 1 pinch Horseradish.
4) Add 1.5 oz vodka, 1 oz stout beer, 2 oz Mott's Clamato, 3.5 oz tomato juice or V8.
5) Spear 2 black olives to the middle of celery stick, sink celery stick, and stir.
7) Eat olives when visible, and eat celery stick to finish drink.

name: Mo's Beach Drink
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Moana Sands
instructions:
Pour chambord and peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Fill up to half with coconut syrup, fill the other half with orange juice, and stir. Garnish with a paper umbrella through a marachino cherry and orange wedge.

After a few minutes the juice and syrup should separate from the alcohol giving it a sand-like look. (But it tastes much better.)

name: MOB
instructions: Pour the Malibu, orange juice and Bailey's into a highball glass. Stir, add a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mob Witnesses
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tall collins glass filled with ice. Stir, and serve.

name: Mocha Flip
instructions: Shake well and strain into a wine glass three-quarters filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Mocha Maria
instructions: Add ingredients to shaker half-filled with ice, shake, and pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Mochito
instructions: Place mint leaves with lemon juice in a collins glass, and mash the mint with a spoon. Add ice, rum and fill up with club soda. Top with angostura bitters, and serve.

name: Mogadon
instructions: Pour absolut citron into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up, add a splash of fruit juice, and stir.

name: Mogul Masher
instructions: Mix hot chocolate as per usual (in a 12 oz. glass or larger) and add liquors. Top with whipped cream.

name: Moi?
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, creme de cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and top with tonic water. Stir well, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Moilanen
instructions:
1. Slice half a lemon into small slices. Extract the juice from the other half.

2. Add ice to a beer mug, and pour in the lemon juice. Fill the rest of the glass with vodka and schweppes, at a ratio of 1:2 respectively. Blend briefly.

name: Mojito
description: Alcohol Content 0.44 Place mint leaves in bottom of glass. Add crushed ice, Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum, sugar, and lime juice, and muddle. Add soda water and garnish with mint leaves.
instructions: Place mint leaves in bottom of glass. Add crushed ice, Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum, sugar, and lime juice, and muddle. Add soda water and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Mojito Diablo
