instructions: Muddle sugar, mint and squeezed lime wedges in mixing tin until mixture smells like spearmint gum. Fill with ice, add tequila and cassis, shake until the tin is icey to the touch. Pour into a collins glass, top with 7-up and garnish with a sugarcane stick and fresh mint.

name: Mojo's Suntan Lotion
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir. Pour into a white wine glass, and serve.

name: Molokai Mike
instructions:
1. Shake white rum, brandy, juices and almond syrup together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice and mix.

2. Combine dark rum and grenadine with sufficient crushed ice to produce a sorbet/sherbet, and gently add to the top of the cocktail.

3. Garnish with in-season fruit, and serve with straws.

name: Mom's Breakfast
instructions: Put ice into glass. Pour in amaretto. Pour in orange juice. Stir. Garnish with orange slice or wedge.

name: Mona Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, bourbon whiskey, rum, sweet and sour mix, and Rose's lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mona-Lisa
instructions: Stir ingredients and pour into a highball glass.

name: Mongolian
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mongolian Motherfucker
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, over ice. Shake, and serve.

name: Moninger's Madness
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass (the larger the better) and stir. Use ice if desired.

name: Monk on Coke
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Monk's Butt
instructions: Pour frangelico, butterscotch schnapps, and creme de cacao over ice. Add milk (or cream) if desired, and stir.

name: Monkey Cum
instructions: Combine the milk and half-banana in a blender for several seconds until only slightly lumpy. Add the vodka and blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass, add a straw and serve.

name: Monkey Doo
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Monkey In a Tree
instructions: Add rum, creme de banane and grenadine to a collins glass. Almost fill with pineapple juice, and mix. Float midori on top, and serve.

name: Monkey La La
instructions: Blend until smooth and frothy.

name: Monkey Madness
instructions: Combine the Jose Cuervo gold tequila, rum, vodka, banana juice and 4 slices of banana (about 1/4) in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, add the creme de cassis, and serve.

name: Monkey Spanker
instructions: Pour 2 - 3 oz whiskey into a beer glass, and fill with vernors ginger ale.

name: Monsoon
instructions: Pour all ingredients except myer's dark rum and stir in an ice-filled hurricane glass. Add dark rum at the top, mix and serve.

name: Monster Mash
instructions: Mix everything in a large beer glass and enjoy!

name: Monster Piss
instructions: Mix everything in a cocktail shaker with ice, shake and pour into glass. Add the sprite to the glass.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Monstermeister
instructions: Pour the Monster energy drink and Jagermeister into a shaker with ice, shake briefly. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Monsters Ball
instructions: Mix rum and Dr. Pepper in large glasses and add Monster Energy Drink to taste.

name: Mont Blanc
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender for 20 seconds. Pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Montana Sunrise
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Montana Tornado
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mason jar, and stir.

name: Monte Carlo Imperial
instructions: Shake gin, creme de menthe and lemon juice well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Monte's Sex Potion
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum, Chambord raspberry liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Monte-Sano
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and stir in sugar. Pour over crushed ice in a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Montezuma
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly, with half a cup of crushed ice, in a blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Moo Moo
instructions: Pour both liquors into glass with ice. Add cream and shake well. Serve with a large straw.

name: Moody Blue
instructions:
Pour above listed ingredients into a 
Collins glass filled with ice.
Stir and serve

name: Moog Patrol Swisher
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, Safari liqueur, Cointreau, blue curacao and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with chilled pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Mooing Irish Pepsi
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Moon Light
instructions: Add whiskey to highball glass, fill with beer. Dash in tabasco.

name: Moon River
instructions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Add the curacao streaked across the top.

name: Moonlight Serenade
instructions: Combine in a highball glass with ice cubes. Stir, and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Moonraker
instructions: Pour the tequila and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Drop the blue curacao into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Mophead
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Moran O' Sweet
instructions: Shake amaretto, vodka, and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Add 3 drops of lemon juice on top.

name: More Orgasms
instructions: Stir ingredients together until it just looks like dark bailey's.

name: More Sunshine
instructions: Stir the gin and creme de cassis together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, stir again and serve.

name: Morgan Madras
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, orange juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Morgan Melon
instructions: Start with the blender. Add the Ice, Captian Morgan's Spiced Rum, Watermelon Pucker, splash of sour mix and 7-up. Blend well and you come out with a wonderful "Honeydew Melon" taste. Garnish with different types of fruits.

name: Morgans Passion
instructions: Add overproof rum to a highball glass, and fill halfway with fruit punch. Shake to mix, then pour in the pineapple rum followed by the Tropical Sprite. Mix that as well. After all the mixing is complete, put the four cubes in the drink and place a pineapple wedge on the glass to garnish. Enjoy!

name: Morir Sonando
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mormon Surprise
instructions: Add the vodka and grape juice to a collins glass and fill with ginger ale.

name: Morning After
instructions: Stir the whisky, schnapps and rum together in a large glass, Fill with Mountain Dew lime soda, and serve.

name: Morning Glory Fizz
instructions: Add scotch, lemon juice, sugar, egg and bitters to a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the soda water, and serve with a slice of orange and a muddler.

name: Morning Glory Fizz #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Morning Junkie Monkey
instructions: Add ingredients to a glass with ice. Shake and serve.

name: Morning Milk
instructions: Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Morning with the Leprechauns
instructions: Pour the Bailey's, irish whiskey, cherry brandy and coffee into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Morning Wood
instructions: Pour the vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Sink the blackberry liqueur by pouring it at the side of the glass, thus forming a layer at the bottom. Serve.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with ice.

name: Mother Cocktail
instructions: Mix gin, vodka, grenadine and sour mix together in a shaker. Pour into a collins glass with ice, filling from half to three-quarters full. Top with beer, to taste, and serve.

name: Mother Fucking Ape
instructions: Pour all ingredients except for brandy into a mug filled with ice cubes, and stir. Drizzle brandy on top and serve.

name: Mother Moo
instructions: Pour the licor 43 into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with milk, and add a stirring pin.

name: Mother Pucker
instructions: Pour appropriate amounts into a mixing container to your liking. Serve in highball glasses.

name: Mother Puckin Goose
description: "This drink was created by popular demand at the University of Massachusetts Lowell by a couple of DANNY C's. It is dedicated to Mother Goose and Dancing with the Stars. It is popular mainly because of its affiliation with Mother Goose who was such a big part of our young lives."Place 4 ice cubes in highball glass.  Pour Watermelon-Strawberry swirl juice into glass followed by Grey Goose vodka.  Proceed by pouring Sour Apple Pucker Schnapps, followed by Tropicana Orange juice. Top off w/ a dash of lemon juice. Mix w/ mixer as desired.
instructions: Place 4 ice cubes in highball glass.  Pour Watermelon-Strawberry swirl juice into glass followed by Grey Goose vodka.  Proceed by pouring Sour Apple Pucker Schnapps, followed by Tropicana Orange juice. Top off w/ a dash of lemon juice. Mix w/ mixer as desired.

name: Motherfucker #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mounaki
instructions: Shake all ingredients with 5 ice cubes for a good 10 seconds. Pour, don't strain, into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mounds
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice, add rum, creme de cacao, and fill with cream.

name: Mount Fuji #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Mount Red
instructions: Add the vodka, rum, gin and schnapps to a highball glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and serve with a lime slice.

name: Mount Tullamore's Dew
instructions: Pour the Tullamore Dew irish whiskey into a collins glass over ice cubes, than fill the glass with Mountan dew. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Mountain Berry Cooler
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in highball glass & stir. Should taste like fruit punch.

name: Mountain Breeze
description: A drink courtesy of Myles from the Switzerland Inn in the Mountains of Little Switzerland, North Carolina.Build ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass, shake and garnish with a lime wedge.
instructions: Build ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass, shake and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Mountain Cider High
instructions: Add the vodka, cider and mountain dew to a glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Mountain Creek (Fjell Bekk)
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sprite and garnish with a lemon slice. This is a Norwegian classic.

name: Mountain Dew Me
description: "I made up this drink while working at Vernon Downs in upstate New York.  A woman asked me for a fruity drink and she became my test subject.  This drink is appealing because of it color, hence the name Mountain Dew Me.  Hope you like it!  Vanessa McCormick."Fill highball glass with ice, then add all ingredients.  Shake and serve.  Garnish with a Lime.
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, then add all ingredients.  Shake and serve.  Garnish with a Lime.

name: Mountain Melon
instructions: Pour Mountain Dew into a highball glass. Add watermelon pucker, and stir. Add more pucker to taste, if desired.

name: Mountain with a Punch
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add vodka. Fill glass with Mountain Dew.

name: Mouse Trap
instructions: Shake vodka, triple sec and orange juice with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and add 7-up (do not shake, stir). Layer the drink w/ grenadine on top.

name: Moxitizer
instructions: Add the shots to a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Moxie energy drink, and serve.

name: Moya Piekna
description: Invented by Nathan Shaw for his polish girl... cocktail name is "My beautiful" in polish. Made in London and earnt itself a devoted crowd. Now permanently at Mao Tai, Parsons Green as a great aperitif. Each flavour can be tasted. Muddled an apple in a boston shaker... add ingredients, shake then strain with an apple garnish. Be very careful as a slip with the chambord can instantly ruin the drink.  Make sure you get alot of apple floating around... shake till it becomes a soft red/green. This drink should not be sweet nor sour... it carefully balances between the two making it a perfect aperitif.
instructions: Muddled an apple in a boston shaker... add ingredients, shake then strain with an apple garnish. Be very careful as a slip with the chambord can instantly ruin the drink.  Make sure you get alot of apple floating around... shake till it becomes a soft red/green. This drink should not be sweet nor sour... it carefully balances between the two making it a perfect aperitif.

name: Mozart 142
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass half-filled with ice, and serve.

name: Mozart Chocolate Liqueur
instructions: Shake well with no less than 6 ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry, and serve.

name: Mozart Cola
instructions: Pour liquids into a hurricane glass, and add a scoop of ice cream on top. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings, add straws, and serve.

name: Mozart Esprit
instructions: Pour sprite over three or four ice cubes in a highball glass. Add black mozart chocolate liqueur and garnish with a slice of lemon. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Mozart Milkshake
instructions: Shake or blend ingredients and pour into a tall glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate, add a straw, and serve.

name: Mozart Mint
instructions: Serve on the rocks in a tall glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Mozart Orange
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass. Pour over ice cubes in a highball glass, add a straw, and serve.

name: Mr G
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Mr. Gerbik
instructions: Stir the gin together with the Dr. Pepper in a highball glass. Carefully layer the Bacardi 151 rum on top, ignite and serve.

name: Mr. Insaneo The Cow
instructions: Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur, chocolate liqueur and milk in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well until smooth, and pour into a collins glass. Drizzle the Hershey's chocolate syrup over the top, and serve.

name: Mr. Jones Pucker
instructions: Get a cup that fits the ingredients and then add the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps. Add a can or bottle of Jones Soda Co. Green Apple Soda, stir, and add ice. Serve.

name: Mrs. Taylors
instructions: Pour the gin, Lillet and triple sec into a red wine glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a burnt orange peel, and serve unstirred.

name: Mt. Jack
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with/without ice. Stir and serve.

name: Mud and Blood
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a large highball glass, and serve.

name: Mud Fuck
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Mud Puddle
instructions: Place the vodka, Dr. Pepper, and orange juice into a pint glass with ice. Stir.

name: Muddy Water
instructions: Pour the amaretto, orange juice and lemon juice in order into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mudskipper
instructions: Pour gin and ginger ale over ice in a collins glass. Add chocolate syrup and let settle in the bottom. Stir very lightly. Drink should appear dark brown on the bottom and gradate to clear on top.

name: Muff Rider
instructions: Pour the sake, white rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with lemon soda, and serve.

name: Mulled Claret
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to the boil, stirring occasionally. Pour into a mug, and serve.

name: Multi-Colored Smurf
instructions: Shake the orange juice, vodka, and mango syrup with ice in a shaker. Carefully layer the apricot liqueur and blueberry schnapps into a highball glass. Float the pre-shaken mixture of vodka and juices on top, and serve.

name: Multiple Orgasm
instructions: Build over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.

name: Multiple Orgasm #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a blender with crushed ice and mix until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, and top with a cherry. Tastes like a chocolate shake, but with a kick.

name: Multiple Orgasm Cajun Style
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Munchausen
instructions: Shake all but lemonade and strain into a collins glass half-filled with broken ice. Add the lemonade and serve with straws.

name: Mundo Fine
instructions: Shake or mix all ingredients, and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass, (or any glass large enough). Garnish with an orange slice, a lemon slice, and a cherry if so desired.

name: Murder of Crows
instructions: Pour ingredeints into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Murray's Cocktail
instructions: Pour rum, vodka, and citron vodka over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up, stir, and serve.

name: Mustang Ranch Freebie
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a champagne flute filled with shaven ice, and serve.

name: Mustique Whammy
instructions: Shake all but champagne, and strain into a wine glass. Add the champagne.

name: Mutual Orgasm
instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes.

name: My Antonella
instructions: In a highball glass, combine gin and chambord over ice. Stir, add two italian green olives, and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: My Blue Heaven
instructions: Put blueberries into blender. Mix well. Add chilled Blue Maui and Aftershock, continue to mix well. Pour into highball glass and top with blueberry brandy. Serve ice cold.

name: My Malibu Delight
instructions: Get a cold beer mug and a straw. Add 1 part (about 3 shots worth) of Malibu Rum, and add 1 to 2 parts (depending how strong you want it) of Sprite or 7-up. Add a few cherries or a lemon twist or two, -or- add all the fruit. Put in the straw, add ice to chill, and enjoy!!

name: My Own Worst Enemy
instructions: Layer BíƒÂ¤renjíƒÂ¤ger then JíƒÂ¤germeister into shot glass. Drop shot into half filled glass of Rockstar and shoot.

name: My Place or No Place
instructions: Pour the gin, creme de cassis and Rose's lime juice into a parfait glass filled with shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: My Pleasure
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: My Sweet Midori
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, squeeze in the juice from 2 or 3 lime wedges, and serve.

name: My Wife's Snatch
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Myrtle Bank Punch
instructions: Pour the dark rum, grenadine, lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Top with cherry brandy. Garnish with slice of lime, and serve.

name: Myrtle Sunrise
instructions: Shake strawberry liqueur and mango rum in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Add orange soda.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: Nadir Blue
instructions: Pour the gin, cherry brandy, lemon juice, strawberry syrup, grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with soda water. Pour the blue curacao into the middle. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Nadir Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, cherry brandy, lemon juice, strawberry syrup, grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with soda water. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Nagshead Lemonade
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nail Puller
instructions: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

name: Naked Barbie
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Naked Lady
instructions: Pour the white rum, sweet vermouth, apricot brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Naked Shake
instructions: Add the vanilla schnapps, swiss mocha cream liqueur and a few ounces of half-and-half to an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Stir or shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with a splash of coca-cola, and garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

name: Naked Sunburn
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, Malibu rum and creme de noyaux into a hurricane glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the 7-Up and sour mix. Fill with equal parts of pineapple and cranberry juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Naked Surfer
instructions: Pour vodka half-way up an ice-filled beer mug. Add roughly a shot of grenadine. Fill with orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Naked Twister
instructions: Pour midori, vodka and tuaca into a pint glass. Almost-fill with pineapple juice, and top with 7-up. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Naked Waiter
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet, and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Nalgaa
instructions: Pour cherry liqueur over four ice cubes in a highball glass, and add the campari. Fill with 7-up, or sprite, and serve.

name: Nani's Aloha
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add alcohol. Fill rest of glass with cherry coke, splash in cherry juice and don't forget the 3 cherries.

name: Napotonic
instructions: Pour mandarine napoleon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, and garnish with orange peels.

name: Nappy Dugout
instructions: Build ingredients over two ice cubes in a highball glass, and stir.

name: Nappy Rash
instructions: Pour the rye whiskey, spiced rum, peach schnapps and grapefruit juice into a blender. Add the iced tea powder mix, and 1/4 of an orange (including peel and rind). Blend very well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nassau Paul
instructions: Combine the white rum, Cointreau, lemon juice, egg white and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Nasty Pablo
instructions: Pour vodka and blackberry brandy into an ice-filled pint glass. Fill with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

name: Natalie's
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Nathalie
instructions: Shake liquors and lemon juice, and strain into an ice-filled wine goblet. Add lemonade, and serve.

name: National Aquarium
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Shake well, and serve on the rocks.

name: Naughty Monkey
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Navel Caribbean Love
instructions: Pour malibu into a hurricane glass, and slowly add the orange juice.

name: Navy Grog
instructions: Pour liquors into an ice-filled collins glass. Add juices, shake, and garnish with an orange wedge and pineapple chunk.

name: Nawlin's Po-Boy
instructions: Using a hurricane glass, filled with ice, add as follows: rum, grenadine, and orange juice.  Then fill to the top with Hawaiian Punch.  Stir and garnish with cherries, lime, or orange.

name: Nay-Nay Strohmeyer
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a large container, in any order.

name: Nazi Qualik
instructions: Pour the vodka, amaretto almond liqueur, Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, Bailey's irish cream and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk, and serve.

name: Nazzy Baby
instructions: In a straight tall pint glass fill 2/3 of it with ice then add liquors. Add a dash of lemonade and fill the rest of the glass with fresh orange juice.

name: Neckbrace
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Necrophiliac
instructions: Pour the vodka, rums, melon liqueur and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Nectar of the Gods
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Need For Speed
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the cranberry juice and the fanta and stir.

name: Needle in Your Eye
instructions: Just put it all together in a glass with crushed ice, and mix well.

name: Neiler
instructions: Stir ingredients into glass with some crushed ice.

name: Nelson's Blood
instructions: Pour the champagne and port into a champagne flute. Stir well, and serve.

name: Nelson's Nightcap
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet.

name: Nemesis
description: The Nemesis is a drink inherant of a Black Russian, in that the only addition is that of Guinness. A friendly chap called Brian Haverty shared the recipe which, as far as he's aware, was invented by Martyn Budden in Australia.Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice into a highball glass. Top with coke, add Guinness, and serve.
instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice into a highball glass. Top with coke, add Guinness, and serve.

name: Neon Fairy
instructions: Filter herbs out of Absinth and pour Absinth into glass. Add baker's (superfine) sugar and stir until dissolved. Absinthe will take on a cloudy green color. Add Sprite and sweet and sour mix. Sit back, relax and enjoy.

ingredients.name: Absinth® King of Spirits Gold liqueur

name: Neon Iguana
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Neon Neutron
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Neon Nightmare
instructions: Combine ingredients into a mixing tin full of ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange flag.

name: Neon Smurf
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour blue Curacao and Blueberry Schnapps, splash of sour mix and fill with 7-up.

name: Neon Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients and pour into beer mugs filled with ice. Top with a cherry.

name: Neon Tower
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass, and add slice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve with straws.

name: Neopolitan Dream
instructions: Pour cream and coconut milk into blender. Blend at high speed for 1 minute, until frothy. Add the Ice Cream (Neopolitan), milk and Kahlua, then blend for 2 - 3 minutes (you can add more Kahlua if you'd prefer). Put in freezer for 5 - 10 minutes to chill, since the blending heats it up, or drink immediately.

name: Nerds
instructions: Pour midori and blue curacao into a highball glass with a few ice cubes. Fill with lemonade.

name: Nermish
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Nerve Agent
instructions: Fill half the glass with ice and pour in Red Bull. Add rum and curacao, stir and enjoy.

name: Neumann
instructions: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey into an ice-filled highball glass. Add orange juice, and serve.

name: Neuralizer
instructions: Mix in a highball glass, and add ice if desired.

name: New Guinea
instructions: Serve over ice in glass.

name: New Hampshire Bulldog
instructions: Pour Alize VSOP white lable cognac over ice in a tall collins glass. Add Fanta blueberry soda. Garnish with a slice of tangerine, stir, and serve.

name: New Orleans Buck
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: New Orleans Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, fill with soda, and serve.

name: New Orleans Hurricane
instructions: Shake all ingredients except 151-proof rum in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass and float the 151-proof rum on top. Drink through a straw from the bottom up.

name: New Orleans Salty Dog
instructions: Coat the rim of a highball glass with salt. Mix vodka and grapefruit juice in another glass with ice and pour into glass with salted rim.

name: New York City Model
instructions: Fill glass with ice (crushed if possible), shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: New York Motherfucker #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into collins glass. Garnish with a lemon. Serve.

name: Newport Punch
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of each alcohol. Add splash cranberry and orange juice. stir

name: Nhardkiss
instructions:
First crush ice in blender...pour white zinfindale wine only... at least a cup....then a half a cup of sprite soda...then squeeze 2 or 3 slices of lime...drop them in after...finally a shot or two of cruzan coconut rum o rany other type coconut rum...stir and pour in what ever glass is comfortable...honestly speaking measuring the alchohol depends on how strong you would like your drink...ENJOY!!!

p.s. I recommend cruzan coconut rum...very smooth...no after taste and has a kick aswell

name: Niagra
instructions: Pour vodka and blue curacao over ice in a highball glass. Top with Red Bull until pale green, and serve.

name: Nichols' Flaming Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Kahlua, condensed milk, cream soda and rum into a cocktail shaker with cubed ice and shake. Strain into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry. If desired, layer Bacardi 151 on top and ignite. Enjoy fireshow, extinguish, and drink.

name: Nick at Night
instructions: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila, peach schnapps, sour mix and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Nick Dimon
instructions: Mix over full glass of ice and stir.

name: Nickel
instructions: Pour the Absolut Kurant, Midori melon liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with cold 7-up, and serve.

name: Nickel Alloy
instructions: Pour the Absolut Kurant, Cointreau and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with cold 7-up, and serve.

name: Nicky's 1 a.m. Sunrise
instructions: Pour the gin and pineapple juice into a highball glass with a few ice cubes. Add a bit of tonic water if desired. Garnish with slices of lemon and orange, and serve.

name: Nicky's Dry Jello
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Stir, garnish with 2 slices of lemon, and serve.

name: Nicky's Lemonade
instructions: Pour the Ballantine's Scotch whisky into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the honey and sugar. Add the juice from one whole lemon, saving a slice or two for garnish. Stir and serve.

name: Nicky's Primo
instructions: Pour the Tanqueray gin and Hpnotiq liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with slices of lemon. Add a little sugar to sweeten only if desired. Stir and serve.

name: Nicky's Sweet Tooth
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass. Optional; add a small scoop of ice cream, chocolate fudge stirred and mixed, or a healthy dose of whipped cream on top.

name: Nicolalas
instructions: Mix absolut mandrin and passoa in a highball glass. Add ice and fill with orange juice.

name: Nicole Simpson
instructions: Add all the 3 parts togethe in a glass, stir well, and enjoy.

name: Night Rider
instructions:
In this order.... in any glass or cup (it is very easy to make); Malibu, add two ice cubes, Cruzan, Jim Beam, Captain Morgan, Dr. Pepper. If you want you can add another ice cube (I do!!).

It has a nice smooth flavor and goes down easy with a little bit of an after warmth or burn if you have no ice cubes. It is a drink that will have you going after a couple! Enjoy!!!!!

name: Night Stalker
instructions: Put it all together in a jar and shake well.

name: Nightcap
instructions: Heat the milk. Add sugar and kahlua, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Nightwalker
instructions: Put high-quality instant coffee into a blender, and dissolve it using a minimal amount of boiling water. Add whole milk and vanilla ice cream (with chocolate chips where possible). Blend it all together. Add Amarula and stir well. Pour into a hurricane glass and freeze it for about 15-20 minutes. Garnish with whipped cream on top.

name: Nijinski Blini
instructions: Pour all ingredients over some crushed ice in a champagne flute. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Nikki Delight
instructions: Pour ingredients over 4 - 5 ice cubes in a collins glass, and stir briefly.

name: Nikki Sixx
instructions: Build over lots of ice in a highball glass. Squeeze a couple of lime wedges into the glass and fill up with Sprite.

name: Nilla Wafer
instructions: Layer over ice in the following order: vodka, vanilla liqueur, caramel liqueur. Fill slowly with ginger ale.

name: Nipples Malone
instructions: Put ice in a collins glass and add vodka. Fill with grape juice until it's about an inch and a half away from the top, then add a splash of white cranberry juice. Squeeze in half a lemon, add three spoonfuls of sugar and fill the rest of the glass with maraschino cherry syrup from the jar and stir. Drop in two cherries and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Nitro Cocktail
instructions: Combine vodka, whiskey and juices in a shaker half-filled with ice. Add equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice, and shake. Strain into a collins glass almost-filled with ice, add grenadine, and serve.

name: Nixon
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-Up, stir and serve.

ingredients.name: 2 oz Captain Morgan® Original spiced rum

name: No Clue
instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec and Dr. Pepper into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: No Pressure
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass one-third full with frozen strawberry daiquiri mix. Carefully layer the frozen pina colada mix until two-thirds full. Add a splash of blue curacao on top, and insert a straw. Fill with 151 proof rum.

name: No Problem
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a tall glass.

name: No Way
instructions: Shake everything together and pour into a pint glass.

name: No. 4
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, add tequila, then triple sec. Top off with cranberry juice.

name: Noah
instructions: Pour amaretto into an ice-filled glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and lemon-lime soda, and serve.

name: Noche de Phoof
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Drink should be frothy on top. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Nolan
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly in a highball glass.

name: Noonermaker
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a highball glass.

name: Nord-Norsk Depresjon
instructions: Pour cointreau, aquavit, gin and lime juice over ice in a small highball glass. Stir, top with sprite or 7-up, and serve.

name: Norling Special
instructions: Pour midori and bacardi limon into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Fill with equal parts 7-up and cranberry juice.

name: Norm the Niner
instructions: Pour the apple-flavored ingredients into a white wine glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Top with 7-Up or Sprite, stir lightly and serve.

name: Norman Porto Flip
instructions: Shake well and strain into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Normandy Cooler
instructions: Pour into a collins glass with ice. Add a spiral of lemon, and serve.

name: North Mymms Mirage
instructions: Mix the blackcurrant and the lemonade together. Add the gin and pimms together stirring well but do not shake. Garnish with fruit pieces. Mix a batch and serve liberally.

name: Northern Lights
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, raspberry liqueur and orange-pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Northern Sweet Tea
instructions: Fill Hurricane glass with cubed ice. Pour all four liquors and lemonade to half inch below the rim. Float of grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and lemon speared.

name: Northside Special
instructions: Add all ingredients (except soda) to a collins glass. Dissolve sugar, filled with crushed ice, and add soda. Garnish with a cherry, slices of lemon and orange, and serve with straws.

name: Norwegian Coffee
instructions: Make some coffee of your choice. Fill the coffee cup half-way with coffee, add a penny, and pour your alcohol in the cup until the penny floats. Take the penny out and you've got yourself what we say in norway, "Karsk".

name: Norwegian Iceberg
instructions: Pour vodka and sprite into an ice-filled beer mug. Add blue maui; until iceberg color, and serve.

name: NoSay
instructions: Fill a beer mug with beer and drop in a raw egg. Drop in a shot of overproof rum and chug the whole thing. Swallow the raw egg when you hit the bottom of the glass.

name: Not So Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps, orange juice and grapefruit juice over crushed ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange or lime, and serve.

name: Novebuche
instructions: Stir with ice cubes and serve.

name: NT Pucker Punch Fizz
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nubian Queen
instructions: Add ice to the mug and add JíƒÂ¤germeister and the dark rum. Fill with chocolate milk. Gently pour the caramel vodka into the drink.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Private Stock dark rum

name: Nuclear Blue
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, Southern Comfort and Wild Turkey whiskey into a highball glass with a few ice cubes. Fill with lime mix, and serve.

name: Nuclear Ice Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except sour mix) into an ice-filled collins glass. Almost-fill with sour mix, top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Nuclear Kool-Aid
instructions: Pour ingredients in order into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Nuclear Slush
instructions: Fill a blender about 3/4 with crushed ice and add liqueurs. Mix and add the sour mix until the mixture funnels in the blender. The final result should be thick. Add more ice if necessary. Pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Nuclear Waste #2
instructions: Shake well and serve in a highball glass.

name: Nuclear Zima
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Numbnut
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass full of ice.

name: Nummy
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker and pour over ice. Tastes like grape kool-aid!

name: Nurse
instructions: Pour vodka and licor 43 over 2 - 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir and fill with with root beer. Serve with a straw.

name: Nut Buster
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nut Twister
instructions: Combine over ice and stir.

name: Nutney
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on ice.

name: Nuts Banane
instructions: Blend with half a glassful of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a collins glass, and garnish with a banana slice and cherry.

name: Nutty Banana
instructions: Shake and strain over ice in a highball glass.

name: Nutty Bartender
instructions: Pour the Merlot and Pinot Grigio and ginger ale (or sprite) into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Stolichnaya vodka, Amaretto Di Saronno liqueur and Alize cognac. Shake gently. Pour into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top off with Grand Marnier orange liqueur, and serve.

name: Nutty Colada
instructions: Combine the amaretto, coconut milk and crushed pineapple with two cups of crushed ice in a blender. Blend on high for a short period and pour into a collins glass. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Nutty Russian
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka, amaretto and Frangelico. Fill with milk. Stir and serve.

name: NYC Car Bomb
instructions: Pour Hennessy Cognac into a glass of Heineken.

name: Nypaver's Black Sherbert
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Tattoo orange rum and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour contents into a highball glass. Top with root beer, stir lightly and serve.

name: O & Cranberry
instructions: Stir together in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: O & Tonic
instructions: Serve in a tall glass with ice.

name: O Madras
instructions: Blend ingredients with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange.

name: O Thing
instructions: Pour the can of Amp energy drink into a tall glass. Add the Bacardi O rum (more or less acccording to taste), and serve.

name: O.J. Comfort
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice, stir in the ingredients.

name: Oasis #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie and Hot Chocolate
instructions: Add liqueurs to a mug of hot chocolate. Stir, top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings. Enjoy!

name: Ocean Breeze
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with a cherry and serve.

name: Ocean Breeze #2
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka, then add the juices in equal parts. Float blue Curacao on top. Garnish it with an orange wheel on the glass, and serve.

name: Ocean Spray Monkey Drink
instructions: Add a few ice cubes to glass. Pour in 2 oz. banana liqueur, then fill with fruit punch. Stir.

name: Ocean Water
instructions: Pour it all into a glass and stir. The blue curacao is mainly for color so not much is needed, and if you want it to be more alcoholic add a bit more of the rum, and then some vodka or white rum.

name: October 27th
instructions: Pour the rums, Rose's grenadine and Coca-cola into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Odwits
instructions: Mix tequila, vodka and southern comfort in a highball glass. Add a few rocks of ice and top up with fresh orange juice. Add just a dash of galliano and stir. Serve with a large slice of lemon.

name: Ogden Style
description: "This drink was originated from Ogden, Utah by a rapper known as CuZz'N *aKa* Da Alcaholik. He has a song called 'Ogden Style' and it is said that his explanation of the new drink is simply to explain a 'real gangsta'. Because the Gin N Juice is the 'gangsta drink', so CuZz'N said a superfied gangsta would have to be stronger so besides Everclear, he mixed it with Bacardi Rum 151 and it tastes great!"About 2-3 cubes of ice, mix 3 oz. of Gin, 3 oz. of Orange Juice and 2 oz. of Bacardi 151. Mix like Gin N Juice topped off with 151. Does not matter the order then stir. Put it on ice for colder and better taste of alcohol.
instructions: About 2-3 cubes of ice, mix 3 oz. of Gin, 3 oz. of Orange Juice and 2 oz. of Bacardi 151. Mix like Gin N Juice topped off with 151. Does not matter the order then stir. Put it on ice for colder and better taste of alcohol.

name: Ogre Drink
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a beer mug.

name: Oh My God
instructions: Fill glas with ice, add schnapps and Southern comfort, then fill glass full with pineapple juice.

name: Ohio
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except champagne) in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Oi-Loa
description:
This tropical drink is actually a combination of Don "The Beachcomber's" Mai-Tai recipe, Trader Vic's Mai-Tai recipe and my own recipe all rolled into one. "Oi-Loa" is actually a Hawaiian word meaning "The Best". Enjoy!Add all measured ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake ingredients for at least thirty seconds (watering down this drink a little bit is a good thing). Serve in a pint glass, a collins glass or a hurricane glass. Add a straw and garnish with a pineapple wedge or lime/lemon slice.

If almond syrup is not readily available you may use the following
substitute: 1/2 oz. of simple syrup and 1/2 oz. of almond liqueur. You can also use Mount Gay or Appleton Estate rum if Myer's is not available.
instructions:
Add all measured ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake ingredients for at least thirty seconds (watering down this drink a little bit is a good thing). Serve in a pint glass, a collins glass or a hurricane glass. Add a straw and garnish with a pineapple wedge or lime/lemon slice.

If almond syrup is not readily available you may use the following
substitute: 1/2 oz. of simple syrup and 1/2 oz. of almond liqueur. You can also use Mount Gay or Appleton Estate rum if Myer's is not available.

name: Oki Sun
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until frothy. Serve.

name: Okinawa Special
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass with ice.

name: Ola Homey!
instructions: Blend 1 cup of ice in a blender with the pina colada mix and rum. Set aside. Blend the raspberry vodka with 1 cup of ice. Rim a pina colada glass with sugar. Pour both mixtures one at a time into the glass. Top with a maraschino cherry. For an added effect, add a drop of red food clouring to the vodka portion before combining.

name: Olaffson's Punch
instructions: Dissolve sugar and shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Serve with straws and garnish with twists of orange and lime.

name: Old Fashioned (Sweet) #2
instructions: Add drops of bitters to bottom of glass and stir in sugar. Once bitters and sugar are combined, add ice and pour in brandy. Top off with 7-up/Sprite and add a splash of grenadine. Serve with cherry/orange slice. Also works with whiskey.

name: Old Sunkist
instructions: Pour both ingredients over 4 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: OliFanta
instructions: Pour Fanta into a collins glass. Add Oliphanta orange vodka, stir, and serve.

name: Oliver's Green Diamond
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur and cold Surge into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Stir well. Top with a bit of vodka; optional. Serve.

name: Olle Goop
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, and add a few drops of lime juice. Add schweppes russian, to taste, and serve.

name: Omnipotent
instructions: Combine above ingredients together in a highball glass with a couple of ice cubes. Stir and serve with a slice of apple.

name: On the Deck
instructions: Mix ingredients in a frosted beer mug, and serve.

name: One Ball Left
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the soda, and serve.

name: One Cock and Two Balls
description: A good pick-me-up for the evening after the hard day at work. Popular even, with the stockmarket hotshots in downtown New York City.Serve ingredients hot in a mug. Best after a hard day of work when you need a pick-me-up.
instructions: Serve ingredients hot in a mug. Best after a hard day of work when you need a pick-me-up.

name: One Long Distance Operator
instructions: Pour the Bacardi rum, Smirnoff vodka and peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Add Sprite, then cranberry juice last. Top with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: One Night Stand
instructions: Blend ingredients with shiny mix thingy. Best results when chilled.

name: One's Nitro
instructions: Mix lemon/lime together before you put it into the glass with the red bull.

name: Ooo
instructions: Serve over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Oral Intruder
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum, Midori melon liqueur, ginger ale, sour mix and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Oral Invasion
instructions: Pour all ingredients in glass, stir and enjoy.

name: Oral Sex on the Beach
instructions: Pour the vodka, peach schnapps, blue curacao and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Orancio Royal
instructions: Pour orancio into a champagne flute and fill with brut champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Orange Blossom Special
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 6 ice cubes in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Orange Breeze
instructions: Build in a large goblet with ice and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Orange Buck
instructions: Shake gin, orange juice, and lime juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Orange Chocolate Martini
instructions: Chill a white wine glass. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into glass (no ice).

name: Orange Creamsicle #2
instructions: Pour the vanilla vodka into a collins glass with ice. Add orange crush til it tastes good. Serve.

name: Orange Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Orange Ed
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Orange Flamingo
instructions: Fill a highball glass four-fifths with orange soda. Add grenadine, and top with whipped cream.

name: Orange Flux
instructions: Fill a shaker half full with ice cubes. Pour all ingredients into shaker and shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Orange Hawaiian

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Orange Kiss

name: Orange Mule
instructions: Pour vodka and cointreau into a highball glass over ice. Fill with ginger ale, and mix well. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Orange Oasis
instructions: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Orange Oscar

name: Orange Peach Plus
instructions: Pour the Absolut peach vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Island Fruit 7-Up and a splash of Canada Dry ginger ale. Stir and serve.

name: Orange Push-Up
instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Serve in a hurricane glass, and garnish with an orange and cherry flag.

name: Orange Push-Up #2
instructions: In a shaker with some ice, shake all ingredients and pour into a nice glass.

name: Orange Rumbler
instructions: Pour the Rumple Minze and Stolichnaya orange vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with tonic water. Garnish with an orange or lime. Add splash of Grand Marnier if desired. Serve.

name: Orange Rush
instructions: Blend ingredients with ice. Serve in a tall glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Orange Safari
instructions: Build over ice in highball glass. Stir.

name: Orange Scorpion

name: Orange Striptease

name: Orange Surfboard

name: Orange Surprise

name: Orange Swamp
instructions: Build over ice in a beer mug. Stir.

name: Orange Tic Tac

name: Orange Warthog

name: Orchard Orange
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Orchid

name: Ordinary Seaman

name: Oreo Speedwagon
instructions: Blend ingredients in blender until smooth.

name: Orgasm #10
instructions: Build ingredients in above order in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Orgasm #3
instructions: Build over ice, garnish with a strawberry or maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Orgasm #4
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Orgasm #5
instructions: Pour the vodka, amaretto, Kahlua coffee liqueur and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Orgasm #6
instructions: Pour the vodka, Bailey's irish cream and Kahlua coffee liqueur in that order into a highball glass. Top with a bit of club soda, and serve.

name: Original Mulekicker

name: Original Zombie
