name: Orlando Sun
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a hihgball glass filled with ice.

name: Orthoniatis
instructions: Pour the kiwi liqueur, Bacardi white rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker with 5 ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Oscar Pop
instructions: Fill the Hurricane glass with ice, combine orange juice and sweet and sour mix, splash sprite soda, float grenadine, Garnish with as many cherries as desired.

name: Osh Kosh Besloshed
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass half full of ice.

name: Osiris
instructions: Pour the vodka over crushed ice in a highball glass. Pour in the Pepsi. Squeeze the orange wedge, letting the juice drip into the glass. Serve.

name: Otter Pop #2
instructions: Add liquors and sweet and sour mix to a cocktail shaker. Fill with 7-up or sprite, and top with grenadine. Shake, and strain into a pint glass over ice.

name: Out of Africa
instructions: Blend with crushed ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cocktail cherry, and serve.

name: Over Board Mai Tai
instructions: Prepare in a Hurricane glass. Add light rum, then gold rum then the juices. Top with grenadine and dark rum, finish with a splash of 151.

name: Over the Rainbow
instructions: Combine all ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a slice of peach, and serve.

name: Over the Top
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Overcast Friday
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour into a highball glass over several ice cubes. Add a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Oyster Bay
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: P.S.U. Victory Dance
instructions:
Mix all ingredients together in a blender. Pour contents into a beer mug filled with cracked ice. 

Note: Add crushed ice to the blending process for a Frozen Victory Dance.

name: P.T.O.
instructions: Pour the rum, vodka, triple sec, and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Pacific Sunshine
instructions: Mix with cracked ice and pour, with ice, into a chilled parfait or hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Paco Mix
instructions: In a beer mug add ice, lemon and salt, then add the beer, stir a bit, add the tabasco sauce and the worcestershire sauce. Finally add the tequila and vodka.

name: Pain in the Ass
instructions: Pour Midori melon liqueur, Bacardi 151, Sour Apple Pucker, and Malibu Rum into a highball glass. Top off with pineapple juice and 7-Up, stir and serve.

name: Pain Killer
instructions: Pour midori melon liqueur in an ice-filled collins glass. Almost-fill, with equal parts; cranberry, orange, and pineapple juice. Add rum, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Painkiller
instructions: Shake or stir ingredients, and pour over ice in a tall glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve,

name: Painter's Delight
instructions: Pour gin, curacao, pernod and lemon juice into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with soda water, stir, and serve.

name: Painting Pink
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Paisano
instructions: Pour vodka and frangelico into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with milk, and shake.

name: Pajama Jackhammer
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a highball glass with shaved ice, and serve.

name: Pajama Jammy Jam
instructions: Shake goldschlager, grenadine and raspberry liqueur in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Mix vodka and orange juice in separate container and float on top.

name: Palais Royal
instructions: Pour ingredients into a wine glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry.

name: Palm Breeze
instructions: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal amounts of orange juice and blue hawaiian punch, and serve.

name: Palmera
instructions: Shake and strain over one large ice cube in a wine glass.

name: Palmetto
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Float myer's rum on top and garnish with a pineapple spear.

name: Paloma
instructions: Pour the tequila into a salt-rimmed collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Splash lime juice on top, and serve.

name: Paloma #2
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice to the top. Squeeze in juice of half of a small lime. Sprinkle salt over top. Add tequila. Fill with Squirt. Give a little stir, then sprinkle a little salt on the top before serving (optional).

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2
instructions: Pour the tia maria, vodka and cherry brandy together into a pint glass. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill with equal amounts of dry cider and 7-up, and add ice cubes.

name: Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster
description:
The Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster is "The best [fictional] drink in existence" and appears many times in the series "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" where its effect is described as being "rather like having your brains smashed out with a slice of lemon, wrapped around a large gold brick". Due to the large fan base of this excellent franchise and the fact that no official (and actually pursuable) recipe for one was ever given by Douglas Adams the writer, supposed mixes of the drink have popped up all over the internet.

This is just another one. However, it does differ from some of the more mundane cocktails of the same name in the fact that it is actually served in an Ottawa nightclub - Zaphod Beeblebrox - and tastes fantastic despite not being quite as potent as the recipes involving Everclear, Bacardi 151 and all that lark. It also glows under ultra-violet lighting, giving that oh-so-crazy spaceage feel.Shake the orange juice, the Jack and the peach schnapps in a shaker 3/4 full with ice cubes. When it's chilled, strain into the highball glass and drizzle some of the blue Curacao liqueur over the top of it. Add a citrus twist (and, bizarrely, an olive if you're a DNA purist), sit back and be prepared to have your brain smashed out by gold bricks, lemons and allsorts.
instructions: Shake the orange juice, the Jack and the peach schnapps in a shaker 3/4 full with ice cubes. When it's chilled, strain into the highball glass and drizzle some of the blue Curacao liqueur over the top of it. Add a citrus twist (and, bizarrely, an olive if you're a DNA purist), sit back and be prepared to have your brain smashed out by gold bricks, lemons and allsorts.

name: Panama City Gin 'n' Juice
instructions: Fill a collins glass 3/4 full with ice. Slowly add the lime juice , then bulid with gin. Slowly fill with 7-Up leaving green and clear layers intact until just before drinking. Garnish with a twist of lime on a bamboo skewer, and serve.

name: Pansy Ass
instructions: Add ingredients to a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Panty Dropper
instructions: Pour kahlua and sloe gin into a tall, ice-filled glass. Fill with half and half, and serve.

name: Panty Dropper #2
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir. Garnish with a cherry or two, and serve.

name: Panty Remover #2
instructions: Freeze the pineapple chunks. Place them into a tall glass, add the gin, pineapple juice and mountain dew, and serve.

name: Panty Thief
instructions: Mix all ingredients well.

name: Papa Muminek
instructions: Pour the Canadian whisky, advocaat, creme de cacao, Tia Maria coffee liqueur, creme de bananes, milk and apple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and pour entire contents into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Papa Smurf
instructions: Mix and chill vodka and kool-aid. Crush blue popsicle and add to mixture. The crushed popsicle should settle at the bottom of drink, making it appear as a blue layer at the bottom and a red layer on top.

name: Papagena
instructions: Mix well in a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Papaw's Cider
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in blue curacao and rum. Fill up with Mountain Dew and splash sour mix on top. Stir.

name: Papaya Driver
instructions: Pour rum into a collins glass. Add papaya juice, and serve.

name: Papaya Sling
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water and pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the pineapple stick and serve.

name: Paradise #2
instructions:
Pour Captain Morgan and Malibu rum into an ice-filled beer pilsner. Fill the rest of the way with the pine-orange-banana juice, and serve. 

Blend the above together with a banana in a blender for another great tasting drink.

name: Paradise Bliss
instructions: Pour in vodka & rum. Follow with pineapple juice. Top off with cranberry. stir and enjoy! Try Dole's pineapple-banana juice for a great variation.

name: Paradise Cafe
instructions: Pour the spiced rum and hot coffee into a mug, and sweeten to taste. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Paradise Cola
instructions: Put ice into the bottom of any 20-oz. glass. Mix in the creme de cacao, the Parrot Bay, and the creme de banana. Fill with a can of Pepsi, or whichever cola suits you. Stir thoroughly and enjoy!

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Paradise In April
instructions: Mix the ingredients together in a glass half filled with ice.

name: Paradise Peaches and Cream
instructions: In blender combine 1 oz. Grenadine, 2 cups vanilla ice cream, 1/2 cup milk, 1 fresh ripe peach, and 4 oz. peach flavored vodka. Blend until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with peach wedge and cherry.

name: Paradise Quencher
instructions: Pour the rum, fruit juices and apricot liqueur into a blender. Add one cup of crushed ice. Blend well, and pour into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a fruit flag, and serve.

name: Paralyzer
instructions: Pour tequilla, vodka and kahlua over ice in a collins glass. Half-fill with coke, and top with light cream or milk. Stir gently with a straw, and serve.

name: Paralyzer #2
instructions: Build ingredients, in order, over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Parappa the Drunk Rappa
instructions: Pour shots over ice, add coke and strain into a collins glass.

name: Paris Opera
instructions: Pour into a pilsner three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Paris Paradise
instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender, mix together, and serve in a beer pilsner.

name: Parkeroo
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a small champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Parrot Bay Breeze
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass over crushed ice. Stir well, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Parrot Bay Mango Madras
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay mango rum over ice in a collins glass. Add cranberry and orange juice, stir and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay mango rum

name: Parrot Bay Pinada
instructions: Combine in a tall glass over ice, and stir well.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Parrot Bay Sunset
instructions: Combine in a tall glass over ice, stir well, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Parrot Cocktail
instructions: Stir and strain into a wine glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with red, green and yellow cherries on a stick.

name: Parrot Perch
instructions: Pour liquor, juice and syrup into a blender. Add a sliced banana and ice. Blend for 45 seconds or until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Parry Punch
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Garnish with a fresh peach slice of lime wedge, and serve.

name: Party Death
instructions: Add chilled soda's to a collins glass, and add chilled lemon vodka.

name: Party Gras
description: Blaire Kubie and Courtney Collins, both longtime and very well known bartenders in the Florida area, created this drink in a salute to Mardi Gras before venturing to New Orleans in 2006 for the festivities. Fill a mixing tin with ice. Pour the rum, melon liqueur, coconut rum, and pineapple juice into tin and shake. Pour contents into a hurricane glass. Top it with a splash of orange juice and float a swirl of grenadine atop that. Garnish with an orange and cherry 'flag', and serve.
instructions: Fill a mixing tin with ice. Pour the rum, melon liqueur, coconut rum, and pineapple juice into tin and shake. Pour contents into a hurricane glass. Top it with a splash of orange juice and float a swirl of grenadine atop that. Garnish with an orange and cherry 'flag', and serve.

name: Party Starter
instructions: Pour the Cointreau, lemon juice, lime juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Partymeister
instructions: Pour gin into a collins glass. Add malibu rum, and top with rose's lime juice (to taste). Fill with lemonade, add ice and serve with a straw.

name: Pasquale's Rico Suave
instructions: Fill Hurricane glass with ice, add Bailey's, dark Creme de Cacao, Frangelico, Kahlua and Jameson Irish Whiskey. Top off with milk, shake and enjoy!

name: Passcack Valley Orgasm
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an iced shaker and shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Passion
instructions: Blend the frozen grape juice and ice together in a blender. Add the rum and blend until smooth. Add whipped cream to desired smoothness. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Passion Beach
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve with fresh fruit on the rim of the glass.

name: Passion Cocktail
instructions: Add the coconut rum, white rum and sugar to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass. Fill with equal amounts of sour mix and pineapple juice, pre-chilled. Top with Sprite, and serve.

name: Passion Colada
instructions: Pour the white rum, cream, passion-fruit juice and coconut syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a pina colada glass. Garnish with a pineapple chunk or a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Passion Fruit Mojito
description:
"I came across this variation in Camden- North London, althought I'm sure its origins are further afield, as i first tasted the mojito many years ago while in brazil and it has been a favourite of mine ever since....the passion fruit addition is however sensational."CRUSH WELL, lime, sugar, soda, 8 to 10 limes leaves anda tea spoon of crushed ice, THEN ADD, ice, passion fruit and rum, THEN, mix vigerously for one minute, and garnish with rest of mint and a straw.

The muscovado sugar is part of a mojito's unique taste, if you find it too sweet -use less sugar add more lime!!

Some people i make this drink for like more passion fruit too!!
instructions:
CRUSH WELL, lime, sugar, soda, 8 to 10 limes leaves anda tea spoon of crushed ice, THEN ADD, ice, passion fruit and rum, THEN, mix vigerously for one minute, and garnish with rest of mint and a straw.

The muscovado sugar is part of a mojito's unique taste, if you find it too sweet -use less sugar add more lime!!

Some people i make this drink for like more passion fruit too!!

name: Passion Mimosa
instructions: Pour passion fruit juice into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne, decorate with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Passion Willy
description: Thanks to Tuan Waffoor, JUMEIRAH Beach Hotel, Dubai for this tropical drink.Shaken cocktail. Pour over ice. Serve in Hurricane glass, garnished with half a passion-fruit.....
instructions: Shaken cocktail. Pour over ice. Serve in Hurricane glass, garnished with half a passion-fruit.....

name: Passion Zombie
instructions: Shake all ingredients except 151 in cocktail shaker with ice. Pour everything into a hurricane glass. Float 151 on top.

name: Passionate Affair
instructions: Add the vodka and strawberry schnapps to a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Use equal parts of cranberry and orange juice to fill the glass. Serve with a straw.

name: Passionate Mist
instructions: Add 1.5 ounces of Passion Fruit Rum into glass. Fill glass with Sierra Mist. Stir and serve.

name: Passionate Screw
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.......Garnish with cherry & an Orange wedge.

name: Passionate Strap
instructions: Combine all ingredients together with crushed ice in a blender, and blend well. Pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with an open strawberry pressed onto the edge of the glass, and serve.

name: Passionate Sunset
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Passionate Toro
instructions: Stir ingredients together on the rocks in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Passoa 'n' Coke
instructions: Build drink in a large rocks glass over ice. Pour in the Passoa, top up with Coke. Drop in a cherry and serve.

name: Passoa Orange
instructions: Pour the Passoa into a collins glass almost filled with ice. Fill to the top with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Passoa Recovery
instructions: Pour passoa and lemon juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with soda water, and serve.

name: Passoa Sweet Dreams
instructions: Shake and serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Pat Quinn
instructions: Pour the orange pop into a highball glass. Add the scotch whiskey, stir, and serve.

name: Patria Colada
instructions: Add ingredients to blender with crushed ice. Blend, adding ice until desired consistency is reached. pour into a glass and garnish with tropical umbrellas and shredded coconut if available.

name: Patrick's Bloody Mother
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a collins glass, stir a little and serve.

name: Patriot Missile
instructions: Pour half a bottle of Smirnoff Ice into a pint glass. Then add 3/4 oz. of grenadine along the inside of glass, so it settles at the bottom. In a separate shaker, combine 1/2 oz. Black Haus and 1/2 oz. blue curacao with ice. Shake contents and pour into a 1 oz. shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass and drink quickly.

name: Patsy Mix
instructions: Pour brandy into a glass over ice. Add babycham pear cider, and serve.

name: Patt's Tea
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass.

name: Patti's Irish Bloody Mary
instructions: Rim a coffee mug with celery salt, and pour bailey's over ice into it. Fill with bloody mary mix, garnish with a pickle spear and filberts, and serve.

name: Paul's Manhattan
instructions: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass, strain into collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Pauligno
instructions: Fill up a highball glass with ice cubes. Pour the Southern Comfort, and fill the rest of the glass with 7-up. Serve.

name: Pavlova Supreme
instructions: Pour the vodka and creme de cassis into a red wine glass filled with finely shaven ice, and serve.

name: Pea Soup
instructions: Mix above ingredients in a glass. Add ice. Serve. Enjoy!

name: Pea Soup
description: Pea Soup is a sweet and fruity-tasting drink named after it's pea-green appearance.Pour the Absolut Apeach into a highball glass, with the mango juice and Midori. Stir well, and serve.
instructions: Pour the Absolut Apeach into a highball glass, with the mango juice and Midori. Stir well, and serve.

name: Peabody
instructions: Shake everything except Ginger Ale with ice; strain into a collins glass with a handful of ice cubes. Fill with the ginger ale.

name: Peach 200
instructions: Pour koskenkorva peach vodka into a glass, and fill with coca-cola. Stir, and serve cold.

name: Peach Beseech
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Peach Blaster
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Peach Blossom
instructions: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with ginger ale, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Peach Blow Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Peach Bowl
instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Peach Brandy Julep
instructions: Strip the leaves from one sprig of mint and muddle them together with the peach liqueur and wedges. Add cognac (or bourbon) and shake. Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice and stir until the outside of the glass frosts. Add more crushed ice, if needed. Garnish with a second mint sprig, and serve.

name: Peach Cider
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps and apple cider into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Peach Daiquiri
instructions: Combine peach, lime juice, sugar and rum in a blender; puree until smooth. Almost fill a large wine glass with crushed ice. Pour peach mixture over, garnish with a mint sprig and serve immediately.

name: Peach Delight
instructions: Pit the peaches and cut into quarters. Add to a blender with the Absolut peach vodka and the sugar. Blend well and serve in appropriate glass or cup.

name: Peach Harpoon
instructions: Stir together in an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Peach Iced Tea
instructions: Pour iced tea into a mason jar. Add peach schnapps and stir.

name: Peach Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Give a couple shakes and pour into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of Coke to make it a little dark on the top half (may use more coke for a less stronger drink). Garnish if desired, and serve.

name: Peach May Cocktail
instructions: Mix together in a hurricane glass.

name: Peach Melba Freeze
instructions: Combine the peach schnapps, black-raspberry liqueur, hazelnut liqueur, vanilla ice cream, light cream and raspberry jam in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pourinto a parfait glass, garnish with a peach slice, and serve.

name: Peach Mimosa
instructions: Add all ingredients into a champagne flute and stir. Garnish with a slice of peach.

name: Peach on the Beach
description: Peach on the Beach was created at Grindstone Brewery in Columbia MO (home of the Tigers) on a fine Sunday morning by bartender Jake Maulin.Fill a highball glass with ice, and add the vodka, schnapps, and pineapple juice. Fill with cranberry juice. Stir and serve.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, and add the vodka, schnapps, and pineapple juice. Fill with cranberry juice. Stir and serve.

name: Peach Panuchi
description: Peach Panuchi was invented by Korey Eby in Fort Wayne, Indiana on a night when he had nothing to drink but tequila and a variety of Faygo; after testing all flavors, he found peach was the best.Stir ingredients together over ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Peach Passion
instructions: Pour vodka into a mixer/glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the triple sec, schnapps and pink lemonade. Stir and pour into a highball glass.

name: Peach Pussy
instructions: Stir ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Serve with an orange peel twist.

name: Peach Sangaree
instructions: Pour the peach brandy into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda, and stir gently. Float the port on top. Dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Peach Tea Cooler
instructions: Mix and serve on the rocks.

name: Peach Tequila
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lime juice, stir and drop lime slice into drink.

name: Peach Treat
instructions: Shake brandy and orange juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Top with chilled champagne, add the peach slice, and serve.

name: Peach Up
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Peach Up #2
instructions:
In a high ball glass, mix the Absolut Apeach vodka , Sprite or 7 up
and add a splash of cranberry juice.

name: Peachbreeze
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins Glass filled with ice.

name: Peaches and Cream
instructions: Pour kahlua and schnapps into a highball glass. Fill with milk, shake, and serve.

name: Peachface
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a collins glass.

name: Peachumba
instructions: First the Schnapps, then at least 1 oz. of Vodka. Fill up with Chocolate milk.

name: Peachy Amaretto
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a 12-oz parfait glass filled with finely shaven ice, and serve.

name: Peachy Colada
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, peach schnapps, coconut cream and pineapple juice into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until slushy, pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Peachy Comfort
instructions: Pour southern comfort and peach schnapps into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Peachy Dream
instructions: Line the top of a hurricane glass with sugar. Fill cup with ice and add peach schnapps and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine syrup. Garnish with a sword and cherry, and serve.

name: Peachy Fuzzy
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Peachy Grace
instructions: Combine the rum, triple sec and 1/2 a peach (cut into quarters) in a blender. Blend and pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour mix, and serve.

name: Peachy Green
instructions: Fill 1/3 of a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Midori, peach schnapps, and orange juice. Shake until well chilled and pour into highball glass. Fill glass with cold 7-Up. Add an orange slice on top.

name: Peachy Pirate
instructions: Fill highball with ice, add rum and schnapps, fill rest of glass with OJ, garnish with cherries.

name: Peachy Screw
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, peach schnapps, Malibu rum and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add sour mix and orange juice to taste. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Peachy Screw Gin Fizz
instructions: Put some ice cubes into a glass. Add Gin, Triple Sec, and Peach Schnapps. Pour in tonic and orange juice. Stir. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Peachy Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients into hurricane glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon.

name: Peanut Butter Cup
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur, Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk, stir well, and serve.

name: Peanut Coffee Frenzy
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Add the 7-up, and serve.

name: Peapicker
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass. Add lemonade, a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Pearasite
instructions: Pour the gin, tonic water and pear syrup into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Pearl Diver
instructions: Mix all ingredients together, shake, and strain over ice in a highball glass.

name: Pearl Harbor
instructions: Add ingredients to a highball glass with ice.

name: Pearl Harbour
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and maraschino cherry on a stick. Serve with a stirrer and a straw.

name: Pearl Harbour Revisited
instructions: Add a splash of vanilla essence to an otherwise standard scotch and coke.

name: Pearl Jam
instructions: Pour orange vodka into an ice-filled highball glass. Add club soda, top with orange juice, and serve.

name: Pedro Collins
instructions: Pour bacardi limon into an ice-filled collins glass. Add sweet and sour mix, and fill with equal parts of club soda and 7-up.

name: Pee Wee Herman
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Peejon's Kiss
instructions: Extract juice from three lemon wedges and add to a highball glass over three ice cubes. Pour in the iced tea and dark rum, and mix well. Pour into a cocktail glass, and garnish with cherries.

name: Peg
instructions: Add bourbon to a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with coke and add lime juice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Pelvic Crusher
instructions: Pour the apple pucker and vodka into a highball glass filled with cracked or cubed ice. Fill with zima, stir gently and serve.

name: Penelope
instructions: Mix alcohols in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Add the juice and grenadine, and shake. Pour into a hurricane glass (incl. ice), add puree and serve.

name: Penguin
instructions: Pour the vodka, blue curacao and lemon-lime mix into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill almost with sprite, floating the banana liqueur on top.

name: Penguin's Surprise
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Penguino
instructions: Add light rum and cointreau to an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with tonic water, and serve with a cherry.

name: Penis Colarous
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour entire contents into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Pensacola Bushwacker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender (ice cream optional) with two cups of ice, and blend until mixed. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Pep Up
instructions: Pour the peppermint schnapps into a highball glass. Fill with 7-up, stir gently, and serve.

name: Pepe
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Pepperclear
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Peppermint Aztec
instructions: Pour milk and liquors into a coffee mug, and add a peppermint stick or candy cane.

name: Peppermint Crisp
instructions: Blend the creme de menthe and kahlua together. Fill with ice cold milk, add a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Peppermint Park
instructions: Pour the gin and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a large champagne flute. Top with champagne, add a straw, and serve.

name: Peppermint Penguin
instructions: Combine the green creme de menthe, chocolate mint liqueur, cookies and cream with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a chocolate cookie and a cherry, and serve.

name: Pepsi-Clear
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Percival's Sister
instructions: Mix thoroughly in a collins glass without ice, and serve.

name: Perfect Margarita
instructions:
1. Pour ingredients into a shaker with crushed ice. Squeeze in the juice of two lime wedges, and shake well. 

2. Rim the outside of a white wine glass with lime and salt, and add fresh crushed ice. 

3. Strain the shaken mixture into the glass, and add the juice from a further lime wedge. Serve.

name: Perfect Parrot
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Perfect Screw
instructions: Pour the Harvest pear schnapps, orange juice and vodka into a highball glass, in that order. Serve.

name: Pernod Fizz
instructions: Pour into a wine glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Perplexed Pimp
instructions: Pour the cognac, raspberry schnapps, lemonade and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain over crushed ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Perroquet
instructions: Pour pernod and mint syrup over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water, stir well, and serve.

name: Pervert
instructions: Shake everything with ice and pour into collins glasses.

name: Pesticidal Cherries
instructions: Add the grenadine to the tonic water in a mixing glass, and mix well. Add the cherry cola and one shot of vodka at the same time. Place the 5 cherries in a seperate shot of vodka and soak for at least 10 minutes (cherries can be soaked in advance and kept in the refrigerator). Remove cherries and add this shot of vodka to the mixing glass. Stir, strain into a collins glass, and serve. Garnish with some more cherries, and serve.

name: Phantasm
instructions: Shake everything except cola with ice; strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with cola and add a puff of whipped cream on top.

name: Phantasmic Explosion
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Phantom
instructions: Pour licor 43 into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add absolut vodka, fill with milk, and mix.

name: Phat Pussy
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker, fill with ice and stir. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Phillips Head
instructions: Mix everything together with lots of ice.

name: Phillips Screwdriver
instructions: Place 2 - 3 ice cubes into a glass. Add vodka and sunny delight (more or less to taste), stir and serve.

name: Phoenix Paradise
instructions: Combine ingredients with four ice cubes in a blender for 20 - 30 seconds. Pour into a highball glass or gibralter glass, and serve.

name: Phuck Suck
instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add lime juice and fill with cranberry juice to taste. Add splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Picasso 1
instructions: Combine ingredients, in order, in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a collins glass with ice cubes. Top with schweppes russian. Garnish with a slice of lime, a mint leaf and a straw.

name: Pick-Me-Up
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Picker's Peach
instructions: Blend in a blender until smooth. Add a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a wedge-like slice of peach, speared with a cherry. Serve with straws.

name: Pickled Mountie
instructions: Pour ingredients into glass filled with ice. Mix. Can also be mixed in a shaker and served over ice.

name: Pickled Tink
instructions:
1. At least 3 hours before serving, place small jar of candied cherries w/ juice, several slices of large cucumber into a small cooking pot with í‚Â½ cup of grenadine and 1 cup of water. Let simmer on lowest heat setting for 15 minutes.

2. Strain out the cucumber slices and chill on a plate in refrigerator.

3. Pour remaining fruit mixture into a blender and blend to a smooth consistency.

4. Pour mixture into buttered cupcake tin and place in the freezer until frozen. (Number of potential servings depends on number of í¢â‚¬Å“fruit cupsí¢â‚¬Â made) 

5. Combine;
í‚Â· 4 oz. - Baileyí¢â‚¬â„¢s Irish Cream
í‚Â· 2 oz. - Rumple Minze Peppermint Liqueur
í‚Â· 1 oz. - Goldschlager Cinnamon Schnapps
í‚Â· 1 oz. - Bacardi Limon Rum
í‚Â· 1 frozen í¢â‚¬Å“fruit cupí¢â‚¬Â of setup mixture
í‚Â· í‚Â½ cup of ice

Blend thoroughly and pour into a chilled tall (Tea) glass (about 12 ounces). Place a single cucumber slice at the top as a garnish & dust lightly with paprika.

name: Picon Limon
instructions: Stir amer picon, creme de cassis and lime juice with cracked ice and strain into a large chilled wine glass (should hold 16 ounces). Fill with soda water, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Picon Punch
instructions: Shake the amer picon, lemon juice and grenadine well with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with soda, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Piledriver
instructions: Add rum and vodka to a beer mug. Top with coca-cola and orange juice, and add ice if possible.

name: Pillow Biter
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey and peach schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a powder-rimmed highball glass. Add a twist of citrus fruit for flavor, and serve.

name: Pimm's Cup
instructions: Pour pimm's no.1 into a highball glass. Add a twist of lemon and fill with 7-up. Garnish with a slice of cucumber.

name: Pimm's Mojito
description: "This easily the most popular cocktail at the bar I work in, in London.  We use Grey Goose Citron vodka fused with about a dozen raspberrys."Place the mint leaves, rasberrys, lime wedges and strawberrys (sliced in half) into a cocktail shaker.  Add a splash of sugar syrup and muddle well.  Add the pimms and rasberry vodka.  Prepare enough crushed ice to fill the highball glass to just over half way.  Add 5/6 ice cubes to the shaker and shake well.  Add the crushed ice to the glass and then strain the contents of the shaker over the crushed ice.  Top up with soda.  Add two straws and garnish with Strawberry/Lime Wheel/Mint Sprig or all three.
instructions: Place the mint leaves, rasberrys, lime wedges and strawberrys (sliced in half) into a cocktail shaker.  Add a splash of sugar syrup and muddle well.  Add the pimms and rasberry vodka.  Prepare enough crushed ice to fill the highball glass to just over half way.  Add 5/6 ice cubes to the shaker and shake well.  Add the crushed ice to the glass and then strain the contents of the shaker over the crushed ice.  Top up with soda.  Add two straws and garnish with Strawberry/Lime Wheel/Mint Sprig or all three.

name: Pimm's No. 1
instructions: Pour Pimm's over ice cubes in a large highball glass. Fill with 7-up, add twists of lemon and cucumber peel, and serve.

name: Pimm's Punch
instructions: Place a slice of lemon, half a strawberry and mint leaves in the bottom of a highball glass. Pour alcohol in. Fill glass upto top with ice, and pour lemonade over. Stir and serve.

name: Pimm's Rangoon
instructions: Pour pimm's no.1 over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and garnish with a lemon and cucumber peel.

name: Pimm's Royal
instructions: Pour pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with champagne, garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

name: Pimm's Turbo
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: Pimp Cocktail
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Pimp Cocktail #2
instructions: Add jagermeister to a highball glass half-filled with ice. Fill with battery, and serve.

name: Pimp Daddy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a beer mug filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Pimp Juice
description: Pimp Juice was inspired by the song of the same name. It is popular at Kappa Sigma Fraternity in San Luis Obispo, California, near where a Mr David McAninch first created it.Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Pimp Juice #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Pimp Punch
instructions: Mix and pour over ice.

name: Pina Colada
description: Old-style recipe for this popular drink. The coconut cream needs to have the right consistancy, some find the alternative, coconut milk to be too thin, however you can add condensed milk to coconut milk to bring up it's thickness. Add pineapple juice if desired.Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.
instructions: Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.

name: Pina Colada #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with crushed ice. Mix well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh pineapple, and serve.

name: Pina Colada #3
instructions: Crush your ice into a blender. Add the Malibu, crushed pineapple, and coconut as above. Blend until smooth, pour into a pina-colada glass, and serve.

name: Pina Colada #4
instructions: Add all of the above ingredients to a blender with plenty of crushed ice, and blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish as desired and serve.

ingredients.name: Mr & Mrs T's® pina colada mix

name: Pina Colada Royal
instructions: Place the rums, crushed pineapple and ice cream in a blender with 1 1/2 cups of crushed ice. Blend until frozen; add more ice if required. Pour into a parfait glass, and serve.

name: Pina Vina
instructions: Blend with a glassful of crushed ice in a blender until smooth. Pour into a goblet, and garnish with a pineapple chunk and a slice of lemon.

name: Pinchaser
instructions: Add vodka, Southern Comfort, first amount of grenadine, sloe gin, and triple sec to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add juices and shake briefly. Pour into a highball glass and drizzle a further splash of grenadine around the edge of the glass. Garnish with a cherry and slice of orange, and serve.

name: Pine Cone
instructions: Pour southern comfort on the rocks in a tall glass. Add amaretto, fill with pineapple juice, and stir.

name: Pine Needle
instructions: Pour ingredients, in the order listed, into an ice-filled highball glass. Vary to taste.

name: Pineapple Banana Refresher
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a slice of banana, and serve.

name: Pineapple Bomber
instructions: Pour equal parts of amaretto and southern comfort into an ice-filled highball glass. Add (at least) another equal part of pineapple juice to fill, and serve.

name: Pineapple Bomber #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Pineapple Cocktail
instructions: Pour rum, pineapple juice, grenadine and lemon juice into a collins glass. Fill with club soda, or to taste. Serve with ice.

name: Pineapple Cooler
instructions: Pour white wine, pineapple juice, powdered sugar and two-ounces of carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and an orange spiral over the rim.

name: Pineapple Currant
instructions: Shake everything except the soda with ice; strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with soda.

name: Pineapple Delight
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass over ice and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Pineapple Drink
instructions: Pour rum over pineapple chunks in a tall glass. Add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Top with sprite, stir, and serve.

name: Pineapple Fizz
instructions: Shake everything except the soda with ice; strain into a highball glass. Fill with the soda.

name: Pineapple Francine
instructions: Blend everything with a cupful of ice until desired smoothness is reached. Add ice if necessary. Pour into glasses.

name: Pineapple Julep
instructions: Muddle the leaves from two sprigs of mint, with the pineapple wedges and simply syrup, in a mixing glass. Add bourbon and ice, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice, and stir well until frosted. Garnish with two further mint sprigs, and serve.

name: Pineapple Monyca
instructions: Pour pineapple juice, triple sec and schnapps into a collins glass. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Pineapple Snap
instructions: Pour Ketel One vodka, triple sec and Absolut Mandrin into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a highball glass. Add pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Pineapple Tea
instructions: Add liquors and sour mix to an ice-filled collins glass. Top with pineapple juice (to taste) and serve.

name: Pineapple Wine Cooler
instructions: Shake everything except soda with ice; strain into a collins glass. Add 2 oz. of soda and garnish with a pineapple spear if desired.

name: Pineapples 'n' Cream
instructions: Give all ingredients 5 or 6 good shakes in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a highball glass (without straining). Serve.

name: Pineau-cchio
instructions: Rim a wine glass with orange juice and caster sugar, and fill with broken ice. Pour in the ingredients, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Pinebrook Screwdriver (Scranton)
description: Favorite Drink of the Pinebrookians of Scranton Pennsylvania. Dedicated to Frank, Bob, Irish, Frankie, Pinebrook Market (formally known as Madzins), Ray, Mayor Dougherty, Capouse Avenue Pool, The Monkey Behind the Plexiglass, All the Cops in Pinebrook specifically Derick the Cop, The Melba, The Jukebox, Lords Court, Franks Mom, Antonios Pizza, and Good Times.Take any empty container. Mix Orange Koolaid (small packets only) to directions on packet. Once Mixed take a jug or anyting you can find and add ice (where available, if its winter do what Pinebrook people do and use snow if need be). Add 8 oz. Orange Koolaid and 2 Shots of Bankers Club Vodka. Top off with a splash of Hurricane Malt Liquor.
instructions: Take any empty container. Mix Orange Koolaid (small packets only) to directions on packet. Once Mixed take a jug or anyting you can find and add ice (where available, if its winter do what Pinebrook people do and use snow if need be). Add 8 oz. Orange Koolaid and 2 Shots of Bankers Club Vodka. Top off with a splash of Hurricane Malt Liquor.

name: Pinerito
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Pink Banana
instructions: Pour creme de banane into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the pink lemonade, and serve.

name: Pink Beaner
instructions: Add tequila, pineapple-coconut juice and grenadine to a beer mug three-quartes filled with crushed ice. Stir until pink in color.

name: Pink Bliss
instructions: Pour Smirnoff vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a large squeeze of lemon juice; this un-bitters the Vodka taste, if you want it sweeter. Fill to the top with Schweppes pink lemonade, and serve. Comes out a transperant pink colour!

name: Pink Cad
instructions: Stir everything into a highball glass with ice.

name: Pink Cello
instructions: Pour limoncello and vodka over ice in a collins glass, and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Pink Coral
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into a large goblet. Garnish with tropical fruit slices/pieces if available, and serve.

name: Pink Cotton Candy
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass, stir, and serve.

name: Pink Cream Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice, sugar, cream, and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, and stir well.

name: Pink Crystal
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Pink Dink
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour equal amounts of Strawberry & Peach Schnapps into glass until glass is 1/2 full. Pour equal amounts of 7-up & Lemon Sour (The kind in a bar gun is the best)into the glass until almost to the top. Top off with a splash of Gredadine. Stir well with straw or shake.

name: Pink Elephants On Parade
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Pink Faced Liar
instructions: Shake everything (except grenadine) with ice. Pour slowly into glasses and add grenadine.

name: Pink Fizzy
instructions: Pour watermelon schnapps into an ice-filled highball glass until half-full. Fill with sprite or 7-up, stir, and serve.

name: Pink Flamingo
instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and serve in a tall glass.

name: Pink Flamingo #2
instructions: Add crushed ice, vanilla schnapps, and grenadine to a hurricane glass. Add a few splashes of orange juice and fill with cream. Garnish with two maraschino cherries.

name: Pink Fuzzy Pussy
instructions: Shake juice, rums, and schnapps with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add ice cubes. Add grenadine slowly and allow to settle. Stir before drinking.

name: Pink Gin
instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

name: Pink Gin Tonic
instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, top with campari (to add more colour and taste), and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Pink Goody
instructions: Build in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple slice, and serve.

name: Pink Inside
instructions: Shake and pour over ice. Tastes exactly like a Jolly Rancher.

name: Pink Lemonade #2
instructions: Add ice, vodka, sour mix, cranberry and lime juice to a shaker. Shake and strain into a highball glass with a garnish of lemon.

name: Pink Lover
instructions: Mix the frozen lemonade and vodka first. Then add cherry juice and triple sec. Garnish with a candy cane.

name: Pink Mikey
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Pink Milk
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker/blender and mix until frothy.

name: Pink Millenium
instructions: Mix vodka, cranberry juice and sugar syrup, and pour into a champagne coupe or flute. Fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine.

name: Pink Monsoon
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in a shot of vodka and a splash of cranberry juice. Fill the highball with Fresca and stir. Refreshing drink on a warm summer day.

name: Pink Moose
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Pink Panther
instructions: Mix strawberry-kiwi crystal light, add your favorite brand of vodka, and serve over ice.

name: Pink Pantie Pulldown
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade, followed by Sprite, and serve.

name: Pink Panties
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Pink Panties #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except cream) together in a blender, adjusting unspecified amounts to your own taste. Pour into a pitcher, and serve into margarita glasses topped with a sliced strawberry and whipped cream.

name: Pink Passion
instructions: Build in a highball glass, in order, with ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedges.

name: Pink Penis
instructions: Add orange juice, cherry limeade, and alcohol into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into champagne flute. Slowly pour in the grenadine so it settles on bottom. Drink like a shooter.

name: Pink Pillow
instructions: Pour the vodka into a beer mug, and add grenadine until pink. Add equal parts of sour mix and ginger ale until full.

name: Pink Planet
instructions: Rim a wine glass with strawberry liqueur and caster sugar. Blend all ingredients (except champagne) briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into the glass and add champagne. Garnish with a strawberry-half, and serve with short straws.

name: Pink Pussy
instructions: Over ice in collins glass pour 2parts lemon rum with one part teuila,dash Grand Marnier,fill w/sour mix then add just a bit of cranberry for color cover w/shaker and give it enough shake to froth.

name: Pink Rose Fizz
instructions: Shake everything with ice (except for the soda). Strain into a highball glass, fill the glass with soda.

name: Pink Russian
instructions: Pour liquor into a highball glass with ice. Fill with milk or cream, and shake.

name: Pink Torpedo
instructions: Stir over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Pinky Colada
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with an amarelle cherry, and serve.

name: Pintado
description: Pintado in spanish means 'painted'. It is very popular in Mexico City where people don't like their drinks too sweet. It is really a less sweet version of cuba libre without the lime.As with most simple cocktails first place ice cubes and then the liquor. Fill almost to the top with soda and at the end give it a splash of coke.
instructions: As with most simple cocktails first place ice cubes and then the liquor. Fill almost to the top with soda and at the end give it a splash of coke.

name: Pinto Bomb
instructions: Drop a shot glass of really cheap vodka into a pint glass of really cheap beer and you have yourself the infamous Pinto Bomb!

name: Pirate Flag
instructions: Mix liquors and rum together with Hawiian Punch in a beer mug 1/3 full of ice. Add 7-Up soda and serve garnished with a skewer of pineapple chunks and cherries if desired.

name: Pirate Float
instructions: Add all ingredients, in order, into a highball glass. Stir if desired.

name: Pirate Margarita
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Pirate of the Caribbean
instructions: Build over ice in a tall glass.

name: Pirate's Tea
instructions: Pour spiced rum into an ice-filled mason jar. Add coca-cola to the ridge of the jar, and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Pirate's Treasure
instructions: Combine ingredients in glass.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
instructions: Shake alcoholic ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a highball glass filled half way with ice, then add juices. Garnish using a pineapple slice with a sword.

name: Pisang Cold
instructions: Combine in a highball glass with two to three ice cubes, shake, and serve.

name: Pisco Sour #2
instructions: Shake ingredients vigorously with ice. Strain into a champagne flute, and add the bitters as an aromatic garnish.

name: Piscola
instructions: Pour pisco over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with coca-cola or other soft drink, stir, and serve.

name: Piss in the Snow
instructions: Pour mountain dew into a large glass with ice cubes. Add vodka and avalanche schnapps, both pre-chilled. Stir and serve.

name: Piss Water
instructions: Combine brandy, peach schnapps and Triple Sec over ice in a pint glass. Fill with Fresca. Stir.

name: Pissed Off Japanese Minnow Farmer
instructions: Mix all the alcohol except the Midori and equal parts of sweet sour mix and cranberry juice to fill the glass.  Shake and serve over ice with the Midori added to the top of the glass.  A cherry makes it look pretty if that matters to you.

name: Pissing Parrot
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum and cranberry schnapps over ice in a beer pilsner. Add 7-up, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Pitbull On Crack
instructions: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice and add the alcohol. Stir and top off with cream, and serve.

name: Pittsburgh Lemon
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir and garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Pittsburgh Sunrise
instructions: Stir and pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Pixie Stick
instructions: Pour gin and midori over ice in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up, and garnish with a maraschino cherry. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Pixie Stix
instructions: Pour southern comfort and amaretto over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix, top with sprite, and float grenadine on top. Garnish with maraschino cherries.

name: Pjolter Bay
instructions: Shake together with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon and a cherry, and serve.

name: Plain Jane Screw
instructions: Mix everything together.

name: Plane Bomb
instructions: Pour gin and ouzo into a glass of Red Bull. Stir.

name: Planter's Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients and serve over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a maraschino cherry.

name: Planter's Punch (Americanised)
instructions: Shake and strain all ingredients (except soda) into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add the soda. Garnish with fruit and a mint sprig. Sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve with straws.

name: Plasse Knock Out
instructions: Mix liquors in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

name: Plastered Possum
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker and pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Playboy Bunny
instructions: Add all ingredients besides sugar into a blender and blend well. Dampen the rim of the glass and decorate with sugar. Pour drink into glass and top off with staw.

name: Plum Cocktail
instructions: Add liquors and fill with equal amounts of cranberry juice and sweet and sour Mix. Shake well and pour into a highball glass.

name: Poca-Hola
instructions: Funnel the punt e mes, campari, vermouth and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml), roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard, stein or british pint), and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle, and serve.

name: Pocket Rocket
description: This drink was invented by Chuck Nourse in Van Dyne, Wisconsin when the local bar ran out of orange juice to make Screwdrivers. The clever bartender substituted Orange Hooch (now defunct), getting Chuck very drunk to which he declared the drink "puts a rocket in your pocket!". The drink was then made famous in Eau Claire, WI on the UWEC campus, and is also a mainstay in the Eagle River, WI and Minneapolis, MN areas. In a pint sized glass filled with ice, pour the glass half full of vodka and then top with mix. Orange mixes best, with berry flavors also a favorable option. Skyy vodka is preferred, as it mixes well and is not overly expensive for the quantities used in this type of drink.
instructions: In a pint sized glass filled with ice, pour the glass half full of vodka and then top with mix. Orange mixes best, with berry flavors also a favorable option. Skyy vodka is preferred, as it mixes well and is not overly expensive for the quantities used in this type of drink.

name: Poinsetta
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a champagne glass, and serve.

name: Poire Fantastic
instructions: Pour poire au cognac pear liqueur into a highball glass. Add sprite, and ice if desired.

name: Poison
instructions: Mix vodka and parfait d'amour in a highball glass. Fill with bitter lemon, and serve.

name: Poison Purple Death
description:
"The most increadable sour in the world, you can split this up into MEAN shots or sit back and drink a jar like I prefer to do..."
You may also wish to try this style of drink with other Kool-Aid flavors such as Rasberry Lemonade with Lemonade, Strawberry-Kiwi with Grape, ect. ect. Lemon Lime with Green Apple Sourpuss is also a nice mix. experiment and have fun, invented by AJ Brown and Jeff Potter in northern Alberta 2003.1. Pour ice cold vodka into a clean mason jar.
2. Add Kool-Aid powders in any order, while stirring constantly.
3. Close and shake vigorously.
4. Open and enjoy with Caution, will stain almost anything

Do not add ice or water.

(If you wish to dilute, use Rasberry Sourpuss, or Cranberry Juice to keep the sour flavor)
instructions:
1. Pour ice cold vodka into a clean mason jar.
2. Add Kool-Aid powders in any order, while stirring constantly.
3. Close and shake vigorously.
4. Open and enjoy with Caution, will stain almost anything

Do not add ice or water.

(If you wish to dilute, use Rasberry Sourpuss, or Cranberry Juice to keep the sour flavor)

name: Poison Sumac
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Poisonous Dog
description: Simple but deadly, bites like a dog but leaves a sting like a viper. Invented by two Americans in a moment of desperation while visiting Iceland in Fall of 2004 and has since grown in popularity in parts of Iceland and South Carolina. To some, it's the only way to make Brenavin drinkable. A warning, though: the effects of the poisonous dog sneak up on you suddenly, more so than just about any other drink in my experience; you'll sip it for a little while and feel nothing, and then BAM.Couldn't be simpler to make. Simply fill a beer mug halfway up with Brenavin and fill the other half up with Icelandic Orange Soda. Regular American OJ can be substituted if necessary.
instructions: Couldn't be simpler to make. Simply fill a beer mug halfway up with Brenavin and fill the other half up with Icelandic Orange Soda. Regular American OJ can be substituted if necessary.

name: Poker Face
instructions: Pour tequila, Cointreau and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Poker in the Lounge
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Polar Attraction
instructions: Pour the brandy into a highball glass and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Polar Bear #2
instructions: Blend with ice in a highball glass.

name: Polar Bear Cooler
instructions: Pour into a collins glass filled with broken ice and add a spiral of lemon. Garnish with an orange wedge and cherry. Serve with straws.

name: Polar Razz
instructions: Blend everything with ice.  Serve in a parfait glass.

name: Polar-Roller
instructions: Funnel the cointreau, armagnac and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml), roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard, stein or british pint), and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle, and serve.

name: Poliuke
instructions: Mix everything into glass with ice.

name: Polkagris
instructions: Mix ingredients in a highball glass. Add one or two ice cubes and cherries. Serve with a thick, red and white striped straw.

name: Polla
instructions: Mix gently in a tall glass. Fill with Squirt and add salt to taste. Doesn't give hard hangovers.

name: Pollenade
instructions: Combine the three liquors and shake. Serve over ice in a collins glass, floating lemonade to top, and serve.

name: Pomegranate Slam-it
instructions: Add liqueur and rum to a glass with ice. Fill with Sobe A-rush.

name: Pompous Mexican
description:
The Pompous Mexican is a cocktail made from Corona beer, Tanqueray gin and lemon juice (ReaLemon brand is recommended). It's popular in New York Tri-State Area & San Francisco. The ingredients complement each other as the beer smooths out the gin, and the gin/lemon de-fizzes the beer.

This drink was created by Jon C. Hodgson in the summer of 2003. It was a hot summer, and he was alternating between icy Coronas and refreshing Gin & Tonics. One day he couldn't decide which one to have, so he simply combined the two (mostly... admittedly he left out the tonic altogether).1. Take a sip (or pour out) a small amount of the Corona, down to where the neck widens, creating room for the other ingredients.
2. Carefully pour the Tanqueray & lemon juice into the bottle of Corona.
3. Cap the bottle tightly with your thumb, invert until the ingredients mix fully.
4. Drink and enjoy.

Notes
* The Corona should be cold (from a refrigerator).
* While not required, the lemon juice should be cold (from a refrigerator) and the Tanqueray should be chilled (in a freezer).
* "More" is not "better" - Using more than a half shot of gin or lemon will ruin the flavor.
* Gins vary widely in flavor. While other gins can be used, the original gin used by the creator is Tanqueray.
* Don't use lime as a substitute for lemon.

2. Carefully pour the Tanqueray & lemon juice into the bottle of Corona.
3. Cap the bottle tightly with your thumb, invert until the ingredients mix fully.
4. Drink and enjoy.

Notes
* The Corona should be cold (from a refrigerator).
* While not required, the lemon juice should be cold (from a refrigerator) and the Tanqueray should be chilled (in a freezer).
* "More" is not "better" - Using more than a half shot of gin or lemon will ruin the flavor.
* Gins vary widely in flavor. While other gins can be used, the original gin used by the creator is Tanqueray.
* Don't use lime as a substitute for lemon.

name: Pomtini
instructions:
Remove seeds from pomegranite and crush to extract juice.  Add vodka to seeds and let set for a couple hours.  Add sugar and shake. 

Mix 3 shots vodka mix 1 shot vermouth and 3 shots apple juice.

name: Ponche De Creme
instructions: Lightly beat all ingredients except bitters. Add an amount of crushed ice such that it just absorbs the mixture. After filling glasses, add a dash of bitters to each glass.

name: Pond Scum
instructions: Pour into a highball glass. Float Irish cream on top, and serve.

name: Poon Juice
instructions: Serve in an 8-oz highball glass.

name: Poontang
instructions: Mix vodka and triple sec in a hurricane glass. Add tang, to taste, and serve.

name: Pootie Tang
description: Pootie Tang is a "poor man's Fuzzy Navel.", whose name comes from the ridiculous, yet somewhat funny movie. Created by Dustin and Drew, in Boone, NC.Pour peach schnapps into a highball glass, and add Tang. Fill with water, stir well, and serve.
instructions: Pour peach schnapps into a highball glass, and add Tang. Fill with water, stir well, and serve.

name: Pop the Cherry
instructions: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Popped Cherry
instructions: Serve over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry.

name: Poppin' Tha Cherry
instructions: Pour into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Drop in a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Porch Monkey
instructions: Pour vodka and grapefruit schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, stir well, and serve.

name: Porky Bone
instructions: Let maple syrup collect at the bottom of a highball glass, and lightly mix the other ingredients, with a few ice cubes, over the top.

name: Port Chicago Punch
instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Add vodka and rum, then fill with pineapple and orange juice in equal parts, leaving room to add a generous dose of grenadine on top. Stir slightly and garnish with a cherry, or a pineapple spear. Enjoy!

name: Port Cobbler
instructions: Pour ingredients into a wine glass filled with broken ice. Mix, garnish with fruit, and serve with straws.

name: Port Eggnog
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass and fill with milk. Garnish with nutmeg.

name: Port Flip
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Port Milk Punch
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Port Wine Eggnog
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Port Wine Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the water and port in the bottom of a highball glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice; add the soda. Float the brandy on top, and garnish with a lemon twist. Dust with nutmeg, then with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Potent Possum
instructions: Put all ingredients into a bar blender except the banana liqueur. Blend the drink until it is thick and slushy. Pour into a highball glass, and then put the shot of banana liqueur over the top. If you want to spruce up the appearance, spray a little whipped cream over the top of the banana liqueur.

name: Pound My Kitty
instructions: Combine raspberry pucker and vodka with juice concentrate.

name: Poutine on the Rocks
instructions: Pour in a collins glass over ice, stir and serve.

name: Power Drill
description: Originally Invented in Melbourne Australia after it was noticed that both screwdrivers and Red Bull and Vodka went really well together. Originally served at a Bar called the Horse Bazaar on Little Lonsdale Street in the CBD. Inventors name is Phil To.Half fill glass with Ice. Pour shot and a half of Vodka over Ice. Top up glass with Red Bull until 2 fingers from the top of the glass. Then top up to the top with freshly squeezed orange juice.
instructions: Half fill glass with Ice. Pour shot and a half of Vodka over Ice. Top up glass with Red Bull until 2 fingers from the top of the glass. Then top up to the top with freshly squeezed orange juice.

name: Power Screwdriver
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass with three or four ice cubes. Add orange juice, and coca-cola to taste.

name: Prawn Salad
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Praying Mantis
instructions: Shake everything (except cola) with ice; strain into a highball glass. Fill with cola.

name: Preacher's Hot Daughter
instructions: Pour mango rum over ice, fill with orange juice and put in a couple of dashes of grenadine for color.

name: Presbyterian
instructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cola and ginger ale and stir well. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Prickly Porn Star
instructions: Pour liquor ingredents into a tall highball glass, and top off with half 7-up and half pineapple juice.

name: Prince of Norway
instructions: Pour vodka, brandy and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sprite, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Prince of Wales
instructions: Place a sugar cube into a small highball glass, and saturate with angostura bitters. Add a single ice cube, pour in cognac, and add an orange wedge and stemmed cherry. Fill with champagne, and gradually pour in the benedictine.

name: Princess Morgan
instructions: Pour the rum, creme de banane and orange juice over ice in a glass. Stir. Add the soda and stir gently. Serve.

name: Prison Bitch
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into tall glass.

name: Professor and Mary Ann
instructions: Shake everything (except soda) with ice; strain into a highball glass filled to the top with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with soda.

name: Prom Date Special
instructions: Add everything in a large water jug, mix and serve. You can add pineapple slices in jug at mixing time and eat them as the drinks are poured.

name: Prom Night Virgin
instructions: Mix well and serve in a collins glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Province Town
instructions: Add everything to a collins glass, stir well.

name: Psycho Citrus
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange juice) over ice in a collins glass. Fill with orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Psycho's Lover
instructions: In a highball glass pour 4 oz. of Bacardi Razz and fill with orange soda.

name: Pucker Fucker
instructions: Mix in a highball glass and serve.

name: Pucker Up
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and enjoy!

name: Pucker-7
instructions: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

name: Puckered Parrot
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice, add Parrot Bay and Sour Apple Pucker. Fill rest with Mountain Dew. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Puckerita
instructions: Combine ingredients and shake well in a tall glass with ice.

name: Puddle in the Rainforest
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Puerto Rican Popper
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon and Passoa into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with cranberry juice, and stir well. Splash with champagne, and serve.

name: Puerto Rican Punch
instructions: Serve straight up in a hurricane glass. Float the grenadine on top.

name: Puerto Rico Breeze
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and add the ingredients (you can also blend the ingredients with ice until slushy). Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: Puffer
instructions: Pour the rum, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost fillled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Pullen Cherry Bomb
instructions: Fill Glass or Mason jar as we do it Halfway with ice. Fill Southern Comfort to half way mark. Top off with Mountian Dew "Code Red".

name: Punch a la Washington Hotel
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Punch In The Pants
instructions: Blend ingredients with ice and serve.

name: Punch in the Stomach
instructions: Fill a collins glass halfway with ice. Add tequila, then fill the rest with half sprite, half hawaiian punch, give it a stir, garnish with pineapple slice and enjoy!

name: Pure Ecstacy
instructions: Pour bailey's and kahlua into a blender until, at most, one-third full. Add enough ice to fill the blender. Blend on a low speed, continually adding ice until a milkshake-consistancy. Mix in the vodka. Strain into wine glasses, and serve.

name: Pure Pleasure
instructions: Shake ingredients with lots of ice cubes. Stir into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Purgavie
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Purple Breeze
instructions: Combine tequila and Pernod in a highball glass. Add a splash of blackcurrant cordial and shoot.

name: Purple Cow
instructions: Pour vodka into a shaker. Add grape juice, to taste. Shake, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Purple Crayon
instructions: Pour chambord and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice, and garnish with a purple grape and pineapple slice.

name: Purple Devil
instructions: Shake liquors with ice. Strain or pour over ice in a highball glass. Almost fill with cranberry juice, and add a splash of 7-up.

name: Purple Dragon
instructions: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

name: Purple Fairy Dream
instructions: Pour in vodka, cranberry juice and mix. Add the raspberry liqueur, blue curacao and cream of coconut, and mix again. Fill with 7-up.

name: Purple Fantasy
instructions: Pour vodka and rum over ice in a highball glass. Top with grape soda and a splash of 7-up.

name: Purple Farmer
instructions: Fill a 12. or 16 oz. glass with ice fill and pour the liquors. Fill the remainder of glass with equal parts sour and 7-Up, stir and serve.

name: Purple Fucker
instructions: Mix all ingredients together.

name: Purple Goddess
instructions: Put ice in the glass, and pour 3 ounces of Island Blue Pucker, then 1.5 ounces of Razzmatazz, then 3 ounces of Vodka. Finish filling the glass with 7-up.

name: Purple Haze
instructions: Pour blue Absinthe followed by Strawberry Liquer into glass. Stir with a straw while pouring Sprite. Result should be a cloudy purple drink with the taste of a black jellybean. Best served chilled or over ice.

name: Purple Helmeted Warrior
instructions: Mix liquors together with the lime juice in a highball glass. Add 7-up (to taste), and grenadine.

name: Purple Helmeted Warrior #2
instructions: Pour Chambord, vodka and sweet and sour mix into a highball glass over ice. Add Sprite, more if desired, and serve.

name: Purple Honker
instructions: Pour schnapps and Maui into a highball glass and fill the rest with 7-Up.

name: Purple Hurt Juice
instructions: Layer ingredients in glass in this order. Serve still layered because it's pretty.  Mix before drinking. The drink will take on a lavender purple color, giving it the name- Purple Hurt Juice.

name: Purple Jim Bob
instructions: Pour the alcohol into a tall glass, then add equal parts of lemonade and 7-Up. Finish with a dash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Purple LaHizzi
instructions: Add rum, then pucker. Fill with Hawaiian Punch and the drink will turn purple.

name: Purple Love
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, for about 25 seconds, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes.

name: Purple Magic
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice until very cold. Strain into either one large or two small martini glasses. Can substitute triple sec for curacao.

name: Purple Motherfucker
instructions: Combine vodka, southern comfort, amaretto, razzmatazz and sour mix in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Shake, and pour into a collins glass. Top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Purple Orchid
instructions: Put everything into the blender. Blend until smooth. Pour and enjoy!

name: Purple Passion #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Adjust amounts if needed until drink is a purple color, and serve.

name: Purple Passion Tea
instructions: Pour into a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Purple Peach
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass over ice.

name: Purple Pecker Spit
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Purple Peedinker
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Purple People Eater
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

name: Purple Peril
instructions: Pour vodka and pernod into a tall, ice-filled glass. Add blackcurrant cordial, top with lemonade, and serve.

name: Purple Popsicle
instructions: Blend everything until frothy, serve in hurricane glasses.

name: Purple Problem Solver
instructions: Add vodka, rum, midori, curacao, schnapps, and sweet and sour to an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with pineapple juice, add grenadine until purple, and serve.

name: Purple Purple Popsicle
instructions: Pour in 2 shots of chilled vodka. Add 2 shots chilled grape juice. Fill the rest of the glass with ginger ale. Shake or stir (stirring preferred), and serve.

name: Purple Purple Popsicle
instructions: Pour in 2 shots of chilled vodka. Add 2 shots chilled grape juice. Fill the rest of the glass with ginger ale. Shake or stir (stirring preferred), and serve.

name: Purple Pushover
instructions: Combine liquors into a large shaker, add the orange juice, the pineapple juice, the grenadine and a spritz of 7-Up. Shake well and strain over ice in a highball glass. Float a dash of 151 rum on top.

name: Purple Pussycat Juice
instructions: Shake everything with ice and pour into a glass.

name: Purple Rain
instructions: Pour gin into an ice-filled highball glass, and fill with cranberry juice. Add blue curacao, sour mix and soda. Shake gently, add more curacao (until royal-purple), and serve.

name: Purple Slurpee
instructions: Pour the blue Curacao and the creme de banane in a tall glass. Blend ice, soda and grenadine and mix in the glass. Change amounts of ice and soda to liking.

name: Purple Wave
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Purple Wet Dream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Pushkin's Milkshake
