instructions: Mix vodkas, cocoa and cold milk in a shaker or blender and pour into a chilled, stemmed glass. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Puss and Lips
instructions: Muddle lime wedges in a glass and fill with ice. Add all other ingredients, cover and shake vigorously. Add a straw and serve.

name: Pussy Charger
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan rum into a collins glass filled with ice. Add peach schapps and fill with pineapple juice. Add just a dash of grenadine, garnish with a cherry and orange wedge, and serve.

name: Pussy Juice
instructions: Shake with ice, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Pussy Liquor
instructions: Pour into a 12-oz. glass over ice and fill with Squirt soda. Stir gently and serve.

name: Pussy on the Beach
instructions: Mix Mandarin vodka and Cointreau in tall glass with ice. Add equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice. Stir, and serve.

name: Pussy On Your Face
instructions: Put icecubes into glass and add melon liqueur first. Add all remaining ingredients except for the orange and pineapple juices....juices are poured in at the end of the process, as in orgasmic experience.

name: Pussy Paws
instructions: Stir cranberry juice, amaretto, and sour mix in a mixing glass. Pour into a frosted highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with club soda, add twist of lime, and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Pussy-tat
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Puzzled Tycoon
instructions: Mix the orange juice, grapefruit juice, pineapple juice, and coconut rum in a shaker with crushed ice.  Shake till well mixed.  Pour liquid into highball glass and add a splash of Midori.  Squeeze the lime into the drink and then drop it in.  Enjoy!

name: Pyrenees Greeting
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: QB Sneak
description: Blaire Kubie is the inventor of this drink and always recommended having a beer in the other hand while drinking this one.  She also reccomends using a lot more rum in it. She always concocted hers with 90%  rum and 10%  gatorade. The gatorade is able to mask the taste of the rum so well that all you need is just a splash of it. Fill glass with ice. Pour rum first, then top with gatorade. Stir and serve.
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour rum first, then top with gatorade. Stir and serve.

name: Quantum Theory
instructions: Pour rum, strega and grand marnier into a collins glass. Add pineapple juice, and fill with sweet and sour mix. Garnish with a lemon cherry flag.

name: Queen Charlotte
instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

name: Queen of Hearts
instructions: Add the melon liqueur and the amaretto to a highball glass first. Then add the blue curaco and cranberry juice.

name: Queen Soda
instructions: Stir and serve in a highball glass with three or four ice cubes.

name: Queen's Cousin
instructions: Pour the vodka, Grand Marnier, lime juice, bitters, Cointreau and wine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a large wine glass, and add the wine. Stir well, and serve.

name: Queen's Park Swizzle
instructions: Squeeze lime juice into a highball glass. Add the shell, fill with crushed ice and add the mint. Pour in the rum, angostura bitters and sugar syrup. Swizzle until glass frosts. Add the soda, garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve with a straw.

name: Queerwig
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass, and stir well. Consume quickly.

name: Quelude
instructions: In a beer mug with ice, add gin, rum, vodka, and triple sec. Fill almost to the top with the sour mix. Grenadine is optional. Pour the Razzmatazz and Blue Curacao on opposite sides. It should be blue and red with a margarita color in the middle.

name: Quick Fix
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Quick-Sand
instructions: Pour the orange juice (with the fruit pulp) over the sambuca in a highball glass.

name: Quikster's Delight
instructions: Pour rum into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with equal parts orange juice and pineapple juice. Top with grenadine, and serve.

name: R & B
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a 12-oz glass and serve.

name: R & R
instructions: Mix together in a tall glass with ice cubes. Tastes just like an old style frosty root beer. You can't taste the alcohol.

name: R-Float
instructions: Pour ingredients into a frosted beer mug over ice. Stir, and serve.

name: R.B. Winter
instructions: Pour southern comfort and amaretto into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with apple juice, and shake briefly. Add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Racing Greyhound
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Pour into glass over ice.

name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass.

name: Rafu Eighteen
instructions: Pour vodka and pisang ambon into a glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and sprite. Squeeze in a twist or two of lemon, and serve.

name: Raggae Sunsplash
instructions: Pour gin and pineapple juice into a shaker and shake well. Pour into a glass over ice, and add the strawberry syrup. Add a small amount of food coloring to the froth, and serve.

name: Raging Bull #2
instructions: Pour vodka and tequila into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with red bull. Add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Ragnar
instructions: Pour absolut kurant into a tall, highball glass. Add a few drops of lime juice, and fill with 7-up.

name: Ragnar #2
instructions: Pour absolut kurant into a tall, or highball glass filled with ice. Add rose's lime (to taste), fill with sprite, and serve.

name: Ragnar #3
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass. Fill with ice cubes, and add sprite.

name: Rain Forest
instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange wheel.

name: Rain Man
instructions: Shake all ingredients together, pour into a hurricane glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Rainblow
instructions: Add ice to glass. Fill 2/3 of the glass with Southern Comfort. Fill the other third of the glass with Minute Maid Cran-Grape juice. Stir with stirrer or straw. Add cherry and lime to glass (optional).

name: Rainbow Brew
instructions: Pour slowly into a hurricane glass, in order.

name: Rainbow Julep
instructions: Muddle one of the mint sprigs with apricot brandy in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add bourbon and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Swirl with a barspoon until the outer glass frosts. Garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Rainbow Orgy
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, strawberry liqueur and banana liqueur into a cocktail shaker one-third filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour entire contents into a highball glass. Top with orange juice, and serve.

name: Raleigh Autumn
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Ramos Fizz
instructions: Add the ingredients except club soda to a chilled mixer and shake for at least one minute. Strain into a thin goblet and top off with chilled club soda, to taste.

name: Rampaging Gutbuster
instructions: Chill all ingredients until Red Bull is slushy. Pour JíƒÂ¤ger and Absinthe over ice into a TALL glass, swirl. Add Red Bull slowly down side of glass, then ignite shot of 151 and drop it in. Drink while frothing.

name: Rampant Rabbit
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with two pineapple leaves placed down the side of the glass so that they look like rabbit's ears.

name: Ramshanked
instructions: Place the lemon slice at the bottom of a highball glass. Add ice, and pour the rum and southern comfort. Finally, add the bottle of Bacardi. Stir and serve.

name: Rangers Rocker
instructions: Pour ingredients into mason jar. Stir, and serve.

name: RaRocks
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass, adding the splash of Sprite last.

name: Rasmaretto
instructions: Pour over ice in a collins glass. Shake (or spindle mix for a nice foamy top). A real refreshing drink.

name: Raspberry Beer
instructions: Pour beer and rum into a beer mug. Stir and drink.

name: Raspberry Beret #2
instructions: Blend all the ingredients with 8 ice cubes (like a mudslide). Pour in a glass rimmed with red-coloured sugar, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with red colored sugar.

name: Raspberry Bliss
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Raspberry Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Fill a small ice tray with raspberry juice, garnishing each with a lemon twist and freeze until solid. Serve by putting one raspberry cube in a champagne flute and fill with champagne.

name: Raspberry Cheesecake
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and serve.

name: Raspberry Chi Chi
instructions: Pour pureed raspberries into glass. Blend 1 1/4 oz. raspberry vodka, 12 oz. pina colada mix, and 1 scoop of ice until smooth, pour over pureed raspberries in glass - serve with straw and stir stick.

name: Raspberry Cola
instructions: Put ice into glass, pour vodka into glass then top with soda.

name: Raspberry Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Raspberry Cooler
instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Raspberry Fancy
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Mix creme de cassis, Frangelico, Chambord and sour mix together. Add lemonade and rasberries on top.

name: Raspberry Girl
instructions: On the rocks. Combine liquor and fill with sprite or 7-up. Pour into shaker and then back into the glass. (do not shake) Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Raspberry Iced Tea
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. This is basically a long island iced tea with raspberry liqueur instead of cola. Quite good.

name: Raspberry Long Island Ice Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker, and shake three to four times. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Raspberry Muscle Relaxant
instructions: Build over ice. Stir and serve.

name: Raspberry Pancake
instructions: First pour hard apple cider into a highball glass. Then add the amaretto and raspberry liqueur at the same time. Give the whole drink a good swirl and garnish with a raspberry and an apple slice.

name: Raspberry Remix
instructions: Pour vodka over a few ice cubes in a collins glass. Add Sprite Remix, stir gently, and serve.

name: Raspberry Renegade
instructions: Fill a highball glass 1/4 of the way with ice. Add raspberry liqueur and lemon juice, then fill the glass with 7-up.

name: Raspberry Romance
instructions: Build in a parfait glass and fill with club soda.

name: Raspberry Stupid
instructions: Mix well in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Raspberry Swirl
instructions: Mix vodka, amaretto and ice cream in a blender, and pour into a hurricane glass. Gently pour in chambord; swirl with a straw or stirring stick to produce the desired effect, and serve.

name: Raspberry Tea
instructions: Fill pint glass with ice. Add all the clear liquors, then top with Chambord. Garnish with lime.

name: Raspberry Zima
instructions: Fill a beer mug with zima and add the raspberry liqueur. Stir well.

name: Rasta Spliff
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Ratty Ol'Deer Head
instructions: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Raw Sewage
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Raw Sewage #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, and pour into a glass.

name: Ray's Suicide
description: A favorite at Tucker's and Nairobi's in San Antonio, Texas. Developed by McGodfrey Ray Edwards while on assignment in San Jose Iturbide, Mexico.Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake, and strain into glass.
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake, and strain into glass.

name: Ray-Ray
instructions: Shake and pour into a highball glass. Serve with a lemon slice centered between two cherries.

name: Razberi Kicker
instructions: Add stolichnaya razberi vodka, cranberry juice and sprite to an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Razberi Sunsplash
instructions: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add juice and grenadine, and shake well. Garnish with a flag, and serve.

name: Razzbaretto
instructions: Mix in a blender and serve in a hurricane glass or a snifter. Garnish with a swirl of whipped cream.

name: Razzleberry
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and serve in a collins glass.

name: Razzputin
instructions: Mix or blend with ice and serve in a chilled collins glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Rearbuster
instructions: Pour tequila and kahlua into a highball glass with ice, and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge and umbrella, stir, and serve with a straw.

name: Rebel Raider
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemonade, and serve.

name: Red Alert
instructions: Shake all ingredients together, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Red Bit
instructions: Mix over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Red Death
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange juice) into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Red Devil
instructions: Mix alcohols into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Add the juice and grenadine, and shake. Serve in a 10-12 oz. glass.

name: Red Devil #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker and strain into your favorite ice filled glass.

name: Red Dog
instructions: Pour vodka and whiskey into a cocktail shaker. Add orange and cranberry juice, and shake vigorously. Pour over ice in a frozen or chilled collins glass or tumbler. Slowly add the ginger ale, garnish with a maraschino cherry or orange wedge, and serve.

name: Red Dwarf
instructions: Mix rum, lemon juice, orange juice and peach schnapps together with plenty of ice in a shaker. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Add creme de cassis; allowing it to form a layer at the bottom of the glass. Garnish with cherries, orange or lemon to taste, and serve.

name: Red Eisentrout
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a collins glass, and almost fill with surge soda. Top off with cherry juice, and shake. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Red Eyed Sailor
description:
This drink was invented by Thirsty Ty, and Galen the God. This drink is best enjoyed while laying on the beach in the hot days of summer. It is a great pre-made, take to the beach cocktail. If you can't enjoy it laying in the sand, let the coastal taste take you there.Mix all ingredients in a cup of ice, shake and pour into Mason jar. Add grenadine or Dr. Pepper to taste for less of a pirate taste.

Pour and roar.
instructions:
Mix all ingredients in a cup of ice, shake and pour into Mason jar. Add grenadine or Dr. Pepper to taste for less of a pirate taste.

Pour and roar.

name: Red Face
instructions: Pour tequila, cranberry liqueur and cranberry juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Red Frog
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Red Gypsy
instructions: Pour whiskey and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add cream soda, and serve.

name: Red Headed Stepchild #2
instructions: Pour Bacardi into a collins glass filled with ice. Add Code red mountain dew, and serve.

name: Red Headed Woodpecker
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cranberry juice) together in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add sufficient cranberry juice to turn the drink red, and serve.

name: Red Hope
instructions: Blend, pour into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Red Hot Lover
instructions: Shake briefly, pour into an ice-filled hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Red Hurricane
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Red Lion
instructions: Shake and strain into a highball glass. Moisten rim with water or juice, dip in caster sugar, and serve.

name: Red Melon
instructions: Pour vodka, watermelon and peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Top with sprite, stir well, add grenadine and serve. Garnish with a slice of lemon (or lime), or a piece of melon.

name: Red Mo-Fo
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Red Ox
instructions: Pour rums and juices into a pint glass one-quarter filled with ice. Almost fill with sweet and sour, top with grenadine, and mix.

name: Red Panties
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Red Rasputin
instructions: Stir, add ice, and serve.

name: Red Rattlesnake
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass, shake, and serve.

name: Red Rock
instructions: Mix vodka and schnapps in the bottom of a glass. Add ice, and pour in the can of dr. pepper.

name: Red Rooster
instructions: Build drink in a collins glass.

name: Red Rum
instructions: Mix together rum and grenadine in a mixing glass or cocktail shaker shaker. Pour into a highball or collins glass over crushed ice and orange juice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange or lime slice, and serve.

name: Red Sampson
instructions: Add ice cubes to a highball glass, then pour Smirnoff Twisted Lime and 1/2 can Sobe No Fear. Stir if necessary. Allow to chill for a minute and enjoy!

name: Red Tonic
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with tonic water and serve.

name: Red Velvet
instructions: Build gin, pisang ambon, sprite and lime juice in a highball glass. Top with grenadine, garnish with a lime boat, and serve.

name: Red Wine Cooler
instructions: Pour the wine, lemon-lime soda and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Red Zalo
instructions: Pour pisang ambon, lemon squash and ice cubes into a blender and mix. Pour into a tall glass, add sprite and strawberry syrup, and serve.

name: Redneck Cocktail
instructions: Fill a mason jar 1/4 to 1/2 full with Southern Comfort, depending on how strong you want the drink. Fill the jar the rest of the way with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy! Add some ice if you plan on drinking this over a period of time

name: Redneck Zombie
instructions: Combine and mix with ice in a highball glass.

name: Refresher
description: The "Refresher" is simply named after the childrens sweets that fizz on your tongue with what can only be described as a fresh (blue?) taste.  This cocktail mimics that feeling but with an added smack of alcohol. Origin may be a bar in Kos, Greece where an English barman said he had invented it over the summer of 06. Also you can tweek the ingredients a little, more red bull for more fizz and sweetness, more WKD Blue for more kick.  But its always liked and easy to drink, plus looks great in bar lighting as its bright blue..Two ways to make this one, either start with the Blue AS and then add the ingredients in the order above and just stir to mix.  The other way is to add the Blue aftershock last and then serve with a straw so that you drink from the bottom of the glass and the whole thing gets progressively stronger as you near the end (and you just wont care).
instructions: Two ways to make this one, either start with the Blue AS and then add the ingredients in the order above and just stir to mix.  The other way is to add the Blue aftershock last and then serve with a straw so that you drink from the bottom of the glass and the whole thing gets progressively stronger as you near the end (and you just wont care).

name: Reggae Cocktail
instructions: Pour vodka, creme de bananes, juices, bitters and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, a pineapple wedge, and a maraschino cherry.

name: Reindeer's Tear
instructions: Stir in a highball glass.

name: Remmsen Cooler
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass with a spiral of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Remsen Cooler
instructions: Pour two ounces of carbonated water into a collins glass, add sugar and stir. Add ice cubes, gin, and fill with carbonated water. Stir again, and garnish with a twist of lemon and a spiral of orange on the rim.

name: Resaca Water
instructions: Place the vodka, rum and watermelon liqueur with ice in a shaker. Add pineapple and orange juice, and shake. Pour over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry, and serve.

name: Retribution
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Reynolds Special
instructions: Pour gin and grapefruit juice into a highball glass. Add four or five ice cubes, and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: Ricard Tomate
instructions: Pour ricard and grenadine into a highball glass. Add water and ice, and serve.

name: Richie 50
instructions: Pour orange juice into a 16-ounce glass half-filled with vodka. Stir, add a cherry, and serve.

name: Richie Family
instructions: Mix vodka, whiskey and bailey's irish cream together in a beer pilsner. Add coffee and sugar, blend, and serve.

name: Rick James
description: The inventor of this drink is a bartender named Cris Kline.  It was invented in a club called " The Limelight" in Raleigh North Carolina.  Despite what you may be thinking... the drink is actually very smooth.FIll Highball glass with ice, pour the Hennessey and the 151 together, fill with 7 up garnish with a lime and serve.
instructions: FIll Highball glass with ice, pour the Hennessey and the 151 together, fill with 7 up garnish with a lime and serve.

name: Rieber Red Margarita
instructions: Add strawberry margarita mix, tequila, and triple sec to a blender with crushed ice. Blend, and serve with a straw in a chilled glass or mug.

name: Riedinger
instructions: Mix rum, midori, and lime juice in a highball glass with crushed ice. Fill with cola, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Ringo
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a hurricane glass with four ice cubes.

name: Rising Sun
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a collins glass and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

name: Ritz Cocktail
instructions: Shake cognac, cointreau and orange juice over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, carefully fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Ritz Fizz
instructions: Pour blue curacao, amaretto and lemon juice into a champagne flute filled with champagne. Stir, add a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Road Runner
instructions: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice for 15 seconds and pour into a champagne flute with a nutmeg/sugar mixture. Garnish with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Roadkill
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Roadkill Toaster Oven
instructions: Shake rum, tequila, lime juice, juice of 1/2 can pears, and a pinch of red pepper flakes in a mason jar. Garnish with 1 pineapple ring and 2 cherries arranged to form face.

name: Roadrunner Punch
instructions: Mix equal parts of each liquor in a tall glass. Top with fruit punch (berry flavored recommended), and serve with ice.

name: Roasted Toasted Almond
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Robicheaux
instructions: Pour bourbon, lime and cherry juice into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with cola, stir gently and garnish with a cherry. Serve.

name: Robinson
instructions: Prepare in a blender with crushed ice, and pour into a large highball glass. Serve.

name: Robot Cocktail
instructions: Combine jack daniel's, vodka and grenadine in a highball glass. Mix well, add ice, and serve.

name: Robyn
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass. Add schweppes until half-filled, and fill with fruit soda. Top with lime juice, and serve.

name: Rochdale Cowboy
instructions: Combine whiskey, Southern Comfort, fruit juices, sugar and bitters in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Rock and Rye Cooler
instructions: Shake vodka, rock and rye, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a ice filled collins glass, top with lemon soda and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Rock Lobster
instructions: Pour razzmatazz and crown royal into an ice-filled glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Rockin' Killer Koolaid
instructions: Add all liquors to a shaker with ice, and shake. Pour into a hurricane glass over grenadine (to taste). Add orange juice, pineapple juice and sprite (to taste). Garnish with a candied cherry, and serve.

name: Roffsing
instructions: Pour passoa, vodka, lime juice and pear soda into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir, top with cream, and serve.

name: Rolling Green Elixer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker, strain into a hurricane glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Romulan Ale
instructions: Pour rum and curacao into a tall, narrow glass. Fill (almost) with sprite, and add tabasco sauce. Add a grain of salt, and serve.

name: Romulan Dream
instructions: Stir and strain into a highball glass.

name: Rong's Finnigan's Wake
instructions: Combine in a highball glass or half a pint glass and enjoy.

name: Roni
instructions: Mix ingredients in a beer mug, and serve.

name: Rontini
instructions: Pour together over ice in a glass, and serve.

name: Root Beer
instructions: Pour vodka into a large, ice-filled glass. Fill with pepsi (do not substitute coke), swirl a splash of galliano on top, and serve.

name: Root Beer Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the root beer, stir well, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Root Beer Float
instructions: Pour vodka, galliano, and light cream into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola, stir lightly, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Root Beer Float #2
instructions: Pour the vodka, tequila, galliano and kahlua into a highball glass filled with ice. Add a splash of cream, top with coke, and serve.

name: Root Canal
instructions: Combine peppermint and root beer schnapps in a hurricane glass with ice. Fill with dr pepper, or root beer, and stir. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Rootbeer Piss
description: A very sweet tasting licorice and cinnamon flavored drink, good especially for those sugar-holics among us. Rootbeer Piss was found in Tampa, Florida, United States. For a bigger bite, add more Bacardi 151 as needed. Although be warned; adding more Aftershock tends to kill the taste of the rum.Fill an iced beer mug halfway with ice cubes. Add Bacardi 151, then Aftershock, followed by an entire can of Mug root beer (or until mug is full). Stir briskly with a spoon and serve.
instructions: Fill an iced beer mug halfway with ice cubes. Add Bacardi 151, then Aftershock, followed by an entire can of Mug root beer (or until mug is full). Stir briskly with a spoon and serve.

name: Rosarita Highball
instructions: Shake the tequila, cassis and lime juice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, garnish with a slice of cucumber, and serve.

name: Rose of the Ritz
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except champagne) well in a blender and pour into a wine glass. Add champagne, and serve.

name: Rose Water
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Rosebud
instructions: Shake vodka, lime juice and triple in a shaker half-filled with ice, and strain over grapefruit juice in an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Roswell
instructions: Pour orange juice, cranberry juice and rum over ice into a 10-12 oz. glass. Add the splash of pineapple juice and enjoy!

name: Round Robin
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

name: Roxy Special
instructions: Pour vodka's, sour mix and lime juice into a shaker, and fill with sprite. Shake briskly, and strain into a highball glass over ice. Add a lemon slice and a cherry, and serve.

name: Roy Rodgers' Corpse
instructions: Pour citrus punch and cola into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Mix ingredients with a spoon, then add the whiskey. Mix again, then add apricot juice and stir very well, since it likes to settle on bottom of glass. Instructions may vary to your liking.

name: Royal Assassin
instructions: Combine in a highball glass.

name: Royal Bill
instructions: Pour chilled poire william into a champagne flute, and fill with champagne. Garnish with a half-slice of orange, and serve.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Poire Williams pear liqueur

name: Royal Caribbean Fuck
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker over, shake well, and strain into a highball glass.

name: Royal Crown Royal
instructions: Pour whiskey into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add cola, stir, and serve.

name: Royal Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Royal Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Royal Hot Chocolate
instructions: Pour Chambord Raspberry Liqueur and creme de cacao into a coffee mug (or Irish coffee mug for elegance) and fill with hot chocolate.

name: Royal Peaches and Cream
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and no chunks of ice are present. Pour into a mason jar and garnish with a fresh slice of peach, if desired.

name: Royal Silver
instructions: Rim a wine glass with grenadine and caster sugar. Shake all ingredients (except champagne) and strain into the glass. Add champagne, and serve.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Poire Williams pear liqueur

name: Royal Sour Kiss
instructions: Mix Crown Royal, lime juice, Sour Apple Pucker. Fill glass with Sprite. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Royal Turkey
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except 7-up) and strain into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add 7-up, garnish with fruit slices, add straws and serve.

name: Royalty Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice, Curacao, sugar, and egg in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Rubber Chicken
instructions: Pour rye whiskey into an ice-filled mason jar. Add equal parts of limeade and ginger ale, and serve.

name: Rubbermeister
instructions: Pour coke into a highball glass, add jagermeister, and serve.

name: Ruby Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Ruby Runner
instructions: Shake the Malibu, brandy, banana liqueur and the juices with ice. Strain into a highball glass and add a splash of grenadine and a splash of Bacardi. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Ruby Soho
instructions: Shake liquors and sour mix with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sprite. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Ruby Tuesday
instructions: Pour gin and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine, stir and serve.

name: Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer
instructions: Mix the light rum, lemon juice, and grenadine. Add the ice cubes and fill to your own taste with Cranberry juice. Add a wedge of lemon on your glass and voila! Enjoy!

name: Rum and Ginger
instructions: Pour rum over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Rum Bana
instructions: Frappe in a champagne flute.

name: Rum Bubble
instructions: Combine liquors over ice in a collins glass, and stir. Add club soda, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Rum Coke Float
instructions: Place two scoops of rum flavored ice-cream into a hurricane glass, add rum and fill with coke. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Rum Cola
instructions: Build in a highball glass and fill with cola.

name: Rum Collins
instructions: Shake rum, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Rum Cooler
instructions: Pour rum and soda into a collins glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Rum Fix
instructions: Stir juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Fill glass with ice, add rum, and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

name: Rum Fizz
instructions: Shake well over ice in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with soda, and serve.

name: Rum Flip
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass and fill with milk. Garnish with nutmeg.

name: Rum Highball
instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes, fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Rum Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Rum Relaxer
instructions: Pour first 3 ingredients into a parfait glass and fill with lemon lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Rum Rickey
instructions: Pour light rum, lime juice and sugar syrup into an ice-filled mixing glass. Shake, strain into an ice-filled collins glass, and fill with club soda. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Rum Runner #2
instructions: Blend with crushed ice, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Rum Runner Island Style
instructions: Pour liquors into a blender with one and a half cups of ice, and mix until thick-consistency. Pour into a hurricane glass, add a cherry on top, and serve.

name: Rum Screwdriver
instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Rum Sling
instructions: Stir in a highball glass and fill with club soda. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Rum Sunday
instructions: Blend briefly all ingredient (except overproof rum) with half a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into a collins glass, float overproof rum on top, and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Rum Sweetie
instructions: Blend with 8 oz. of crushed ice until the mixture is slushy. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Rum Swizzle
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in a mixture of carbonated water and juice of lime in a collins glass. Fill with ice, stir, and add bitters and rum. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Rum Whaler
description: Can easily be served in a tall collins glass, or any other nice looking glass.  The drink is a delightful pink, and especially popular with any rum lover.  This is an old drink that used to be around the eastern seaboard of the U.S., but fell from popularity when more complicated drinks became the rage.  Enjoy!In a 8oz highball glass, add ice cubes, Anejo rum, and Grenadine.  Fill with orange juiice, stir, and serve.
instructions: In a 8oz highball glass, add ice cubes, Anejo rum, and Grenadine.  Fill with orange juiice, stir, and serve.

name: Rumage
instructions: Pour Bacardi Superior rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass. Add Malibu coconut rum, and juices. Stir and serve.

name: Rummple
instructions: Mix all ingredients with ice, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Rummy Sour
instructions: Blend in blender with a scoop of crushed ice. Serve in a parfait glass.

name: RumRunner's RubyRed
instructions: Pour vodka and ruby red grapefruit juice into a large, ice-filled glass. Top with tonic water, pour into a seperate glass (to mix), and serve.

name: Rumstar
instructions: Put a few large chunks ice in a large glass, pour in the Bacardi White Rum and fill up with Rock Star. Stir and drink with straw.

name: Russian Banana
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Russian Funk
instructions: Blend vodka, lime and sugar in a highball glass. Fill with soda water, and serve.

name: Russian Kelman
instructions: Pour vodka into a 12 oz highball glass. Add pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Russian Monster Tom Collins
instructions: Mix vodka and sour mix (to taste) over ice in a glass. Add grenadine (to taste), and serve.

name: Russian Mountain Dew
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass with 3 or 4 ice cubes, and serve.

name: Russian Qualude
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream or milk, stir, and serve.

name: Russian Sarin
instructions: Pour vodka and liqueur into a highball glass over one or two ice cubes. Fill with schweppes russian, and serve.

name: Russian Seven
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up, garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Russian Sunrise
instructions: Mix with ice in a collins glass. Orange juice to taste.

name: Russian Sunset
instructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and sour mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled collins glass, add a dash of grenadine to the top, and swirl slightly. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice if desired, and serve.

name: Rusty Water
instructions: Fill half glass with ice. Add 2oz Wild Turkey. Fill the rest of glass with 7up. Garnish with lime if preferred.

name: Rye Highball
instructions: Build in a highball glass with ice and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with a twist of a lemon peel.

name: Rye Sling
instructions: Shake rye whiskey, cherry heering, sugar syrup and lemon juice well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, fill with soda, garnish with a cocktail cherry, and serve.

name: S2C3
instructions: Pour into tall glass and serve.

name: Sacrifice
instructions: Pour the rums, creme de cacao, coconut cream, juices and bitters into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well at high speed, and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Sailor Jerry Butter Rum
instructions: Pour the Sailor Jerry spiced rum, DeKuyper Buttershots liqueur, Smirnoff vanilla vodka and Jones cream soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Sailor's Delight
instructions: Stir together. Serve.

name: Saint Paul
instructions: Take a tall glass, put a few ice cubes on top of each other. Pour the Gin and the rum in the glass. Fill the glass with bitter lemon. Leave some of the ice over the surface, so that you can pour the angostura on top of it. It should leave a rather nice track of red down the ice cubes.

name: Salem Witch
instructions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka, midori, and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently, and finally top with a splash of grenadine.

name: Sally Fudpucker
instructions: Pour the tequila and pink grapefuit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the galliano on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Salt Lick
instructions: Pour ingredients into a white wine glass filled with ice cubes and rimmed with salt. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Salt-and-Pepper Highball
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rimmed, ice-filled highball glass.

name: Salty Balls
instructions: Salt the rim of a Collins glass. Fill with ice, pour vodka along with the OJ. Fill the rest of the glass with grapefruit juice, and float midori melon liqueur on top.

name: Salty Dog
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

name: Salty Dog (Vodka)
instructions: In a shaker, add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka and grapefruit juice. Stir and serve over ice in salt-rimmed glass.

name: Sammy Special
instructions: Put all ingredients in a blender with ice cubes. (More ice = more froth.) Blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glass and enjoy.

name: San Diego Seabreeze
instructions: Build all ingredients in a collins glass, cover, shake and serve.

name: San Francisco
instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

name: San Juan Cooler
instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice. 

Add rum and dry vermouth. Fill with pineapple juice and serve.

name: San Juan Tea
instructions: Shake liquor and sour mix. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: San Remo
instructions: Pour into a wine glass, garnish with slices of grapefruit and mandarin, and serve.

name: Sancho Panza
instructions: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.

name: Sand Dance
instructions: Pour whiskey, brandy and cranberry juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Sand in Your Shorts
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake and strain over ice in a tall glass.

name: Sandra Buys A Dog
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Santa Fe
instructions: In a highball glass full of ice, pour a full shot of your favorite Tequila. Fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up Add Triple Sec, and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Santa Monica Pier
instructions: In a tall glass with ice, pour the Alize and Triple Sec, stir and enjoy.

name: Santo Libre
instructions: Pour lime juice into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add rum, fill with sprite, stir, and serve. Garnish with lime.

ingredients.name: Ron Barcelo® Imperial premium blend rum

name: Saoco
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a collins glass, stir, and serve.

name: Sapphire Ricky
description: First created in a shoemaker's restaurant in Washington, circa 1900. Named after Col. Jim Ricky, the customer for which a bartender created the first Gin Ricky.Shake the first three ingredients with ice and then strain into an ice filled glass. Top with soda water (approximately 3oz). Emerse a length of lemon peel around the edge of the glass as garnish.
instructions: Shake the first three ingredients with ice and then strain into an ice filled glass. Top with soda water (approximately 3oz). Emerse a length of lemon peel around the edge of the glass as garnish.

name: Saronno Kir Imperial
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Saskatchewan Paralyzer
instructions:
Fill a chilled highball glass with ice. Pour in Kahlua and vodka. Pour in cola next. Very important otherwise the milk will curdle. Top with cold milk and a cherry for the ladies. Add a straw. The drink should be served unstirred. 

You can just use 1-oz vodka if you don't have Kahlua. You can also substute the vodka with tequila.

name: Satin Angel
instructions: Add a splash of Coca-Cola to the Frangelico over Ice, and fill add the cream.

name: Satin Sheet
instructions: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth, use a sugar frosted rim.

name: Saturday Night Special
instructions: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey into a pint glass. Add Bacardi Breezer and serve.

name: Scarlet Fever
instructions: Mix together and shake, pour into a draft glass. Add 3 ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel on the side.

name: Scarlet O'Hara
instructions: Pour 2 oz. Southern Comfort over ice in an 8 oz. glass. Fill with cranberry juice. Squeeze one wedge of lime into drink. Stir and serve.

name: Schnapp Pop
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add schnapps and fill with club soda. Turn over once to mix. Serve with straw.

name: Schnappster
instructions: Mix together in a large collins glass, and serve.

name: Schwartzy
instructions: Serve in a tall glass.

name: Scooby Doo
description: Don't forget to howl "Scooby-Doobie-Doooo..." before you drink.Pour all ingredients into a collins glass, and serve.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Scooby Snack #4
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake until blended, pour into a rocks or old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Scope
instructions: Put double of creme de menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to the top with ginger ale, tonic, or soda water.

name: Scorpino
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Scorpion
instructions: Fill a 12 oz wine glass with ice, add a lime wedge and transfer into shaker. Add ingredients, shake and pour back into glass. Garnish stirrer, straw, cherry-pineapple, parasol, and mint.

name: Scotch And Water
instructions: Pour the Scotch and the water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Scotch Cooler
instructions: Pour scotch and creme de menthe over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Scotch Fix
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the Scotch. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Scotch Highball
instructions: Pour scotch in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Scotch Mist
instructions: Pack a collins glass with crushed ice. Pour in scotch. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve with a straw.

name: Scotch Rickey
instructions: Pour scotch and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lime peel/rind and serve.

name: Scottie Mac
instructions: Chill rum. Then layer. Creme de Banana first, then Bailey's and float rum on top.

name: Scotty Boy
instructions: Pour a lot of kurant into ice filled glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake, always shake and add a splash of soda.

name: Screaming Chocolate Monkey
instructions: Shake well and pour over ice, top with cherry or chocolate sprinkles.

name: Screaming Epsilon
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a blender set on high speed for 15-30 seconds.

name: Screaming Multiple Climax
instructions: Best if built in a mixing glass with ice, shaken and poured into Hurricane glass, but can be built directly in the Hurricane glass.

name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm
instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries, and serve.

name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm On The Beach
instructions: Fill glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all liquors and speed shake. Top with club soda.

name: Screw the Polar Bear
instructions: Add all ingredients into the glass and stir.  Only softly stir as to not make the lemonade flat.  Drink before the juices seperate and the lemonade looses its fizz.  Add more vodka for a stronger drink.

name: Screw-Up
instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes, add all ingredients, mix then drink.

name: Screwdriver
instructions: Add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka in ice-filled glass and top with orange juice.

name: Screwdriver #2
instructions: Pour in rum and then add orange juice. Add three ice cubes and serve.

name: Screwdriver #3
instructions: Add orange juice first, then add vodka, and finally add apple juice and stir lightly. The pouring should do most of the stirring.

name: Screwdriver a la Carla
instructions: Mix the orange juice with sugar and the yolk of an egg. Then pour in the vodka with some ice cubes and stir. Serve well chilled.

name: Screwdriver Boricua
instructions: Mix with ice.

name: Screwdriver With Color
instructions: Start with a shot or two (depending on your preference) of vodka in the glass. Add orange juice until its almost full. Then add a shot or two of Kahlua, just until it has a bit of color. Then some ice, and stir.

name: Screwed Banana
instructions: Put ice in highball glass, about 1/2 full, then pour in the banana liqueur and the Peach Schnapps. Fill with orange juice. Stir.

name: Scrumdriver
instructions: Mix the vodka and orange juice in a chilled highball glass over ice. Add several dashes of lime juice at your discretion.

name: SD Special
instructions: Make fresh homemade lemonade by mixing the juice of one lemon and 8 oz. (one glass) of water. Be sure not to add sugar. Add the vodka and stir. Add 5 ice cubes, and serve.

name: Sea Breeze
instructions: Pour vodka into an iced highball glass. Fill partially with grapefruit juice and top with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Sea Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

name: Seabreeze
instructions: Pour vodka over ice into highball glass. Add mixers. May be garnished with a wedge of lime.

name: Seadoo
instructions: Add the vodka to a tall glass with lots of ice.Throw in a splash or two of cranberry juice and then fill with the soda.

name: Seal Beach Cruiser
description: "This was invented one Long Beach Grand Prix weekend at Grandma's Beach House. We made them with what she had in the cupboard, got on our beach cruisers and cruised down Main Street in Seal Beach.  It's caught on and became a Grand Prix favorite ever since.  It was invented with Cuervo Gold but perfected with Patron Reposado.  Cheers"Fill a highball with ice, add a liberal pour of dark tequila (Patron is the best), top off with pineapple juice and add a lime garnish.
instructions: Fill a highball with ice, add a liberal pour of dark tequila (Patron is the best), top off with pineapple juice and add a lime garnish.

name: Seaside-Summerbliss
instructions: Red wine first, then the cider.

name: Seattle Smog
instructions: Pour shots into mason jar filled with ice. Fill 2/3 of remaining with cranberry juice and top with orange juice. Stir.

name: Seaweed
instructions: Ingredients can be mixed in any order over ice.

name: Secret Blue
instructions: Shake ingredient vodka, lime and sugar with shaker. Add soda. Pour into Beer-pilsner with Ice. Drop curacao and creme de menthe. Decorate with cut-lime and cherry.

name: Seelbach Cocktail
instructions: Add bourbon, bitters, and triple sec first. Fill rest of glass with champagne. Depending on the size up your flute, you might need to put less bourbon in. Garnish with orange twist.

name: Seizure
instructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a hurricane glass. Mix through a couple times and serve.

name: Señorita
instructions: Add liquors to a highball glass filled with ice, fill with lemon-lime soda and throw in a dash of salt.

name: Seven Veils
instructions: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

name: Sever St. Special
instructions: Fill a Collins glass most of the way with ice. Pour in the Yukon Jack. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

name: Seville Chocolate
instructions: Combine mandarin napoleon and cocoa in a heat-proof irish coffee cup, and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Seville Highball
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Add a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Sex Appeal
instructions: Mix two rums, melon, peach and blue curacao in a mixing tin with the sour mix. Pour into a collins glass with ice and add a dash of lemonade. Garnish with lemon squeeze.

name: Sex in the Desert
instructions: Shake and serve on the rocks.

name: Sex in the Red Zone
instructions: Put vodka and sloe gin into glass. Add lemonade.

name: Sex On An Arizona Beach
instructions: Mix ingredients and add some ice.

name: Sex On My Face
instructions: Mix in tall glass w/ice.

name: Sex on the Beach
description: This is a popular Sex on the Beach and what is most likely the original.  Popular substitutes include using pineapple for the orange, or Midori & Chambord instead of schnapps. Add vodka and peach schnapps to a highball glass over ice. Fill with equal measures of cranberry juice and orange juice, and stir.
instructions: Add vodka and peach schnapps to a highball glass over ice. Fill with equal measures of cranberry juice and orange juice, and stir.

name: Sex on the Beach #10
instructions: Shake vigorously with some ice, strain into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach #12
instructions: Mix all ingredients in order in ordinary glass. Add cranberry and orange juice to your liking.

name: Sex on The Beach #13
instructions: Pour peach schnapps, Midori melon liqueur and Malibu coconut rum into a hurricane glass. Add juices, add a straw, and serve.

name: Sex On The Beach #6
instructions: Highball glass 1/2 full ice. Add vodka and schnapps. Fill to near top with OJ, amount depends on ice and glass size. Add cream last and stir. May be served up after mixing. The amount of OJ and dairy cream may be adjusted to taste.

name: Sex on the Beach #7
instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir heavily. Serve cold.

name: Sex on the Beach #8
instructions: Pour the rum into a highball glass. Almost-fill with pineapple juice, and top with grenadine and sprite. Coconut rum can be substituted for malibu rum.

name: Sex on the Beach - Bettsy Style
instructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a Highball glass. Stir until mixture is pink. Add a bit of cranberry juice if you want to make it Bettsy Style.

name: Sex on the Beach - Ultimate
description: Submitted by Tony “T-Bone” Adams, Certified Professional Bartending Instructor for the Professional Bartending School of America, Dayton and Cincinnati campuses.Fill a tall or collins glass full of ice. Add alcohols and equal amounts of all of the juices to fill. Shake vigorously, garnish with an orange and cherry flag and serve.
instructions: Fill a tall or collins glass full of ice. Add alcohols and equal amounts of all of the juices to fill. Shake vigorously, garnish with an orange and cherry flag and serve.

name: Sex on the Brain
instructions:
Fill glass with ice, insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka, Midori, Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. 

Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. 

*The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom, yellow in the middle and red on top.

name: Sex on the Grass
instructions: Shake all except orange juice with ice. Pour into a hiball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice.

name: Sex on the Pool Table
instructions: Mix equal parts of each alcohol over ice, and top with grapefruit juice. Shake to blend.

name: Sex on Ya Mamy
instructions: Pour in the vodka and peach. Pour a splash (or roughly 1/2 oz.) of Sour Mix or Lemon juice. Pour in the Cranberry (to fill, or roughly 3 oz.) & stir. ....No Garnish.

name: Sex with Jess
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice.  Mix in alcohol, fill almost to top with pineapple juice.  Top off with splash of cranberry.  Can be served with a cherry.

name: Sex with the Bartender
instructions: Mix rum, triple sec, lime juice, grenadine and 7-up. Garnish with lemon and lime, then splash irish cream down the middle.

name: Sex with the Captain
instructions: Build drink in glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Sexual Chocolate
instructions: Shake well and serve on the rocks.

name: Sexual Trance
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain over ice cherry garnish.

name: Sexy Bitch
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins or tall glass, and serve.

name: Sexy Blue Eyed Boy
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 2 ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: SG03
instructions: Pour rum over ice cubes in a collins glass. Add a splash of grenadine, and pour in a can of MC2 berry blue energy drink Serve.

name: Shady Lady
instructions: Pour melon liqueur, tequila, and grapefruit juice over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Shaft
instructions: Pour Apoerol and gin over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Fill with sparkling white wine.

name: Shag by the Shore
instructions: Build the midori and orange into the collins glass, filled with ice, then pour peach schnapps and cranberry into mixing tin and shake with ice. Strain into glass so it floats above orange & midori. Float Blavod vodka on top.

name: Shakes - Party To Go
instructions: Drink the first 6oz of a fresh samantha and then discretely add the triple sec and vodka. Then shake baby.

name: Shamrock Juice
instructions: In an Hurricane Glass filled with Ice pour equal amounts of all liquors. Top off with Orange Juice. Garnish with a slice of an Orange and a couple of cherries.

name: Shamrocks
instructions: Mix equal parts Curacao and Vodka and and Orange Juice for a light green color.

name: Shanan's Bloody Mary
description:
Family recipe adjusted over years, a lot of work and a lot of ingredients but always well worth it and people always come back for another!Fill glass with ice. It's very important that spices are added first since they stick to the ice and help in the flavor.

Add a dash of salt, and celery salt, careful with both can be to salty, add pepper, tsp of horseradish, the thicker the better, a couple drops of worcestershire sauce and franks red hot, and only one dash of tabasco, and one dash of the angostura bloody mary seasoning (they just add a little to the flavoring!) Fill glass 1/2 with vodka and the rest with V8 juice, leave room for garnishes and rimmer, shake, rim glass add celery stalk, peperoncini, olive, lemon & lime wedge! If you have a jumbo shrimp tops it off-
instructions:
Fill glass with ice. It's very important that spices are added first since they stick to the ice and help in the flavor.

Add a dash of salt, and celery salt, careful with both can be to salty, add pepper, tsp of horseradish, the thicker the better, a couple drops of worcestershire sauce and franks red hot, and only one dash of tabasco, and one dash of the angostura bloody mary seasoning (they just add a little to the flavoring!) Fill glass 1/2 with vodka and the rest with V8 juice, leave room for garnishes and rimmer, shake, rim glass add celery stalk, peperoncini, olive, lemon & lime wedge! If you have a jumbo shrimp tops it off-

ingredients.name: 2 drops Frank's® Original red hot sauce

name: Shark Attack
instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

name: Shark Bite #2
instructions: Combine Myers's rum, Orange Juice, Sour Mix, and Ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into Hurricane Glass, and add Grenadine. Serve with a straw, but do not stir before serving.

name: Shark Tank
instructions: Mix vodka and lemonade in a large glass. Drop in grenadine last, but do not stir. Best served over ice, through a straw.

name: Shark's Tooth
instructions: Pour rum, lemon juice, lime juice, and grenadine in a short collins glass. Shake or stir, then add splash of soda.

name: Sharp Hill Sunrise
instructions: Pour the tequila, triple sec, orange juice and lime juice into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add Squirt, and a dash of salt. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Shattered Dreams
instructions:
Shake all ingredients except the 7-Up and pour over ice into the glass. Add a splash of 7-up and stir carefully: don't kill the carbonation.

Add the vodka if you wish to make the drink a little stronger, but you'll never taste the difference either way.

name: Shaved Pussy
instructions: On the rocks, collins galss. Over ice in mixing glass, add vodka, sour mix, lime soda and grenadine - shake the heck out of it. Service it up nice and pink with thin white fuzzy foam.

name: She Hulk
instructions: Layer over ice, Stir for transformation. Garnish with lime slice twist. Taste just as good without ice but chilled.

name: Sherry Cobbler
instructions: Pour into a wine goblet filled with broken ice and mix. Garnish with in-season fruit, add straws, and serve.

name: Sherry Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Shining Bull
description: Kat. Matisyahu concert 6/15 Cleveland, Ohio. This is a great big drink to nurse during an entire act, or to enjoy poolside. Tastes good and stays refreshing as the ice melts.Pour Stoli Ohranj over lots of ice in a large Collins glass, hurricane, or highball. Add 1 can of Red Bull Energy Drink. Top off with a large splash of Sprite (optional). Stir and enjoy.
instructions: Pour Stoli Ohranj over lots of ice in a large Collins glass, hurricane, or highball. Add 1 can of Red Bull Energy Drink. Top off with a large splash of Sprite (optional). Stir and enjoy.

name: Ship of Fools
description:
Originally served in Madison, Wisconsin by Christopher Walters. Invented as a rum-based variation to "The Three Wise Men" whiskey blend.Blend all ingredients together at high speed until slightly foamy. Serve in a collins glass over crushed ice.

Can also be blended directly with crushed ice for a "frozen" variation.
instructions:
Blend all ingredients together at high speed until slightly foamy. Serve in a collins glass over crushed ice.

Can also be blended directly with crushed ice for a "frozen" variation.

name: Ship's Doctor
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice. Garnish with a thermometer.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Shirley Tempest
instructions: In a high ball glass fill half with ice, pour 1.5 ounces of Bacardi Superior Rum. Fill 4/5 of the glass with sprite, add a squirt of grenadine for color/flavor, garnish with a cherry.

name: Shitface
instructions: Add rum, grenadine, and sugar syrup in glass. Fill with orange juice. Add ice and shake, strain into glass and garnish with marachino cherry.

name: Shocking Chocolate
instructions: Heat the hot chocolate and add the cinnamon schnapps.

name: Shogun
instructions: Mix in blender and garnish with orange slice.

name: Shoot
instructions: Mix everything and shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Serve.

name: Shoot to the Moon
instructions: In a tall drink glass, fill it up half way with cubed ice. Add liquor. Then add cranberry juice, grenadine and soda, and mix well.

name: Short Island Iced Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients, except Coke, over ice. Fill with Coca-cola and stir.

name: Shwin-tastic
instructions:
1.) Pour ginger ale into cup(do not add ice yet).
2.) Add 1 and 1/2 to 2 shots of Brandy.
3.) Stir moderatly with a stirring rod.
4.) Add 3- 4 ounces of Grape Juice and stir same as above.
5.) Add ice. Final color should look a bit darker than a regular beer.

name: Siberian Sunrise
instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into highball glass.

name: Sid's Special
instructions: Place cubes in glass, add gin, frozen lime juice concentrate, and 7-up then stir and enjoy.

name: SigTau Scorpion
instructions: Mix ingredients, stir, and add ice to bring level to top of glass.

name: Silent Death
instructions: Fill cup 3/4 full with ice. Add cherry vodka until glass is half full. Add sweet sour mix until glass is 3/4 full and then top off with sprite. Mix if desired but not necessary.

name: Silver Fizz
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender half-filled with ice. Pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Silver Stallion Fizz
instructions: Shake gin and vanilla ice-cream with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve

name: Simon Sez Seazar
instructions: Shake and serve in a hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a celery stalk.

name: Singapore Sling
instructions: Pour grenadine into the bottom of a collins glass, and fill with ice. Add gin, and almost-fill with equal parts of sweet and sour and chilled soda. Top with cherry brandy, and serve unstirred, garnished with a cherry.

name: Singapore Sling #2
instructions: Combine gin, cherry brandy, pineapple juice, and grenadine into a collins glass. Stir well. Top up with club soda and garnish with the cherry.

name: Sinlet
instructions: Mix the ingredients with a great deal of ice cubes and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Sir Francis
instructions: First, pour all 3 vodkas over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with grenadine, shake & serve.

name: Sister Starseeker
instructions: Pour the rum, lemon juice, grenadine, and tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Sixteen and a Half
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Skeet and Lean
instructions: Put 1 part Bacardi for every 1 part Grape Juice into a shaker. Shake vigorously. Pour and enjoy.

name: Ski Slope
instructions: Mix in any order, serve in glass with ice.

name: Skier's Toddy
instructions: Rinse out a large mug with boiling water, add steaming hot chocolate, and stir in liqueurs. Top with several marshmallows.

name: Skinhead Paramedic
instructions: Add all ingredients in a collins glass. Do not stir. Garnish with a lime wedge or an ear of baby corn.

name: Skinny Dipper
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Skip And Go Naked
instructions: Pour gin and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled beer, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Skipper's Ripper
instructions: Add rum, whiskey, and grenadine to glass. Fill the rest of the way with Coke. Stir once to mix.

name: Skittle
instructions:
Add Absolut Vodka and Banana Liqueur to Collins glass. Fill glass 3/4 full with Kool-Aid. Add crushed ice, stir, and serve.

Kool-Aid flavor determines what flavor Skittle you get.

name: Skittles
description: A drink that tastes curiously like Skittles (the red bag of different colored M&M-sized candy sweets). Created by Kyle Guinn, Puyallup, Washington.Add Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum and Coca-Cola to a collins glass. In a seperate container, mix all of the pineapple starfruit concentrate and the berry punch together. Pour into the collins glass until full, stir, and serve.
instructions: Add Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum and Coca-Cola to a collins glass. In a seperate container, mix all of the pineapple starfruit concentrate and the berry punch together. Pour into the collins glass until full, stir, and serve.

name: Skunk Teas
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large pitcher with ice. Stir, and serve in tall glasses.

name: Sky Blue Fallout
instructions: Mix all ingredients except 7-Up in a mixing glass. Pour into a hurricane glass and add the 7-Up. Stir lightly with a straw and serve.

name: Sky Captain
instructions: Mix Hpnotiq liqueur, Hennessy cognac, and Blue Curacao liqueur in a mixer. Strain into a highball glass with ice (can be ground or whole cubes, whichever you want). Pour in Sprite soda if you use whole ice cubes. Stir drink, and enjoy.

name: Sky Highball
instructions: Pour scotch whisky and pineapple juice into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Sprinkle curacao on top, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Skydiver
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add Skyy vodka, add orange juice, preferable fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Skylab
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Slammin' Sammy
instructions: Add amaretto and triple sec to ice-filled glass. Pour in orange juice and top off with apple-cranberry juice to taste. Stir.

name: Slap Your Mama
instructions: Shake one part Orange Juice and one part Vodka together. Pour over ice and add one part Mountain Dew, then stir slightly.

name: Sledgehammer
instructions: Pour vodka and lime juice over into a collins glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Top with Sunny Delight, stir well, and serve.

ingredients.name: Sunny Delight® Florida Style orange juice

name: Slemmig Slyna
instructions: Mix vodka and midori and kiwi with ice. Add sourmix. Shake. Fill with soda. Decorate glass with pineapple.

name: Slider
instructions: Add Rye, kahlua and milk to a high ball glass, glass should be full of ice. Stir and enjoy.

name: Slim's Sunrise
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice, stir, and serve.

name: Slimer
instructions: Mix ingredients listed above in the order stated. The best way to gauge if you've done it correctly is by color. It'll look like what it's called and it will taste like gummi worms.

name: Slimer #2
instructions: Add liquor first. Use a glass beverage container to highlight the the green color.

name: Slippery Dick #2
instructions: Pour Sprite and orange juice into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add triple sec, Smirnoff vodka and peach schnapps. Add a dash of sweet and sour mix if desired, and serve.

name: Slippery Eggs
instructions: Stir ingredients well so that the drink is the original color of the eggnog.

name: Slippery Surprise
instructions: Shake with three-quarters of a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of fruit, add straws, and serve.

name: Slippery Todd
instructions: Pour banana schnapps and vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add orange tangerine juice, and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw
instructions: Stir or shake ingredients & serve with ice.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #3
instructions: Pour gin, liqueurs and whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #4
instructions: Add the southern comfort to the sloe gin, and fill with orange juice. Float galliano on top, decorate with a cherry, and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Watching a Sunrise
instructions: Cover the bottom of a highball glass with a thin layer of grenadine, then fill the glass with ice. Combine the 42 Degress vodka, Southern comfort liqueur and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain over the ice into the highball glass. Garnish with two cherries, and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Collins
instructions: Shake sloe gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Add slices of lemon and orange, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Sloe Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake the gin, lemon juice and simple syrup with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with soda, garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Rickey
instructions: Pour sloe gin and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

name: Sloehand Jackson
instructions: Pour the sloe gin, gin, vodka, orange juice, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Sloughdriver
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add 2 shots of Blavod black vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with orange juice. Sprinkle shredded orange peel on top.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw
instructions: Pour sloe gin and Southern Comfort into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw on a Dogbox
instructions: Mix all ingredients in mason jar, add ice and enjoy.

name: Slow Gin and Tonic
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Add a half-slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Slow Screw
instructions: Pour sloe gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Slugger's Delight
instructions: Pour the Rock & Rye into a glass with ice. While the Rock & Rye is still fizzing, quickly add the 151 proof rum. Stir thouroughly before drinking. (Heavy concentrations of 151 have been known to cause a few sore throats.)

name: Slut Tits
instructions: Pour blue curacao and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with white cranberry strawberry juice, and stir. Top with a cherry, and serve.

ingredients.name: Ocean Spray White Cranberry & Strawberry Juice

name: Slutty Temple
instructions: Fill glass with ice, Incorporate all ingredients one at a time. Add cherry as garnish and enjoy with a straw.

name: Small Bomb #2
instructions: Begin by filling the glass halfway with Amaretto, add shots of melon, add shots of everclear, add rest of glass with pineapple juice, stir, then pour into glass with ice.

name: Small Sand
instructions: Mix the first 4 ingredients with ice. Fill with lemonade. Garnish with carambole and strawberry on the edge of glass.

name: SmegHead
instructions: Pour Jager & Malibu in glass of your choice, add apple juice and stir. Bottoms up!

name: Smiler
instructions: Pour tequila, lemon juice, sugar and port into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Smirnoff Snapple Spikage
instructions: Add half of glass with ice cubes. Add Vodka. Fill with Snapple. Mix and serve.

name: Smith and Kearns
instructions: Build in an iced highball glass. Top with soda, and serve.

name: Smith and Wesson
instructions: Pour vodka, kahlua, and cream into glass filled with ice, then top off with Pepsi.

name: Smooch
instructions: Pour into a tall glass over ice, shake to mix all ingredients well, garnish with a cherry or an orange slice if you so desire.

name: Smoochie Smoochie Blue
description: Created by Marco Almeida out of the need to include Gatorade's powerful electrolytes with the power of booze. A delicious and very refreshing drink for summer. Popular in Malibu, Scottsdale, San Diego, and other Sunny Places.Fill 1/2 of glass with crushed ice, add 2 oz of 99 Blackberries, fill glass with glacier freeze gatorade, add splash of Sprite or Sierra Mist for a little touch of fizz, garnish with lime and serve.
instructions: Fill 1/2 of glass with crushed ice, add 2 oz of 99 Blackberries, fill glass with glacier freeze gatorade, add splash of Sprite or Sierra Mist for a little touch of fizz, garnish with lime and serve.

ingredients.name: 10 oz Gatorade® Glacier Freeze energy drink

name: Smoochie Smoochie Red
description: Created by Marco Almeida out of the need to include Gatorade's powerful electrolytes with the power of booze. A delicious and very refreshing drink for summer. Popular in Malibu, Scottsdale, San Diego, and other Sunny Places.Fill 1/2 of glass with crushed ice, add 2 oz of 99 Blackberries, fill glass with fruit punch gatorade, add splash of Sprite or Sierra Mist for a little touch of fizz, garnish with lime and serve.
instructions: Fill 1/2 of glass with crushed ice, add 2 oz of 99 Blackberries, fill glass with fruit punch gatorade, add splash of Sprite or Sierra Mist for a little touch of fizz, garnish with lime and serve.

ingredients.name: 10 oz Gatorade® Fruit Punch energy drink

name: Smooth Sailing
instructions: Serve over ice. Drizzle cherry brandy over the top of the other ingredients. Garnish with lime and a cherry.

name: Smooth Teenager
instructions: Add ingredients to a tall chilled glass. Stir and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Smurf Cocktail
instructions: Take the vodka in first, then orange juice and sprite. Then you take some dashes of grenadine and stirr it around for 20 sec. On the top of it you have a little dash of Strawb.marg.mix. Add ice cubes.

name: Smurf Piss #2
instructions: Pour vodka and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade, and serve.

name: Smurf-o-Tonic
instructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want, you can add the blue curacao after stirring the drink.

name: Smurfs Up
instructions: Combine and stir.

name: Snake Piss
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir occasionally.

name: Snapple and Schnapps
instructions: Fill shaker (or glass) with crushed ice. Pour schnapps in first and top with Snapple. Shake like hell and pour into a frosted (preferably) highball glass.

name: Snapple Sensation
instructions: Mix the Snapple and whiskey in a pewter martini shaker. (preferably pewter because it keeps the drink so cold). Next step put crushed ice in very last so you do not water down the drink. Serve in a martini glass or a hurricane glass with 4 lemon drops.

name: Sneaky Ashley's
instructions: Make sure the frozen pink lemonade mix is in the fridge or out, where it can become liquid before preparing the drinks. Cut up two large peaches, or three small ones, depending on size. Use as much of the peach as possible, and throw the pitts away. Put the cut up peaches in the blender, and pour eight ounces(roughly half the can) of the  pink lemonade mix into the blender as wel. Then add eight to ten ounces of vodka, depending on tastes. Fill the remainder of the blender with ice, until it is completely full. Then blend, and serve!

name: Sneaky Bastard
instructions: Mix Midori, Malibu, Curacao, vodka & pineapple juice into shaker. Shake well. Pour into Highball. Sit back and enjoy.

name: Sneeky Sucker
instructions: Mix all ingredients together with lots of ice.

name: Sno-Cone
instructions: Fill glass with ice, then add schnapps & 7-Up. Add Grenadine and let settle to the bottom of the glass. Carefully float the Blue Curacao over the top of the drink.

name: Snoop Dogg
instructions: Pour orange juice over chilled Tanqueray.  Stir gently.  Sip while rollin down the street smoking endo.

name: Snow Melt
instructions: Pour Vodka and Amaretto into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate.Top with whipped cream or marshmellows and cherry.

name: Snow Snake
instructions: Larger glass can be used if more cream or milk is needed to soften the impact of the drink.

name: Snowball
instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Snowballs
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed completely. Pour into a collins glass, and serve into two highball glasses or one very tall glass.

name: Snowplow
instructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste, add booze, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Snowshot
instructions: Throw all ingredients into blender. Add sugar to taste, sweet lemons dont need more than one cube. Blend until the consistancy resembles a daiquiri.

name: Snuggler
