If you can't find Viuda de Sanchez, I've substituted it with a good quality Orange juice, a lime, and Pico de Gallo seasoning a good brand is Via nueva, but is won't make your drink red like Viuda de Sanchez mix will and that’s why the drink is call Vampiro (In English it translates to Vampire) because its looks red.

name: Van Gogh
description: Absinthe is not legal in the US because it contains wormwood; however, you are able to purchase the US version without this ingredient.In a Champagne flute combine Cassis, Absinthe and Black Berry Brandy. Top off to the top with Champagne. Stir very lightly. Enjoy!
instructions: In a Champagne flute combine Cassis, Absinthe and Black Berry Brandy. Top off to the top with Champagne. Stir very lightly. Enjoy!

name: Vanilla Coke
instructions: Pour southern comfort and vanilla liqueur over ice in a collins glass. Fill with coke, and serve.

name: Vanilla Creamsicle
instructions: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add cold milk, stir, and serve immediately.

name: Vanilla Island Paradise
instructions: Combine Malibu Coconut Rum and fill the rest of the glass with Vanilla Coke. Mix. Serve. May add ice.

name: Vanilla Pig
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass. Add ice if desired, and serve.

name: Vanilla Vargas
instructions: Pour liquors, in order, into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Top with pepsi, stir well with a barspoon, and serve.

name: Varadero Sunrise
description: Varadero Sunrise is a very popular drink in the hotels and resort locations around Cuba. Looks great for the colors. Pour orange juice into a highball glass. Add grenadine carefully so that it will stay at the bottom. Carefully add some ice cubes. Seperately combine and mix the rum and blue curacao, and layer the mixture into the highball glass so that it floats or remains on top. Add a straw, and serve.
instructions: Pour orange juice into a highball glass. Add grenadine carefully so that it will stay at the bottom. Carefully add some ice cubes. Seperately combine and mix the rum and blue curacao, and layer the mixture into the highball glass so that it floats or remains on top. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Vaughn Purple Haze
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, and add razzmatazz. Fill with cranberry juice, mix, and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer #2
instructions: Pour creme de cacao, vodka and cream into a blender. Add ice, half a sliced banana, and sugar to taste. Blend until smooth and pureed, and pour into a glass. Serve.

name: Velvet Hammer #4
instructions: Combine all liquids and mix. Pour into cup and add gummi bears, drink using red vines as a straw. A secret ingredient is usually added to make each batch unique. Use your imagination! (amaretto, lemonade, and rum all make good secret ingredients).

name: Velvet Presley
instructions: Pour bourbon over ice, add chocolate milk until creamy, and serve.

name: Velvet Tongue
instructions: Pour southern comfort and canadian club whisky over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Vermont Maple Blaster
instructions: Pour vodka into an ice-filled collins glass, add vodka and syrup, and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis
instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis Tall
instructions: Pour the vermouth and creme de cassis into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda, and stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Very Berry Tonic
instructions: Pour vodka and chambord into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with tonic water, garnish with two fresh raspberries, and serve.

name: Vesper
instructions: Shake well until ice cold, strain into a deep champagne goblet. Add a thin slice of lemon-peel.

name: Vibrator
instructions: Pour liquors into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with equal parts of orange and cranberru juice. Shake, garnish with two cherries, and serve.

name: Vicker's Treat
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Victory Collins
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Viking Blood
instructions: Pour aquavit and tia maria over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with sprite or 7-up, stir, and serve.

name: Viking's Helmet
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, add a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Villa Park
instructions: Combine bourbon, orange juice and pineapple juice in a shaker, and shake well. Pour into a highball glass with ice, and serve.

name: Violent Fuck
instructions: Pour curacao and sloe gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with equal parts of sour mix and orange juice, and blend briefly. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Violetta
instructions: Add anis, parfait d'amour, juice and grenadine to a cocktail shaker. Fill with soda water, and shake. Pour into a collins glass, and garnish with a slice of orange, mint sprig and a cherry. Serve with straws.

name: Vit Ryss
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass, add ice, and mix.

name: Vitamin V
description: Stoli, soda, orange. The elemental components. Overwhelming ice immediately bringing the whole construct down dramatically in temperature. Straw mashing down the slice to release the acids, mixing with the soda and balancing out the vodka.Fill glass /w ice. Add the Stoli and soda.
instructions: Fill glass /w ice. Add the Stoli and soda.

name: Vodka "7"
instructions: Pour vodka and lime juice over ice cubes in a collins glass. Drop the lime wedge in and fill with lemon-lime soda. Stir well, and serve.

name: Vodka Amp
instructions: Add ice to a pitcher. Pour in vodka, Amp, and top off with sweet and sour mix. Pour into highball glasses, and serve.

name: Vodka and Apple Juice
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over three or four ice cubes. Fill with apple juice, stir, and serve.

name: Vodka and Bitter Lemon
instructions: Combine vodka, lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with tonic water, and serve.

name: Vodka and Coke
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add Coca-cola, add a straw, and serve.

name: Vodka and Schweppes
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Vodka and Tonic
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes, and fill with tonic water. Stir, and serve.

name: Vodka Bitter Lemon
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, add bitter lemon to taste, and serve.

name: Vodka Collins
instructions: Shake vodka, lemon juice and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with slices of orange and lemon, and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Vodka Cooler
instructions: Pour the vodka and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Vodka Fizz
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except nutmeg), and pour into a large white wine glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Vodka Greyhound
instructions: Pour vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Vodka Orange
instructions: Pour vodka over three or four ice cubes in a highball glass, and add fresh orange juice.

name: Vodka Pina Colada
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker and swirl until sugar is dissolved. Sweeten further if needed. Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and strain into a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Vodka Ricki
instructions: Pour vodka into a tall, ice-filled glass. Add sprite, and squeeze in the lime wedges.

name: Vodka Russian
instructions: Combine ingredients in a tall glass with ice cubes and serve.

name: Vodka Salty Dog
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

name: Vodka Sonic
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add equal parts of soda and tonic, to taste, and garnish with a wedge of lime. Serve.

name: Vodka Sunrise
instructions: Mix vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Vodka Swizzle
instructions: Add the lime juice, sugar, vodka and bitters to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture from the shaker into the glass, and add club soda. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Vodkalenius
instructions: Stir pre-chilled ingredients with ice cubes in a grog-like glass. Add a straw if desired, and serve.

name: Vokter Pepper
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Volcano
instructions: Pour liquors into a champagne flute, and fill with ice-cold champagne. Add a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Volga Boatsman
description: Volga Boatman is a Russian recipe makes use of a chilled copper cup, which is the customary way to serve this recipe. It also uses Kamchatka vodka, the best-selling liquor in Ohio.Pour the vodka into a cup. Add collins mix, stir, then squeeze the lime into the mixture. Add an ice cube, and serve.
instructions: Pour the vodka into a cup. Add collins mix, stir, then squeeze the lime into the mixture. Add an ice cube, and serve.

name: Volga Volga
instructions: Stir liquors over crushed ice in a small highball glass. Fill with tonic water, and serve.

name: Voodoo Dew
instructions: Pour shots into a mason jar or large glass. Add mountain dew, mix well, and serve.

name: Voodoo Sunrise
instructions: Pour rum and vodka into a collins glass. Tilt the glass, and pour the grenadine down the inside. Fill with chilled orange juice, and serve.

name: Wa-Hoo-Wa
instructions: Combine vodka and curacao in a collins glass over ice. Fill with orange juice. Stir and serve.

name: Waikiki Beach
instructions: Rim a wine goblet with egg white and sweet grated coconut. Shake ingredients, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Walk Me Down (Sweet Jesus)
instructions: Shake ingredients (except Sprite) together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add Sprite and stir. Strain into a hurricane glass over ice, and serve.

name: Walk the Plank
instructions: Pour rum over ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir. Garnish with cherries.

name: Walker's Revenge
instructions: Add rums over ice and fill glass with ice tea. Best in a tall frosty glass.

name: Ward Eight
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a red wine glass filled with cracked ice. Add the orange slice, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Wasabi Bloody Mary
instructions: Combine lime juice and wasabi with a whisk, until wasabi dissolves. Pour into a pitcher, and add veggie juice, worcestershire sauce, pepper sauce and salt. Chill. Stir in vodka and serve over ice, with a stalk of celery or pickled asparagus. Serves 8.

name: Washington Apple Cocktail
instructions: Pour DeKuyper sour apple pucker and Crown Royal canadian whisky into a highball glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice, more to taste if desired, and serve.

name: Water from the River Ganges
description:
Especially in northern parts of Denmark is this drink in vogue, invented by bartender Nikolaj Hyldig, working on the Esbjerg - Newcastle - Hamburg ferry-line.

Water from the River Ganges gets its name from the appearance of the liquid, not from its taste!Add 1/4 slice lime to the bottom of a highball glass, along with 2 ice cubes. Pour the Stolichnaya vodka, orange juice and Coca-cola into the glass in that order, and serve.
instructions: Add 1/4 slice lime to the bottom of a highball glass, along with 2 ice cubes. Pour the Stolichnaya vodka, orange juice and Coca-cola into the glass in that order, and serve.

name: Watercolour
instructions: Mix liquors together and add pineapple juice to taste. Garnish with a cherry or a pineapple chunk.

name: Watermelon
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Watermelon Crawl
instructions: Fill a 16 oz pint glass with ice, pour the above in. Garnish with cherries.

name: Watermelon Crawl # 2
instructions: Half fill glass with ice cubes. Add liquor and fill with mountain dew.

name: Watermelon Pucker Fucker
instructions: Mix in a hurricane glass.

name: Watermelon Slice
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add grenadine, then vodka, rum, gin and triple sec. Fill with half orange juice and half cranberry juice. Float with midori. Drink should be presented as is but stirred before drinking.

name: Watermelon-Kazi
description: Watermelon Kazi is, as you may have guessed, a variant of the Kamikaze. It was sent in by a Mr. Will K. after he hit lucky on this tasty recipe.Pour all ingredients over 2 or 3 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir, and serve. Add water if too strong, until just right.
instructions: Pour all ingredients over 2 or 3 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir, and serve. Add water if too strong, until just right.

name: Wave Runner
instructions: Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add sprite, stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.

name: Wedding Anniversary
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Welcome Stanger
instructions: Shake with ice and strain.

name: West Indian Punch
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass. Fill with crushed ice, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Western Sling
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and slice of orange, add a twist of lemon, add straws, and serve.

name: Westwood Ice Tea
instructions: In a beer mug full of ice, pour in the tequila, gin, light rum and stir. Stir in the cinnamon schnapps, then stir in the vanilla vodka. Splash the high proof rum on top.

name: Wet and Wild Lip Tickler
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with an orange wedge, and serve.

name: Wet Kiss
instructions: Layer the ingredients in the order listed into a shot glass. It is also good over ice in a highball glass.

name: What She's Having
instructions: Pour in vodka, then fill with the orange juice. Add the amaretto which should mostly sink to the bottom. Splash in some grenadine to cloud the center of the drink. Serve without mixing or stirring.

name: Whippersnapper
instructions: Add rum, fresca, and 1 or 2 ice cubes to a highball glass and serve.

name: Whippet
instructions: Made as in a normal vodka and orange, with raspberry cordial added last.

name: Whiskey Collins
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Decorate with slices of orange, lemon, and top with the cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Whiskey Cooler
instructions: Pour the whiskey and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Whiskey Daisy
instructions: Slice the lemon quarter in half, and muddle with the lime, syrup and chartreuse in a mixing glass. Add whiskey, shake well with ice, and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lemon and lime wedge, a cherry, and serve.

name: Whiskey Fix
instructions: Shake juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add blended whiskey and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

name: Whiskey Fizz
instructions: Shake whiskey, juice and syrup and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with lemon-lime soda, and serve.

name: Whiskey Highball
instructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Whiskey Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Whiskey Orange The Jesperian Way
instructions: Mix together in a whiskey sour glass.

name: Whiskey Plush
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled wine glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Whiskey Rickey
instructions: Pour blended whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

name: Whiskey Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the water and whiskey in a highball glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice and add club soda. Float tawny port on top. Garnish with a lemon twist, and dust with nutmeg and cinnamon. Serve.

name: Whiskey Sling
instructions: Pour whiskey, lemon juice, sugar and water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Whiskey Swizzle
instructions: Pour the whiskey, bitters, lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until the glass is frosted. Shake the contents of the cocktail shaker, and strain into the collins glass. Add club soda, add a swizzle stick, and serve.

name: Whisky Melba
instructions: Muddle a small piece of fresh ginger in the glass. Fill glass with ice, add whisky and ginger ale. Drop in a strip of lemon peel and stir gently.

name: Whisper Jet
instructions: In shaker glass, put in ice, then add all of the liquor and brandies as in order, then add the orange juice and sweet and sour mix.   Shake and pour into Hurricane glass.  Garnish with orange slice and cherry on toothpick or umbrella.

name: White Ape
instructions: Make hot chocolate, add bailey's and ground cinnamon. Float whipped cream on top.

name: White Bat
instructions: Build all ingredients in a tall glass over ice. Stir, add a straw, and serve.

name: White Bull
instructions: Pour ice into a glass, add tequila and kahlua, fill with cream, shake and serve.

name: White Carnation
instructions: Stir and pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: White Cloud
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: White Elephant
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender, and mix until smooth and thick. Serve with a straw, and a garnish of shredded coconut.

name: White Girl
instructions: Pour Bailey's irish cream, Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka over ice in a parfait glass. Fill with milk or cream, stir, and serve.

name: White Jamaican
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice and pour in the ingredients. Speed shake and serve.

name: White Lightning
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a blender. Vary the amount of vodka according to how buzzed you want to be. Remember, it must have at least 2 oz. of vodka in order to be called white lightning. Serve in a tall glass.

name: White Lizard
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass 1/2 filled with ice, and serve.

name: White Rabbit
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add in the vodka, vanilla liqueur, and milk. Shake and serve.

name: White Romanian
instructions: Pour Stoli vodka, kahlua and banana liqueur into a highball glass or cup with ice. Top off with milk, followed by two slices of thinly cut bananas. Stir and serve.

name: White Splash
instructions: Add the cola slowly to the pina colada mix.

name: White Ukrainian
description: "Many things Russian are actually a slightly watered down version of something cooler in Ukrainian (anyone who tells you differently is buying into years of communist propoganda).  So clearly a White Russian is just a watered down version of the real drink which has been kept hidden behind the iron curtain for far too long.". Thanks to Anna Lawrence.Pour all alcohol directly into glass (over ice, if preferred).  Add milk.  Stir.  Serve.
instructions: Pour all alcohol directly into glass (over ice, if preferred).  Add milk.  Stir.  Serve.

name: Whop Me Down Sweet Jesus
instructions: Best in a large mason jar. Blue going down, blue coming up.

name: Wicked Apple
instructions: Pour jagermeister into a highball glass filled with ice. Add vodka, and almost fill completely with apple juice. Add just a splash of ginger ale, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Wild Cherry
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Wild Sacramento
instructions: Add everything but the bitters and lemon juice to a blender with four ice cubes. Blend for less than a half minute (the ice cubes should not be totally disintegrated). Pour into a highball glass, add the bitters and lemon juice, and serve.

name: Wild Sex
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, pour in malibu, peach schnapps and 151. Pour juices on top followed by a splash of grenadine. Use a shaker tin to cover the glass and give a couple of good shakes.

name: Wild Wendy
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shaker. Shake well. Serve in a highball glass over ice.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Wile E Coyote
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass.

name: Will to Live
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: William's Rainbow
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in vodka, then fill up with sprite. Slowly pour the blue curacao on top, followed by the grenadine. Serve as is, allowing the guest to stir it until purple.

name: Windy Beach
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Makes 2 servings.

name: Winning Horse
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet, and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Winter Breeze
instructions: Pour liquors into a beer mug, and fill with milk. Stir, and serve.

name: Winter Tropic
instructions: Pour vodka into a hurricane glass. Add cranberry juice and margarita mix simultaneously, and serve.

name: Wisconsin Badger
description: Scott Bentley, inventor - instructor at the Bartending College, 739 S.108th St. West Allis, WI. The Wisconsin Badger incorporates flavors of the state - cranberrys, apples and berries - and favorites of the state - brandy, schnaaps and beer. The Wisconsin Badger, a new refreshing legend...Fill mug w/ice and add ingredients. Stir with a red and white straw (preferably). Serve with a New Glarus Spotted Cow beer chaser.
instructions: Fill mug w/ice and add ingredients. Stir with a red and white straw (preferably). Serve with a New Glarus Spotted Cow beer chaser.

name: Wobbler
instructions: Pour vodka into a glass one-quarter filled with ice. Fill until two-thirds full with grape juice, and fill completely with russian water. Add a touch of grenadine, and serve.

name: Wolf (Howlin')
instructions: Pour spirits in a glass. Add some ice and fill up with Sprite. Prefered served with a blue cherry.

name: Wolfsbane
instructions: Rub the inside of a highball glass with lemon juice, and sprinkle with sugar. Frost in a freezer. Shake ingredients, pour into the frosted glass, and serve.

name: Wonder Woman
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients, in order, into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Serve unstirred, garnished with a cherry.

name: Woo Woo
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Woody Woodpecker
instructions: Shake cachaca and juice with ice, and pour into a collins glass. Add galliano, and serve.

name: Wooly Mitten
instructions: Place cocoa powder into a mug, half-fill with hot water, and stir. Pour in the southern comfort, peppermint schnapps, and bailey's. Stir, add more hot water, and top with whipped cream.

name: Worcester Tramp
description:
The name is based on its place of origin, Tramps Nightclub - Worcester. "As far as I know there is no cocktail of similar flavour. I serve it in the bar I work at to regular praise." Take 4-5 strawberries and crush in a mixer, add the vodka, cointreau, and chocolate liqueur, preferably bols creme de cacau. Take 2 small oranges and chop into quarters, add these to the mixer and crush, leave the rinds on. (these can be substituted for orange juice but make sure its a full bodied juice not a cheap supermarket brand.)

Shake these together with ice and serve in a collins glass.
instructions:
Take 4-5 strawberries and crush in a mixer, add the vodka, cointreau, and chocolate liqueur, preferably bols creme de cacau. Take 2 small oranges and chop into quarters, add these to the mixer and crush, leave the rinds on. (these can be substituted for orange juice but make sure its a full bodied juice not a cheap supermarket brand.)

Shake these together with ice and serve in a collins glass.

name: Wrightsville Sunset
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain into a large white wine glass half-filled with crushed ice.

name: Wu Wu
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add equal parts of orange and cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Yager's Bloody Mary Jane
instructions: Fill large glass with ice and fill with all ingredients, mix and add large green olives or celery stick. You can add more or less vodka but don't forget the 1/4 cup of water or it just won't taste right.

name: Yellow Bird
instructions: Pour all the alcoholic ingredients in a highball glass. Stir sour mix in a mixer and fill the glass.

name: Yellow Bird #2
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Yellow Birdie
instructions:
Pour Vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir.

*Can substitute Light Rum for Vodka.

name: Yellow Fever
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Yellow Fingers
instructions: Shake all but the curacao and lemonade very well and strain into a double-cocktail glass. Add lemonade, and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Using a thin straw, place drops of blue curacao in neat rows across the frothy white surface, and serve immediately.

name: Yellow Parakeet
instructions: Fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour.

name: Yellow Sock
instructions: Add the vodka along with the pisang ambon. Fill with orange juice and stir.

name: Yes!
instructions: Pour rum, passoa, orange vodka and cherry liqueur into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Fill with Red Bull, and serve.

name: Yo Mama Cocktail
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add soda, top with a splash of orange juice, and serve.

name: Yoda
instructions:
Mix the Sour Mix and Blue Curacao together in a shaker, or if you don't have a shaker, two identical glasses will work if you are careful. 

Use more or less Blue Curacao depending on how green your Sour Mix was to begin with. Once those are mixed into a nice green color, add the Midori and then the Pucker. Finally add the splash of Vodka, and mix a couple more times, then pour over ice.

name: YoYo Blow Out
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.

name: Yukon Dew Me
instructions: Just mix and drink.

name: Yummy Bidnis
instructions: Combine ingredients in highball glass and stir.

name: Yuppidoo
instructions: Shake all on ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Zack Attack
instructions: Pour ingredients over lots of ice in a blue-tinted collins glass. Garnish with blueberries, and serve.

name: Zadarade
instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Add absolut mandrin, triple sec, and sour mix. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and pineapple. Shake, and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.

name: Zico
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Zimadori Zinger
instructions: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori - don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Zimamazing
instructions:
Put the first six ingredients in a shaker glass without ice and shake until frothy. Fill glass with ice and pour Zima and the contents of the shaker glass at the time so it is a one-to-one ratio. Stir and serve. Makes about four drinks.(depending on the ice)

Tastes like an Electric Lemonade with Zima instead of lemon-lime soda and more sour mix. Instead of triple sec, you can also use blue curacao. It makes it a pretty blue-green drink.

Also, keep a LOT of extra ice on hand because this drink has so much alcohol it melts the ice immediately, which is why you should not put ice in the shaker, it will dilute the drink.

name: Zimaretto
instructions: Pour about 2 ounces of Amaretto into a 16 oz. glass and fill with Zima.

name: Zocolo
instructions: Pour dark rum, tequila, pineapple juice and grapefruit juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda and stir well. Garnish with a slice of orange, a pineapple wedge, and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Zombie
instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice except Bacardi 151 proof rum. Pour into a collins glass. Float Bacardi 151 proof rum on top. Garnish with a fruit slice, sprig of mint and a cherry.

name: Zombie #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except 151 proof rum) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Float the 151 proof rum on top, add a cherry (if desired), and serve.

name: Zombie #3
instructions: Shake over ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Zombie #4
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except the high-proof rum) over ice, the pineapple stick and the sugar. Strain and add ice. Garnish with pineapple and a cherry. Float the high-proof rum on top and sprinkle a little sugar over it.

name: Zombie #5
instructions: Strain ingredients into collins glass filled with ice. Top with 151 Proof Rum.

name: Zombie (UK Style)
description: Based on original recipe and is incredibly tasty and guaranteed to knock your socks off! Thanks to L.J., Henry Africa's Hothouse, Bristol, UK.Shake first 7 ingredients hard and strain over fresh ice into large glass. Float overproof rum then drizzle grenadine. Garnish with pineapple flag/leaf and orange wedge
instructions: Shake first 7 ingredients hard and strain over fresh ice into large glass. Float overproof rum then drizzle grenadine. Garnish with pineapple flag/leaf and orange wedge

name: Zone 23
description: Invented by the owner and served as the signature drink at Zone 23, Bronx NY,  the cocktail is a radical modification of " Sex on the Beach".  It is  seductive, colorful, suprisingly potent, and highly addictive!Fill 2/3rds a Libby's # 11 water glass or large red wine goblet  with ice cubes. Pour each ingredient in the order given without stirring or shaking.  The orange juice should be  drizzled over the top. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.  A wedge of fresh orange or lime on the rim is optional.
instructions: Fill 2/3rds a Libby's # 11 water glass or large red wine goblet  with ice cubes. Pour each ingredient in the order given without stirring or shaking.  The orange juice should be  drizzled over the top. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.  A wedge of fresh orange or lime on the rim is optional.

name: Zoot
instructions: Pour gin and 7-up over ice cubes in a glass, and float the jack daniel's on top. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Zulu
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add cola, garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.
